provider_name: "Play Strong Kids"- Building Resilience and Ending Behavioral and Emotional Challenges in Children
review_text:
We participated in the parent-led CPRT (Child-Parent Relationship Therapy) with Dr. Jen, and it was truly eye-opening. She gave us practical tools that helped us build a deeper connection with our child and strengthen our overall relationship as a family. The structure of the weekly sessions led to a real paradigm shift in how we understand our child‚Äôs emotions and thought processes.

Even after completing the program, we've continued our individual special playtime sessions‚Äîand they‚Äôve made a lasting impact. Our bond with our children has grown stronger, and communication has improved significantly.

We are so grateful to Dr. Jen for her guidance, insight, and support. We highly recommend her to any parent looking to build a more connected, empathetic, and joyful relationship with their child.

provider_name: "Play Strong Kids"- Building Resilience and Ending Behavioral and Emotional Challenges in Children
review_text: I am thrilled with the progress we have made through play therapy! Thank you so much Dr. Jen for being so patient and kind and helpful through this entire process. If your child is a child of divorce, or is having any struggles with school and behavior, this is the perfect solution.

provider_name: "Play Strong Kids"- Building Resilience and Ending Behavioral and Emotional Challenges in Children
review_text:
The parent led CPRT program was life changing for our family.
Our favorite things were:

- Each week, Dr. Jen‚Äôs feedback was specific, personalized and tailored to our family and child‚Äôs goals
- Dr. Jen‚Äôs utmost respect for children, their concerns and their feelings made this program really special. We felt our child had a behind-the-scenes ally and advocate.
- The virtual structure of the program (online meetings, prerecorded lessons) made it accessible so both parents could participate. Play time could be scheduled at home.
- We saw a weight lift off our child throughout the 10 weeks. They are more exited to connect, to express themselves and to play. Our family is so happy to have the skills to keep play time moving forward and have the outlet to let our child‚Äôs confidence and creativity grow.

provider_name: "Play Strong Kids"- Building Resilience and Ending Behavioral and Emotional Challenges in Children
review_text:
Bringing home our newborn last May was a joyful time, but it also introduced some major challenges with our toddler. He became hostile toward my wife and the baby, extremely defiant, and had frequent, explosive meltdowns. Every day felt like a battle, and after trying several other methods with little success, we felt completely helpless and defeated. That‚Äôs when we reached out to Dr. Jen for a consultation‚Äîand we are SO glad we did!

Dr. Jen introduced us to her virtual, parent-driven CPRT course, and it was truly a game-changer. She helped us understand what our toddler was going through mentally and emotionally, shifting our entire perspective on how to support him. Through her guidance, we learned how to conduct ‚Äúspecial play times‚Äù and received incredibly thoughtful, specific feedback that helped us refine even the most nuanced aspects of our interactions with him.

Beyond the structured lessons, Dr. Jen took the time to dive deep into our specific struggles, offering detailed, actionable advice that made a real difference. She never made us feel rushed, and her thorough, compassionate approach made every session valuable. On top of that, she‚Äôs an absolute pleasure to work with‚Äîsupportive, engaging, and full of warmth. We even shared plenty of laughs along the way!

Thanks to Dr. Jen, our home life has completely transformed. If you‚Äôre struggling with a challenging toddler, we can‚Äôt recommend her enough. She gave us the tools, knowledge, and confidence to navigate this season of parenting with so much more understanding and positivity.

provider_name: "Play Strong Kids"- Building Resilience and Ending Behavioral and Emotional Challenges in Children
review_text:
Dr. Jen is fantastic, truly a phenomenal person. We reached out to her for a consultation and quickly realized she was the perfect person to help. Dr. Jen is very thorough and compassionate at what she does. From the first week until the last of our 10-week CRT course, she provided us with invaluable feedback and knowledge.

We are very proud that our toddler gave up his aggressive behavior in such a short time and also learned some amazing behavioral ‚Äúhacks‚Äù as well as how to frame dialogue to build strong and confident children. We would encourage anyone having difficulty with a struggling child to reach out to Dr. Jen for a consult and see if she can assist!

Dr Jen impacted our lives in a very positive way and helped us be better parents by helping us understand our kids and why they do the things they do. We truly felt Dr. Jen was an angel sent to us!

We absolutely love this chiropractic office! It‚Äôs always clean, cheerful, and so welcoming‚Äîespecially for families. The kids‚Äô play area is such a thoughtful touch, and Dr. Kiani has been wonderful with my newborn, making sure everything was aligned and her head was shaping beautifully after birth. The front desk is always warm and friendly, and every visit feels like we‚Äôre being truly cared for. Couldn‚Äôt recommend them more!

THIS IS NOT A CHIROPRACTOR!!!!!!!!! They do not care to help you at all, all smoke and mirrors with gimmicks and DO NOT ACTUALLY ADDRESS THE SPINE. She did zero adjustment, told me I didn‚Äôt feel it or hear it but that she did adjust me. She talked down to me like I don‚Äôt know my body or what a chiropractor is supposed to do. I have been going to a chiropractor every week sometimes 3 times a week for the last 32 years, all over the nation, this is hands down the worst service I‚Äôve ever seen and was very much made to feel like I was an inconvenience when I was trying to tell her what my body needed, so I chose not to be seen a second time. She still charged me full price after she said she wouldn‚Äôt, and I had my friend on the phone the whole time just to monitor how I acted cause I sometimes have issues with confrontation, and my friend was cussing up one side and down the other when she heard how this lady spoke down to me as if I was a 3 year old who doesn‚Äôt understand my body. So I will be fighting for my 40 dollars back just out of general principle. I would‚Äôve gladly paid the 25 for the cancellation within 24 hours, but she wasted 94 seconds on me and charged me full price. If you‚Äôre looking for people to suck you in and keep charging you money, this is your place, but if you want help with your body, go almost anywhere else. I just drove 4200 miles over 11 days and the very next person I found actually helped me immediately while I could hardly walk leaving this place still

I started seeing Dr. Olivia after my car accident and have been continuing with regular visits after. I highly recommend 24/7 Chiropractic, everyone here is so welcoming and friendly. I was terrified of chiropractors before my first appointment, and Dr. Olivia has changed my view on that. She makes the appointments enjoyable and very personable. I am not just another patient here, everyone has gotten to know me and I think that makes the a world of difference, it‚Äôs not just another stone cold visit somewhere. My husband and I look forward to our appointments every week. If you‚Äôre looking for a great chiropractic team, HIGHLY recommend checking them out.

During the hurricane season in 2022, I went through a very testing time due to severe back pain. Bad weather and lack of mobility, forced me to look for emergency chiropractic services online. I stumbled upon 24/7 Chiropractic Wellness & Rehab, with a friend's help I stepped into their clinic with immense pain.

Right from the beginning, both chiropractors took real good care of me and I was able to feel the relief & comfort after every visit.

Dr. Olivia & Dr. Kiani - a blessing in bundle! ü§ù

Absolutely amazing team - from the front desk to the Chiropractors. They have helped me with my herniated disks and other issues. Love the included relaxation therapies they offer before your appointment.

3C's is a game changer. This staff is stellar, and UNDERSTANDS OUR KIDS. I've had 20 years of raising children with various special needs, and I've never experienced anything like the team here. If your child needs any help socially/emotionally, they'll be in the best hands here. 100% recommend!

As a therapist, I refer to 3C's often with confidence! The 3C's team and their groups approach to social success is exactly what our community needs. Chrissy, Caitlin and the whole team are warm, empathetic and driven to support families in areas that usually go unmet. As a provider in Central FL, I enjoy partnering with 3C's because they truly care about the individuals and families they work with!

The 3 C‚Äôs crew is amazing.  They have met our family right where we needed them.  Not only are they amazing with our son they have been an immense resource for us the parents.  They walked along side us through a difficult situation with school, but we made it through it and now he is thriving at a new school!
The 3Cs team are completely dedicated to the children‚Äôs progress. The support they provide the kids and their families is amazing and so reassuring!

Everyone in 3C's is incredible and I cannot recommend them any more highly! My son, who is on the spectrum, has grown so much in the year we have been in 3 C's. He LOVES going to the sessions, it is one of the highlights of his week. He gets to connect with other incredible kids like himself, be guided by the most caring therapists, play games, and feel supported and empowered. He feels loved and accepted there - how I wish he felt everywhere! Chrissy cares about each and every child AND family and it shows. Her (beautiful!) practice is truly a place of love and hope, where kids are appreciated for who they are, encouraged to love who they are, while also taught skills they need to thrive in the world. I only wish that every kid who need social skills had access to a practice as wonderful as 3C's!

***I also wanted to mention that we first came to 3Cs when my son had just been diagnosed (at 5 years old, 3 years before we started sessions) and at that point he was not ready for groups. She recommended OT (which helped him immensely) and individual therapy. At that point I was a dissapointed because I really wanted to give my son all opportunities. However, as soon as he was ready for groups, Chrissy happily took him in. I realize now that it was the best timing because he would not have been ready before and now he is and can gain the most from the therapy (and your investment). My advice to parents on the waitlist or whose children are evaluated but are not ready for groups is to reach back out to 3c's because when they are ready, it will truly make a difference.

Truly an amazing program and facility. Everything is clean. The communication has been nothing less than consistent. My sons therapist is Jennifer and I can see and feel that she treats my son as her own child with love kindness and patience. In the short month he has been apart of the program, my son has adjusted so quickly. He looks forward to each morning that he is running to the front door as soon as he steps out the car. I would recommend this program to all parents that are seeking a safe space for their children that need that extra help and guidance.

Megan and Theo at 3 Step ABA Therapy Center are truly exceptional!
They‚Äôve both been incredibly helpful and supportive throughout our experience. Their communication skills are fantastic‚Äîthey‚Äôre always clear, responsive, and proactive. Megan consistently follows up and delivers thoughtful solutions, while Theo brings a calm and confident presence that makes everything feel manageable. Together, they‚Äôve made this process smooth and reassuring for us as parents. They‚Äôre always on top of things and truly go above and beyond. 3 Step is lucky to have them!

We started 3 Steps recently, and I saw improvement in my son within the first few days. Laura has been absolutely amazing‚Äîshe‚Äôs joyful, encouraging, and built a beautiful bond with my son. She meets him where he‚Äôs at and celebrates every small win. By week two, his confidence in social interactions had grown, and he‚Äôs more motivated than ever to try.

Theo and Megan have been incredibly supportive from the start‚Äîalways responsive and accessible, which gave me peace of mind during the transition. Allana has made understanding ABA therapy so much easier; she breaks things down in a way that truly makes sense and is always so informative.

Rebecca, the first face you see at 3 Steps, is so welcoming and attentive‚Äîshe sets a comforting tone the moment you walk in.

As a parent, peace of mind is priceless. I know my son is in excellent hands at 3 Steps.

One of the be best choice I have made for my baby who was diagnosed with autism, from the list I received to review for therapy, from the first call the staff was so welcoming, professional and friendly and most of all have a unconditional love for kids. I enrolled her in 3-steps therapy, her motor skills, behavior and speech has improved dramatically. She is beginning to share, use a few words and can sign for things she wants and unable to use words for. Her coach Megan is so welcoming and can talk to her about any questions or concerns you have. Her therapist Bianca is very knowledgeable and gentle and loving, she understands her and helps her to learn so quickly, she will inform me that she is working on a task and by the next day my baby is able to do it. What I also really love about this center, they really keep you informed of their behaviors and tasks, the therapist greets you in the mornings, so welcoming, ask about their nights and mornings, at pick up information you about their day‚Äôs activities and you meet once a month with their BCBA coach, who updates you about what they are working on, and their progres. I am happy I chose 3-steps therapy.

My son started school in March of this year. Communication is excellent and our therapist Gracy is amazing with my baby. He loves going to her in the morning. Our main therapist Stephania who oversees our son‚Äôs program is just so attentive as well to our son‚Äôs progress. Best decision we‚Äôve made so far.

I am incredibly grateful for the care and expertise I received from Dr. Danielle and her staff. They have been very knowledgeable about my specific conditions and also incredibly patient and understanding throughout my therapy sessions. I felt like they truly listened to my concerns and tailored my treatment plan accordingly. As a result, I've made significant progress. I highly recommend 360 rehab and their services!.

I highly recommend this place for any physical therapy needs or post-operative. I've been in therapy after a total knee replacement and can attest to the excellent service the staff consistently provides, not just to me but to all patients. Amparo M

I have only had two treatments so far for a shoulder issue, so not long enough to see results. Initial impressions of this rehab center are very favorable for Dr. Gordon-Cornwall and Chantel. Dr. Gordon-Cornwall is professional, knowledgeable, listened to my concerns, explained everything, and I expect I will have good results from her treatments and plan.

Update: I chose 360 Rehab after reading about Dr. Gordon-Cornwall on her website. I had excruciating pain in my right shoulder, unable to move arm or sleep without pain. I have completed my treatment and now pain free. Dr. Gordon-Cornwall is a ‚Äúshoulder whisperer‚Äù as she claims. Thank you, Dr. G and Shantae for care and treatment provided.

Amazing staff. Doctor D and her staff takes time to talk with you and give you the support you need in your recovery. I had surgery on my ACL and thanks to 360 rehab services my recovery has come along way.

Courteous staff. Very professional. Nice and clean family friendly office. Dr. Danielle Gordon-Cornwall is the best at what she does. I always leave as an extremely satisfied client. If you're looking for the best physical therapist around, look no more, you've found her üôÇ

This private practice is truly exceptional. The therapists are not only highly skilled but also deeply compassionate, creating a safe and supportive environment from day one. They take the time to truly understand each client‚Äôs needs and provide thoughtful, personalized care that makes a real difference. The atmosphere is warm, welcoming, and judgment-free, making it easy to open up and do meaningful work. I‚Äôm incredibly grateful for the positive impact they‚Äôve had on my mental health and well-being.

I cannot say enough wonderful things about 360 Therapy. From the moment you log into a session, you feel genuinely welcomed and supported. The therapists here are not only highly skilled and knowledgeable, but they approach their work with compassion, patience, and respect for each individual‚Äôs unique needs.
Whether you‚Äôre navigating a difficult life change, working through anxiety or depression, or simply wanting to better understand yourself, you will be met with kindness, understanding, and expertise. This group has made a profound difference in my life, and I wholeheartedly recommend them to anyone seeking thoughtful, professional, and life-changing mental health care.

They create a safe, non-judgmental space where you can truly open up, and they have an incredible ability to balance deep therapeutic insight with practical, real-world tools you can apply right away. The team‚Äôs dedication to their clients‚Äô growth and well-being is evident in every interaction. I highly recommend 360 Therapy!

There are not enough words to describe Melanie. She is one of the most amazing woman I know.  She is such a hard worker and she really cares about her patients. She came to my place of business and educated my staff on how people should behave in the workplace, how different personalities can work together, and gave an overall amazing educational workshop. I am eternally grateful. üòä

Melanie is a highly qualified clinician. She really cares about her clients and goes above and beyond to help them. She makes it a point to stay current with new research, trainings and methods to remain the well rounded clinician that she is. You are definitely in great hands when you are being treated by her.

The therapists at III-D have been working with my special need son for several years now, even prior to the opening of the facility. Their compassionate approach with my son made it a lot easier for him to build a loving and trusting relationship with each therapist. My son have made tremendous progress under their care and He will remain with them for as long he's able to. I'm for ever grateful for their involvement in my son life .
My kids loved it, they fed, cleaned, had a mini riding lesson, and learned about horses today

My 1st visit here was for a birthday party this past weekend. This place was super clean. The staff was very friendly. The horses were friendly and well taken care of.  I will be back to see my favorite horse that I fell in love with. Overall experience was fantastic.  Thank you for all that you do.
This Barn is my daughter's favorite place in the world, It's magical, the energy you feel is amazing. Staff is friendly and very responsible horses are very well taken care of. Highly recommended.
This place is amazing!! I ride horses there, the owner also gives separate private classes and she‚Äôs so nice! Definitely recommend!
The best place to learning and riding horses 100% recomendable the people inside is amazing excellent everything tomorrow I‚Äôm going back üíØüôåüèª

My twins receive occupational therapy at 7 Senses and I am so happy with the services and care from Miss Kirstie and the staff! My boys look forward to going and have made significant progress. They also had the pleasure of working with Aloha, their therapy dog, and that was such a wonderful experience for the boys. I just love the staff and how well decorate the space is.  I highly recommend 7 senses and am so thankful we found them (which my tutor highly recommended them).

We absolutely love 7 Senses.Kids OT Studio. My son looks forward to going every week to see Mrs. Jennifer. He also looks forward to the chance to work with Aloha. I would absolutely recommend 7 Senses for any child who needs extra help with fine motor/gross motor or sensory integration. They have been such a blessing to our lives.

We love 7 Senses! My family is close to the family that owns 7 Senses and we brought our daughter for an occupational therapy evaluation. They are amazing, show so much care for my daughter, and gave a very detailed and thorough assessment. I feel confident in the care she will receive here.

Absolutely love this place!!! My autistic six year old goes twice a week to see Ms. Kirstie for Occupational Therapy and he has made so much improvement. Not only is he selectively verbal and asking for Ms. Kirstie almost daily, but I‚Äôve learned so much on how to better support him and his growth. As a parent opposed to ABA therapy, this is super helpful for allowing him to be his unique self while still learning how to process the world in a less threatening way. Thank you guys so much!!!!
Great place! Our son loves it here and we have seen progress with his OT. Everyone is amazing and the owner Lauren is very understanding and caring! Will be doing the speech therapy next. 5 stars!!

provider_name: A Beautiful Mind Counseling and Consulting
review_text: I cannot rave enough about this place. The first walk through the door you just feel at home. The counseling room is so cozy and inviting. Theresa is truly amazing, she has been a blessing to my whole family. I seriously cannot express enough how grateful and thankful we are to have found her.

provider_name: A Beautiful Mind Counseling and Consulting
review_text: Theresa is professional, kind, and a great communicator! She has so much experience and knowledge. The office is calm and inviting making clients feel at ease. I‚Äôd recommend her to anyone needing services!

provider_name: A Beautiful Mind Counseling and Consulting
review_text: Theresa has been an absolute blessing for our family. Both of my kids have ADHD and struggled with behavioral issues, but Theresa made a world of difference. From day one, she showed incredible patience, understanding, and a deep knowledge of how to support children with ADHD. My kids not only feel comfortable with her, but we‚Äôve also seen tangible improvements in their behavior and emotional regulation. I can‚Äôt express enough gratitude for how much she has helped transform our home life. Truly an angel in our lives!

provider_name: A Beautiful Mind Counseling and Consulting
review_text: Theresa is absolutely amazing. She was a blessing during a very difficult time and I am so happy we found her. Theresa is always so understanding and accommodating to our hectic schedule, which makes it easy to stick to appointments, consistently. What I appreciate most is that she CARES and she is REAL. Sessions were never rushed and always took her time to listen. Her insightful feedback has given a lot of clarity and peace. I highly recommend Theresa to anyone who is looking for counseling services.

provider_name: A Beautiful Mind Counseling and Consulting
review_text: The minute I walked into the office, I felt at home. It was so warm and inviting! Theresa is an amazing therapist who is genuine, sharp, and has a great personality and sense of humor. I know from our personal experience that Theresa truly loves what she does. Highly recommended and deserves much more than 5 stars.

My daughter has been at A Bright Start Therapy for the last 4 years. Yazmine and her staff have been absolutely amazing throughout the years. They have truly become family. They are Very attentive to my daughters needs and always communicating with me on her progress and things I can do at home to help her. I am extremely grateful for all their support.

A Bright Start Therapy has been amazing for my daughter. The staff genuinely cares for each child and their progress. Thanks to their dedication, my daughter has come so far, reaching milestones I never thought possible. I‚Äôm beyond grateful for their support and highly recommend them!
The Ramirez family will forever be grateful with all the therapists that have helped our daughters in this journey. I recommend this center 100000%%%
Best Therapy Center to take your children. My son receives Speech and OT therapy for over a years. The best therapies my son can have.

I absolutely love this place!
I was recommended here by my son's nutritionist. My son was receiving therapy at a place that was not offering enough hours for him to progress.
This place? Do not think about it! They ALL make you feel like you are part of their family! Since the first day they accepted my son with open arms. And I can tell my son enjoys his sessions. We have been coming for over 3 months and my son has been showing improvement with his behavior and his speech. The therapists work very hard and they are extremely patient, and I say this because my son is very hipper. They know what they are doing. I live far, I have to drive in the 4pm traffic to Hialeah for 40-50 minutes and I do not care, it is worth the drive! A Bright Start Therapy is Amazing!
Definitely interesting I would recommend to anyone looking to improve and get more understanding of their mental health‚Ä¶ I am definitely intrigued

Meeting Angie feels less like an appointment and more like stepping into a safe haven. Though young in years, her calm presence and thoughtful insight reflect the wisdom of someone who‚Äôs lived many lifetimes. She listens not just with her ears, but with a rare kind of empathy that makes you feel deeply seen and understood.

What sets Angie apart is her gentle perspective‚Äînever rushed, never prescriptive, but always quietly profound. Her ability to hold space for even the most tangled emotions is truly healing. With a grounding, old-soul presence and a heart attuned to the nuances of mental well-being, Angie is a gift to anyone navigating the journey toward emotional health.

I had an excellent experience with A Peaceful Mind Counseling Group, especially during the master presentation by Dr. Anthony Garcia, Psy.D. The presentation provided a clear and compelling explanation of the EMDR therapeutic method and its remarkable advantages in treating and healing various mental health disorders resulting from trauma. I left feeling motivated and inspired to pursue this therapy myself.

Overall, I would rate the event as outstanding. The refreshments were delicious, the atmosphere was welcoming and professional, and I truly enjoyed engaging with colleagues and, most importantly, with Dr. Garcia's team. It was an unforgettable experience that has deepened my understanding of effective trauma treatment options. I highly recommend A Peaceful Mind Counseling Group to anyone seeking compassionate care and innovative therapeutic approaches.

Dinner was excellent and the seninar was informative and cleared up some questions that I had regarding EMDR.  Definitely something I will consider looking into after having tried many other types of treatments.

Update following my consultation.  The consultation went well and I scheduled another appointment for the treatment to begin the next week and I made my first installment payment.  After I gave it more thought that evening, I decided to cancel my appointment and I called the next day to cancel. I had to leave a message-no return call that day.  Some of my concerns for canceling which I shared with Dr Michelle was the cost being almost twice as much as what we were told at the dinner, that I wanted to explore other options that would be covered by insurance which EMDR is not covered, I also wanted to talk with my priest and my PCP before starting EMDR.
She said that because of handling fees they would not refund my credit card but she could write me a check.  I agreed and said I would stop in to get the check which took over a week before she had it ready for me to pick up!  It was not for the amount I paid.  It was almost $500 less!  She said that was because Dr Garcia had spent 3 hours discussing my plan with the therapist he had chosen for me.  My first treatment was scheduled with Dr Garcia since this other therapist was going on vacation that week so I‚Äôm not exactly sure what they were discussing for 3 hours!  I also had to leave messages and wait for calls to be returned, I also waited in a poorly lit waiting area with no one at the desk to greet me both times that I visited the office.
My advice is to be completely confident in your decision to go ahead with the treatment plan before giving them any payment whatsoever!

I had a wonderful experience with Peaceful Mind Counseling. From the very beginning, I felt welcomed and supported. Angie, in particular, was incredibly kind, patient, and genuinely caring. She made it easy for me to open up and created a safe space where I felt truly heard.

Dr. Cowden and his wonderful staff have restored my 11-year-old Husky, Jewel, to her old self.  I knew she was going to be ok when she started talking back to me after having her stitches removed following surgery to remove a cancerous tumor from her anal gland.  They are the best!

A pet‚Äôs place is amazing. I used to go to Belcher animal clinic and when Saint John retired the new practice literally was price gouging. I had very sick kitties and brought them here and they not only charged a reasonable price but they also treated my babies as if my cats are theirs. The love and comfort they showed them was amazing. My one cat who hates everyone was purring even when they were checking a cyst on his paw. I have now recommended family and friends to go here and they are just as happy. Best vet and staff ever!!!! Let‚Äôs not forget Shadow the amazing company who waits with you.

These folks are angels!! They have been so caring, thoughtful and helpful when it comes to the health of our pets. We wouldn't use any other vet! We drive way way out of our way to go here and would highly recommend them to anyone looking for a vet in pinellas county

Great veterinary care, Dr Cowley is articulate and has come up with complex treatment solutions and has knowledge that other practices don‚Äôt. His experience and education has kept my eldest dog alive for quite some time. The staff is kind and experienced as well.

Highly recommend
Great place to take your cats. Always very friendly and the doctor really knows what he's doing

provider_name: A Time To Change Counseling Center, P.A.
review_text: Clara Soles is an absolutely amazing counselor!  She has done so much for our daughter in helping her from coping skills to being able to communicate and express herself in words that make her seem like she is so much older than her actual age. The process that we have had to go through with things in life have definitely been made more understanding with the help of Mrs.Clara. Our daughter not only sees her as her therapist but also her friend that she can trust and count on.  Atimetochangecounseling is a wonderful practice and community within themselves.  Thank yall so much for everything!!

provider_name: A Time To Change Counseling Center, P.A.
review_text:
Our experience with A Time to Change Counseling Center has been nothing short of appalling. From the moment we began as brand new clients, we were met with repeated last-minute cancellations ‚Äî often just an hour before our scheduled sessions ‚Äî with no regard for the fact that we had rearranged our work schedules and mental health needs around these appointments.

The communication from reception was unprofessional and dismissive, and the Operations Director demonstrated no accountability whatsoever, instead making excuse after excuse for their poor performance. At no point did we feel that our time, needs, or well-being were respected.

Even more troubling, one of their counselors made extraordinary claims about holding multiple PhDs. Given the lack of professionalism and credibility in every other aspect of this practice, I have serious doubts about the truthfulness of these claims ‚Äî which raises serious questions about their qualifications and the legality of their practice.

This is not just bad business ‚Äî it‚Äôs unethical and potentially dangerous. Mental health clients often come here at their most vulnerable, and this clinic‚Äôs careless, disrespectful approach only causes more harm. We are reporting this business and encourage others to do so as well to: Florida Department of Health ‚Äì Division of Medical Quality Assurance (MQA), Florida Board of Clinical Social Work, Marriage & Family Therapy, and Mental Health Counseling , American Counseling Association (ACA) ‚Äì Ethics Complaint, and the Better Business Bureau (BBB).

If you value your time, your mental health, and working with truly qualified professionals, avoid this place entirely!!!

provider_name: A Time To Change Counseling Center, P.A.
review_text: We have been very pleased with the service our child has received. We were skeptical with counseling at first but so far seems to be beneficial to our child. He really enjoys seeing Lisa and gets very excited about his sessions.

provider_name: A Time To Change Counseling Center, P.A.
review_text: I gave them three stars because I have only had one interaction with them so far. I don‚Äôt feel we have a sufficient amount of interaction to give a full perspective. However, the first interaction was very amazing. Nicole understood how to approach my daughter. In return, my daughter felt open to talk to her. So, that was a positive thing.

provider_name: A Time To Change Counseling Center, P.A.
review_text: I am impressed with the thoroughness of the application. Although it is time consuming, it has helped me to identify some of the important issues I am dealing with. My appointment was worth every minute! Ms. Sabrina is sensitive, responsive, and has a Christian perspective that restores my faith!

provider_name: A Touch of Hope Occupational Therapy
review_text: I came to A Touch of Hope OT after injuring my shoulder. Hemdat Bar was absolutely amazing throughout my recovery. She took the time to understand my pain, explained every step of the process, and gave me exercises that were both effective and easy to follow. Her patience, professionalism, and genuine care made a huge difference in how quickly I regained my strength and mobility. I‚Äôm truly grateful for her help and highly recommend her to anyone who needs an occupational therapist.

provider_name: A Touch of Hope Occupational Therapy
review_text: Hemdat is an outstanding occupational therapist‚Äîprofessional, kind, and incredibly caring. She has been so helpful with my son‚Äôs progress, and we are truly grateful for her dedication and support. Highly recommended!

provider_name: A Touch of Hope Occupational Therapy
review_text:
If you are dealing with pain or discomfort from desk work, go to Hemdat Bar from A Touch of Hope OT . She is incredible!
I had constant neck pain from long hours at the computer, and through targeted massage and personalized exercises, she helped release the tension in my neck and taught me ways to prevent the pain from coming back. I felt real improvement after just a few sessions.
Hemdat is truly professional, caring, and highly skilled.

provider_name: A Touch of Hope Occupational Therapy
review_text: Hemdat is absolutely amazing! She‚Äôs incredibly knowledgeable and always explains things in a way that makes sense. What really stood out to me was her patience and genuine empathy.  She never rushed me and always made me feel heard and supported. Thanks to her, I‚Äôve made real progress and actually enjoy going to therapy. Highly recommend!

provider_name: A Touch of Hope Occupational Therapy
review_text: Hemdat recently facilitated a professional development session on proper pencil grip to our Early Childhood teaching staff.  She was thorough, clear and engaging.  Her strategies to support our young learners were very helpful and informative.  The feedback from the staff was very positive- the teachers want a follow up session.   As the Director of Early Childhood Education at Beth Torah Benny Rok Campus, I would encourage you to bring her to your school

I had such an amazing time with A&A Adventure Horseback Rides! The whole experience was relaxing, fun, and full of beautiful views. The team was so kind and thoughtful, they offered us refreshments like water, fruits, and cookies, and even surprised me with a chocolate horse cake and flowers for my birthday!
It truly made my day extra special. The horses were gentle and well cared for, and the staff made sure everyone felt safe and comfortable the whole time. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back and recommending this place to anyone who wants an unforgettable ride and warm hospitality!

A wonderful experience. Went for my fianc√©s birthday. Andre‚Äôs horses were stunning and very attentive - easy to maneuver and fast. Andre is a phenomenal teacher and conversationalist. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a few hours of riding!

Professionalism at its finest. After visiting a few weeks ago for a group trail ride through a scenic and shaded section, in the woods, I decided to come back and ask for 1 on 1 lessons. My trainer and his partner are the pinnacle of their craft. Horses are extremely well taken care of. The training was engaging and done with purpose from start to finish. There is no question... these two know what they are doing. I couldn't recommend this place enough. Can't wait to come back

This was the most amazing experience I have been on in South Florida. My boyfriend and I went for our anniversary and it was romantic and the scenery was so peaceful. You need to book this excursion ASAP!

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è Epic Trail Ride at Robbins Preserve!

My girlfriend, my best friend, and I all had one shared reaction as we finished: that was an epic trail ride.

We rode with A&A Adventure Horse Trail Rides through Robbins Preserve in Davie, FL. I rode a fantastic horse named Buck a Roo, what a ride! The group was about 6 to 7 riders total, and even with a small delay due to the weather, the owner and his team handled everything like pros. They made sure we were comfortable, even tossing in extra time once the skies cleared.

The owner, whose name unfortunately slipped my mind, was incredibly professional and clearly an expert with both his horses and teaching. He gave each of us individual attention and solid instruction, which made the ride feel easy and safe for riders of all levels.

Buck a Roo and the other horses were well cared for, calm, and friendly. The Preserve itself is expansive and scenic, with the views getting more beautiful the deeper you go. For the price, the experience was outstanding. They also provided fruit cups, snacks, and water before and after the ride, nice thoughtful details.

I‚Äôm even considering taking future lessons with them to learn more. If you‚Äôre looking for a safe, scenic trail ride run by true horse people, this is it.

Would definitely recommend A&A Adventure Horse Trail Rides at Robbins Preserve. Happy Trails!
Wonderful group of instructors and horses! I learned so much from Caitey‚Ä¶ she was so patient and gave me time to think things thru,  and encouraged me to learn new things.  Highly recommend A&A!!

Alisha & Jamie were amazing with my novice daughter . Highly recommend them to teach your child to ride . Horse Club is great , kids have a opportunity to learn to ride and are taught everything from ground work, tack, and safety. Let them help fulfill your child‚Äôs dreams of becoming a horseman/woman , you won‚Äôt regret it ! Money WELL spent

I‚Äôve been riding with Alisha McGinnis for the past 10 years. A&A equestrian is a great place to learn about equestrianism and is a super kid friendly enviorment. I volunteer with Saturday club, a place where kids typically 5-12 can ride and get personalized instruction from a group groups of instructors, as well as learn about tack, training, and Horse care. Private and group lessons are also available throughout the week by Alisha, Amanda, or Becca with any of their horses, which is great for individual improvement. Overall, A&A equestrian is a great place to explore the wonderful hobby of equestrianism.

This team of equestrian are some of the best in the bay area. From lessons for all ages to trail rides , camp, or club they have something for everyone. Multiple lesson horses for all skill levels. This is the place to be if you love horses and want to learn from the best!
Caitey is the best coach ever and she makes me feel so comfortable and confident in my Equestrian journey! Absolutely love her and the horses!

I had an outstanding experience at A&M Physical Therapy from June to August 2025. Judy is very friendly, both on the phone and in person. Their flexible scheduling made it easy to attend appointments. Dr. Amado and his friendly, caring team focused on improving my health, and movement patterns prevent future injuries. Thanks to their dedicated care, my low back pain has improved exponentially! I highly recommend them!

A&M Physical Therapy is an excellent place to come for post op physical therapy and to heal well. I had a right hip replacement and they were crucial to my healing process. The physical therapist doctors and staff were just great!  I am now walking normally with no pain. I recommend them highly. Thank you Dr. Amato, Dr. Chance, Brandon and Judy!  You are all wonderful people and made my visits very enjoyable.  Brenda Chiarello

I came to A&M with lower back pain, no injury just had pain when I slept or sat for long periods. It also caused limited physical activity like golf and regular exercise. Since I have been at A&M my pain has subsided drastically. I am able to workout longer with minimal pain and my golf drive distance has improved, with the pain nearly gone, I have more power to the ball.The staff is amazing.üëåBrandon, Dr. Chance, and Judy welcomed me in with open arms and they are some of the nicest people you will ever meet. They make me want to come to my appointments. Not just for the care I receive, but the environment they create. I highly recommend A&M you will not be disappointed.

I came here after getting knee surgery and everyone was so friendly, laid back and knowledgeable. You can tell the PTs stay on top of the latest research to inform your recovery. I‚Äôm so happy I came here and am leaving upon discharge, fully recovered with a ton of knowledge and exercises to support my long-term knee health.

I called to have a prescription for PT on my left hip. I even brought the paperwork in person. Once there, I was told the 1st new patient appointment was 3 weeks out. No mention of this over the phone.

This place came off as amateurish.

Not acceptable.

Marla has been incredible in her work with my son. She is patient, knowledgable and kind. Often times, he will resist working with his specialists, but he looks forward to Marla‚Äôs visit each week. He has been making steady progress since he started with her, and we are so happy to have found her practice.

Marla is amazing. She‚Äôs patient yet firm in working with my son. He‚Äôs come so far in two years, literally leaps & bounds. Things he couldn‚Äôt do before he just does them now. Marla understands kids & how they are wired. And when the wires seem to be crossed, she knows just the exercises to get things moving correctly. We love Marla & we love Ms Dot!

My grandson has been seeing Marla for two years and the improvements in his academics and social emotional areas are amazing! Marla has been instrumental in helping Lincoln be successful, not only academically at school, but in forming relationships, being aware of his physical body and so many  activities of daily living skills that are key to  him being successful. It‚Äôs been amazing to see the progress. and how much confidence he has gained by working with Marla. Between the weekly visits and attending her shoe tying  camp he is finally up to speed and doing age-appropriate activities. Marla is very kind, gentle and compassionate and this has made a huge impact on him being able to receive and respond to instruction

Best OT in town. She is able to thoroughly assess each child and develop a plan to meet their needs. She is knowledgeable in many areas and gets to the root of the issues by addressing primitive reflexes
Mrs. Marla is an amazing therapist. She is caring, sweet and does a wonderful job. Highly recommended.

Conner was referred to A+ Therapy at 2 years old due to having repeated ear infections over the course of a year causing him loss of hearing, and very behind on all his milestones. We had tubes placed in, and we waited for a spot to be open for speech therapy. Conner was assigned to Mrs. Lauren when he was 2. He could barely communicate and had a hard time saying two word phrases, and understand what he was saying. As time passed, Conner was progressing very well. He learned all of his letters and numbers by name a recognition. He was able to answer very simple questions.  After two years, he graduated, and we are able to communicate with him and see his beautiful personality grow. He currently sees Mr. Tito for occupational therapy, and he is progressing so much that it's astonishing. I would highly recommend A+ therapy to anyone.

They have been wonderful. I've noticed a significant improvement since beginning their services.
-They accept Sunshine Insurance
-Are really flexible with schedules, the pathologist even goes to my child's daycare.
-The speech pathologist I was assigned is extremely friendly and is wonderful with my little one ‚ù§Ô∏è

I‚Äôd give a 0 star if I could, I took my son here about 1 year ago, a couple session in they strapped him to a blue chair because they said he didn‚Äôt stay still. (Because they wanted him to be there by himself without me) He got bruises from the chair straps. When I was waiting for him while he was in a session I could here him crying and yelling, they said that it was ok and he has to learn to be without me. I then told them I will not be coming back. The doctor was very upset and she said he will continue to be speech delayed, which is not the case my son now speaks and speaks. I should‚Äôve reported this when it happened but sadly I was naive and didn‚Äôt. I will never take any of my kids to any speech therapist because of this place. I‚Äôd add a pictures If I knew how.
My sibling goes here and they are very caring,  and he always comes out happy.
Highly Recommend

I took my 7-month Mini Dachshund to ACA for training and left really happy. So happy that I want to keep bringing Klaus not only because he learned so much, but also because he was genuinely happy to be there. This family-owned business is very well organized and the team is professional. The facility is well kept and clean, and they go above and beyond to make sure the dogs are safe at all times.

What I really appreciate is that the program is not only about training your dog, but also about training you as the owner. They guide you through handling techniques and communication, which I believe is one of the most important parts of the whole experience. They also offer different levels of training depending on your dog‚Äôs needs, and it was impressive to learn that even Police K9s are trained here.

I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the training my dog received at ACA Center! From the moment we walked in, the staff was welcoming, professional, and truly passionate about what they do. My dog had a few behavioral challenges that I wasn‚Äôt sure could be fixed, but the trainers worked wonders.

Not only did they help build my dog‚Äôs confidence, but they also gave me the tools and knowledge to continue reinforcing good behavior at home. I saw such a transformation‚Äînot just in obedience, but in overall calmness and focus.

The facility is clean, well-organized, and clearly run with care. The trainers took the time to understand my dog‚Äôs personality and tailored the training accordingly, which made all the difference.

I‚Äôm incredibly grateful for the support and expertise from everyone at ACA. It‚Äôs a huge relief knowing I now have a happy, well-behaved dog‚Äîand a place I can trust if I ever need more help in the future. Highly recommend

I brought my dog Zelda because of her reactive behavior and ACA has been amazing at making her a well behaved dog. Alexandra and Cesar are very thorough and detailed when it comes to explaining the reasoning behind the training, and they take you step by step through the whole process. I have seen tremendous improvement in Zelda‚Äôs demeanor. Their handling lessons are great and they send you home with clear instructions to continue training. I would come back 100 times. Best dog training center in Miami.

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about ACA and their team. I brought my pit bull terrier mix to their 3-week obedience course which ran from 9am to 3pm daily and included weekly one-on-one handler sessions. In the handler sessions, we as the owner and understanding the kind of relationship/communication we have with our dog. The main goal was to help with her leash reactivity‚Äîshe used to tug so hard I‚Äôd end up with rope burns, and she would often lunge at other dogs on walks.

Now, she walks by my side and no longer pulls like before. The transformation has been incredible. We noticed progress within the first week, and now nearing the end of the program, I feel more in control, which gives me peace of mind and allows her to safely enjoy the outdoors. Everyone at ACA is so knowledgeable‚Äîyou can tell they truly understand the psychology of canine behavior.

The trainers are not only highly skilled, but they also kept me updated every single day with how she was doing, which made me feel really involved and supported. My dog absolutely adores them‚Äîshe gets so excited to see them each morning, and it‚Äôs clear she built a strong, positive connection with the entire team. While this is just the beginning of her journey, I‚Äôm blown away by how far she‚Äôs come already. 100% recommend.

Cesar and his team are so incredible! We took our German Shepard for training and he is quite a crazy one! They managed to train things in him in a matter of 3 weeks. They are so caring and knowledgeable about the dogs they train and they are honestly the sweetest people ever. I recommend for absolutely everyone. Best trainers ever!

We had such a wonderful experience at AAA Equestrian! They were able to schedule us for a trail ride last minute the day before my friend flew out of town for her birthday, and it couldn‚Äôt have been more perfect. The manager was so friendly and really went out of their way to make sure we had a great time. I really appreciate that they took pictures of us during our ride so we have photos to remember the occasion.

The horses were lovely and gentle, which was perfect since we were all beginners (it was even the very first ride for one of my friends!). They made us feel comfortable and safe the whole time, so we could just relax and enjoy the ride.

A special touch that meant so much: they let us keep a birthday cake in their fridge, so at the end we were able to surprise my friend, the staff joined us in singing happy birthday, and make the day extra special.

I can‚Äôt recommend this place enough for beginners or anyone looking for a fun, welcoming trail ride experience. We‚Äôll definitely be back!

We had such a peaceful and unforgettable experience horseback riding! From the moment we arrived, Jamie was welcoming and knowledgeable, making sure we felt safe and comfortable around the horses. The trail was beautiful serene, scenic, and the perfect way to disconnect from the everyday hustle.

The horses we rode were gentle and well-trained, which made the entire ride smooth and relaxing. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or more experienced, this is a great way to connect with nature and unwind.

We left feeling refreshed, empowered, and honestly a little more grounded. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a new adventure or just some quiet time outdoors. üêéüåø

What a wonderful trail ride! Such beautiful scenery and lovely horses! Jamie was so knowledgeable and fun! We were sure to tip her well, she took such good care of us! We will be back soon! Thanks AAA for a great experience.

Hey guys, good afternoon I wanted to come on here and leave a review Because I thought the world should really know how amazing this Horse farm is from the first day I began taking my daughter for horseback riding lessons we just fell in love starting with the beautiful scenery, to the welcoming staff, &  the enchanting selection of horses they share.

One thing that really makes this farm so amazing is the welcoming staff to include the owner, and  trainers. They are super friendly and down to earth, & go out their way to make sure you have a beautiful experience while on the farm. They are so professional and passionate about their craft they make the environment feel so peaceful, and motivating, & just really makes you want to keep coming back even if it‚Äôs for lessons or trail rides. I‚Äôm so blessed to have found this farm and want to really expressed so much gratitude to the owner and Adalyn, who is currently my daughter‚Äôs trainer. My daughter has learned so much in such a short period of time thanks to Adalyns devine devotion to teach. This has become my daughter‚Äôs happy place and for that I‚Äôm forever grateful.

Another thing that makes this farm stand out from the rest is the enchanting selection of horses they share for all age groups. The horses are so social and soft and gentle. The farm makes sure they are well groomed and ready for a fun day ahead of them. I would highly recommended this farm to all my horse lovers you will not be disappointed I promise you ‚ù§Ô∏è

We had the best experience at AAA Equestrian! Jamie was our guide and was so pleasant to chat with! Butters led the way and Cayman stayed in the back, while we rode Lacey and Kane both of which made us feel so comfortable and confident even though we don‚Äôt have much riding experience. The trail took us through the Florida woods with plenty of shade and such beautiful scenery. It was peaceful, relaxing, and truly enjoyable from start to finish. The horses moved at their own pace, which made it even more comfortable. Everyone at the barn was so welcoming and gave clear, easy-to-follow riding instructions that helped us feel confident throughout the ride. We had such a great time and can‚Äôt wait to come back during the cooler months!

Owner Mindy Lee & RBT Carolina is freaking amazing! I was referred by my child‚Äôs ESE Specialist at Wingate Oaks Center to this company when I was in need of getting my son ABA therapy. I had no idea what it consisted of and where to start. I researched and spoke to so many companies and I was not comfortable with any of them. Either they were too money (insurance) focused, unfriendly or poor customer service, terrible reviews, or not accommodating.

But not this company. From the beginning and still, Ms. Lee has helped me every step of the way! She throughly explained what ABA was, how her company operated, how to obtain the evaluations needed for my son to qualify, & more! We‚Äôve been using her company for about 3 months from this date and I am overwhelmed with how much my son‚Äôs assigned RBT Ms. Carolina has helped him grow, achieve, & ATTAIN goals we‚Äôve been working on and towards that was listed on his IEP for almost a year and a half at school. Another amazing thing that makes her company stand out from the rest, is the fact that their goal is help your child become independent so that they won‚Äôt need to be dependent upon having an RBT for the rest of their school years. Their mission is to help your child manage on their own with the tools they‚Äôve learned, with hopes for them to be matriculated into classes with Gen Pop. Of course this doesn‚Äôt mean that each child will be the same, but what will be is having like minded and goal oriented people to help support you and your child become successful in their own way.

Unlike most ABA companies, who would rather hinder your child‚Äôs growth and development for their own gain such as money. THIS company is all about supporting, helping, and focusing on your child to help them become the best versions of themselves!!

I cannot thank Ms. Carolina, Ms. Lee, & Sabrina his analyst enough for all that they have and ARE doing to help me and my son. The relief of anxiety as been such a great feeling. Ms. Lee even volunteered to tour the new school my son will be attending for kindergarten next year. She and his RBT have been so supportive in so many ways. Something as a special needs parent you don‚Äôt always receive from resources we use or the few that we find and need because of limit availability of options. I am super grateful to have met them. This company has truly been a blessing. ‚ù§Ô∏è
I visited my nephew last week, he has been receiving ABA‚Äôs services and I‚Äôve noticed a positive difference.  My sister is delighted.
Such an amazing and caring staff! I highly recommend them!

**********************I give 5 million stars********************

I would like to say thank you to the staff at ABA centers of Florida. From the initial call, the staff was professional, warm, patient and accommodating. You could feel the compassion and genuineness through the phone. As a mother with a child on the spectrum, it was important to find an ABA company to accommodate his needs. ABA centers went above and beyond from day one ensuring that my child had no gap in services. The admissions process was smooth and efficient with great communication regarding progress and updates. The CEO Nicole is an angel from Heaven. It is such a great feeling to know that someone understands your struggle and will love and advocate for your child as much as you will. The staff we interact with wants the best for our child and it shows on all levels. If you are looking for a great company to provide services to your child ( THIS IS IT). This review only allows 5 stars, but I give them 5 million. From the bottom of my heart, I am forever grateful to this company for investing in my child. I would not have the child that I have today without ABA.

Arilea Fenty

Hearing the struggles of families seeking testing or services for their children with ASD and the endless waiting lists is heart wrenching. Being able to help and offer hope & encouragement with the support of leadership makes each work day rewarding.

ABA Centers of Florida is a great company that really cares about their clients. They provide amazing support to the families as well. Their play centers are so much fun. It‚Äôs so cool to watch 14 year olds playing in rooms next to 6 year olds, it‚Äôs as if there is something for everyone. Truly life changing work.

The staff have gone above and beyond for anything that I have asked‚Ä¶ without their help I would definitely be lost in a zoo of RED tape‚Ä¶
Thank you Jack
I‚Äôll try to contact with someone please contact me as soon as possible somebody recommended me ,Thanks

There are simply not enough words to describe how amazing, caring and loving ABA First Results is. The clinical director, Michelle Goike is probably one of the most kindest and sweetest souls I‚Äôve met. She cared for my two kids as if they were her own. Michelle was always on top of every need my two kids had while attending First Results. She made it so easy for me.  Every morning when I dropped my kids off at First Results, I knew that my kids were in the best hands because the therapists all there were even more so kind and loving with my kids. The attentiveness and therapy my kids received was amazing. I saw major differences in their behavior in just the first few weeks my kids attended. My son started responding to his name. My daughter started following directions and her temper tantrums decreased. They really helped my babies thrive. It broke my heart when we had to move away because I don‚Äôt if any other ABA center will care for my kids as much Michelle and all the other therapist at First Results did. They are all truly real angels. I will forever be grateful to them.

ABA Results-Gainesville made all the difference in our daughter! Not only in speech and social skills, but her overall quality of life has completely changed for the better. She is truly a different kid since being a part of ABA Results. The employees have went above and beyond for her and us. After our tour, we just knew it was the place for her! She made lasting friendships with her peers. Each and every person there shows immense patience, love, and genuine joy to help the children there. Not only is the environment warm/friendly but so very inclusive.  The employees were always available for questions, concerns, and never minded giving help or support to us! We cannot thank ABA Results enough for all the growth and progress our daughter has made. It truly changed the course of her life, education, and health. You guys are the best!

We are extremely grateful for ABA Results! When our child was first diagnosed, we were very nervous about finding the right center to support him. We wanted a nurturing, loving atmosphere where he could build skills and confidence. We definitely picked the right place. The director, Michelle, is incredibly organized and responsive. She helped guide us through assessment, intake, and matched us with the perfect BCBA and RBT. Our BCBA has been such a champion for our child's development and our RBT was very patient and dedicated. Our child has grown so much because of the team at ABA Results.

ABA Results is amazing. The staff is extremely attentive and knowledgeable about what they do. The director, Michelle Goike is also amazing and it is clear that she has a love and passion for what she does! Highly recommend!!

Wouldn‚Äôt even give my child a chance. Wouldn‚Äôt do a meet and greet or anything. Very disappointed. Guess only kids that will make them look good get accepted. Don‚Äôt have high hopes if you are. Desperate parent in need.

provider_name: ABA THERAPY LEADERS BEHAVIOR ABA & COUNSELING, LLC
review_text: This is a small agency that truly operates with a clear mission. The staff and leadership consistently welcome you with warmth and a smile, fostering a close and supportive relationship with the families they serve.

provider_name: ABA THERAPY LEADERS BEHAVIOR ABA & COUNSELING, LLC
review_text: I have been with working with this company for almost 2 years and it has been nothing short of amazing . I have been working with nercy since my sons autism diagnosis when he was 2 and a half . He is now about to turn 5 and he is like a completely different child . They are so communicative and amazing to work with. I understand people have such a misconception of ABA therapy and I was concerned myself but after working with this company it has been the best thing for my son and I am so grateful for them and for my sons therapist , nercy.

provider_name: ABA THERAPY LEADERS BEHAVIOR ABA & COUNSELING, LLC
review_text: When I called this company, they explained the process to me step by step, answered all my questions, and provided highly empathetic customer service. It is a small company that truly cares about what it does and has a deep understanding of each of the families it serves.

provider_name: ABA THERAPY LEADERS BEHAVIOR ABA & COUNSELING, LLC
review_text:
I  recently had the opportunity to receive therapy services for my autistic child at this incredible healthcare company, and I cannot express how grateful I am for the positive experience we had. From the moment I reached out to them, I received exceptional customer service that made me feel valued and understood as a parent.

The team of therapists who worked with my child demonstrated unparalleled dedication and professionalism. They were highly qualified and experienced in treating autism, which gave me great confidence in their approach. Additionally, their individualized and personalized focus ensured that my child received the specific attention he needed to achieve his goals and overcome challenges

provider_name: ABA THERAPY LEADERS BEHAVIOR ABA & COUNSELING, LLC
review_text: Since the beginning,  speaking to Leaders Behavior ABA & Counseling' staff felt as I was with my family. They guided me through the whole process to get services, explained to me the questions I had, and took the time to listen to me. I noticed that they truly understand the fact that I was looking for help for my little one. I can't even explain how shocked, confused, and vulnerable I was feeling before I got to spoke to them but their words of empathy really cheered me up. ‚ú®üôèüèº

provider_name: ABA Therapy - Hope Center For Behavior Change, Inc.
review_text: Our experience with Hope Center for Behavioral Change over the past two years has been excellent.  The owner truly cares about tailoring  services to  each patient‚Äôs individual needs and celebrates their gains. Great care was taken to select direct therapists who were a good fit for my son, and he‚Äôs made notable progress  during his middle school years as a result.  His direct therapists are clearly vested in his progress and communication with all team members has been super easy.  If you‚Äôre looking for a quality ABA provider that will partner with you in helping your child reach their potential, then you‚Äôve found one of the good ones.

provider_name: ABA Therapy - Hope Center For Behavior Change, Inc.
review_text:
I cannot speak highly enough about the incredible care and support we‚Äôve received from AJ. From the very first session, AJ‚Äôs compassionate and understanding approach made both my child and me feel safe, heard, and valued.

This journey has not only brought amazing growth and healing for my child, but it has also helped shape me as a parent and as a person. The tools, insights, and encouragement we‚Äôve received from AJ have been truly life-changing.

Thanks to AJ, we are more confident, more connected, and better prepared for the future. I am deeply grateful for the positive impact AJ has had on our lives. If you‚Äôre looking for someone who genuinely cares and can make a real difference, I wholeheartedly recommend AJ.

provider_name: ABA Therapy - Hope Center For Behavior Change, Inc.
review_text: I am beyond grateful for the services and support provided here. The staff truly operate with a ‚Äúfamily first‚Äù mentality ‚Äî they‚Äôre both personable and professional. It‚Äôs rare to find a place that understands and meets the needs of children with autism the way this facility does. We need more places like this in the world. Thank you for all that you do!

provider_name: ABA Therapy - Hope Center For Behavior Change, Inc.
review_text: Aisha and her team are absolutely top-notch. I rarely come across someone as proficient and as detailed oriented as the are. An absolute pleasure to work with.

provider_name: ABA Therapy - Hope Center For Behavior Change, Inc.
review_text: Aisha has been a great help, guiding us on the best services for our daughter with special needs. Everyone in this place has always been very kind. We highly recommend the HOPE Center!

provider_name: ABA Therapy Center by Lucio and Lucas Corp
review_text:
Our experience with the ABA therapy team has been nothing short of amazing. Every member of the team has shown genuine care, professionalism, and dedication to helping my daughter succeed. From day one, they created a welcoming and supportive environment that made her feel safe, motivated, and excited to learn.

The therapists work together beautifully, ensuring consistency, creativity, and encouragement in every session. They celebrate her progress, no matter how small, and provide us with valuable guidance as parents so that we can support her growth at home, too.

It is clear that this team truly loves what they do, and their kindness and commitment have made a huge difference in my daughter‚Äôs life. We are beyond grateful for all the hard work, patience, and heart they bring to each session.

I highly recommend this ABA therapy team to any family looking for compassionate, skilled, and reliable support.

provider_name: ABA Therapy Center by Lucio and Lucas Corp
review_text:
Lucio and Lucas Corp is truly a gem for families seeking high-quality ABA therapy for children with special needs. From the moment you walk through the doors, you can feel the warmth, professionalism, and dedication that define this exceptional center.

The entire team, from the administrative staff to the Behavior Analysts and RBTs, is knowledgeable, compassionate, and deeply committed to each child‚Äôs progress. They tailor their approach to meet individual needs, and their communication with families is consistent, respectful, and informative.

The facility itself is not only secure and well-maintained but beautifully designed to create a welcoming and calming environment for the children. The rooms are bright, thoughtfully decorated, and filled with developmentally appropriate materials that make learning both fun and engaging. There‚Äôs a sense of care in every detail, from the safety protocols in place to the sensory-friendly features that support comfort and regulation.

Lucio and Lucas Corp doesn‚Äôt just provide therapy, they create a nurturing space where children can thrive. The professional level of care, combined with the loving atmosphere, makes this center a place where families feel supported and children feel safe, understood, and empowered to grow.

Highly recommend!

provider_name: ABA Therapy Center by Lucio and Lucas Corp
review_text: This ABA agency is professional, organized, and truly focused on helping each child reach their full potential. The staff is patient, caring, and well-trained. Programs are personalized and based on the individual needs of each client. Communication with families is consistent, and progress is clearly tracked. I highly recommend this agency to anyone looking for quality ABA services.

provider_name: ABA Therapy Center by Lucio and Lucas Corp
review_text: I am very happy with the ABA services my child receives. The entire team is amazing, attentive, and dedicated. He has made great progress, and I feel he is in excellent hands!

provider_name: ABA Therapy Center by Lucio and Lucas Corp
review_text:
I am an RBT and I visit this center regularly and my clients love it. There is plenty of room for kids to play and do activities in a fun and safe manner. My favorite area is the outside playground that has artificial turf and remains very clean so children can play, even without shoes if desired. Furthermore, there are different scheduled activities for children to perform each day of the week and the center provides the necessary materials for these activities.
The culture among staff and RBT members is very healthy too. There is a lot of respect for each other and everyone is willing to help. One can feel a very good vibe in general. In a nutshell, this is the kind of place anyone would want their kids to receive therapy.

What a blessing to have found this place! My son is soon to be 3 and his therapist is Rocio, he started about 3/4 months ago and it‚Äôs amazing to see the progress he has made. I feel at ease bringing my little boy there every morning because of his willingness to just walk in (he‚Äôs a very shy boy). I love the daily updates he‚Äôs always smiling and laughing in every picture. Thank you guys so much for making my son feel at home and loved.

This is the first agency I‚Äôve seen that truly practices ABA the right way. The staff are incredibly supportive, compassionate, and well-trained, always willing to help whenever needed. Their dedication and approach make a real difference.

All the ladies at the office are super sweet and very helpful. My son absolutely loves them all! My son was introverted but after being with these ladies he‚Äôs opened up so much. They taught him sign language to help him communicate since he is nonverbal. They are accommodating to all of the needs for my son and I. Appreciate them all so much!

My son has been attending ABA Therapy of St Lucie since July and I have to say his progress has been amazing! I only have words of appreciation towards his therapist Lianis and owner Elizabeth who are great people and are always focusing to help each child. Lianis as a therapist has been extraordinary, very dedicated and shows great caring towards my son. As a mother, makes me feel at ease that my son is receiving excellent attention and they care for him sincerely. This center truly deserves 5 stars.

My son has been attending here since they opened. Don‚Äôt know where to begin of how wonderful this place has been for Valentino, he has made so much progress in his behavior, speech, social skills‚Ä¶he attends ABA and during his section he also attends speech next door (same owner). Valentino came with 0 words and now has 50 plus words and putting sentences together now. Since beginning Elizabeth was amazing with his enrollment and guiding me with insurance, Dania at front is great, and can‚Äôt tank enough all his therapists‚ÄîMegan, Andrea, Serena and his beloved Ana. Second family for us.

This is a wonderful place to start with your puppy. Then you can move up through Advanced Training. They are offer many different types of classes. You can get your Canine Good Citizen certificate here as well as your advanced and urban. They also offer rally classes and much more. They are very knowledgeable in what they teach and all the trainers compete as well.

ABC4K9 is simply the best when it comes to dog training in SW FL!  I adopted a very timid Golden Retriever and enrolled him in puppy class right away. We went through AKC Star Puppy, Graduate Puppy, Good Manners, and all the way to Good Citizen Certification.  I look forward to continuing on for additional training with my dog to keep reinforcing all the things we‚Äôve been working on. Highly recommended!

Bobbi Graves masterfully trained my husband and me and our three year old 80 pound yellow Labrador, Maggie,to be a therapy dog in 2013. Maggie loved visiting her friends at Brookdale until she passed a year ago.

We saw Bobbi and Tiana for a consult regarding training for our energetic 18 month old sheepadoodle, Lizzy, a week ago. Their suggestions have already made a huge difference in putting us back in the driver's seat. Lizzy starts her Manners class on Saturday. She is really excited.

We can't recommend ABC4K9 highly enough!  Susan Miller and Ed Bouton

Our  English Bulldog needed manners for his safety. He was just too friendly and we didn't know how to reign him in so HELP!!! BOBBY!!!   We took the Manners class 4 sessions, now we have a dog that can go in public and be safe and happy. Thanks for working with us Bobby. Now on to the next class.

I LOVE ABC 4 K9! We have done several training classes there and daycare with our Rhodesian Ridgeback. Bobbie and Tiana are so knowledgeable and patient and overall outstanding. I also love the family feel of the place. I also just got a rescue with some behavior issues which I was very stressed out about  it and they helped me immediately. They are always helping. They are just really great people.
Excellent service and professionals. I am very happy with my son's progress and see the results. Thank you for all the support and understanding with my son.
EXCELLENT ENVIRONMENT AND PROFESSIONALISM

A great agency, very professional and committed to their clients. We are very satisfied with their services. They are always committed to improvement and advancement. Thank you, thank you, thank you.
A great agency, very professional and committed to their clients. We are very satisfied with their services. They are always committed to improvement and advancement. Thank you, thank you, thank you.

Elegy Pet Services have been amazing for us! We had a litter of golden retrievers and they were so well taken care of the entire 8 weeks. We are so grateful we found Elegy Pet Services when we did! From delivery to vet visits to the at home care, we definitely recommend them!

We left our two fur babies with them, one being a 9 week old puppy, and they shared pics of them throughout the stay.  Communication was great prior and throughout the stay.  We had peace of mind leaving them and will be using them again.

Amazing grooming! My golden looks like a show dog!! Very professional and we are SO happy with the servicesü§ç would choose them over and over! We drive an hour to get our golden done as well! So worth it!!

She was amazinggggg she removed fleas from my 5 week old kitten within minutes and was so kind to squeeze me in with such short notice and also answer all of my questions, definitely will be coming backü´∂
I take my six Yorkies here. The young girl does a wonderful job. My fur babies always look great and they have very reasonable pricing. Thank you for your extra love and care.  üê∂ Tammy Hight

We are incredibly grateful to the team. From day one, they made us feel supported, heard, and well-guided. The staff is highly skilled, patient, and genuinely caring with the children.  You can truly see the dedication and passion in their work. The facilities are also safe, clean, and thoughtfully designed for children‚Äôs comfort and growth. I wholeheartedly recommend this place to any family looking for therapeutic support for their child.

I am extremely pleased with the therapy my son is receiving. Diana, his therapist, is truly exceptional ‚Äî her dedication and vocation shine through in every session. Luciana and Claudia at the front desk are not only professional but also warm and caring, which makes every visit a pleasant experience. I wholeheartedly recommend this place 100%.

We‚Äôve seen so much progress, not only in speech and motor skills, but also in confidence and social interaction. The facility is clean, well-equipped, and designed to be fun and engaging for kids. Scheduling is also flexible, which has been a huge help for our family.
This place is amazing! The staff truly care about the kids and go above and beyond to support their growth. You can feel the love and dedication in everything they do

Had a great experience bringing my daughter to ACAS! They set up the appointment and verified my insurance accurately and quickly..Luciana and Claudia at the front desk were very welcoming..On time therapy we were in an out and my daughter really enjoyed the therapist..Highly recommend!

Gina and Fabian are true professionals who bring both knowledge and compassion to their work, and it shows in every interaction. Their facility is clean, well-maintained, and designed with the comfort and safety of our furry family members in mind. Choosing the right dog trainer is one of the most important decisions a pet owner can make, and Gina and Fabian have proven they are the right choice. While quality training may cost a bit more upfront, it ultimately saves time, stress, and expense down the road by setting a solid foundation for your dog‚Äôs behavior.
