I‚Äôm on the road to the best recovery I‚Äôll ever have. The staff are very friendly, so sweet. Picking the right physical therapy office is so important and I‚Äôm thankful I found the best one. Thanks Dr. Brett!

Dr Nate oversees my treatments. He is knowledgeable, knowledgeable understanding and patient, to name only a few virtues. The techs are also helpful, knowledgeable and willing to do whatever is necessary for me to succeed. It‚Äôs by far the best PT experience I‚Äôve had

I went to Advanced Medical of Florida for multiple issues I had from a combination of old injuries and a car accident. My injuries were creating issues for me at work. I worked with Dr. Nate and Alisha and their care helped me be able to recover from these injuries after years of issues!
I‚Äôm a massage therapist and I refer all my clients to them!
This place is amazing! I came in for my shoulder after rotator cuff surgery and they had me up and moving so quickly. It is so nice to gain my strength back so quickly.

Such friendly staff!  My hand therapy has been handled professionally and with care.
Alisha K. is knowledgeable and I feel confident in the exercises we are doing. They are flexible to my schedule and do effective appointment reminders. I highly recommend them!

I am so grateful that I fell into the hands of Advanced Physical Therapy. The staff is AMAZING, each and every one of them. They are kind, caring and super personable. The progress I made with my fractured shoulder could not have happened if it wasn't for Cathy, my super friendly and dedicated therapist. The ladies at the front desk are the BEST!!! I will miss them all. Highly recommended to anyone seeking physical therapy. Forget the rest and go to the BEST!!!!!

I have been coming here for a couple of weeks now for a quad tendon rupture. I have had physical therapy before, and hated it. Previously the place I was had 3-4 patients for one therapist during a time slot. I love it here because they give you individual care! Now, let‚Äôs talk about Cathy. Cathy is truly amazing! She has a very nurturing spirit and shows she truly cares about her patient! I had Troy one visit and could tell he was a great guy as well. You can‚Äôt go wrong allowing these folks to care for you! I look forward to my visits 3 times per week.

I go to the Cape Coral location and have had the best experience.  In a car accident and had to have Physical therapy at a certain point.  From the beautiful women at the front desk to my therapist, Kathy, they have taken great care of me and have been so kind. Today was my last day and it brought me to tears. Love them all.  The Cape office is a family feeling.  Highly recommend!!

I highly recommend Advanced Physical Therapy of Cape Coral, they get the job done!!! I was in so much pain from sciatica and very skeptical that much could be done to relieve my pain. But after four weeks of PT, I walked out of there pain free!!! Thank you to Troy and Cathy for pushing me to my limits and getting me back on track! And I can‚Äôt forget the office staff , Amy and Karen! Always smiling, so friendly and accommodating! Thank you all and if ever need PT again, I know where I‚Äôm going!
Many thanks,
Sandi Case

From the moment I walked through the door, I was warmly welcomed. The ladies at the front desk, Amy & Karen were wonderful. My Physical Therapist, was Troy, he is professional, & well spoken. He truly has a gift as a physical therapist. I also worked with Yosmen, who was very good. I can't forget to mention Emma, the assistant physical therapist, she is also very good, and seems to know what is needed before she is asked. I only wish I could give more than just 5 stars!  Sincerely,  Margaret Smyth +

provider_name: Advanced Physical Therapy & Rehabilitation- Ft Myers, FL
review_text: I highly recommend Advance Therapy! Everyone there has been amazing, caring, professional, and supportive throughout my treatment. This is a top-notch, very well-run practice. The ladies at the front desk, especially Thea, go above and beyond to help with scheduling and make the process easy. The therapists are focused on one goal getting you healthy and better. Directed by Thomas Zeller, a practicing therapist and one of the best, Tom and his entire team are not only highly skilled professionals but also truly caring individuals. I highly recommend!

provider_name: Advanced Physical Therapy & Rehabilitation- Ft Myers, FL
review_text:
I can‚Äôt begin to share all my experiences at Advanced physical therapy. If you are someone that is looking for a personal care attention and people that truly care this is your place. I started bringing my 91 year-old father here not knowing what to expect and all I can say is they treated him with kindness And gave him the confidence that he could do more than what he thought. The staff and team goes above and beyond what is expected they always know you by name and always greet you with a smile. Believe me when I say this is your physical therapy center for care and improvement.
Rene

provider_name: Advanced Physical Therapy & Rehabilitation- Ft Myers, FL
review_text:
After extensively searching through reviews for the best physical therapy location, I decided upon Advanced Physical Therapy.  From my initial phone conversation with Phio at the front desk through my discharge date, I have received the best service, attention, follow up and care that I could have hoped for.

My initial evaluation was thorough and insightful. Pictures were drawn and images printed so i could better understand my issues and the planned approach for therapy.

I received one on one personal attention during each visit. My therapist never left me doing exercises while he/she attended to another patient.

Appointments were confirmed and I was often contacted when additional openings became available.  The staff are extremely friendly, engaging and attentive.  There is a "family" feel amongst the employees which extends to the patients.  I looked forward to every visit!

I have made great progress toward healing and I attribute it to Tom and his wonderful staff.  I cannot thank them enough!

provider_name: Advanced Physical Therapy & Rehabilitation- Ft Myers, FL
review_text:
After being in pain for so long and repeatedly told it was a shoulder issue, I decided to explore other options on my own. That search led me to Advanced Physical Therapy, and I truly couldn‚Äôt be happier.

From my very first call, the front desk staff was incredibly friendly and accommodating. Phio got me in right away and has been such a pleasure to work with ever since, promptly scheduling me with Thomas Zeller.

From my initial visit, Tom was absolutely amazing. He immediately identified the real issue‚Äîsomething no one else had been able to do. He‚Äôs consistently knowledgeable, helpful, and genuinely kind. From day one, I knew I was finally in the right place and in the best hands.

I can‚Äôt fully express how grateful I am to Tom for his expertise and support in helping me heal. I highly, recommend Advanced Physical Therapy to anyone looking for real answers and exceptional care.

provider_name: Advanced Physical Therapy & Rehabilitation- Ft Myers, FL
review_text: Highly recommended. The therapist I had Tom Paul Jen Alex with assistance from Thomas. We‚Äôre all exceptional, warm, friendly, and very proficient when you enter the staff greets you with a smile and after the first day, a smile and your name, it really is an exceptional  facility.

I was referred to Jeremy for TMJ/ posture  issues and have been going to him for several months now  . As many other reviews mention he‚Äôs awesome at what he does . He gives simple but effective exercises, sends videos demonstrating them, is  extremely polite and professional , communication is great and maintains a very clean office  . Above all Jeremy is a really good human being‚Ä¶ compassionate, kind and patient , qualities that someone who is struggling or in pain will greatly appreciate .

Jeremy is awesome and so funny. He really knows his stuff and his red light therapy laser is a game changer. I met him five years ago after I broke my foot in a car accident and I have been going ever since to get a tune up once a week. He was one of the ones that helped me walk again. We always talk the whole session cause we like Disney, Music and just straight up living life and our families. Definitely if you have a pain somewhere or just need a smile or a good talk. Jeremy is your guy. He will help you in more ways than one. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Jeremy is the absolute best. After looking for PTs in the area that were flexible with their schedules and were available for appointments on the weekend (as to not interrupt my work), I found Advanced Physical Therapy Specialists. Jeremy quickly called me, I gave him information regarding my back pain, and he immediately understood what I was going through. We scheduled our sessions for Saturdays.

Each session is personalized and Jeremy focusses on the cause of the pain/discomfort. He also sent me follow up emails for exercises I could do in between sessions.

His personalized, hands-on approach is fantastic. I was feeling better in no time.

I highly recommend Jeremy and Advanced Physical Therapy Specialists! He is by far better than any other PTs in the area, particularly the more commercial shops.

Jeremy is, without a doubt, the best physical therapist I‚Äôve ever worked with. I traveled all the way from South America just to see him, and it was the best investment I‚Äôve made in my health in years. After 10 years of hip pain (FAI), surgery, 8 doctors, and over 15 physical therapists across 4 countries, nothing truly helped‚Äîuntil Jeremy. With a few observations, precise adjustments, and tailored exercises, I experienced immediate relief. He also generously offered to collaborate with my physical therapist back in Chile, sharing his knowledge and recommendations for continued treatment after I returned home. One of the best in his craft!

Great knowledge, great person, and the best Physical therapist you will find in Miami. He is not the usual physical therapy clinic where they put heat packs and a few exercises. Jeremy dedicates the full hour working with you 1:1 doing manual therapy to make you feel better. Jeremy is a master of the physical therapy, he is a medical professional like the ones you don‚Äôt find too often.

The team at Advanced Rehabilitation is AMAZING! I came in with frozen shoulder after failed PT attempts with other physical therapists that made my condition worse. My doctor felt it was time for Chris and he was right! Chris, Jo, Nicole and the entire team at Advanced rehab not only got me back to full mobility, but made every session fun. Filled with kind, talented and invested team members, Advanced Rehabilitation leads the PT space. Highly recommended and truly grateful for their tremendous compassion and care.

Amazing team! Highly recommend Chris Arrigo and the staff at Advanced Rehabilitation. They assisted me in understanding my IT band pain, learning exercises to stabilize myself while running, and ultimately I‚Äôm back to running (mostly) pain free.

I cannot say enough good things about Chris Arrigo and the entire Advanced Rehabilitation team. I came to Chris desperate for help just 2 weeks into marathon training and he scheduled me for the next business day. After the first session or two, my pain had subsided and in roughly 2 weeks I was feeling great. I‚Äôm now two weeks out from my marathon, feeling great and back on track. It definitely wouldn‚Äôt be possible without them! If you are in need of PT, I highly recommend Advanced Rehabilitation.

I did a sesssion here and I felt very un welcomed by the front office staff. The therapist I worked with was kind but I will not return. I called to make a second appointment since I am recovering from knee surgery and this location is close by, the front office clerk said she would call me back, 1.5 weeks later and no call back. They just don‚Äôt seem to care about the patients. I‚Äôd rather drive to a farther spot than deal with the negative energy they provide patients.

Everything about Chris Arrigo and Advanced Rehabilitation has been wonderful!!  As a CrossFit games athlete, I was desperate to find hope that I would be able to compete again after receiving bad news about my shoulder. I knew I didn't want surgery and needed to find a shoulder specialist. Chris is helping me build up my shoulder strength to get me back to doing what I love! I am now back to doing many of the high level gymnastics and overhead movements that involve shoulders!!
I was initially worried that my competitive career could be over, but with Chris' help, I am feeling more and more confident about the upcoming CrossFit season. He has gotten me through a tough time and helped me get closer to reaching my goals!
I would highly recommend him and his staff!!!
Cici Fougere

Sly is an awesome physical therapist. He has helped me tremendously with my rotator cuff shoulder surgery, and my Morton‚Äôs
Neuroma in my right foot. He also offers what they call Dry Needling. I call it acupuncture.

Dr Sly was a very patient, knowledgeable, kind practitioner who was the joy to work with. I would gladly refer him to anyone in my circle. Thomas also was a kind soul and I appreciate the way the two work together.

I absolutely recommend anyone needing physical therapy to go to Advanced Rehabilitation.  I was fortunate to see Sly Edwards, PT, DPT at the Largo location . Sly cares about the well-being of his patients.  Sly was professional, encouraging, and upbeat! He  listened to my concerns and questions thoughtfully and worked with me to help me achieve my goals. I came in with significant pain as a result of having a total knee replacement.  Today was my last day and I am pain free.  I have gained strength in my leg muscles and most importantly I feel more confident going forward.    Since my first day of therapy the entire staff here has been so fantastic and made me feel so well cared for.

I sustained a spiral fracture of my arm in June 2024, and nerve damage left my wrist dropping as if I had suffered a stroke. When I began physical therapy, I was in a great deal of pain and extremely frightened about the future use of my hand. Even though it was, thankfully, my non dominant arm I was quite limited in what I could do. I was blessed indeed to have Sly Edwards as my therapist. It was clear to me that he is extremely knowledgeable and competent. Equally important was the fact that he is kind, encouraging, and supportive.  He realized that I was traumatized by the entire incident, and he therefore needed to address psychological issues as well. He was a taskmaster, clearly believing that I could have a successful outcome. I am so very grateful that I ended up at this facility and in his care. I would recommend him without reservation. And yes, I do have full use of my handüôè

Natalie has helped me to not walk with a cane anymore, and I don‚Äôt use my brace for my knee due to the expert handling of exercises and PT that I have received after two visits. The whole staff are professional and really care.

I‚Äôve been working with Ira for the past year following back surgery, and I couldn‚Äôt be more grateful for his care. When I first started, I could barely walk‚Äînow I‚Äôm stronger, more stable, and feeling like myself again. Ira‚Äôs deep knowledge, persistence, and personalized approach made all the difference in my recovery. His customized plans helped me progress steadily, and his dedication never wavered. I highly recommend Ira to anyone in need of physical therapy.

After going to a few therapists over a period of time with no results a doctor recommended Ira. His one on one therapy was just what I needed for my hip issues.  Ira‚Äôs knowledge & care solved the problem & I can‚Äôt thank him enough.

Ira is a hands on therapist.  Only exercise can't break scars tissue, help with frozen shoulder and rehab after serguery. You can count on him to work very hard and get your mobility back.
Very recommended.

I have used Ira Farber a few times for physical therapy.  He was recommended to me after I had my first knee replacement.  After just a few sessions, I was mobile and comfortable walking.  I then had my second knee replaced and again, he worked with me and my recovery was excellent.  Ira stayed with me for my entire session, monitoring my progress and ensuring that I wasn't overdoing anything, but progressing positively.  He is kind, compassionte and extremely knowledgeable.  I would recommend him to anyone who needs physical therapy and wants positive results.  Outstanding therapist!

Your location

Ira D. Farber, MPT
5850 S Pine Island Rd, Davie, FL 33328
Physical therapist
Georgette Spring
91 points
Ira is an excellent Physical Therapist.  He is very knowledgeable, caring and extremely supportive of his patient's needs. My surgery was a reverse shoulder replacement.  Ira knew exactly how to manage the pain and swelling in my arm. He knew the exact stretching exercises for me to perform in order to stretch my arm muscles. Ira is very gentle as he maneuvers my arm so I can retain the flexibility I need for daily use without pain and discomfort. He also knew the weight training exercises to build my deltoid, tricep, and bicep muscles which were terribly weak. I highly recommend Ira for all your physical therapy concerns and needs.

I can't say enough good things about this physical therapy center. From the moment you walk in, you're welcomed like family ‚Äî and that warm, professional care continues every step of the way.

Craig, the owner, has created a space where healing is not just physical, but emotional, too. His dedication to excellence and patient-centered care is evident in every detail.

The therapy team is top-tier. Brittany is incredibly knowledgeable, attentive, and always brings a positive attitude to every session. Chris is equally impressive, skilled, motivating, and genuinely invested in helping you reach your goals. Their expertise and encouragement made a huge difference in my recovery.

And let‚Äôs not forget the front office dream team! Jennifer and Nathalie are warm, efficient, and always ready with a smile. They make scheduling easy and stress-free, and they genuinely care about each patient.

If you're looking for a place that blends professionalism with heart, this is it. I‚Äôm so grateful to have found them ‚Äî they don‚Äôt just treat injuries, they lift spirits.
Helpful and friendly front desk.  My physical therapist Kayla is easy to understand and follow. Has been a good experience overall. Highly recommend.

I have been to Advanced Therapeutics in Hallandale twice for physical therapy.  I have had a lot of PT in my adult years having had back issues since I can remember, including surgery. This place is by far the best I have had.  Craig, the owner, is warm and inviting, always attentive to everyone‚Äôs needs.  Jennifer was always on point with appointments and scheduling. Chris was great to work with. He focused on what I needed to do to reach my goals. Never pressured or bullied me to do more than I could do.  Trained me on TRX which I absolutely loved. And we always had a good laugh!!   And most importantly, the dogs are wonderful. The emotional support and joy they provide makes going there extra special. Thank you All!!!

Been coming here for about 2 months now and always a great experience. Staff is very friendly and make it easy to schedule appointments. The therapists are great and really know what they‚Äôre doing. I‚Äôve been working with Nicole and she‚Äôs awesome! I‚Äôve definitely seen a difference and improvement in such a short period of time. If you need PT I totally recommend to come here!

Everyone in the office is so friendly and helpful from the front desk to the therapists. My therapist Nicole was amazing! She is super energetic and supportive. Explained the process of the exercises and therapy so I can easily understand how to get to my goal of getting my knee stronger. Very positive experience. Highly recommend Nicole!

My first visit to this vets office on Friday. The vet and her assistant were both very gentle and compassionate with my sick kitty. They explained everything gave me a treatment plan with a reasonable affordable price in which to treat my cat. I feel fortunate and blessed to have Found such a good veterinarian. I highly recommend them. I am a registered nurse and I‚Äôm very observant as to cleanliness et Clinic, it was very clean and I appreciated The Care of my fur baby.  Although my baby isn‚Äôt doing much better, I know she got the best possible care available

I am very pleased with how quickly they were willing to fit us! Dr. Stone has compassion and takes her time to explain and answer questions. I also love our vet tech Eddie! They both have great personality's ! Chris at the front is also very kind and helpful! Prices are fair to which is a bonus !
Our cat, Shine, needed to be seen right away and our vet couldn‚Äôt get her in.  Advanced Vet Care of Pasco got us in, and were so kind and gentle with Shine. Very impressed!! Highly recommend.

I was happy with my experience here. I was able to get in to see them on the day that I called for an appointment for my sick cat when I couldn‚Äôt get into my regular vet whom I‚Äôve been going to for about 20 years. And this isn‚Äôt the first time I couldn‚Äôt get into my regular vet, rather was told to go to urgent care. All the staff here were helpful and kind, giving my fur baby the best care. I will be going back. Thank you Advanced Veterinary Care! You‚Äôve gained a new client.
This was my first visit for my Chiwinee Oreo's yearly. Excellent caring staff! Dr. Stone and Eddie gave the best TLC to Oreo! I have used other Veterinary offices and they can't compare.

I have had several experiences with Advent Health all of which have been positive.  My first experience was when I was so sick my brother brought me to Advent Health Emergency.  They were very thorough and found I had a mass on my Pituitary Gland.  They made all the necessary arrangements to get me to The Shands in Gainesville in order to have the mass surgically removed via my nostrils the next morning.  It was incredible the medical care I received at both facilities.  Eight months later the surgical team at Advent Health surgically removed a tumor that was growing in my neck.  Again, I couldn‚Äôt have experienced a more thorough and caring surgical team.  There is no noticeable scar.  Most recently at 70 years old I had my first colonoscopy and endoscopy.  I required surgical polyps removal.  The surgery was very expertly conducted and I have gotten along really well.  Very grateful for the teams that have truly stepped up to provide the best medical care possible.

I had a wonderful experience with the Advent Daytona Beach Hospital neurosurgery area.  Their therapy unit has everything you can think of for rehabilitation purposes.  Their therapy staff was extremely helpful & kind.  The food was actually very good for hospital food.  I was impressed & pleased with my three week stay.

Had an orthopedic appointment with Dr. Quattrocelli and had a very professional interaction.  Parking there is an Olympic sport so show up 30 minutes early because you‚Äôre going to have to make Daytona 500 laps around the parking lot looking for a space.  The office staff were really helpful and knowledgeable.  My appointment happened exactly on time. The Aide was professional and seemed to know the procedures well.  The Dr. showed up quite soon after, completed his exam, spoke respectfully with me to get an understanding of my concerns.  His treatment and recommendations for follow on care seemed right as I was expecting from discussions with my Primary Care Dr.  great new modern facility, equipment and well maintained.  Highly recommend Advent for your orthopedic needs and in particular Dr. Quattrocelli.

Wonderful care at ADVENT WOUND CARE CENTER. The doctor knew exactly what to do to allow my wound to heal quickly. The wound occurred at the end of July and it had become a serious problem, even with the care I was receiving. Dr. Clayton knew exactly what to do when I saw her at the end of September. The wound has now healed, in such a short time. The staff are also excellent, very courteous and professional.

Where do I Start!  Was checked in the Emergency Room and was excellent. Then put in a 5x7 Room with no windows or toilet facilities. After about 9 hours of this was moved to a room in the Regular Hospital.  They put me in a special bed due to my care. Well the bed was supposed to be to be an air mattress.  Did not work first night slept on a board all night.  Nurses were deplorable. Was in 5 nights and never a shower or bath. Not able to brush my teeth.

Could go on forever but what‚Äôs use!

The staff here is wonderful! They work in such a cramped space and somehow find a way to make it work. I cannot imagine how challenging it must be. Parking was a little tricky on certain days, but I‚Äôm hoping the parking garage helps that. Overall I couldn‚Äôt be happier with our experience.

I am very pleased with the staff and the care my child is receiving.  My child‚Äôs therapist is by far the best physical therapist I have ever worked with.  Her knowledge, patience, compassion are exemplary.  During the initial and any subsequent evaluation, she clearly explain the care plan along with treatment as well as the duration.  Besides all the great qualities mentioned above she is very resourceful; she has given recommendations and assistance with obtaining equipments that suit my child‚Äôs needs. She also takes time out of her busy schedule to collaborate treatment plans with my child doctors.  Also I would like to mention that while my therapist was on leave, it was a blessing for my child and I to have worked with other staff members of this care team.  Other PT were able to step in and continue with the therapy session.  I know there‚Äôs great communication skills because they all were on the same page; which led me to believe that my therapist communicated with them prior to her absence.  Thank you everyone for the excellent treatment you provided for me and my child.

We have Ms. Jan for speech for over a year now for my oldest and a few months now for my youngest. She is truly one of the best therapists we‚Äôve had for any therapy! They were in other therapies in the past here as well. Everyone has been so nice and helpful. Wait lists moved pretty quickly as well.

Advent Health Pediatric Rehab in Ocala has such amazing therapists that care so much about the children they work with. My grandson's therapist, Melissa Cunningham, is a wonderful speech therapist and he has made such progress with her help! I am so grateful for all they do!

The speech therapists here are great. But every visit the two receptionists will not crack a smile, they don't want you in their lives. They seem annoyed to have to look at your ugly face. Anytime you check in, you feel like an inconvenience to them. I have tried my best to be nothing but friendly and kind and it has not been returned. It kind of puts a damper on the whole experience, especially since I'm paying over $6 a minute for the services I get my son here. Why get a job interacting with the public if you hate it so much?

We have had a wonderful experience at Advent Rehab. The therapists are knowledgeable and take time to know and understand their patients and their needs. The therapists go out of their way to organize equipment needed and connect you with resources. The facility is clean and well kept.

Meg is absolutely wonderful! She is thorough, knowledgeable, and takes the time to explain everything in a way that makes you feel comfortable and supported. Just after the first evaluation, I felt so much better. On top of that, she‚Äôs warm and friendly, which makes the whole experience so much easier.  I can‚Äôt recommend her enough! Thank you, Meg!

I started working with the Advent Health Rehab for Pelvic Health at Innovation Center a few weeks ago. At my second visit, I met with Meg, who was attentive and informative. She listened to my concerns, addressed my questions, and provided new insights. These were insights that no one had connected before and immediately I felt it made sense based on my symptoms. The following week, I met with Kimmie, who offered biofeedback that provided another valuable layer of information. Both providers demonstrated expertise in pelvic health and were easy to talk to about my concerns, knowledgeable, and empathetic. Highly recommend.

From the moment I went in, everyone was so attentive and kind. They made me feel very comfortable. From Guillermo at the front desk, to Kimmy with therapy and to top it all off with Simone at checkout, everyone was so pleasant and they genuinely care for you. I‚Äôm very blessed to go here for my therapy needs.

Katie at the Clermont facility is a great therapist. She is patient, explains goals and how to correctly do the exercises. Katie is an asset to Adventhealth. If you have tried the program I recommend it.

Advent health and rehab are the best
Yarah is the most professional I've ever had. My rating for yarah is 100 percent.
Richard Rosado

provider_name: AdventHealth Sports Med & Rehab Dr. Phillips
review_text: Excellent facility and team! They are highly motivated and skilled to assist you in getting back to shape. I had a lot of fun while assisting for my physical therapy, they make it feel like fun but they did work me hard. 100% recommend the location and all the therapists. Loved it!!

provider_name: AdventHealth Sports Med & Rehab Dr. Phillips
review_text: I received physical therapy here for 6 weeks and saw a vast improvement in my range of motion as well as the pain levels I was experiencing with my injury. Stefano and Caroline were both excellent physical therapists and very personable throughout each physical therapy session. Both were also very knowledgeable in understanding the body and coming up with a routine to put me on the path to recovery. I would highly recommend this location if you‚Äôre looking to receive physical therapy.

provider_name: AdventHealth Sports Med & Rehab Dr. Phillips
review_text:
I had the best experience at this location. Daniel, Stefano and Caroline were my trainers, they are professional, detailed and explained in depth how to use the machines and do the exercises . Caroline Daniel and Stefano are really great trainers they are very good at what they do. correctly. Stefano made a great plan for me.
I‚Äôm so pleased with the results and strongly recommend coming to this facility.

provider_name: AdventHealth Sports Med & Rehab Dr. Phillips
review_text: Kirsten and Jacob were the best at their job. I went in with an injured shoulder limited ROM and was very skeptical about the healing process. By the time they were finished with my sessions , my range of motion returned and no more pain. I fully recommend them. Location nice and clean. Thank you guys. Patti K.

provider_name: AdventHealth Sports Med & Rehab Dr. Phillips
review_text: I present with shoulder pain. Dr recommended 6 weeks of PT.  I did it at the Advent Sports Rehab Dr Phillips. I work with Stephano. He correctly assessed the exercises I needed.  He gave me a work out program for when I was not coming to PT. His knowledge was excellent. At the end of 6 weeks my pain was gone. I have a program to continue now that I am done with PT. I highly recommend working with Stephano.  As a physician I appreciate his professionalism and ability to relate to his patients.  Well done Stephano

provider_name: AdventHealth Sports Med & Rehab East Orlando
review_text:
I came to AdventHealth Sports Med & Rehab East Orlando after my robotic prostate surgery and worked with Christie and Kristen for about three months. They are both very professional, patient, and detail-oriented. The facility is clean, well-organized, and has private rooms that make the therapy sessions very comfortable.

Thanks to their guidance and care, my recovery went extremely well, and my leakage issue is now completely resolved. I truly appreciate their dedication and highly recommend this place to anyone in need of physical therapy.

provider_name: AdventHealth Sports Med & Rehab East Orlando
review_text: I really can‚Äôt say enough great things about this location. I came here last year for a frozen shoulder, and now I am back this year for physical therapy on my knee/hip. Everyone from my first phone call, check in, evaluation, and my regular PT visits have been amazing. I have had nothing but top notch service during every single interaction. My therapists have listened to all of my concerns and answered all of my questions. And more importantly, they handle everything with care and compassion, and a little bit of humor ‚Äì which makes going that much more enjoyable. If you‚Äôre looking for a great place to go for your rehabilitation, you can‚Äôt ask for anything better. I highly recommend AdventHealth Sports Medicine and Rehab- East Orlando. Five stars really isn‚Äôt a high enough score!

provider_name: AdventHealth Sports Med & Rehab East Orlando
review_text: Love coming to this physical therapy location the staff are very friendly, helpful and supportive. Scot my primary therapist is awesome. Very supportive and understanding of my limitations, he pushes me through the process but not to the extent of exertion. I know he is leaving, I will miss him very much but the other therapist there will be just as good. Blessings on your next chapter Scot, I know you‚Äôll excel in whatever you choose.

provider_name: AdventHealth Sports Med & Rehab East Orlando
review_text: My teenage daughter is being seen for therapy.  From the first appointment on forward, we have had a positive experience at every visit.  But, I have to give specific kudos to David. During our last session,  my daughter wasn't in the best of moods and David noticed.  Sorry David, teenagers? üòÖ  When the session was over, her entire demeanor was different. She was excited, happier, and wanted to continue the session.  She commented on the therapy received and has continued talking about it days later, looking forward to it and waking up earlier. She even requested to continue her sessions with David. This makes my mommy heart happy!  Thank you David! #legpress #add5morelbs

provider_name: AdventHealth Sports Med & Rehab East Orlando
review_text: I had vestibular therapy at Advent Health Rehab Center for over two months. My therapists were wonderful, and very thorough with me, explaining how the inner ear affects my balance. Many thanks to them for their diligence and care to make me better!

provider_name: AdventHealth Sports Med & Rehab Orange City
review_text:
The old team was great but this newer team is not put together as well as the past one. You have one therapist supporting 4 or 5 patients at one time causing wait times and shorter sessions. The open sessions in the large room verses the more private sessions in the smaller rooms with a more personalized a better consideration for your needs made it better. The old group believed in working the muscle groups that were responsible for your need to improve where groups greatest concern is to cause NO pain. Not a helpful plan for. Healing. With my knee replacements the old team worked them out with care not to push to far. This new team seems to be more concerned with making more money by handling more people with absolutely no pain. My exercises 80 percent of them did nothing for my back
I felt no pain but did little exercises that improved directly the problem in my back. The exercises I did at home NOT prescribed by them did more. I will not use them again. None of the criticism has anything to do with the rest of the hospital. I use AHFM for all the rest of my health needs and I am very satisfied with them.

What a wonderful rehab experience. If you‚Äôre looking for physical therapists that are knowledgeable, supportive, and caring. Christopher and his amazing team are the one‚Äôs you want to work with. provider_name: AdventHealth Sports Med & Rehab Victoria Park
review_text: I've come a long way since my stroke 5 years ago. I started off in a almost vegetable like state with a feeding tube and a trachea. A year ago I started on the long road of therapy. I had to start of paying for therapy myself but I had to stop because I couldn't afford it any longer. Because of going to that therapy I started recovering. They pushed me and I was able to use a walker somewhat and go upstairs with help. I was recommended advent sport and rehab in Orange City but because the one in Deland was closer, I transfered to it. Due to my therapist Kandy, who kept pushing me past even what she thought I could do, I accomplished all of my short term goals and even walked with a walker 400 feet. And I was able to graduate from the program. I highly recommend this place. They are not only kind but are all good at their jobs. I am so thankful to them. Kandy is awesome at her job and I highly recommend her as well.

provider_name: AdventHealth Sports Med & Rehab Victoria Park
review_text: I received 6 weeks of therapy after surgery. The treatment was focused on the areas that I needed to strengthen. I feel the therapy was very beneficial because my balance and strength improved significantly at the completion of my physical therapy cycle.

provider_name: AdventHealth Sports Med & Rehab Victoria Park
review_text: Came to this rehab office with severe arthritis in lower back and very tight hamstrings. I had very limited flexibility and was uncomfortable and had a hard time getting good sleep. Niraj took me on and the results after two weeks have been notable. Better flexibility, little or no lower back pain and definitely better sleep. The office has been very professional and accommodating. Niraj has given me stretching exercises to do at home as part of an ongoing health improvement. It has been very helpful and is now a part of my daily routine. Thanks to all in the office.

provider_name: AdventHealth Sports Med & Rehab Victoria Park
review_text: I came to this facility for help with a frozen shoulder, resulting in very limited mobility. When I started therapy I could only raise my arm halfway. I could not reach behind my back nor even put my hand on my hip, due to the pain. I knew it would take a while to regain full range of motion, but with two PT appointments a week, and doing exercises at home, after 3 months, I am almost completely recovered. I probably have 95% mobility at this point and will continue my therapy at home, anticipating a complete recovery of mobility very soon. I am appreciative of all the staff at advent sports med & rehab. They are all so knowledgeable, kind and encouraging, but also challenged me when needed and kept me moving forward week after week. I am so pleased with the results! This was my second experience at this facility. My first experience was a knee injury that required rehab about a year ago. I highly recommend this team of therapists and support staff! I hope I never have to need physical therapy again, but I know If I do, this is where I will go for the best treatment. I highly recommend them!

provider_name: AdventHealth Sports Med & Rehab Winter Park
review_text:
The experience that we had  during this time that my son was in physical therapy was absolutely amazing.  After breaking his leg and having to undergo surgery in the middle of January, we weren't sure of how long it would be before he would be ready for competitive high school basketball. From a January surgery to being cleared to play full speed with no restrictions in the middle of October is credited to this team. Juan Madrid and the other therapists pushed my son every session to prepare him for such an amazing comeback. I believe he's better now after surgery and completing therapy than he was before he broke his leg. Thanks to this team.

Completing therapy was bitter sweet. We were glad to have made such an accomplishment and to have met and worked with a group of amazing therapists. At the same time, we are sad to leave behind such a talented and caring group. I would highly recommend Juan and the team there at AdventHealth Sports Med & Rehab Winter Park to anyone who is willing to put in the work for a complete recovery.  We'll surely miss you guys.  I wish you all the best as you continue to grow your careers and care for the community.

Gym Manager is engaged with members and staff ensuring that the gym runs smoothly for those seeking physical therapy/occupational therapy/massage therapy/regular workouts.

Check out the information cards at the desk for more information. Packages are available.

Highly recommended ‚ô•Ô∏è

One of the best deep tissue and special area massages by Joshua, at Advent, ever. I've had 6 50 minute massages with Josh in 2023 / 24, and he has used many effective techniques and pressure points to always address my concerns.  He is a good communicator and has strong hands!  The staff is always so welcoming and helpful. Highly recommended!!!

By far the best er/hospital facility I‚Äôve ever been to.
We were admitted for three days with my 2 month old son for severe reflux. Our nurses were awesome, doctors were awesome, radiology was awesome. We got so many answers in three days from two doctors than we‚Äôve had in two months from several. All in all was a great experience even though the hospital isn‚Äôt where you always want to be. So extremely thankful.

We are so grateful for Dr. Raj and the entire team who cared for our little guy during his brief NICU stay earlier this month. Esther (days) and Amy W. (nights) were two standout nurses for us making sure we were always informed and included in our son‚Äôs care. Amy even made the cutest footprint keepsake after learning about my husband‚Äôs aviation career. Thank you, thank you, thank YOU to the entire care team!

We had an amazing experience at AdventHealth Pediatric ER. From the moment we arrived, every staff member treated our daughter with such kindness, professionalism, and genuine care. The nurses were gentle and attentive, helping our daughter feel calm and safe throughout her visit. The doctors were thorough, compassionate, and clear in their communication, which gave us great peace of mind.

The environment was clean, peaceful, and kid-friendly ‚Äî exactly what you hope for in a moment of stress. We felt truly seen, supported, and cared for. We are so grateful for the exceptional care our daughter received and wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to return if needed. Thank you, AdventHealth, for going above and beyond!

I would like to take a moment to say thank you for the excellent service! I would like to commend the care that we received from nurse Amy with her preceptee Erin who has been so kind and has made my daughter feel cared for and loved! To Dr. Jan, thank you for updating me on my daughter‚Äôs health status. To Kayla, the social worker, thank you for making my daughter feel heard, and thank you for the resources you provided. I can‚Äôt thank you enough for everything! May God bless you a thousandfold.

The staff was very caring.  Doctors/Nurse Practioners involved me in the care of my child.  They asked my opinion, given a series of facts; they also helped to keep her comfortable/entertained in between getting tests run and getting results.  10/10!

provider_name: Affiliated Veterinary Specialists: Carlos L. Aragon, DVM, DACVS
review_text: Dr Aragon did surgery on my dog the next day. They made sure she was comfortable and well taken care of. She's like my kid. Only the best for her. Told me up front the price, and that was it. They didn't have any hidden fees. We love them and you would too. Safe was great helping me under stand anything i was unsure about. Yvonne Z

provider_name: Affiliated Veterinary Specialists: Carlos L. Aragon, DVM, DACVS
review_text: All the staff was very professional, the doctor did a fantastic job on my dogs rear left leg he's recovering nicely. The time that the doctor spend with us explaining the procedure was very reassuring. Highly recommend this facility if your pet needs surgery.

provider_name: Affiliated Veterinary Specialists: Carlos L. Aragon, DVM, DACVS
review_text: This place is the BEST!!!!! I met with Dr. Aragon for our consultation after my dog Jozie tore her ACL. I can simply not say enough about him and his staff. He was so thorough and professional. He explained every little detail in depth. I knew that my dogs well-being was their number 1 priority. I love that they have a Board Certified Anesthesiologist to  oversee each case. Each pet has their own anesthetic protocol catered to their very own specific needs. If you want quality specialized care, this is the place to bring your fur babies. Jozie's technician Angelina was INCREDIBLE. So knowledgeable and helpful. All the way through till the end. After surgery Dr. Aragon noticed some muscle atrophy and felt that she would benefit from physical therapy. I was able to get in right away to see Dr. Appel, the Physical Therapist. WOW! Dr. Appel and her Nurse Erin where great! They were so helpful in helping Jozie achieve her goals, and regaining muscle strength in that leg. I could never thank them enough for all they have done for Jozie. You have such a wonderful team of Doctors and Nurses. THANK YOU!!!!!

provider_name: Affiliated Veterinary Specialists: Carlos L. Aragon, DVM, DACVS
review_text: Dr. Aragon repaired my foster dog's hips after being found with severe damage from being hit by a car and struggling to survive through Hurricane Mathew. Without Dr. Aragon, this pet would still be suffering. He did an incredible job and my foster healed so, so fast. The physio and aftercare were so easy and Dr. Aragon was so helpful in answering any questions I had. 5 stars to him and his team.

provider_name: Affiliated Veterinary Specialists: Carlos L. Aragon, DVM, DACVS
review_text: After finding out that our sweet pup has an aggressive cancer, amputating her leg was our only option to relieve her pain. I am not able to say enough good things about Dr. Benjamino and the kind nurses at AVS. They were so thorough, never made me feel rushed and answered every question that I had. The people really care about your animal, which makes the money worth it!

We‚Äôve had such an amazing experience at Affluent Learning Center with our son‚Äôs speech pathologist! From the very beginning, communication has been top-notch‚Äîthey‚Äôre always quick to respond and so welcoming. Our son absolutely loves his sessions and literally runs in as fast as he can to see his speech pathologist. The connection they‚Äôve built is wonderful, and the positivity and transparency in every session is something we truly appreciate. He has been improving drastically with his speech. When he first started, he only knew a few words and now he‚Äôs able to identify almost everything I ask of him! We feel so lucky to have found them and highly recommend them to anyone looking for a fantastic speech therapy experience!

My daughter‚Äôs speech therapist at Affluent Learning Center has been absolutely wonderful. She is patient, kind, and truly invested in my daughter‚Äôs progress. Since starting therapy, I‚Äôve seen such an improvement in her confidence and communication skills. The sessions are always engaging and tailored to her needs, making learning both effective and enjoyable. I‚Äôm so grateful for the care and dedication shown, and I highly recommend the center to any parent looking for quality support for their child!

I connected with Affluent a few weeks ago and saw they offered speech therapy which I know my mother was researching different options for my younger brother. I sent Affluent my family's way and after some research they settled on Affluent. It has been an amazing experience so far. My brother who struggles to connect with others absolutely loved his therapist, with time and patience. The staff is extremely kind, understanding, and I truly couldn't recommend them enough. They really care

I took my little brother here a few weeks ago for his Initial evaluation. The woman did his evaluation and explained exactly what was going on with his speech and that she would email me a copy. I like that she explained what is wrong with his speech so that I can try to help him at home. The other place he was going to in Longwood did not take the time to do that. Then she said it would take two weeks for the insurance to process. She called me the other day to give me an update, letting me know that it looks like he will be scheduled soon! They have great customer service here! Glad I switched providers!

This place is amazing. My kid has always had trouble in school and making friends, but the team here just gets it. They know how to make learning fun and actually care about the kids. We‚Äôve seen such a big difference in how she interacts with others and how she handles challenges. She‚Äôs way more confident now. If you‚Äôre thinking about bringing your kid here, do it. You won‚Äôt regret it.

provider_name: Agape Detox Center | Florida Alcohol & Drug Rehab
review_text: I am truly grateful for the experience I had with Agapa. The staff is incredibly professional and knowledgeable. They played a crucial role in helping me recognize the areas where I was struggling daily. When I arrived in 2022, I was unsure about being there, but I now realize that Agapa, as a whole, was a group of angels sent to help me turn my life around. Thank you for everything!

provider_name: Agape Detox Center | Florida Alcohol & Drug Rehab
review_text: This place saved my life if it wasn't for the staff I wouldn't know where I would be at this time. The staff was very attentive to all the patients there, They treat you like you family and the food is great. Lol Agape means live and they sure do show it. I would recommend this place for anyone with mental health issues or addiction issues.

provider_name: Agape Detox Center | Florida Alcohol & Drug Rehab
review_text: I was very satisfied with my stay , with the staff and with the other people staying there . Everyone was personable and friendly and non judgemental . The medical staff will do everything they can to make you feel better . The food is Quality and the place is clean and taken of . If you want a good place to get clean and sober this is it .Thank you for everything and welcoming me with open arms.Gabriel ‚ù§Ô∏è

provider_name: Agape Detox Center | Florida Alcohol & Drug Rehab
review_text: Caden and Eddy were amazing! I have been looking for a place with good drinks. I got the Tropical Fruit Olong Tea w/ Mango jelly and it was great!

provider_name: Agape Detox Center | Florida Alcohol & Drug Rehab
review_text: Such an amazing experience, amazing team, amazing staff. Truly unconditional love! If you put in the work you‚Äôll get the results. Highly recommend coming here, been doing treatment my whole life and they taught me more then i have in years. Thank you Agape family for always being here. Love you allü©∑

provider_name: Ageless Agility Performance and Sport Rehabilitation
review_text: Ashley is great she is a good listener and pays attention to each client. I went there for a demonstration / lecture. She works well with doctors and she has dedication to helping individuals achieve their best. She even gave her card to my Uber driver who needed physical therapy. Check regarding insurance options before actually making an appointment but consider attending any of the free workshops via zoom or in person. I feel in person is best.

provider_name: Ageless Agility Performance and Sport Rehabilitation
review_text: Ashley has been such a huge help with my recovery and training. She is incredibly accommodating and always willing to adjust to my needs. Thanks to her support, I‚Äôve been able to work through my knee issues and continue training for running. She always shows up whenever I need her, which has made such a difference in my progress. Highly recommend!

provider_name: Ageless Agility Performance and Sport Rehabilitation
review_text:
After experiencing a traumatic accident, I wasn‚Äôt sure if I‚Äôd ever feel like myself again‚Äîphysically or emotionally. Under the compassionate and expert care of Ashley, I not only recovered, but rediscovered my strength and confidence.
Her approach was both intuitive and structured, blending deep clinical knowledge with genuine empathy. Each session was tailored to my evolving needs, and she consistently made me feel heard, supported, and empowered. From managing pain to regaining mobility and emotional resilience, her guidance was instrumental every step of the way.
Thanks to her dedication and skill, I‚Äôve made a full recovery and feel more in tune with my body and mind than ever before. I‚Äôm deeply grateful for her role in my healing journey and would wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone seeking transformative care.

provider_name: Ageless Agility Performance and Sport Rehabilitation
review_text: I have been running for many years but in the last few months I have been struggling with discomfort and pain in my right ankle and arch. I went to see Dr. Kranz to find answers, after a comprehensive examination she determined that I actually do have an injury, potentially a collapsing arch plus my running form is not the best which could be the reason of my injury or a consequence of this, in this treatment we are address both. She designed a 10 week rehabilitation program that includes exercises to make my ankle, arch, glutes and legs stronger to help heal my injury and improve my running form. I‚Äôve been following her work out routine for the past two weeks, doing the exercises 4 times a week and I already feel a stronger and able to control my stride a little better again (everything started with what I call a ‚Äúwobbly‚Äù ankle). It is a work in progress and running is not 100% enjoyable yet, but in only two weeks I can feel a difference and have noticed that I no longer have pain after I run, my arch and top of the foot don‚Äôt hurt anymore during the run and I can control those ‚Äúwobbly movements‚Äù a little better. During her initial examination she was even able to notice that my right leg seems shorter then the left  and this is an issue that an orthopedist treated when I was a child, my right hip is a couple of inches higher than the left so the fact that she was able to see that impressed me. She is also so easy to talk to and takes her job seriously. I highly recommend Dr. Kranz if you have any type of pain and your runs are no longer enjoyable, she will be able to help!

provider_name: Ageless Agility Performance and Sport Rehabilitation
review_text: I was struggling with persistent hamstring injury that sidelined me for weeks, I was fortunate to find Dr. Kranz. She took the time to thoroughly assess my condition, conducting a comprehensive biomechanics evaluation and pinpoint the root cause of my injury.  She designed a personalized treatment plan tailored to my needs combining hands on therapy and targeted exercise that I could continue at home.. Thanks to her expert care, Iam now back to running at full speed, pain free and stronger than ever. I am so grateful for her help and HIGHLY recommend Ageless Agility to anyone seeking top-notch physical therapy.

My interaction with the physical therapist at Agile Physical Therapy was one of the best physical therapies I've ever experienced. Nivah Shad was on point, very knowledgeable and precise, and the therapy sections were short but productive, no run around, straight to the point, and the problem. One on one therapy section, which I found to be productive, I definitely recommend, and I'll definitely go back to if I ever need more physical therapy.

Nirav Shah at Agile PT is by far one of the best physical therapists I have been to. I was suffering from vertigo while I was in Orlando and he was able to set me straight. He has a super calming way about him and His knowledge about vertigo is super impressive.

I started coming to this location about two months ago. I had lost faith in recovering my right arm's range of movement and strength but it all changed with the dedication and professionalism it's given to you on a one-on-one basis. The understanding to your individual case and warming welcoming makes of this place one you can trust and feel comfortable with. The attention to detail, exploration and evaluation provided here to give you the best form of treatment it's simply beyond any expectations. I highly recommend this place and I am very happy with my progress. You won't regret it!

After a nasty fall in May, I had surgery to repair a fractured shoulder and torn rotator cuff.  Although I began my therapy sessions elsewhere, the surgeon recommended a change of venue to accelerate the success of my recovery...and so began my journey with Nirav of Agile Physical Therapy.

Always patient and prepared, Nirav challenged my physical limits and raised the bar with each and every visit.  His utilization of dynamic excercise techniques lead to substantial gains in my flexibility, strength, and range of motion.  I was once again able to raise my arm high above my head, something I was unable to do when I met Nirav.

Nirav is dedicated to your individual success and inspired me to never give up, no matter how physically difficult.  It is with great pleasure and utmost respect, that my recommendation of his services comes with the highest of praise...thank you Nirav!

He is a dream come true for your love one in need. He convinced my 91 year old mother with dementia to walk again after a painful hip surgery. His tone and his gifted techniques are amazing to watch. I will say he is the best we have experienced .

Jackie is so friendly, honest, and easy to talk to.  We talked many hours on phone, and I wanted her to pick for me.  I love Jackie for picking out my pup from my personality that she felt he was perfect for me. And he is!  Saint Santana was god sent to me after losing my husband to cancer 4 years ago.  My Santana is close to 9 months old now. Very easy to train and wow- he so loves me. Stays by my side.  I love him and especially Jackie for making my life complete!!!

Omg...I received the best puppy in 2019!  Nova has the most sweet temperament and has been everything I've every dreamt of and some.  When you buy a puppy from Jackie you are buying your new best friend and getting a breeders love and support as she will answer all your questions and be your support for as long as you need her.  I met up with Jackie to receive my baby and Nova was snow white, smelling great, and just loving as can be!

Let me reiterate Jackie has been there through all my silly questions, training stories, vet visits, and well even the days Nova is misbehaving and a "bad" dog!

One of the best decisions I've made!  You can't go wrong with Sandy Beach Saints! Here is the bad news....I already have Nova and she is best BUT the good news is I'm sure puppy "no name" will make you feel the way I feel about Nova.  Peace and blessings...

Melissa

Very respectful breeder. I purchased my St Bernard from Jackie the breeder and he is a beautiful dog. He is a part of our family for almost 2 years now. Gunner Tank is the best child you could ever want. Anyone wanting a healthy puppy should endeavor to purchase a family member here. This breeder goes well above and beyond to ensure you are happy.

Just Love Jackie and Sandy Beach Saints! As a kid I always wanted a Saint Bernard but my Pop didn't think I was ready for such a big dog with a huge responsibility. Later my wife and I while living in Las Vegas NV after we lost a pet we came across a Saint and rescued him, from that day we fell in love with the breed. When our beloved Bear died we wanted a Saint. We found Sandy Beach Saints and Jackie, not only did she have all the requirements as a breeder but when we reached out to her unlike other breeders she talked to us about our history with dogs and told us insights on the breed we didn't know she also answered many questions that other breeders don't, she seemed very caring about who she let adopt one of her babies. That has led us to our 1st Saint from Sandy Beach Saints and Jackie. We got Norbert 2 years 4months ago. And when Norbert needed and wanted a friend we went right back to Jackie. Her dogs are extremely smart and well breed. The care and love Jackie has for the breed is apparent. So getting a 2nd it was a no Brainer. In walked Thundarian, he has the same Dad as Norbert just a different Mommy. We are very happy with Sandy Beach Saints and Jackie. I highly recommend her and her excellent Puppies! This is Norbert(2yrs) and Thundarian(5months)

I have the best Saint Bernard named Gunner that I purchased from Jackie about a year and half ago. I have 4 other giant breed. I can tell her puppies are loved and raised as pets. She is not just breeding puppies and keeping them in cages until someone purchases them. Gunner is my best friend and always at my side. If you‚Äôre thinking about getting a Saint Bernard puppy I highly recommend Sandy Beach. I will be purchasing another puppy from her when the time comes.

provider_name: Alachua County Agriculture and Equestrian Center
review_text: GALA OF THE ROYAL HORSES. I have never been around horses and definitely not a horse show. It was super cool. The best part was the educational information given about each horse and the detail info that goes into training the horses. And oh my! They were beautiful. I didn't realize that Arabians were so small.

provider_name: Alachua County Agriculture and Equestrian Center
review_text: Really nice facility where we've enjoyed watching several horse shows.

provider_name: Alachua County Agriculture and Equestrian Center
review_text: I took my ten-year-old on his field trip here on Monday March 6th. It was really cool had a lot of animals to see and interact with. 4H and FFA folks ran it. I would go back any day!!

provider_name: Alachua County Agriculture and Equestrian Center
review_text: UF Plant sale...kinda crowded mess.  Early birds got all the worms.  I hope they rethink their checkout procedures for the next one.

provider_name: Alachua County Agriculture and Equestrian Center
review_text: Wish the speakers were better quality, impossible to hear anything! Other than that, love this place.

We had a follow up at our regular vet and they had a relief Dr. on that day. This was the first time we were told that our frenchie needed to have BOAS, elongated soft palate and entropion. He said the best way to do it would be using a laser for little to no bleeding, not a scalpel.
After 2 weeks of actively searching, emailing and calling around, we found Dr. Duprey at Alafaya Trail Animal Hospital. From the first exam, we knew he was the one. He was very kind, understanding, thoughtful, and treated us like it was his own dog.
We scheduled the appointment for 2 days later. The healing process took about 2.5 weeks. To say the least, she was excited to not have to wear her e-collar any more.
We are so pleased to say Dr. Duprey is absolutely amazing and we highly recommend him. Thank you!

Friendly, kind caring staff and employees that really help my dog.  The Dr. is extremely detailed and knowledgeable about how we treat my dog.  He makes us feel comfortable to ask questions and answers all of our concerns with great care and detail.  Dr. Duprey is an amazing doctor and a kind caring person.  Thank you to all the staff for their care and support of our baby.

My husband and cat were visiting me from Kansas City this summer and during said visit the cat developed an abscess, ear infection, and a broken toe. We have no idea how, but since he doesn‚Äôt live with me, I had no Veterinarian here. After looking at reviews of local Veterinary offices near me, I called, they picked up, and were able to see him immediately. Our kitty is 17 and is very important to us. The husband has gone back to KC but the kitty remains here. This place has taken incredible care of us. They don‚Äôt try to ‚Äúupsell‚Äù and I can feel the love. Dr Q is wonderful, the techs are anmazing, the office staff is awesome and I am so grateful we found this place.

We had to say goodbye to our Labrador Retriever Cayenne. He had been the best friend and therapy dog for many years. Dr. Q and her staff had always taken such great care of Cayenne. They made his passing comfortable for him and easier for us. We felt their love and compassion. I highly recommend this practice and all the doctors and staff.

Great service! One of my cats had a minor injury to a toe, it was treated quickly and completely healed after 2 only weeks because of the thorough instructions and excellent care from the vet team. My other cat had her first visit today. She is very temperamental however the staff were very kind and patient with her, making a custom care plan for her to make sure she's comfortable in the environment while also receiving care.
I went here monthly for a year or two and cant thank this place and Ben Mills enough. This place helped me through the toughest times and taught me a lot about myself. Highly recommend.

Only great things to say about Restoring Hope. Alvis is a great listener, challenges me, and provides a safe space for me to be vulnerable. My friends also go and have had amazing experiences. I‚Äôm excited to continue healing and growing as a person!

I am so thankful for my experience here. Mrs. Rivera has been wonderful to me, and I love the environment. Completely a safe place to be yourself, and all I can say is that I am forever appreciative. Thank you!

Starting therapy was a huge milestone for my life personally, especially with the large and negative stigma about therapy services. After experiencing childhood trauma and trying to handle it on my own, I later realized that I needed help in my healing process. I wanted to find a place that related to my Christian morals and would understand who I am. I have currently been in therapy for about 4 months, and have noticed in myself personal development that I never thought possible. Therapy is a process, but it is worth it. If you are considering starting therapy, don't be afraid to find that healing and opportunity to grow. Restoring Hope is truly a place of restoration. :)

This place truly helped save my life. They were affordable and approachable. They listened to remember and helped me processes all my literal trauma. I would and have recommended them to many of my people

I have a very anxious Dachshund and I needed help. Ray is my third attempt at professional training and he was the first that Morty responded to with comfort and wagging tails. I tried to "bust his bark" with another company and it only made Morty terrified of trainers. Morty was so calm and comfortable that he fell asleep halfway through Ray's first visit! If you want to feel calm and connected to your dog without having to change everything you do, I highly recommend Align K9. It is a fraction of the cost of the much harsher training options in the area, and it is truly priceless to be taught how to align you and your pup for a happy life. I learned more in 90 minutes than I have in 3 years with my pup, and look forward to continuing with Ray and to see Morty progress into the happy confident dog I know I can help him become.

Ray really knows his stuff! In just 3 sessions so far, my rescue dog Willow‚Äôs behavior has improved drastically. She went from aggressively barking at him/ready to attack to being calm around him, taking treats out of his hand, and taking his commands. Willow still has ways to go, but Ray has given me a lot of hope.

With proper training, the right tools, working at it every day, and a LOT of patience, it‚Äôs possible for any dog to completely transform. Thanks so much, Ray! I would definitely recommend Align K9 for your pup‚Äôs needs!

Ray is a wealth of knowledge with not only canine but human energy and emotion. I adopted a dog from Lee county animal control who had zero manners and was wild beyond belief. Ray taught me how to work with him to set boundaries. He went above and beyond spending extra time to make sure I felt comfortable and understood not only what we were trying to do but the WHY. I would recommend him to anyone looking for help with dog training. Ray says he isn‚Äôt a dog whisperer he‚Äôs a dog listener which is 110% true. He uses force free training that doesn‚Äôt stress the animal and uses positive reinforcement. He is awesome!

We rescued 2 puppies from an abusive situation. The male was aggressive and lunged and the female barked constantly at anyone outside our family. After being turned down by other trainers due to their aggressiveness and failing an interview at the boarding facility we use for our senior black lab, they recommended Ray at Align K9. In only 5 sessions, these pups are walking properly on leashes, calmly sitting when Ray visits, eating out of his hand, hopping in and out of the car on command, and walking confidently around our pool. These pups were terrified of these things before training. We are amazed that we can confidently walk them by joggers and kids playing and they sit by our sides! There is still more work to be done, but we‚Äôre beyond pleased with their progress! Everyone told us we should consider giving them up. Ray gave us hope.

Ray was our third trainer to help us raise a rambunctious, rescue lab-mix into a well-mannered pet. Our dog is now in her "testing teen" years, but I can see that practice and perseverance will provide a big pay-off. Ray explains the dog's behavior and how the owner can get the desired results. A visit to our Vet this a.m. garnered unsolicited compliments on her training. So this isn't a biased opinion. Hire the best first (Ray) and forget the rest.

Enjoyed my couple months of physical therapy at Align for my shoulder!  Found atmosphere to be very welcoming and positive.  Facility was clean, organized, and not crowded.  Had the pleasure of working with Daniel. He was very knowledgeable and encouraging.  Always introduced new exercises each session, so never got bored.  Appreciated the education and the tips Daniel provided as well.  Look forward to working with him in the future.

Hello, Just a note to say thank you for all that you do for so many people. The exercise area is always neat, clean and organized. My instructor is always ready to get my physical needs met & it all made a big difference with me. My family and friends also noticed my obvious improvement.  Thanks again.  Well worth the time and effort.
Everyone is so funny, nice and motivational! I started going at the beginning of June for a back injury and I'm nearly back to my full strength. Extra shout out to Patrick, he's amazing.

I have had a wonderful experience at Align, I have experienced all of the therapists. Steve, Patrick, Pam, Paul, Both of the Danny‚Äôs, Dot, Kristina and Kirby all of them are very knowledgeable, friendly and overall seem very happy and the whole office has a positive attitude. They listen and they are all very supportive and tentative to all their clients. I like how they encourage you to see all of the different therapist, they work together each therapist can work your area of concern. Each one has different experiences that they can add to your recovery.My mother and my mother in law both are clients at Align, they have had great success as well.

I recently had the pleasure ‚Äì yes, pleasure ‚Äì of receiving physical therapy at Align Physical Therapy in Indian Harbour Beach.  In my eight weeks of biweekly appointments I  worked with five therapists, all of whom were aware of my goals and concerned with my comfort as I did my exercises.  In the end, my knees are pain-free and stronger  than they have been for ten years.
In my time there I observed that all of the therapists and the other patients in the room always appeared to be jovial, which is pretty good considering that some of the exercises might be grueling.  It was an atmosphere that made us want to do our best while working hard to improve our mobility.
I highly recommend Align Physical Therapy to anyone who needs it.
Karen Coleman

I would first like to say ,every therapist that works for Align Physical Therapy ( Indian Harbour Beach location), was absolutely a joy to see every week. In my case it was three times a week. They each had their own strengths in how they worked on their patients. I was a mess when I first started out, pain and numbness all down my left leg all the way to my foot. I am still pretty young so having to deal with the daily pain to even walk, sit, sleep, etc. became unbearable. I had a lot of issues in the Piriformis area, discovering that the issue was coming from my back. I was able to rotate around to the therapists and finally discovered what worked best for me.  I would like to give extra praise to Daniel Bastin, he was my absolute life saver!!!! I loved everyone there , but Dani was able to give me the extra therapy that I really needed.  I was at least 85% better before I left the office in the end.  When I was discharged, he gave me all of the exercises I would need to stay on track and hopefully see daily improvement. So far I am doing great and so grateful to all of them!!!! I would highly recommend this practice to anyone who is in need of physical therapy.  Do not be like me ,and wait too long, just call them and make an appointment and let them make your life easier :)

Everyone at the Melbourne Beach Align was great. Pam was focused on my issue and provided me with tailored exercises and treatment, she knows her stuff. They care about the client as an individual, you don‚Äôt feel like you are just another ankle rehab. The process takes time but the team at Align will get you through it. I highly recommend them.

The PT center is amazing! I tore and had surgery on my ACL, and needed to begin rehab. I called the front desk and they smoothly scheduled me for an evaluation with the PT, Tylor. He was extremely welcoming and understanding in what I was sharing with him for my injury. Tylor asked the right questions, provided reassurance and relevant knowledge about my rehab process, and was always willing to answer any questions I had. Upon completing my evaluation, I was scheduled for 3 days a week for PT and Tylor was attentive, considerate, and helpful in communicating my steps in each session. The front desk staff was extremely helpful all throughout the process too, calling and offering availability to me when I could not find a time. After 7 months of undergoing treatment with Align and successfully coming back to full health, I can confidently recommend Align to anyone undergoing any rehab treatment or recovery.

For over 4 decades now I have utilized the Physical Therapy services of Steve Ryland, now through his Align group of offices.  More importantly, I highly recommend Tylor Bene.  As a young PT he has proven to me over the past 2 months that youth can include incredible insights to guide his advice and the routines necessary for significant improvement in my very serious wounds and neuropathy!  Tylor takes his role very seriously.  He has clearly taken his PT education seriously, as his breadth and depth of knowledge is impressive.
I encourage anyone within earshot of Ocean Avenue to take advantage of Tylor and his incredible energy!

When I had a nasty break in my arm after a bicycle accident, Tyler at Align Physical Therapy in Melbourne Beach was recommended, and I couldn't be happier with both my treatment or the office itself which is a little jewel! Upon entering my very first time, I was greeted by Katie who is a ray of sunshine no matter what time my appointment. She is friendly, overly accommodating, and makes you so happy that you walked in the door at this bright and sparkly clean Melbourne Beach treatment center.
Tyler's focus is to get me to "100%". His credo is "the goal is the goal", and my progress is a testimony to that.
Amidst the strides I was making in the range of motion in my arm, out of left field (and over four days after my pt session), I woke up one morning with an excruciating pulled muscle or pinched nerve in my back accompanied by a vertigo like dizziness that severely impacted my ability to move, let alone work on arm strengthening. It was greatly debilitating at best. Rather than dismiss me until I could work on my arm again, Tyler totally took command, helping me exponentially with both my dizziness and my back muscle until I could get back to my original objective of getting my range of arm motion to 100%.
Tyler's knowledge is impressive, but his application of it speaks volumes to his skill, particularly as he magically kneads "angry muscles" back into place. Tyler is selfless, and is willing to work as hard as he needs to achieve goals. I left a session today where he literally massaged and manipulated my arm for over 35 minutes until he was convinced that my muscles loosened up considerably. He is RELENTLESS in the most positive way. Tyler is not happy with good enough, and takes his clients'  successes personally until he absolutely maximizes their potential to not only totally heal, but to soar.   "Soaring" can sometimes feel "sore", but I leave every session feeling motivated, grateful and empowered to be my best. I could not recommend Tyler and this particular office more highly. THANK YOU, Tyler and Katie
I am updating my review as I move forward with a significant increase in my range of motion. Unfortunately, Katie has left, but in my three months at at Align, I also had the chance to meet an additional staff member over the phone whose patience was absolutely over the top. Madeline endured countless telephone calls with my insurance company to help me to get continued coverage. She not only was able to conference me in to phone calls with my insurance company and the appeals department when necessary, but she followed up on a daily basis to advocate for me. Madeline could not have done any more on my behalf, and I am so deeply grateful for her patience, professionalism, and kindness.
I'm hoping that if I ever need to come back here for any reason that I get to meet Madeline in person, there will be flatscreen TVs set up, and we will be listening to Chase Ryland (Katie's replacement) during my therapy sessions because he will have made it to the top of Nashville's finest!

I had a fantastic experience! I was in terrible pain but I arrived but was so much better when I left. I have noticed significant improvement in my pain & mobility. They are warm, welcoming and incredibly professional.
I highly recommend!

My first time visiting this location and Jessica and the front office staff were amazing. They took their time, asked questions, listened, and were very professional. Looking forward to great results here. Thank you all.

Very 1st visit and wow. Compassionate and a bedside manner that is impressive. The ladies really went above and beyond. Listened to our crazy stories. It was nice to not be rushed out of a Dr.'s office like we have been at others in the past. Will recommend AIM and Family Chiro to everyone. Thank you!

I have been so excited to take care of my wellness here, the ladies knew it from my first visit!
This is such an amazing facility!
I definitely have recommended my family and friends here.

Wellness is happiness inside out!

See ya‚Äôll soon!

Sandra Velez
