This definitely is the best group of professionals I‚Äôve been referred to. The doctor and staff are amazing. You can see they actually care about you and they explain everything to you. Definitely look them up. I had to get a few shots and Jessica and melony understood my anxiety and fear of needles. I got through it because of them. Thank you

I had the best experience ever at Alignment Physical Therapy in Hallandale! The staff is incredibly friendly and highly professional. I especially want to thank physical therapist Angela, who guided me through my post-operative recovery for a fractured shoulder.

Her dedication, kindness, and expert approach made a huge difference in my healing journey. Thanks to her, my shoulder mobility and arm strength have improved significantly. I‚Äôm truly grateful for her hard work and support.

Thank you, Angela, and the entire team at Alignment Physical Therapy!

My Wife and I were diagnosed with arthritis and bone on bone knees with ongoing pain and with many knee injected shoots along the way in the last few years . We were advised to see the Alignment physical therapist s and only after 8 sessions , that were paid for by Medicare incidentally , we have been pain free for the last couple of weeks , and are stopping the Gel shoots .
Besides waking better and without nagging knee pain , we now sleep well at night too without getting up from the knee pain in the middle of the night .
Great medical people . They really helped us a lot  with learning what to do and not do as older seniors .
They are the best !!!

John And Mary DeMarco
Hallandale Beach . Fl .

Arlene and her team are the best in Miami hands down. Been coming here for 12 years when my body needs strengthening and when I need help recovering from fitness injuries. They‚Äôve helped my posture, back, and hip issues repeatedly. Front desk is kind and responsive- all around positive vibes and magic hands at Alignment. Love you guys!

I cannot say enough good about this place.
While here on vacation I needed some physical therapy.  Just before vacation, I had seen a orthopedic doctor in regards to chronic pain in my lower back.. they wanted  me to start physical therapy as soon as possible. I mentioned I am going on vacation for six weeks so they gave me a script to start physical therapy while on vacation. I found alignment physical therapy on a web search. Let me tell you these people are fantastic from the minute. You walk into the door you are greeted by friendly people at the front desk then I was assigned a physical therapist which showed a true concern for helping me get better after several visits. I have shown great progress due to the hard work of the two physical therapist that helped me through my pain. My only regret is my vacation is over and I have to go back home and will not be able to continue visits at alignment physical therapy, do not hesitate. If you need any physical therapy. These people will treat you promptly courteously and with real affection to improve your condition.

The Alignment Physical Therapy is an excellent place to get a physical therapy done, .people who work there very professional, attentive and very friendly. Can not say enough good things about this office. I worked with Jorgelina, she is excellent, definitely recommend her and this office

The experience here has been great. I came in with pain and tightness from injury with my back and they did a full evaluation. After that I been doing physical therapy with my PT Omari. He has constructed a full detailed plan, that he goes through with me every session and it has worked wonders for my back pain. He is a top notch PT. I have definitely seen and noticed great improvement. The staff is very helpful and friendly. The equipment is top of the line. I highly recommend doing your PT here.

I‚Äôve had such a positive experience with the physical therapy team‚ÄîJamie, Maksim, and Ryan are all incredibly kind, knowledgeable, and attentive. From the moment I walked in, I felt welcomed and supported. Each of them brings their own expertise and care to every session, making the recovery process not only effective but also enjoyable. I truly appreciate their dedication and the comfortable environment they create. Highly recommend!

Great facility, amazing staff and physical therapist! Second time coming here for rehab on different injuries. Whether you work with the same one or switch depending on appointment times the standard is all the same and the transition is flawless as if you had been working with the same therapist the entire time. Top of the line treatment, if regardless if you‚Äôre the average joe or pro athlete you get the same level of care and use of all the latest technology and treatments available. Shout out to Chris, Omari, and Brian for all their help on my road to recovery!

After surgical repair of a femur fracture and lateral meniscus tear from a car accident, I spent a year recovering on my own with some basic physical therapy. It helped me regain my ability to walk and return to daily life, but I was still far from where I needed to be in the gym as a body builder ‚Äî squats and lunges were nearly impossible, and I wasn‚Äôt making meaningful strength or hypertrophy gains.

ALKEMƒí SPORTS RX changed that for me. From my first visit, everyone made me feel welcome and supported. The facility is modern, clean, fully equipped. Even with multiple patients in the space, the level of focus and personalization I receive never wavers. Every session is thoughtfully designed around my specific injury, body mechanics, and goals.

The therapists took the time to quantify my deficits objectively, and use that data to design custom programming that truly challenges me. We work with a range of modalities‚Äîneuromuscular electrical stimulation, blood flow restriction, and targeted exercises‚Äîto rebuild the mind-muscle connection in areas that had stopped firing properly. After just five sessions, I‚Äôve already seen a 20% increase in strength and am finally feeling my muscles engage again during training.

Thank you Jamie for keeping everything organized and running smoothly, and to Dr. Omari, Dr. Bryan, and Dr. Chris for collaborating so effectively to help me make such quick, meaningful progress. I‚Äôll definitely be continuing with ALKEMƒí through my competition season. 10/10, highly recommend ALKEMƒí for all your rehabilitation needs!

I can‚Äôt say enough wonderful things about this physical therapy team! My son, who is a dedicated basketball player, came in after his injury feeling discouraged and worried about getting back on the court. From day one, the therapists were not only knowledgeable and professional but also incredibly encouraging. They built a personalized plan that challenged him while keeping his long-term recovery in mind.

What stood out most was their attention to detail‚Äîalways monitoring his progress, adjusting exercises, and celebrating small wins along the way. They treated him like more than just a patient; they cared about his goals as an athlete and as a young man. Thanks to their expertise, he‚Äôs stronger, more confident, and back to playing the sport he loves.

We are truly grateful for their support, skill, and positivity throughout this journey. If you‚Äôre looking for a team that combines technical excellence with genuine care, this is the place to be!

I‚Äôve had an excellent experience with Ryan at Alkeme Sports. From day one, they were professional, attentive, and truly listened to my concerns. They took the time to explain my treatment plan and adjusted it as needed to help me progress at a comfortable pace. I‚Äôve seen significant improvement in my neck injury , and I‚Äôm grateful for their guidance and support throughout the process. The place is clean, welcoming, and well-organized. Highly recommend!

I started my PT here a few weeks ago for hip pain and I‚Äôve got to say that it has helped me so much. My inflammation has gone down and I feel the difference in my day to day. My first session with Ryan was amazing, he really listened and explained to me what I would need. I appreciate that they adjust the treatment according to what my body is feeling that day! I highly recommend Ryan and Max!

Literally the best PT I‚Äôve ever had.. I was in so much pain when I started and Dr. Ryan‚Äôs treatment was incredibly effective. His knowledge and expertise are invaluable and offer a plan that works for your specific needs. The facility is spotless, professional & friendly, which are all so important to me and you also get one on one attention. I highly recommend Alkeme and love that they‚Äôre close to Downtown Miami. I‚Äôve been recommending them to everyone.

I came in with foot pain while starting training for a half marathon, and Ryan and Max have been amazing! After just a few (slightly torturous‚Äîbut in the best way) sessions, I finally feel hopeful and confident that I‚Äôll be ready for race day. They really care and want me to get to 100%, and it shows in every session. Highly recommend!

I've seen improvement since the moment I stepped into Dr. Ryan Johnson's clinic. He's a knowledgeable and skilled physical therapist. He also gave me clear and actionable steps to support my recovery at home. His techniques are effective for relieving pain and his care has made a real difference.

provider_name: All About Dogs! Pet Sitting Services
review_text: Sandy has taken care of all our dogs over many years , she is so reliable and punctual and very kind and gentle , which is very important to us. We are down to one dog now and he is very happy to see Sandy , she gives him a good walk which he loves . Definitely recommend Sandy a true treasure

provider_name: All About Dogs! Pet Sitting Services
review_text: Sandy is trustworthy and amazing! We just used her cat sitting services for the first time. She took care of our senior cat for a week, coming to see him twice a day. She took good care of him and we felt comfortable leaving him in her care for a week. She was very communicative and let us know how he was doing everyday. Not only did she take care of our cat, she fed our outside feral cats and took care of house stuff like bringing in packages, taking the garbage out, etc. We highly recommend her services! Sandy even sent us a video of our cat because we missed him so much!

provider_name: All About Dogs! Pet Sitting Services
review_text: Sandy is the sweetest! She checks in on and spends time with our kitty when we are on vacation. She has also stopped in to let our dog out or feed her when we know we‚Äôll be away for hours. We highly recommend Sandy! She is reliable, truly cares about your pet, and will keep you updated after each visit. She is great for all cats and dogs!

provider_name: All About Dogs! Pet Sitting Services
review_text: Sandy is incredibly trustworthy and reliable and she has obvious true love and appreciation for animals. She understands my dogs and cats different personalities very well and with great intuition. They all love her! We couldn't get by without her! I'm updating this review to include that she had taken care of multiple cats and dogs for me of all sizes for 7 years now. If any of them are even 10% off, she notices and let's me know right away. Sandy has remained incredible reliable and trustworthy. I'm a veterinarian and have high standards for my babies!

provider_name: All About Dogs! Pet Sitting Services
review_text: My review of Sandy is straight from my heart. Sandy loves animals, is caring, reliable and exuberant with each n every one of her ‚Äúcustomers‚Äù! She is trustworthy, prompt and on time, every time. With each visit she will send u a report  just to reassure that all is well with your animals. She‚Äôs da best and I give her a 100% satisfaction report!!

provider_name: All About Kids Therapy Services LLC
review_text:
I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt gratitude for the incredible work that Jade has done with our son. I am filled with a deep sense of appreciation for the transformative impact that she has had on my son's life.

Jade has consistently demonstrated a genuine passion for her work and a deep understanding of my son's unique needs. Her patience, creativity, and personalized approach have been instrumental in helping my son overcome his obstacles and reach new heights. I am truly grateful for the care, empathy, and expertise she has brought to every session. She has been an invaluable partner in our journey.

Thank you for the incredible work you and your team do. It has been a privilege to be a part of this journey with you.

provider_name: All About Kids Therapy Services LLC
review_text: My son got an OT consult with the Doctor who also owns it. There was a billing issue because I thought I paid the invoice after the consult but after that  the OT was very difficult to work with cooperatively. She kept bringing up my billing issue. The consult didn‚Äôt last the full hour and you can tell because there‚Äôs no information in the demographics section of the evaluation. The doctor repeatedly brought up doubts about my ability to pay and in the end didn‚Äôt recommend services even though she had scheduled me in for a time weekly and I was begging for help for my son. I‚Äôm giving 3 stars  because the schedule would have worked for me if she would have recommended services.

provider_name: All About Kids Therapy Services LLC
review_text:
I am here to show my appreciation for Angelina Terechtchenko, the founder and owner of All About Kids Therapy. Angelina's a Speech Pathologist with years of experience with all sorts of children in need.  If you have a child that suffers with shuddering to even not being able to communicate from a Traumatic Brain Injury, Angelina is your therapist. My daughter Bella had a problem communicating and the way she spoke at times kids would make fun of her. She had low self esteem and lacked the confidence to show others how awesome she really is. I reached out to Angelina and within a few days she was able to come to my home and start helping Bella. After working with Bella for a few weeks Angelina was able to boost her confidence and show her the way to communicate which allowed her to open up to others.
So again, please follow All About Kids Therapy. The great thing that separates Angelina from the rest is that she comes to you, where your child feels the most  comfortable and safe.
Thanks Chappies,  stay safe out there.

provider_name: All About Speech & Language Therapy Brandon & Occupational Therapy Brandon
review_text:
I honestly did not benefit from this center at all. My son didn‚Äôt show any improvement in his speech, and he still isn‚Äôt talking. I stayed with them for almost two years, and throughout that time, I saw no real progress.

Every month or two, they would switch his speech therapist ‚Äî one leaves, another comes in ‚Äî and it kept going like that. They all say the same things over and over, and every session felt like a repeat of the last. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre doing this, we‚Äôre doing that,‚Äù but nothing ever changed.

At some point, it just felt like empty talk and false promises. I started feeling like they were just going through the motions, not truly working on my child‚Äôs development. I will not return to this place, I‚Äôm honestly shocked by all the positive reviews. I trusted what other parents said, but sadly, I experienced something completely different.

provider_name: All About Speech & Language Therapy Brandon & Occupational Therapy Brandon
review_text: We are so thankful for all about speech and language. There isn't a person in here who doesn't greet you with a smile. They are above and beyond wonderful to each child who walks in these doors. My daughter truly enjoys being here and always asks when we will see her therpists again. We love Karlie, Taylor, and Annalyssa. All the therapists are amazing! Highly recommend coming here for your child's therpy.

provider_name: All About Speech & Language Therapy Brandon & Occupational Therapy Brandon
review_text: I would highly recommend Ms. Karlie. My child made a great progress with his speech and pronunciation working with her. Unfortunately we had to take a break due to our schedule but hopefully we can go back some day. The staff was amazing helping us navigate schedule every time.

provider_name: All About Speech & Language Therapy Brandon & Occupational Therapy Brandon
review_text: I strongly recommend All About Speech & Language for their professionalism and the attention they provide for each child. Ms. Jen is an absolute professional that has been working with my 6 year old with speech delay. My son has made tremendous progress in reading, writing and focus retention with a few months of therapy sessions. Ms. Jen really focuses on my child's specific areas of need and worked in accordance with my son's school/teacher lessons to ensure consistency. I love the flexibility in scheduling and most of all the focus care and support for my son to be successful in school and in life!  Thank you Ms. Jen for your great work!

provider_name: All About Speech & Language Therapy Brandon & Occupational Therapy Brandon
review_text: My daughter had been receiving services from AASL for about 4 years after receiving ear tubes and experiencing a speech delay. She built a deep relationship with her speech therapist, Maria, who she still talks about even after services have been completed. We kept her in therapy even as she surpassed her milestones because we, as her parents, were learning just as much as she was. We appreciate Maria for being a partner through every step of this journey. We can't say enough great things about AASL.

All County is the best!!! Our family is so thankful. Our 3yr old Boxer was bitten by a rattlesnake. After being in overnight emergency and having the anti venom,  he was not doing any better. We went to All County for the day to continue his care and they saved his life. Dr Newcomer felt he needed more anti venom treatment and after that he began to improve. All of the staff cared for our Gooby like he was their own. I can‚Äôt say enough.  He has made a remarkable recovery. The pics are right after the bite, when he went to All County (at his worst) and today, just 5 days after. ‚ù§Ô∏è Thank you All County for giving me back my boy!!!

This place is amazing. The staff is amazing, wonderful, caring, empathetic, etc‚Ä¶ can‚Äôt say enough. We recently moved  to Brooksville and in a matter of 24hrs had to schedule an appointment to put our dear dog, Molly girl to sleep. She lived the best almost 14yrs of her live and aged. They were phenomenal with the process, as this was our first time experiencing it. Coming out to the car to take care of Molly. Then our 2 yr old cat Freckle, passed away in their office of liver failure. They were quick to bring Freckle back, as we just arrived no appointment coming from the ER vet. Unfortunately there was nothing that could have been done to save him! If you need a vet please go here! We will continue our relationship with them with the rest of our fury family members!

All county animal hospital is a wonderful place to take your pets. They are loving, friendly, and always there when you need them. I have been going there for years and I love them. you couldn't ask for a better staff team, they are wonderful.

The entire team at All County was great. Everyone was friendly, I formative, and professional. I really appreciated the doctor and tech explaining everything to me, giving me options, and caring about the pet I brought to see them. I felt like they were acting in the best interest of myself and my pet, and not just doing things for money, as ive felt at other vets offices. Im actually bringing 2 kittens in today, and will probably transfer all of my animals care ( 12 cats and 2 dogs) to them.

My cat was seen by two different doctors on three separate visits for a skin infection right below the eye. Initially, an ointment was prescribed; in the following visit a different vet added an oral antibiotic. Three weeks later, the infection is looking much-improved. Also a special shout out to the vet assistant who was very friendly to both my cat and me. And, she was very kind when I showed up right at closing time and asked for instructions on administering my cat's medications.

We have a 3 year old frenchie who was born with an irregular spine. We went to her primary vet whom said she would never walk again due to the nerves pinched in her spine.  She had no control of her back legs. We were told only place to possibly operate her would be University of FL and over 4k for surgery that may do nothing.
We consulted with this office and the front desk was so empathetic and caring. Called with cancellation to get her in next day.
First treatment we did chiropractic and acupuncture treatment and 3 days later she‚Äôs walking and well. We went for a 2nd tux today and after the 90% approval we have hope after 2 visits she will be better then she‚Äôs ever been. Thank you so much to all of you at the office! We truly love yall for helping our fur baby.
I couldn‚Äôt load the videos, however you can see she was sad before treatment with her back legs dragging to happy smiling during treatment.

First I was able to get an appnt for the next day. After checking in I only had to wait about 5 mins then we were taken to a room . The vet tech or nurse was so sweet and friendly. The Doctor came in relatively soon and he was very attentive to my concerns and thorough . We‚Äôve been taking our dogs there for approximately 17yrs .

I‚Äôve been going to all creatures for 40 years and all I can tell you is in those 40 years it‚Äôs always been caring people from answering phone, to billing, vet tech and veterinarian‚Äôs.   Dr William Latter has hand picked his staff to be as loving and caring to our animals as he is. If you‚Äôre looking for compassionate knowledgeable, veterinarians go to All Creatures animal  clinic on pipkin road in Lakeland fl
These are my babies over the years that lived a happy life with the last photo of Maggie who is still with us at age 10

Cali was my world, my best friend, truly everything to me. I have been battling my emotions everyday since she became sick. I can‚Äôt eat, sleep, anything. If it hadn‚Äôt been for the staff at All Creatures, I, myself, might have been in the hospital. Tuesday night, Cali took her final breath in my arms. There has never been a harder decision or moment for me in my life.
I just want to say the most sincere thank you to everyone at this clinic. I have never felt so appreciative of a group of people before. I especially want to thank Dr. Chinault, Savannah, and Jessie. You guys saw how much Cali means to me and took that seriously. You did more than what your job requires by comforting me and helping me through this. I hope I‚Äôve made the right decisions for her and I feel comfortable knowing I had great guidance.
Thank you.

The sweet docs/techs were very attentive & made me feel like I was their top priority (as they should)! I could tell they loved and cared for me from the second I pranced my little twinkle toes in that front door! I loved when the front desk ladies passed me around and kissed me like I was a pro league championship trophy at their celebration parade! My moms always tell me I‚Äôm perfect but there was one time when I wasn‚Äôt (GASP*clutches pearls in shock)‚Ä¶.these genius doctors got to the root of my issues and made me perfect once again! I don‚Äôt particularly like the booty temperature checks or the vaccine needle thingys but I always get a treat afterwards so it evens out. Also, the bathroom facility outside the front door is fabulous and clean! I‚Äôm absolutely pawsitive that I have the best docs in town! See you next year! Love, keewee üêæ

Ever since we brought Dusty, our rescue dog, home nearly two years ago, the team  at All Creatures has taken excellent care of him. Both Dr. Brennan‚Äôs are highly capable and compassionate doctors, the staff are all friendly, responsive and efficient and Barb, his groomer, has that magical touch that makes our pup feel safe and comfortable. We love All Creatures and would highly recommend them to anyone who has a furry family member. üíï

Recently transferred my pets to this practice based on a recommendation from my pet sitter. My dogs have been very happy with the employees at the practice, the employees take an interest in them. Dr Mary & the vet techs are great with my furry kids. They follow up on matters and call to see how they are doing following a procedure or shots.   Sorry i did not join the practice years ago.

I‚Äôve been going to All Creatures for quite a few years. The doctors there are so compassionate and caring. I go to Dr. Natalie , she was so sweet when I had to put my cat asleep and made me feel so comfortable about it. Yesterday I had to bring my other kitty home after he was staying at the hospital For three days. I also had Conversationswith Dr Tammy always calling and give me updates. All the doctors are extremely knowledgeable and I feel very comfortable with my pets going there.
All Creatures animal Hospital is the best! As I told you, they are super caring and always go the extra mile for your furry friend.

The staff at All Creatures Animal Hospital is excellent. Roger did an excellent job with the pre-exam of my dog and Dr. Mary is THE BEST vet a dog could ever have. Thank you for taking such good care of Scruffles!

I see the exotic vet for my bun, and I‚Äôm always happy with their care. My bun also has seen various tech‚Äôs for nail trim, and they‚Äôre always on time and do a good job making sure his nails are cared for

provider_name: All Dogs Unleashed Dog Training Tampa
review_text: We brought our puppy to All Dogs Unleashed to have her trained to be a well behaved pup and they more than delivered! She was a good girl before the formal training but needed a little help getting over the puppy biting phase, pulling on the leash and listening when she was doing something she shouldn‚Äôt be doing. They also taught her several helpful commands that we put into practice daily. Since her two week board and train we have flown with our pup a few times and she was so good in the airport and on the plane thanks to her training. We‚Äôve also brought her to restaurants and coffee shops and can put her in the sit command at our table while we run up to the counter to grab our coffees and she patiently stays put until we return. The staff at the Tampa All Dogs Unleashed are incredible! Everyone was so kind and treated our Clover like she was their own. She loved everyone who works there and it was comforting to know she was in good hands and we had nothing to worry about. Friends, family and strangers have commented on how well behaved Clover is and we will continue to recommend training at All Dogs Unleashed!

provider_name: All Dogs Unleashed Dog Training Tampa
review_text:
We couldn‚Äôt be happier with our experience at All Dogs Unleashed! Our dog Monty made tremendous progress in just the two weeks he was there. The transformation in his behavior and obedience has been incredible.

The trainers and staff are truly amazing, you can immediately tell they love what they do and genuinely care about each dog that comes through their doors. Their passion and professionalism shine through in every interaction.

The facility itself is top-notch: clean, well-organized, and clearly designed with the dogs‚Äô well-being in mind.

Thank you to Tony and the entire team for the outstanding work you‚Äôve done with Monty. We‚Äôre beyond grateful and highly recommend All Dogs Unleashed to anyone looking for real results and a team who treats your dog like family.

provider_name: All Dogs Unleashed Dog Training Tampa
review_text:
We took in our reactive, selective hearing, uncontrollable, ball of anxiety one year old GoldenDoodle for two weeks of training. We were afraid that he would come back home the same crazy, untrained dog.
Two weeks later, he‚Äôs almost a different dog and we get to actually enjoy and his company a lot more. Now, we are able to actually accomplish house chores and are able to relax without having to be interrupted and pause what we‚Äôre doing to correct him every two mins.
They did an amazing job training him and he is the best dog ever now.
Joe was great and walked us through the training the day that we picked our boy up. It‚Äôs been a week since we picked him up and the money we spent on this was so worth it.

provider_name: All Dogs Unleashed Dog Training Tampa
review_text:
‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è Absolutely recommend!

We recently completed the 2-week board-and-train program with All Dogs Unleashed for our dog, Roux, and we could not be happier with the results! From the very beginning, the team was professional, friendly, and clearly passionate about what they do.

Before training, Roux was a sweet dog but had a hard time focusing and following through with commands‚Äîespecially with distractions. After just 2 weeks, we brought home a dog who listens, responds, and is so much more confident. It‚Äôs like we unlocked his full potential!

The trainers, especially Joe, didn‚Äôt just work with Roux‚Äîthey worked with us too, making sure we understood each command, how to reinforce them at home, and how to keep his progress going. They were patient, knowledgeable, and genuinely cared about Roux‚Äôs success.

We‚Äôre so thankful for the love, effort, and skill they poured into our pup. If you‚Äôre looking for a place that treats your dog like family while delivering real, lasting results, All Dogs Unleashed is it. Roux is proof!

provider_name: All Dogs Unleashed Dog Training Tampa
review_text: My baby girl Millie spent 2 amazing weeks at All Dogs Unleashed of Tampa. They were compassionate and loving, while training Millie to the perfect dog. It was worth every penny spent!! HIGHLY recommend their program if your puppy/dog needs someone to break them of all their bad habits.  They will return a different pup.  ü©∑

We are beyond thrilled with Hank‚Äôs transformation after training at All Dogs Unleashed! Before, Hank struggled with barking at people, children, and other dogs, and was prone to biting. Now, he‚Äôs calm, well-behaved, and responsive to all commands. His leash training has made walks a breeze‚Äîhe no longer pulls or tugs, and walks calmly by our side.

Roy‚Äôs customer service was exceptional‚Äîknowledgeable, patient, and always supportive. The entire experience has been life-changing for Hank and us. Highly recommend All Dogs Unleashed for anyone seeking effective, personalized training!

This business is amazing! They take very good care of the dogs they train and the patience they have is unmatched. They treat them as their own and develop bonds with them during their time of boarding. They take their time to teach you everything that they taught your dog. My puppy has been amazing and very well behaved ever since I sent him to All Dogs Unleashed. They really unleashed my Blue‚Äôs potential!!!! ‚ù§Ô∏è thank you so much.

Roy and Stacey are just amazing! I have a very stubborn GSD who thinks she's a princess and everyone obeys her rules lol. Let me just say, she can still be stubborn but she knows to keep it in check and listen to my rules. Roy and Stacey were absolutely wonderful with her and me! Never a problem to call or text, questions, anything.  It truly was an absolute pleasure meeting and working with them. They are very kind and experienced and will treat your pup well! Best money ever spent, thank you both! Will always recommend your services! Chaynga too!

We‚Äôre so grateful we came across All Dogs Unleashed when searching for a trainer for our fur baby. Draco is one stubborn boy but with two weeks of training with Roy and Stacey, he‚Äôs been amazing! We saw the improvement the moment we picked him up and two weeks later, he is still doing great! They provided me with photos and videos, along with his report card while he was in training; which was really sweet and eased my anxieties knowing he was on track with the program and doing well away from me. Draco responds to all the commands taught in training, he is no longer pulling on the leash (which was our biggest concern)-he‚Äôs doing so well, that my nieces who are 2 and 3 are able to walk him. He stays in place, comes when called-even with distractions, we can trust him off his leash during our outings, etc. We‚Äôve seen so much progress and are very thankful to Roy and Stacey for it! They were so sweet and loved on our boy, too! Great communication all around, they provided us with all the tools we needed to be successful and worked miracles on our stubborn boy! We also appreciate the fact that they said we can contact them if we ever need help with anything, which is very comforting! 100% recommend All Dogs Unleashed, with knowledgeable trainers and you can tell they love what they do and have a strong love for all your fur babies!

Have nothing but praise for training.  Professional, and friendly.  My dog after weeks is now mannered and obedient to commands.  I would highly recommend this beautiful facility to anyone wanting a respectful, obedient dog for a future of harmony with your loved pet. Best decision we've made.  Thank you so very much.

Wow!! Amazing!!! Incredible!!!
These are words I used in the first 15 minutes of training my dog with Chrissy at All Fur Pets!
My dog is generally a well-tempered and affectionate little guy. That all changed when he sees another dog. He starts barking and growling and pulling on the leash.
Within one training session, Chrissy had him following commands, walking comfortably and by the end of the hour, we were even able to get him to be in THE SAME ROOM with another dog like it was no big deal.
He came home happier, and more relaxed than I‚Äôve EVER seen him!
Truly amazing!
Thank you so much Chrissy and All Fur Pets! You are wonderful! ü•á

Chrissy is the BEST! I met Chrissy almost two years ago to do a private session with my dog, Harley, to work on her reactivity. Since then we completed High School, I boarded Harley with Chrissy for a week while I was on vacation, and we continue to do Fungility class twice a month. Harley‚Äôs reactivity has improved significantly in the past two years because of the exposure and ‚Äúsocializing‚Äù she has gotten by being near other dogs. Thank you, Chrissy!!

‚ô•Ô∏èWhat a difference a few weeks can make! Ellie went to school today (her first class was 2 weeks ago) and holy moly she has done so well. I have poured massive amounts of time and energy into her, ensuring she gets a good foundation and I am not looking for an "obedient" dog, just a well grounded polite pup. The first week of class she practically ignored me and was more interested in Chrissy Dullano with All Fur Pets than me. But this week she was all about paying attention to me and wanting to see what I had planned next - it was like night and day difference from week one to today. Sometimes when were doing "the homework" from our training classes we dont really see the results and then you put it to the test in class and I was just blown away by how much Ellie has matured, learned, and retained.

ü´∂üêïü´∂And Chrissy is amazing. She has helped me to lower my expectations since Ellie is still a puppy and she is helping to guide me as I navigate different and new things with Ellie. Raising Ellie is a big commitment but I am loving it, I slightly thought it might get old eventually, but quite the contrary - its getting better and better each step of the way. Raising a puppy truly is so so much fun - thanks to having a great trainer in our back pocket!

Chrissy is amazing!!  We rescued a dog that was absolutely crazy, but after Chrissy worked with her and showed us what we needed to do to help made such a difference - like night and day.   The things were easy and incredibly helpful.   I also loved the way Chrissy's ways didn't take long and they were all gentle.

Chrissy is AMAZING!! We originally started out with private lessons with her for our 5 month German shepherd puppy, Arleigh! After meeting Chrissy and learning the importance of neutral socialization we completed grade school, which was such another amazing experience! Chrissy is so knowledgeable and has so much information to give about training your puppy/dog! She taught us the importance of positive reinforcement and really trained us on how to train our puppy. Arleigh is now 10 months old and such a great dog, and owe it all to Chrissy! We are now taking high school to continue Arleigh‚Äôs training. I could not recommend Chrissy more for both group and private lessons! I will forever ONLY recommend All Fur Pets to anyone looking for a dog trainer!!

provider_name: All Heavenly Creatures Pet Crematory is Now Resting Rainbow of Port St. Lucie
review_text: 110% recommend All Heavenly for your Fur baby services..At a hard moment in our life losing our family cat of over a decade, All Heavenly was compassionate beyond words and gave me a comfort and peace that I can't even begin to explain. Even getting to know Fran for the few moments I was there, I can see the strong and passionate love she has for animals and the empathy she showed for the loss of our Bella. I cannot thank her enough for her kindness. Thank you from the bottom of my heart, and we need more compassionate people in the world like Fran!

provider_name: All Heavenly Creatures Pet Crematory is Now Resting Rainbow of Port St. Lucie
review_text: Losing a loved one is the most difficult thing one can imagine.   Having it happen when you were not expecting it and pain to another level.  He has his wings and is now in heaven.   Having it occur Friday evening was more difficult because we did not know what to do.  Nothing was open not even the vet‚Äôs office.   The service that Fran did for us during our moment of loss is only a person pure of heart and a true animal lover.   I read on the site about calling 24 hour.  As I am leaving the message at 9:00am, Fran immediately called me back.  I could not even complete my sentence with emotion when she said I can meet her at her store or she can come to pick him up.  She opened her store which is closed on weekends for us for my baby.   I could not thank her or bless her enough.  We went with a private cremation service and we had his ashes by Monday afternoon again after closing.   I absolutely fully recommend her and All Heavenly.  Even interacting with Kathy her assistant she was truly caring and sympathetic.   God bless the work that they do and the genuine love for us and our baby.

provider_name: All Heavenly Creatures Pet Crematory is Now Resting Rainbow of Port St. Lucie
review_text: Losing an animal that you see as another child is beyond difficult and putting it into words in nearly impossible. As a family we decided to ease the suffering of our beloved Radien. He had multiple problems including blind in both eyes, very horrific allergies, constant swelling of his joints and lymph nodes, and more. It was a very difficult decision as he was a big baby because he didnt know how big he was. I could go on with all the great things about our big baby. I called All heavenly creatures pet crematory. I spoke with Thomas and he was very straight forward from the moment I spoke to him. He gave us the cash price up front and all the information we needed to put our big baby in a better place. When the day came he was very sympathetic and empathic. He gave me time to hold my Radien why I sobbed very uglily. The doctor was very kind and understanding and straightforward. I picked up my big baby's ashes and ern and paw print and there was a gentlemen there in the front. I was in a rush to get out of there because as soon as he handed me my big baby I could feel myself getting ready to sob. I had not one issue during this process and I am very thankful for everyone that went through this process with me. I would definitely recommend and if ever needed the services again I would call. Our Radien was a big boy but a big baby. He will forever be missed and forever will be in the heart of our family.

provider_name: All Heavenly Creatures Pet Crematory is Now Resting Rainbow of Port St. Lucie
review_text:
Fran is wonderful!  She is exceptionally kind, generous of spirit, and compassionate, exactly the type of person  you want helping you at some of the most difficult times of life.

Away from work, Fran is a relentless advocate for animal rights, a fierce champion of animals.

I moved to New Jersey seven years ago but still send her Christmas cards.

provider_name: All Heavenly Creatures Pet Crematory is Now Resting Rainbow of Port St. Lucie
review_text: All I can say is that Fran and her staff are truly amazing. I had to use them once before for our other pup, and recently yesterday for our beloved Kiyah. She cares so much about our pups dignity. I would highly recommend them to anyone that needs their service.

I cannot say enough great things about Brittany and All Things Communication! When my son was 2‚Äì4 months old, he struggled a bit with bottle feeding, was always coughing and choking on milk and suffered from bad gas and reflux. Brittany showed us gentle mouth stretches and exercises that made a huge difference in such a short time. She explained everything clearly, was so patient, and genuinely cared about my son‚Äôs progress. I‚Äôm so grateful for her help and highly recommend her to any parent needing support!

Brittany is wonderful. Our daughter loved to see her every week and we could truly see her blossom more and more each time she went. Our daughter is also bilingual and Brittany was helpful in both English and encouraged Spanish as well (what she knew at least lol). I would recommend anyone to All Things Communication if they needed speech therapy for their child. We‚Äôve learned so many things as parents to help our girl continue to thrive in her speech journey.
We had such a wonderful experience with both Brittany and Amber! They met our son right where he was at and catered to him so well. 100% recommend All Things Commutation!

I can't say enough good things about Mrs. Brittany and Ms. Amber. They have been amazing with my 3 year old and giving me pointers and tips to help us continue exercises at home. You can feel the passion and care behind the work they do. If your looking for the best SLP around town, you've found them here!

Very kind and compassionate ladies working here. Both oral and speech specialist are very kind and helpful. We have been going for 3 weeks and my little one has already improved in speech and ASL signing.

All Together Wellness has been an absolute blessing to our family! Since starting our son has made incredible progress in his speech, language, and overall development. He looks forward to every session and truly enjoys working with his entire therapy team.

Cate (SPT), Carly (OT), Hannah (PT), Amy (Educational Specialist/ Certified Teacher), Paige (Admin), and Jenny (Owner) have all been wonderful. Each of them pours so much love and dedication into their work, and it shows in how far our son has come. We are especially thankful for Jenny‚Äôs vision in creating All Together Wellness‚Äîa place where all therapies are under one roof, and the team works together to support each child.

Our son has grown so much, and we only wish we had found All Together Wellness sooner. This organization truly cares, and we highly recommend them to any family looking for the best in therapy and support!

All Together Wellness is amazing and such an asset to the community. There are so many helpful resources available for parents as a 1-stop shop. The staff have so much heart and are very professional, and the owner, Jenny, is a wealth of knowledge.

We have been so grateful for all the folks at All Together Wellness. From the physical therapy, to the occupational therapy, getting help with hormone testing and protocols, root cause testing ‚Äî you name it, they‚Äôve been incredible to us.
So kind, so merciful, so determined to be a good resource and help to all of my family - from the youngest (3) to the oldest. I appreciate them so much and how they truly want to come alongside and help us!!

We were beyond lucky to have access to this amazing group of professionals. Our son was experiencing some developmental delays, and this program made a massive difference for both him and us. We had the pleasure of working with Amy P., who was knowledgeable, thoughtful, caring, and resourceful. Amy considered our son's specific situation and built weekly plans that were tailored to his needs. Moreover, she was so enthusiastic and high energy that it was hard not to get totally engrossed in each session. While the tactics we worked on certainly helped our son, I think they had even a bigger impact on us as parents - we learned tons of new ways to communicate and manage issues, and we felt like we had the power to make things better. Thank you for allowing us to work with your team, and for anyone considering this program - dont think twice... it's fantastic.

We‚Äôve been seeing Jenny since my son was 2 months old and she‚Äôs the best! She takes care to educate myself, my husband and my sons grandparents on the strategies she is implementing as well as making recommendations when necessary. I love that we have the option of having therapy either at home or the clinic, whichever fits our needs at the time. I highly recommend All Together WellKids for therapy!

My mom wanted to plan a 6-week vacation throughout Asia, which was exciting but intimidating üòÖ. However, my dad‚Äôs early signs of dementia and other family members unavailability to care for my furbaby made it challenging. Thankfully, I found All Critters Pet Boarding Service! When I dropped off my cat, they asked for specific care instructions, which relieved my worries. When I picked up my beloved cat, his long hair was fluffy and well groomed with no mats üê±. My sister was impressed that they‚Äôre located on a horse farm, noting that horses require meticulous care, so she knew my cat would be in good hands. I appreciate the excellent service from Armando and his team, particularly Shirley, who kept me updated with regular check-ins, pictures, and videosüì∏Knowing my furbaby was well cared for allowed me to enjoy my vacation worry free! I‚Äôll definitely rely on All Critters again for future trips! ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Armando and his team do a terrific job with the animals they care for. We left our little dog with them for almost 3 weeks and when we got there to pick him up he was happy and playful both to see us and the young man who has been spending time with him. I would leave him with them any day! Great experience! A+!

I recently boarded my two birds, Walker (our Quaker) and Kenya (our Timneh African Grey), at All Critters Pet Boarding for four days, and the experience was absolutely fantastic! Armando took amazing care of them and provided top-notch service. I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better boarding experience. Highly recommend!

Needed a place for my cat when on vacation, quickly was able to get in contact, and very glad I chose here. Armando is cool, lenient and even used some of his own litter after cleaning the box which wasn‚Äôt necessary, as well as making sure he would have what was needed to be okay for the stay. Highly recommendedüëå
Armando provides great care for all the pets in his care.   We had our cat there for three weeks and had a peace of mind that she was in great place.  We will be using him again next month.

We brought our 3-year-old son here for a speech evaluation due to a speech delay, and the team created a personalized therapy plan for him. We had the opportunity to work with three different specialists ‚Äî Hayley, Madison, and Samantha ‚Äî and each one was outstanding. After every session, our son did not want to leave; he truly enjoyed the experience and looked forward to each visit.

Remarkably, within just two weeks he began making attempts to speak, showing motivation, and imitating our words. The progress was clear, and it was evident how much he was benefiting from the sessions. The therapists were always attentive, caring, and highly professional.

I am deeply grateful for their dedication and expertise. It is also very important to us that they accept insurance, Medicaid, and scholarships, which makes these services accessible to families. This is a wonderful team, and I highly recommend them.

All star speech is a God send. As a teacher of 16 years who worked with children with special needs, and a parent of children with speech delays, apraxia of speech and auditory processing disorder, I can tell you that All Star Speech is by far the most child centered, effective and nurturing environment I could have ever asked for. They understand the behavioral challenges of children who have struggled with speech and other delays and they are well prepared to handle whatever comes their way. They treat my children with kindness and understanding all while challenging them, facilitating growth and pushing them towards progress. Vicky has the patience and calmness of a saint, Melissa does a great job helping parents understand what they can do to help their children and Liz has a way of helping kids without them even realizing that that‚Äôs what she is doing.
The growth I have seen in my two children is nothing short of astonishing. My previously non-verbal child LOVES going to speech and practicing new sounds and ‚Äúplaying‚Äù games, all the while he is making progress towards being verbal. He had some serious behavioral challenges when we first came a year and a half ago, and his speech therapist never gave up on him. She worked through the problems with him and consulted with his occupational therapist who also works onsite, and now my son happily goes to speech every week.
As a parent, I can tell you that I know my children are safe and actively learning while they are at All Star Speech. I am so thankful to have found them because without them I highly doubt my children would have made such progress.
If you are looking for a place that will truly help your child, I highly suggest looking into All Star Speech.

If you are looking for an occupational therapist Desire who runs Wonder Kids at the same location, is one of a kind. She took my son on and has worked to help him start writing and so much more. He went from nothing but scribbles to being able to write most of his alphabet, sorting like a pro and most importantly she works with him on his sensory regulation. He went from not being able to sit and focus for more than 2 minutes to being able to sit and focus for periods of time up to 30 minutes! She has even helped me learn ways to help him, help himself and I‚Äôm an ESE teacher! She is simply the most amazing occupational therapist I have ever seen.
She does not shy away from a challenge and I can tell you that when I first brought my son to her, it was truly a challenge. She has done an amazing job. My only regret is that I didn‚Äôt take him to her sooner.
I even recommended her to my neighbors who have since started bringing their daughter to her and the growth is amazing!
Long story short, if you have child who needs speech and/or OT, this is the place you want to take them. The collaborative efforts of both speech and OT have been a game changer for my son and the changes I see in him are nothing short of a miracle.

We have been taking our son to see Vicky and Desiree for years now and we cannot say enough good things about them both. They have helped our son grow and develop so much. They are truly the most kind and knowledgeable people we could have in our sons corner. Thank you so much for all the time and investments you provide.

All-Star Speech makes your child a priority!
Ms. Vicky and her staff go above and beyond to provide the best environment to help your child develop the language skills they need. Our child has been going to All-Star speech for over 4 years and the gains he has made are truly unbelievable. Ms. Vicky is professional, dedicated, and passionate about her profession. She is warm, caring, and understands our kiddos needs. She‚Äôs a phenomenal therapist, and one of the best human beings we have ever had the pleasure of knowing.
Highly recommend, All-Star Speech!

Our family met Vicky over a year ago to help our son with speech issues.  Vicky has been amazing!!!  She see's our son at his "school" so we don't get to see her face to face, but she is always in contact with us about his progress.  Our son loves his time with Ms. Vicky and we have seen amazing improvements.  She has gone above and beyond to help us and our son get the best care he needs.  I can not thank Vicky enough for all that she does.
Dr McIntosh is the most professional and caring doctor that I have ever had the privilege of having providing me care and treatment. I highly recommend her. She is such a pleasure to talk with.

We are so incredibly grateful to have found Catherine Huey! She is truly exceptional, especially when it comes to working with children on the autism spectrum. Her warm, patient, and intuitive approach creates a space where children feel safe, understood, and empowered.

What sets her apart is her deep understanding of AAC (augmentative and alternative communication) and how to help each child use their device as a true voice, not just a tool. She meets every child where they are, celebrates every small step, and makes sessions engaging, fun, and meaningful.

Our child has made amazing progress thanks to her support, not just in communication, but in confidence and connection. You can tell she genuinely cares and is deeply committed to helping each child thrive. We can‚Äôt recommend her highly enough!

review_text: The best decision I've made for my 9mo old PitbullMix was putting him through Alpha and Omega Dog training. provider_name: AlphA and Omega Dog Training - Fort Lauderdale
review_text: When I got my new puppy- Bentley (an English Mastiff who can potentially weigh over 200lbs) so adorable and cute I actually forgot how fast and large my puppy was going to get.  As he got older (4 months and over 40lbs +) it was getting very difficult to walk and control my dog. She gave me her trainers contact number and I reached out immediately and they schedule a consultation within days and my dog and myself have never been better.  PJ is absolutely amazing!  See folks he told me the easy part is training the puppy/dog the hardest part is training the owner he taught me how to be Bentley's leader and that to me is priceless!!! I purchased the service dog package and it's worth every penny. My puppy is now 6months old and almost 70lbs; I can walk my dog without a leash in public areas and he's ALWAYS well behaved!  PJ thank you so much for you patience, guidance and all of the kindness you have shown to me, my family and most importantly Bentley!  üêæüêæüêæ my rating for Alpha and Omega -PJ 5+ stars highly recommend

Laz is an incredible dog trainer - bringing out the best in my dog! Laz has worked with our Golden Retriever who we can now enjoy in our home as a member of the family or enjoy on walks. It's no overstatement to say - Laz has helped change our family dynamic for the better.
I would trust Laz with my dog any day of the week! He is fantastic at what he does and truly cares about the animals he trains.

We had an incredibly positive experience working with Laz. From the very beginning, he was patient, knowledgeable, and truly passionate about what he does. Not only did we learn a lot of practical tips and tricks for training, but he also helped us better understand how our dog‚Äôs brain works ‚Äî which made such a difference in our communication and bond with our pup.
Each session was both informative and fun, and we always walked away with new tools we could apply right away. His approach is thoughtful and tailored specifically to your dog, and it‚Äôs clear he genuinely cares about both the dogs and their families. We also really appreciate how he was always available over text in between sessions answering all our questions and concerns when we didn‚Äôt know what to do.
Over time, he‚Äôs become more than just a trainer ‚Äî he‚Äôs become a good friend of our family. We‚Äôre so grateful for everything he‚Äôs taught us and would highly recommend him to anyone looking to build a stronger relationship with their dog.

We can‚Äôt say enough good things about Alpha Buddy! Laz was absolutely amazing to work with‚Äîfast, efficient, and incredibly intuitive when it came to understanding our dog, Toni. Toni is a high-energy, rambunctious pup living in a high-rise, and Laz gave us the tools and confidence to help him thrive in that environment.

Elevator rides, leash training, and public outings (like coffee shops and parks) used to be stressful, but now they‚Äôre enjoyable experiences for all of us. We‚Äôre an active family and the training he provided gave us the skills we needed to include Toni in adventures like kayaking with ease!

Toni can be a little stubborn, but whenever challenges came up, Laz had quick, thoughtful solutions that worked. After completing the first course, we feel empowered and better connected to our pup‚Äîand we‚Äôre already looking forward to the next level to work on off-leash training.

Highly recommend Alpha Buddy to anyone who wants a happier, well-behaved dog and a better bond with their pup!

By far the best trainer. My precious dog chocolate was so shy and scared to be around other dogs. I call him the dog guru. That‚Äôs how great he is. Now my chocolate is so confident and I could actually take him for walks and to the dog park. I couldn‚Äôt be happier. When I tell you that I highly recommend him you won‚Äôt regret it. Trust me when I say your fur babies will be in great hands. You won‚Äôt be disappointed. So if your fur babies are like my chocolate was you must call Alpha Buddy Dog Training. I give it a 10 star ‚≠êÔ∏è

Five stars because that‚Äôs what Laz gives you. Rollo was a stray off the streets and obviously very skittish and aggressive because that‚Äôs what he needed to be. Being in a business where you see so many dogs, it said a lot for the amount of time he spent with Rollo and the feelings he formed for him  I have a feeling that he is that way with all of his dogs.

reviewer_name: Rima Abou Salman Rima Abou Salman
review_text: Best place for therapy. I've been going there for 2 years and i don't have any complain for anything. Everybody works there are great and my son has improved way to much since he goes there. Love the place, and my son too. Quality of people and Quality of work, specially Mrs. Avry for art and Mrs. Ana for music. Thank you so much for everything.

I adore Rachel! She has been incredibly kind and patient with my daughter. Since we began therapy with Rachel, my daughter's progress has been remarkable. Rachel is always willing to answer all my questions and ensures we understand the tasks to help my daughter reach her milestones. I wholeheartedly recommend her to everyone!

My son was fortunate to have two excellent speech therapists, Alexis Gedallovich and Angelica Artiles, here. They are angels who are patient when working with children. It's clear they love what they do. I'm so grateful because I've noticed progress in my 3-year-old son.

This was an extremely frustrating experience. I strongly advise against going to the North Miami center. Google Maps directs you to the wrong building, and parking is nearly impossible to find. We spent so much time waiting for a spot that my daughter had to use the restroom, which made us 10 minutes late. Despite explaining the situation, we were charged a $100 no-show fee and our session was canceled.

There‚Äôs no clear signage to guide you, as the center is tucked away on the third floor at the back of the building. On top of that, the staff were unfriendly and communication was poor.

Overall, I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this place to anyone.

I cannot say enough great things about Always Keep Progressing! provider_name: Alyssa Frey CranioSacral and Occupational Therapist CST, OT
review_text: I feel extremely lucky to find Alyssa. My 18 month old baby was diagnosed with strabismus and after doing eye patching for about 3 months we saw very little improvement and were told that we might need to do a surgery. Even after one session with Alyssa we saw huge improvement which was incredible. Also baby gained more confidence and freedom in her body movement and improved coordination. I already went for a session myself for lower back and neck pain and was amazed how much better I felt  after the session. The therapy is very gentle and precise and you can feel the results instantly. Alyssa is very passionate about her work and explains everything very well, you know you're in good hands. I highly recommend Alyssa Frey, she really does wonders.

provider_name: Alyssa Frey CranioSacral and Occupational Therapist CST, OT
review_text:
Alyssa is a GEM‚Ä¶she is super easy to talk to about what you want to work on. In our case she was working with us to release some tension and related issues my month old baby seemed to be carrying. We saw so much improvement - he had a little bit of a recessed chin that got much better aligned. And overall just helped get him on a good trajectory, including stronger with tummy time and more engaged as his wake windows have increased. So pleased and happy to have found her

location is super easy and was able to find street parking every time.

provider_name: Alyssa Frey CranioSacral and Occupational Therapist CST, OT
review_text: I will start of by saying I am usually not the person that writes review. But Alyssa has been wonderful to work with from the first session. We have worked with her for about a month to release my 6 months old extreme body tension. We worked with Alyssa prior to finding out my baby had a lip and tongue tie and also worked with her post revision. I have seen a huge improvement in my baby‚Äôs tension and she is now able to move more freely and Reach her developmental milestones without restriction. I write this review to help any parents that might feel stuck with an unhappy restricted baby.

provider_name: Alyssa Frey CranioSacral and Occupational Therapist CST, OT
review_text: Alyssa is literally an angel on earth. We have been going to her since our baby was a little over a month old and now he is turning 9months in two weeks! In the beginning she has helped him when he was really colicky, fuzzy, and had a preference of a side. She has tremendously helped him with his pre and post tongue tie release. She is our go to. Very informative, and always tries to make sure our baby is the healthiest version. We recommend her to every parent we meet!

provider_name: Alyssa Frey CranioSacral and Occupational Therapist CST, OT
review_text: I brought my son to Alyssa shortly after getting his tongue, cheek, and lip tie revisions. It‚Äôs incredible how quickly his torticollis and feeding patterns changed after a few sessions. Alyssa is very thorough in explaining everything that she does, and the process is extremely gentle. I would highly recommend her to anyone in need of bodywork for their baby. I‚Äôm thankful for the recommendation that I got, because now i can‚Äôt even tell that my son had body tightness or breastfeeding issues. He‚Äôs reaching his milestones on time and moving around comfortably. I would say that consistency is key and would suggest getting the work done as early as you can to see quick results. Thank you Alyssa for all of your help !!

I can‚Äôt speak to how Ambrosia is today (I did look through the reviews though and it seems as though it‚Äôs gone downhill a lottttt in the last few years with mainly negative reviews whereas the older ones are all positive. Unfortunately I‚Äôve been to a lot of treatment facilities but Ambrosia was by far the best - like 100x better. I actually loved it there a little too much as I went through their inpatient program 8 times. That wasn‚Äôt because it wasn‚Äôt an amazing program it was me that was the problem. I constantly self sabotaged and didn‚Äôt know how to function in the world sober and essentially became institutionalized. (The last time I went they told me it was the last time and I was black listed and wouldn‚Äôt be allowed to come back because they realized I had an unhealthy comfortability with the facility. I truly did consider it my home. Every time I went I really did try my hardest and the staff did everything in their power to help and support me including sending me to an outside trauma therapist who I worked with for 4 years and she helped me immensely. I wish I could say ambrosia was the last place I went to but it took a lot more rehabs for me to finally get out of my own way. It doesn‚Äôt seem like any of the staff is still there (I went the first time in 2011) but they truly cared and helped keep me safe from my own self and I‚Äôll forever be grateful. I don‚Äôt think I would be alive today if I never went to ambrosia or if I didn‚Äôt go as many times as I did.  Actually I know I wouldn‚Äôt. So this review goes out to everyone that worked there a long time ago. James, Ashley, Mike, Jordan (especially you - you‚Äôre the reason I never spent a single night on the streets and you never gave up on me). And all the techs from that time too. Shauna, Nicole, Ro, Tonia‚Ä¶. I owe you all my life. ü©µ

Worst place we could have ever sent our child. He has been there for 60 days. They did none of the things we were promised. We would be told one thing from psychiatrist and something else from the therapist. Our son continued his violent destructive and non compliance behavior and they are discharging him for that even though they were aware of these things when they admitted him.  As soon as they maxed out the insurance, he is no longer their problem and they are giving us 24 hrs to pick him up. Not safe to have him in a facility but we are supposed to bring him home with our other children.  No help. Just more problems and frustration.

Honestly I have received good psych care from here but I still think there should be some improvements, because nobody/nothing is perfect except for Him. I was constantly having some confrontations (physical and verbal) with some of the kids there, especially with a kid named Hunter, and I think the director should have investigated it instead of brushing me off. Although they couldn't handle my bad behavior anymore after 10 days, I still received good psych care despite my bad behavior. Thank you Ms. Annemarie, Ms. Shannen, Ms. Nordeen, Ms. Celina, Mr. Ezekiel, Mr. Daevonte, Ms. Melissa, Ms. Shanicka, Ms. Nina, and my therapist (I forgot her name but she was good to me) I'm sorry to disappoint you guys, you guys have been good to me I really appreciate you guys, God bless you all. üôèüôè

this place is top 10 WORST destinations in United States. while i was there February - April KIDS WITH SPECIAL NEEDS were BULLIED and BEAT UP. which i don't know why any parent is sending away autistic kids to a behavioral health facility full of mean kids, but they did nothing about it ok, as in the staff and the facility in whole.
Ms Celina gave me the best talks, and advice then any therapist ever could while being there. Thx ambrosia for absolutely traumatizing me. i was scared to go to another rehab for treatment because this place was so bad. I'm glad were I'm at now, (LOTUS BEHAVIORAL HEALTH 8/10 recommend, its actually helpful) truly cares for your health. The groups at ambrosia...  good god, were so down right terrible.

they persistently forget your food, and when they do, your "meal replacement" is 3 measly mozzarella sticks.

THANK YOU Ms. Celina, and Mr. Ezekiel for making my stay as warm, and loving as possible, TRULY.    God bless yall, and any other child being sent here.

This happened back in 2020 i believe.
It sounded good when I got transfered there. It was nice I suppose. I ended up AMAing one day and they wouldn't charge my phone because "that's enabling " (mind you,  this was my first time in Florida at all. I literally had been in a different unit for 28 days before being transferred there). So I was walking with no phone and my bags. A car with 2 women and a baby offered to let me charge my phone in their car. They drove me to their house and it was a pimps house. I declined the free heroin many times and eventually gave in. I was raped , overdosed, and then I was left half naked in a ditch.  Thr police/ems found me not breathing or responding.

Now, none of that was ambrosias fault. (Except maybe help establish a safety plan? Or charge the phone? )

while in the hospital they wanted to keep me because my tsh levels were bad (I dont have one) , but ambrosia told them that it was okay , "we have nurses there who can monitor her". They took me back, wouldn't even let me inside because "i relapsed and was no longer welcome there". Eventually they got another place to pick me up.  I had been gone less than 2 days (including the hospital stay) .

I brought my 7-year-old son, Titus, in for SPECT imaging and a history review at the Hollywood, FL location. From the moment we walked in, the staff was incredibly warm and welcoming. Their lobby was clean, comfortable, and beverages were provided for the patients and family while waiting.
We encountered Toni at the front desk. She was very sweet and efficient.
Moe was our tech in the scan room. He had a very hard job, as one of his tasks was IV insertion... and, being 7, Titus did not like that. During the process, Moe was extremely gentle, patient, encouraging, and comforting to Titus (and me, an overwhelmed mom) during IV insertion and imaging. He went above and beyond and did this two days in a row. Big props to him!
We saw Ana for a comprehensive patient history. She had an extremely calming energy and was an engaged active listener.
We come back in a couple of weeks for a follow up, and my son already can‚Äôt wait to see the staff again. Thank you all!!!

Scan Tech Moe is awesome! I'm normally deathly afraid of needles but he made the scan experience hilarious! Very professional, friendly and over all funny guy. You guys are in great hands üëå üëä

Mo was so patient, compassionate and authentic.  Riley was also terrific.  Those that greeted us upon arrival were courteous and friendly.  I can‚Äôt wait to get the results and will update when I have more opinions.

A two-hour epic evaluation of my brain‚Äôs images with Dr Fredrickson at the Amen Clinic in Hollywood Florida. Merry Christmas to me!

I really recommend everyone to go to this lovely place. I promise you‚Äôll love it there and get better ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è

This place deserves more reviews. From the moment you enter, you feel incredibly welcome, and everyone is extremely helpful. They take their work very seriously. I had a great experience at Amethyst. I would wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone looking for a peaceful and productive rehab experience. The environment is very positive and restful. After 20 years of my sons battle with addiction and mental health issues which included multiple rehabs and therapists this is by far the best place he has ever been.  I finally have hope for him because they are listening and watching him to determine why he keeps failing at sobriety.  The staff are kind and caring and the facility is very clean and a pleasant place to be while recovering . They are accommodating to the family also as they truly understand  addiction is a family problem.  The people who run the facility know what the clients need to get started on a successful happy life of sobriety  and are sincere about helping them if they are ready to help themselves .

Shout out to Bobby for recruiting and admitting me, Dania for intake, Sal Nicole Keela and Lea for taking care of me.

I heard from residents this is one of the nicest recovery centers in the state, if not whole East Coast. The Staff are friendly and helpful, Doctors are knowledgeable, Nurses are considerate. You will receive round the clock care every day of the week. The food is Chef cooked and different every day, residents are a huge fan of the meals and snacks! We have recreation outside to play basketball or get some sun. We have at least 4 classes a day, sometimes 6. Teachers are compassionate and knowledgeable. I had a great experience here and have no complaints about the facility after 23 days in treatment.

One of my concerns (which ended my treatment early on my part) is the lack of transparency on when you will be released. Some people are admitted 13 days and some 35 without any knowledge of which group one will fall into. Kylie is cold and unapproachable and provides zero communication on discharge timeframe which makes residents feel like hostages. She also will call your emergency contact and snitch on you if you attempt to leave. I hope she learns her lesson the hard way.

If you need to detox and you're serious about recovery and sobriety this is the place you need to be. the staff and the food are top notch and the Aftercare planning is awesome. I would recommend them to anyone serious about recovery in a safe environment:-) :-)!!!

This place legit saved my life. From the staff to the facility itself was very clean, good energy. I was very impressed by how quickly I improved in my substance abuse treatment while I was here.. I could have never imagined doing it anywhere else. I am almost 1 year clean from fentanyl and I will forever hold a special place in my heart for them. They also gave me a scholarship so I could go with my fianc√© at the time because he had better insurance than me.. god works in mysterious ways and I felt I was meant to be here at the time I was there. Thank you so much

review_text: I had amazing experience here. It was my first time grooming my baby boy Damon, I was nervous. I‚Äôm also new to town, just moved to florida from New York.
