We‚Äôve had such a wonderful experience at] Apex. My daughter came in with a painful elbow tear from gymnastics, and the care she‚Äôs received has been outstanding. From the very first appointment, the team made her feel comfortable and supported. They took the time to explain everything clearly and created a personalized plan that was both effective and encouraging.

Her therapists are not only knowledgeable but also incredibly kind and patient, always motivating her while keeping her progress safe and steady. We‚Äôve already seen huge improvements in her strength and confidence, and she actually looks forward to her sessions.

Been working Professional and Personally with APEX for years now.

Professionally - Incredible. As a Gym Owner, not only do they take care of many of our members, they also provide their services at our gym once a month. Additionally, every year we Host a Fitness Competition in which all proceeds go to the Salvation Army by way of asking participants and spectators to donate a toy for a child 3-12 years of age. This even draws hundreds of competitors and spectators. APEX provides services at this competition AND encourages their own people to donate towards this great cause.

Personally - As a "weekend warrior" I've used APEX's services to keep my body together. Last year I injured my shoulder at a local competition. I personally take very good care of myself through water, diet, sleep, mobility, etc. I tried everything to heal the injury including taking time off from using my shoulder, but the pain did not go away. In fact, it worsened as time went on. APEX was able to show me that I had a 50% tear on my bicep and pec. While I was doing all the right things, I needed Physical Therapy to restart the healing process. Additionally, because I had stopped using the shoulder, I created some pretty poor movement patterns as well as some compensating to the other side of my body. Within 1 session the pain went away. Within 2 sessions I had regained almost 90% of my mobility back.

Whether Personally or Professionally I highly recommend using APEX for all your needs.

Apex is State-of-the-Art.  I had a full hysterectomy and had a weak core and back.  PT Alana and Keelan are knowledgeable, experienced and designed a program tailored to my needs.  Alana performed dry-needling and cupping on my back.  The results were amazing.  Their PT assistants are motivating and well trained.  In one month I feel stronger and more mobile.  I highly recommend Apex.

A couple of weeks ago, I was having a crisis trying to find a clinic or hospital that had a health care provider that knew how to treat an abrupt flare-up of benign paroxysmal positional vertigo on a Saturday morning. Apex was the only option I could find that had someone that understood my condition and could treat me that day. My therapist‚Äôs name was Rocco and he was very kind and understanding of the poor state I was in at the time of my appointment. He was very knowledgeable and even in just one treatment, he significantly decreased the discomfort I was experiencing.

Overall, this is a bustling clinic with clientele of all ages. Everyone was friendly. The staff are working on multiple patients at once but there appears to be sufficient staffing to cover the demand. The high number of positive ratings is warranted in my opinion.

Apex Physical Therapy is an exceptional resource for those in pain and seeking effective and long-term relief. Their staff is outstanding; highly skilled and trained, intentional, and caring. Their focus is to explain and educate, get to the root of the issue, and get you back to life and activity with the most progressive and effective therapies. I specifically have worked with Dr. Alana Lackey for several different injuries and each time her thorough examination, assessment, therapies, and post self-care suggestions have gotten me back and have kept me active and playing pickleball at full strength. I am not interested in medical institutions, we have too many of those. The Apex facility, staff, and culture let you know they want to help and you matter.

After a couple of major surgeries, I was looking for a therapist that would safely and correctly get me back to my previous condition. Mike has been the best physical therapist that I have worked with. Others have just gone through the motions and delegated exercises for me to do. Mike monitors me, and directs me, while motivating me. His approach pushes me enough without overextending, and has an understanding my specific recovery. Mike has a vast knowledge of his profession mixed with a genuine personality, and listens to my concerns and aches. He takes my feedback before each session and tweaks that days plan.I have made tremendous progress that I did not think possible. After my session with Mike, I am upbeat, moving better, and energized.

I came to Apex Fitness to work on strengthening my legs, and I‚Äôm so glad I did. Mike  has been absolutely wonderful to work with. He‚Äôs incredibly knowledgeable and took the time to tailor exercises to my needs and abilities. I‚Äôve already noticed a real improvement in my strength, and I feel more confident in my daily activities. On top of that, he‚Äôs kind, patient, and makes every session enjoyable. I highly recommend Mike to anyone looking for expert guidance and support!

I first started with Apex on June 13, 2025 after I had fallen ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ Dr. Aubrey Hall was my Physical Therapist. My Primary Care Doctor ordered in home PT because my need was to regain areas needed to function at home. My  treatment plan was for 20 visits, twice a week and more if needed.

Aubrey gave me back the courage, the will power,  strength and my hope that I‚Äôd be able to function again! We worked the areas I needed: balanced,  fear of falling, building and strengthening weak muscles and going from sitting to standing was the toughest exercise that we conquered!!

Aubrey is an excellent Physical Therapist with his Doctorate in Physical Therapy.  He is very knowledgeable and knows just what you
need. He is kind and gentle, a coach and cheerleader and yet he pushes a bit but that‚Äôs what is needed!  He is definitely an asset to Apex.

I will be forever grateful for Apex and their Therapy programs and will definitely recommend they to everyone!

Great physical therapist. I started out with left hip problem which quickly was solved. My right hip started to bother me and after several sessions that too was solved so both hips feel completely better. The concern and personalized treatment were amazing. Just feels like everything was tuned to my specific issues. Nothing seemed liked general PT but all took into account me and our communication with the therapist. Can‚Äôt highly recommend enough.

Mike, with Apex Rehab and Training, goes above and beyond what you would expect from a PT provider.
Knowledge, communication, flexible scheduling, and bedside manner are all exceptional. We are very thankful that Mike Jones/Apex, was recommended to us for our Physical Therapy needs.

provider_name: Apex Systems, Center for Autism & communication Disorders
review_text: I am so thankful we were recommended to come here. I tried many other types of therapies for my son and all of them tried their best in the education, and techniques. But as my personal experience, I can see that the approach taken by Roy has aimed correctly at the root of the problem. The best part is that Roy truly cares, he is committed, and even though the program has a linear way to work, he personalizes to every individual. Ah! Not to mention my son loves it !! Truly thank you. Apex system "Roy Sarfati"

I‚Äôm very happy I chose this location for my physical therapy. The exercises were well-instructed and truly helped me gain confidence in my effort to improve my physical limitations. The staff was knowledgeable, supportive, and always on time, making each session smooth and efficient. They also provided helpful suggestions on how to do the exercises at home without needing the same gym equipment, which made it easier to continue my progress outside of therapy. Their professionalism and dedication made a big difference in my recovery. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for quality care and guidance!

Great place for PT!  Facilities clean and modern, with excellent equipment.  Staff very knowledgeable, professional, and friendly.  Have recommended several friends, who have had similar great experiences.  I am now walking without a limp and back to my pre-accident self.  If I need PT again, I will certainly go back to this site again.   Definitely the place to go for effective PT that works!

Christine and Summer are well trained physical therapists. I had rotator cuff surgery and they knew just what to do to get my strength and mobility back all in a one on one,  personal and very fun setting.

Its difficult to find such a dedicated group in one place. Thankfully the staff there recognize how important their craft is to all patients, especially  my dad who has Parkinsons, and needs specialized attention.

Skilled staff and convenient for Island residents. Exclusive! Personalized treatments, extra friendly and professional clinicians and staff. Love the Q&A with specialists ,  nice breakfast and Happy Hour perfectly organized as a nice recognition to the residents . Attention to details makes a difference!!

Dr. Lovely has been working with my oldest for 11 months and my youngest with Dr. Courtney for 6 months. Their knowledge and patience with both is absolutely amazing. They always look forward to going and ask to go when they don't. We have tried countless of locations for OT and ABT is BY FAR the best we have seen. The center has also provided so many options for their therapy and its not just sitting on a chair in a cold office. My daughters have done art, life skills, feeding, aquatic, outdoors, gardening, handwriting and so so much more.

My son has been working with Dr. Lovely for almost a year now, and the level of development has been exponential. Her relationship with my son is so genuine, and she has been such a great advocate for him during his time with her. She continually engages us with what is being worked on in sessions so we can help reinforce actions at home, and our son often talks at home about how he is practicing the actions for Dr. Lovely. I would encourage anyone thinking of using ABTC to go in worry free and confident that your child will get the utmost care and support. Our son‚Äôs early interventions have been monumental in his development and Dr. Lovely has been a instrumental in his journey.

Apollo beach therapy center has been wonderful for my daughter! From the first time I contacted them, I have had nothing but positive interactions. She took the time to  understand my daughters needs and has been so patient with child. Ms. Lovely makes sessions fun and engaging. We have seen such great improvement in my daughter since we started therapy here!

Honestly my experience has been outstanding. Dr. Lovely has such a gift with kids. My son has never really open and enjoyed therapy until we attended Apollo Beach Therapy Center. He progressed and we saw great improvement with him.  We are truly blessed by there unremarkable job they do.

My 6-year-old daughter has been a client of Dr. Lovely‚Äôs for almost a year now. As a therapist mother myself, I understand the importance the role of an occupational therapist plays in the successful development of children like my daughter who have Down Syndrome. I‚Äôm beyond pleased with the progress she‚Äôs made since working with Dr. Lovely. My daughter responds beautifully to Dr. Lovely‚Äôs errorless learning approach to therapy. Her confidence has soared and there has been a significant gain in her strength. She finally achieved her goal of climbing a rock wall and crossing the monkey bars, feats I didn‚Äôt think she‚Äôd achieve for a long time. My daughter has responded so well to Dr. Lovely‚Äôs calm affect, something I too try to mirror when working with my daughter and other children. The facility here lends itself to functional therapy opportunities by providing a pool, obstacle course, playground, sandbox, and an indoor gym. My daughter always wants to come and cheers when it‚Äôs OT day! I highly recommend that if you‚Äôre searching for an occupational therapist, you consider Dr. Lovely. You just can‚Äôt have my time slot!
Great place for physical therapy. Staff members are very nice and professional and always with a smile on. I see a big improvement to my injured knee.

I came to Apollo Rehab on referral from my podiatrist after getting fed up with pain in both my ankles that persisted for almost a decade. I was able to make an appointment for evaluation quickly and easily. The facility is always kept clean which is important to me. I had an honest, plain english discussion with Mr Reid my first visit. I received a simple home work out plan with pictures as well as basic equipment to take home. I was also regularly seen by Mr Steve and Miss Andrea and they were always polite but pushed me to do better. Over 2 1/2 months I would say I have improved almost 100% in terms of pain and frequency of episodes. It has greatly improved my quality of life and mental health. I really wish I would have come sooner if I would have known it would be so easy. Thank you so much everyone!!

I just wanted to say thank you for all the support during my recovery from my torn meniscus. From being greeted by name at every visit to the warm atmosphere and excellent customer service, it always felt like, more than just therapy. On days when I didn't feel like tackling the rigorous exercises, the staff always found a way to make the visit memorable.  The care and dedication of the entire staff have truly made a difference.  Thumbs up for a job well done!

I‚Äôve been going to Apollo (both Tamarac & Parkland) for about 3 years now, on and off whenever my herniated disc has a flare up. Without fail, they help me heal to normal functioning life each time. It‚Äôs hard to put my gratitude into words but I am just so happy to have found these amazing therapists because they really do life changing work. Always a welcoming, fun environment and they really know how to encourage you to find your strength and push yourself safely. Doesn‚Äôt matter which therapist you work with, they are all absolutely amazing. If you‚Äôve been hesitant about physical therapy, I encourage you to try out Apollo Rehab!

Shout Out to the greatest PT team! Everyone has been amazing during my journey. My doctor's office assured me if I got in with Apollo, I would not regret it and they were correct. I primarily work with the Monday crew and while all the team is great, the money crew is the best. Sam is always so gracious, Blake is always clear and precise in his instructions, and JT is just a great, supportive PT. If you want a place to feel comfortable and cared for, come to Apollo.
Hello !! I want say that this Wellness center is the best one I ever want to !! There's very professional people working in this place and with 5 sessions all my pain are gone !!

Wonderful place!! I come for the 30-minute infrared sauna sessions. The service is amazing. They have water for you if you need any. There‚Äôs towels to wipe the sweat away. I am so happy, I found this place!!  I Was looking for a place that offered IR sauna and  massages for my aching upper back, neck, and hips. I found an amazing pair of hands to help me. I am so grateful to have found a place that is clean, tranquil, welcoming and professional. My esthetician, Emma, was incredibly knowledgeable and took the time to understand my skin concerns and goals. She customized the facial to address my specific needs, including a combination of deep cleansing, exfoliation, and mask application.

What truly impressed me was the attention to detail and dedication to providing an exceptional experience. From the soothing music to the calming aromas, every aspect of the treatment was carefully crafted to create a sense of tranquility and relaxation.

Clean facilities, well appointed sauna room with good lighting and a relaxing atmosphere. I think the infrared sauna treatment is helping to calm my urticaria issue and it's a great place to meditate and unwind. Friendly customer service too.  Mariela is great! She makes me feel at home and doesn't rush me out the sauna if there's no one waiting for it. I plan to continue my treatments in 2024 as long as nothing changes!

My boy Duke and I have been struggling to manage his reactivity during on-leash walks. Luckily we found the amazing people at AYP and just after our first private session with Jonny at the facility I could tell they would make a huge positive difference in our training. We left Duke for about a week in their board and train program and Alex and the rest of the team did a wonderful job taking care of Duke. We really do appreciate their effort and all the knowledge they‚Äôve given us to progress Dukes training. Highly recommend AYP, thanks again!

I cannot recommend AYP enough! We have two adult 9 1/2 yr old dogs who were not dog-friendly at all, and thanks to our trainer Felisha‚Äôs incredible patience and guidance, they now accept‚Äîand love‚Äîour two new pups every single day. It wasn‚Äôt an easy journey, but it was absolutely worth it, and I‚Äôm so thankful we made this decision to keep all four of our dogs safe and happy together.

Felisha was amazing during our private lessons, working with the big dogs to accept and interact with the pups. Then, in the group classes, trainers like Maggie and Alex helped the puppies learn obedience skills (and even some fun tricks!). Every trainer we worked with is knowledgeable, kind, and truly invested in our dogs‚Äô success.

This has been the best money I‚Äôve ever invested in our fur family. We are now living in harmony, and I couldn‚Äôt be more grateful!

We had originally prepaid for multiple group lessons, but after our first lesson realized the group setting wasn't a good fit for our nervous rescue.  AYP was very accommodating and allowed us to use the remainder of our credit toward a private lesson.  Felicia met us at our local park, and she was so great with our dog!  She quickly grasped our dog's temperament, established trust, and even helped us identify tricks and tools we could use with consideration to our dog's breed and unique characteristics.  Thank you so much Felicia!

AYP is great! The faculty is clean and spacious, and the team is very organized and synced from the moment they open.  And their one on one training is wonderful as well.  Felisha is amazing with our rough dogs. She speaks and they listen. She is giving us confidence to be more firm with them, and has a great way to feed treats to toothy dogs. I wish we could have her come over every week!

Monika was a great trainer and she made a huge difference with our dog, Winnie. Winnie is a 4 y/o rescue with severe anxiety from a tough life and we had a ton of trouble potty training her and teaching her to walk on a leash. Our expectations were pretty low when we called AYP - we just wanted to get her potty trained and thought anything above that was just wishful thinking. However after just 6 training sessions with Monika, not only is Winnie potty trained, she also walks on a leash, she knows ‚Äúsit‚Äù perfectly, and she has almost mastered ‚Äúcome.‚Äù Needless to say our expectations were far exceeded. We did have to do a lot of ‚Äúhomework‚Äù with Winnie, but Monika explained everything perfectly and laid it out in a very manageable way. She was full of ideas and suggestions. It was refreshing to work with a true professional, who is also super caring and sweet!

My family has been with this amazing company since 2019. We first started with in-person threapy and after the pandemic because of personal perfrences moved to telehealth threapy. Apple Patch is always considerate of my family's scheduling and are great in making accommodations for my twin boys with ASD. The SLP we have had was amazing! She became like family (almost 2 years with Ms. Kyle) until new endeavers (life and love) moved her to another part of the US. Ms. Kyle knew how to differentiate her style to know when my son needed a change in the learning process. üíô Now we have another SLP who is just as amazing üëèüèª  Ms. Ameena. She is the kindest, sweetest, and most patient person to work with my boys. Love her! Apple Patch has never failed with the quality of threapist to assist my children along their journey. Great place. A+

I was struggling to find a speech therapist for my son that would actually listen to me as the parent. I called Apple Patch and got Blanca on the phone and she heard me out and guided me on what was needed. She listened to my concerns and was wonderful! I finally thought we might have found something good! We did our evaluation with Dino and Teeba. They again listened to my concerns and were extremely patient with my son. Dino got back to me extremely fast with wrote up and therapy plan. He exceeded the amount of therapy hours I was expecting to receive. Teeba has been a heaven sent! She is wonderful and so patient with my son. He loves going to speech and it makes me so happy. Apple Patch you have exceeded all of the expectations I have. You are all amazing and wonderful!

This company helped my 12 year old about 9 years ago....He was 3 at the time and started out non-verbal. He's now is a great speaker!!....As of today, they are currently teaching 3 of my other children who have speech impairments. The therapist is always on time,  dependable, and keeps me informed on everything. She's very kind and professional. I recommend this company to everyone!!

I absolutely love the convenience of this option for therapy for my daughter. She spends all day at school so for her to just do her speech therapy remotely makes it so much better for her and myself.
We love Andrea! She has been working with my daughter for a few months now and I can honestly say that she has improved tremendously.
We‚Äôve had such a wonderful experience with Apple Patch! Andrea truly cares about her patients and is deeply committed to helping them succeed. She is kind, patient, and encouraging.

Had the best experience with Arena Counseling and Wellness. Maria helped me so much with her vast knowledge about therapy, her empathy, care and dedication to my happiness and success. It may sound corny but the counseling sessions we had changed my life, I know myself way better than I did before, made big changes in my life and in my mindset that are still impacting me positively today a year later. Thank you! 100% recommended.
Fantastic crew at Arena. They genuinely listen and care. I can‚Äôt recommend them enough. Go see them. It‚Äôs okay to not be okay, but it‚Äôs not okay to go through it alone.

Arena Counseling is the epitome of professionalism, compassion and knowledge. Every member of their team is committed to helping their clients. It is an environment of safety and trust that has allowed me to do the work I need to do. They have been supportive and collaborative in working with me and using an approach that best meets my specific needs. They are equipped with a variety of therapeutic modalities which is just one of many things that sets them apart. I have grown and found more healing in my work there, than I have throughout many years of previous therapy. I highly recommend Arena Counseling.  Thanks Jackie, Kelly, Leslie!

Arena is a wonderful place. The front desk staff are kind, communicative, and have a very quick response time! I worked with David for 2 years and it was the best therapy I have ever received. He is patient, understanding and knowledgable.

I üíõ Arena. They've saved my life in many different ways. Receiving EMDR therapy services with David Weinert greatly improved generalized fear and anxiety symptoms that I experienced for a long time. Being a client at Arena has improved my quality of life a lot. Thank you guys for all you do üôè especially thanks for the yummy chocolates in the waiting room

I am extremely pleased with my teenage daughter's experience at Aries Physical Therapy. The staff is welcoming, professional, and highly skilled. From my daughter's very first appointment, they took the time to understand our concerns and developed a personalized treatment plan that truly met her needs.

The therapists are not only knowledgeable but also genuinely care about their patients' progress. We felt supported, and my daughter felt encouraged throughout her recovery journey. The facility is well-equipped with the latest equipment in the industry, clean, and has a positive atmosphere, making every visit a little brighter.

I highly recommend Aries Physical Therapy to anyone seeking physical therapy. Their expertise and commitment to patient care are truly exceptional!

Aries has been a HUGE help in rehabilitating my left elbow. We‚Äôve been doing dry needling and different exercises to support the tennis elbow symptoms. Not to mention, they‚Äôre all about the community, which I love. They‚Äôre constantly looking for ways to support different organizations, run clubs and gyms. I‚Äôve been going to Bill, the owner, and the whole team is great. Can‚Äôt go wrong!

Aries Physical Therapy is exceptional! The therapists have empathy, compassion and most importantly a thorough knowledge of the human body and how to maximize your physical therapy sessions so you experience results! Did I say they also provide stellar customer service.
Aries Physical Therapy is a rare find. I'm grateful to my orthopedic specialist, Dr. Fernando Manalac (Holy Cross) for recommending Aries Physical Therapy.
I am grateful for their level of commitment and excellence!!
Traci Cloyd

I had a great experience at Aries Physical Therapy with Abby after my shoulder surgery for a torn labrum. She was skilled, caring, and made recovery fun. The facility is clean and welcoming. Highly recommend Abby and Aries!

My experience with Aries was a memorable one and I mean that in a very positive way. My therapist at Aries-Hollywood, Andrea, was a pleasure to meet with and get to know. She is very knowledgeable in her chosen profession and was always attentive to my condition and the progress that I made during my treatment.

But it not only was it her professionalism and attention to my needs that is memorable, but also the therapist/patient relationship that grew during the three-month span during which I was treated at Aries. Andrea is professional, approachable and personable in ways that enabled me to enjoy and look forward to our sessions. She is highly recommended!

Additionally, I wish to shout out to Leesa at the Hollywood location. While we did not work directly together, I was witness to her professional and infectious manner with her patients. With Andrea and Leesa, I and some regular patients that I came to know enjoyed an effective, relaxed and friendly environment.

Kudos to them both.
Donald Parrish

I‚Äôm very grateful to have been referred to this place for my father‚Äôs therapy after his hip replacement surgery. Everyone is very kind and attentive. Adan, the physical therapist in charge of my father‚Äôs care, is excellent‚Äîvery patient and highly professional in what he does. He explains everything and always makes sure my father feels comfortable. My father‚Äôs progress has been incredibly good, and for that, I thank Adan and the team.
I recommend this place 100%.

I went in for meniscus rehab.  Dr Adam was my therapist.  I found him to be very patient, thorough, and personable.  The facility is kept very clean and the staff was very professional and friendly.  Adam was kind enough to send me some exercises to do while I was out of town.  I am very pleased with the way he facilitated my recovery.  Full range of motion and strength has returned.
Thank you ARIES.  Great job!

I came to Aries from a nearby place and the difference was night and day. I have been working with Cameron and my sciatic pain has dramatically decreased in a couple of weeks. I‚Äôm now able to get back to my normal workout routine and other activities. I love the one on one attention and personalized care, something you can‚Äôt find at the other crowded places.

My son came in as he sprained his elbow growth plate. Joey and the team were great! They assessed where he was in the rehab phase and gave him a specialized plan. The exercises strengthened  his arm, core, shoulders etc... He recovered and was able to return to playing. Joey was always attentive, asked questions and knew just what to do so my son could have a full recovery.
Andrea massaged me at an event (Iceapalooza) and did an absolute wonderful job! I could‚Äôve fallen asleep with the DJ music playing it was THAT good! Thank you!

My first encounter with Aries Physical Therapy‚Äôs Hollywood location was on the phone with Liza. I experienced her enthusiasm, professionalism and compassion during that initial phone call! It said a lot. The team at the Hollywood location understands the process of rehabilitation. T They make sure each session is uniquely tailored to your needs.  My orthopedic physician, Dr. Fernando Manalac (Holy Cross) recommended Aries and I‚Äôm grateful. I am so glad to have found such caring therapists who‚Äôre always patient, ready to answer questions and provide a thorough explanation to any questions.

I had been at Arias for almost a year. When Liza became my Therapist, I thought we had a good relationship and we were working hard to help rehabilitate me after five spinal surgeries and a broken neck. It was pricey with my co-pay. They even recommended needling which was an additional cost, which I have no benefits from. I would not recommend spending the extra money for this per my experience. I had to make some adjustments to our sessions due to my physical pain levels. When I couldn't make it, I would call within 24 hours of my appointment. Maybe one or two times I called on the same morning and they ended up dropping me as a client. I thought that I had a good relationship with them. I had even bought Liza my therapist a $50 gift card for her birthday. And the day she decided she didn't want to take me as a client she cashed in that $50 gift card really fast. I would never go back. I'm super disappointed. I still feel like I need physical therapy to this day but I will  have to go somewhere else.

One year ago I arrived at Aries physical therapy on a walker. I had a bad fall resulting in 3 areas of fractures.  Every one there is so nice and helpful but I really must commend Andrea. I'm probably in better shape now than I was before I fell. She has worked with me on balance and strength and keeping me upright. She tolerates my complaining when something is hard and she encourages me to be better than I think I can be. I have been to other PT clinics before but I think Aries PT is the best.

I first went to Aries last July because of a partially torn rotator cuff, a difficult injury to rehab, but necessary in my mind, especially since the alternative of shoulder surgery is as risky as knee surgery. I finished my treatments for all intents and purposes by early June, 2025. Whereas I had had little mobility, motion, or strength for my first 3 or4 months in that arm, Liza and her staff provided sufficient supervised exercises at Aries and in homework assignments to have enabled about a 95% recovery. The atmosphere is comfortable and relaxed but not to where it interferes with the staff's dedication and professionalism. And I could even talk hockey with a few staff and fellow clients; lol.

Top rating *****
The staff is very helpful, with excellent knowledge to help each patient's need. Courteous and understanding of pain level each visit greeting patient - showing concern for their individual progress. I was not walking very well when I started and now as I have finished, I am much better and therapist has even helped out with suggested exercise routine for me to continue at home. I would highly recommend Liza and Andrea at the Sheridan St. location of Aries Physical Therapy.

I came to Aries by recommendation of my doctor to receive vestibular physical therapy to treat and help prevent the reoccurrence of benign positional vertigo. Dr Lindsay is extremely knowledgeable and has relieved all of my symptoms and I can happily say at this point I have not had another episode of vertigo while working with her.

During my time at Aries PT I have observed Dr Lindsay treating many other patients for a variety of other issues as well. If you need physical therapy, I highly recommend you to come to Aries for very personalized care!

The entire staff are friendly and extremely knowledgeable. I have seen great improvement in my mobility of my shoulder and muscles and am preparing for shoulder surgery. Bill and Lindsay are the best. Highly recommended
Lindsay and Cam took great care of me during my treatments! They were very detailed with their plan of attack for my physical therapy. Highly recommended! Great people.

I started rehab with Aries because of a ‚Äúdropped foot‚Äù which for some unknown reason became paralyzed. I could not move it up or down. Needless to say it impeded my ability to walk and caused great depression to me. I was recommended to Aries and worked for 5 weeks with Dr Lindsay Merrill who was extraordinary in her knowledge of the condition and how to treat it. She started me on electric stimulation of the nerves and with other forms of therapy my foot is back to normal. I could not be more grateful.

Went in today to get some cupping done. Was greeted kindly by the two people behind the front the desk. From there Lindsay took great care and made it a very enjoyable experience. To anybody looking to take better care of their body going to Aries is a great first step!!

provider_name: Ark & Bark Animal Hospital Debbie Butler DVM
review_text: Great care and very low prices. Some reviews say they are expensive, NOT. Got my services for a quarter of the price of my old vet and the people there were very caring and hours were more convenient. No pushy up selling. Both my cats and my big dog that's a coward loved them. Prices for prescription food was cheaper than Chewy. Go, you won't be disappointed.

provider_name: Ark & Bark Animal Hospital Debbie Butler DVM
review_text:
Saved

Debbie Butler is highly experienced. She gets right to the problem then offers the solution at a reasonable price,  We have been bringing our furry friends there for many yrs. Our latest adopted feline Ashford needed full mouth extractions. Debbie took care of it in a few hours and now a few days later he 's already perking up and eating soft food from A&B and on the mend. F-M-E is a very hard procedure to see your pet go through, but the only way to fix the infection, more so being FIV positive. If this is not done properly, the condition will get much worse requiring more radical surgery, not something to trust just any vet to do.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              We brought him in to Ark& Bark at 5:00 pm and picked him up just after midnight Job done. WE are so grateful to have our rescued special needs finally healing and out of pain. Thanks, Debbie and your Staff.

Ashford day of adoption            Ashford after eye surgery and
two weeks after full  mouth
extractions @ Ark& Bark

provider_name: Ark & Bark Animal Hospital Debbie Butler DVM
review_text: I called multiple times no one called me back. Email twice no response so at least you could have done is tell me you don't have time for new patients you're overcrowded no big deal I would have had more respect for that but to ghost me. I will find a new vet. I didn't want to have to drive to Melbourne every time my boys needed a vet I wanted someone close. Life is choices and you made my hand go the opposite of being a positive. Fairhope all the animals you care for I hope you do care for them because showing me what you showed me. Take care best wishes

provider_name: Ark & Bark Animal Hospital Debbie Butler DVM
review_text: I'm a veterinary technician at an animal hospital in Cape Canaveral and when I was pet sitting a puppy that had a foreign obstruction I called Arc and bark because I wanted to see if they could sell me an e-collar. I don't remember the front ladies name but she was wonderful. She did not charge me for the cone and was very understanding and helpful. She even taught me a clever way to make sure it stays in place that I didn't even know how to do. I can't speak for their vet care but I can speak for their compassion. I was very pleased and appreciative

provider_name: Ark & Bark Animal Hospital Debbie Butler DVM
review_text: We had to put our very sick older cat down, and the entire staff was so sympathetic and we felt they genuinely cared about animals. We don't have alot of money, and her price was better than any we looked into. We now have a vet for life

Alex is very professional and personally cares about his client‚Äôs progress. He‚Äôs organized with his work yet adapts well to personalized needs. His perspective on physical therapy and return to sport is ideal for athletes and active people because of his capabilities as a performance specialist on top of being a physical therapist. He‚Äôs progressive with his work and continues to grow as a practitioner so he sets himself apart from traditional clinics.

Dr. Alex Samuel is an exceptional physical therapist. From the very first session, he takes the time to thoroughly understand your health history, current concerns, and long-term goals. His approach is thoughtful, personalized, and rooted in truly listening to his patients.

What distinguishes Alex is his responsiveness and adaptability. He is personable and friendly. He is always ready to adjust treatment plans based on your progress or explore different approaches based on new information. He is also incredibly patient, taking the time to explain exercises, techniques, and how each component fits into your overall healing process. He will challenge you - but not beyond your limits.

Whether you are dealing with a chronic issue, recovering from surgery, or simply aiming to move and feel better in your daily life, I highly recommend Dr. Alex Samuel and Ascend Physiotherapy. You will be in excellent hands.

I attended Dr. Alex‚Äôs Wednesday morning runners workout shop. At the end of the workshop I told him about this pain that had been going on in my body for almost 3 months. It was on the left side of my neck that radiated to my left shoulder. He recommended I see him for PT. We did 2 sessions. Each involved dry needling. There were even accessory exercises we did during the session. He even sent me in a document to do on my own after the first meeting. We proceeded with a follow-up meeting to see how I progressed.

I‚Äôm really glad I met with Dr. Alex. I can honestly say I have never been to a PT doctor. I‚Äôve been working out since I was an adolescent. I usually know how to implement self care & recovery. I tried 2 massages and even went to my primary care doctor for help. However this approach using PT and dry needling has been a game changer for me. Seeing Alex has changed the way I move as an athlete. Thanks so much!

My experience working with Dr Alex at Ascend physiotherapy has been a game changer. I‚Äôve been dealing with a knee injury over the course of 5 years and never felt better with my time around Dr Alex he‚Äôs been very helpful and kind and supportive as well as I go through my journey with recovery helping me mentally get back to playing basketball mentally free I will continue to keep working with him and the Ascend family and will definitely recommend people working with him and definitely rate 5 stars

Alex is so much knowledge.
He helped me get to my marathon finish line Jan. 26th 2025. He helped me with chronic pain from a pulled hamstring doing dry needling as well as helped my elbow pain with shock therapy.  No issues have resurfaced as of this posting. I am starting his run training class to get stronger as I progress with training. Because,  you have to strengthen your muscles to heal them too.
Thanks Dr. Alex Samuel I love your treatments and your guided exercises.
Lovey Susanne

provider_name: Ascension Sacred Heart Rehabilitation The Market Shops
review_text:
Having experienced physical therapy with Teri H. &  speech therapy with Andrea W. I think it‚Äôs safe to say I can give an accurate description: OUTSTANDING! Skill level: EXPERT
Knowledgeable, compassionate, professional, goes the extra mile to make sure clients are comfortable, excellent teaching & I always feel better leaving than I did when I got there.
I even went back for a ‚Äòdo over‚Äô because they were so darn good!
The whole staff has been caring, inviting & pleasant, making it a great place to get better‚Ä¶.
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

provider_name: Ascension Sacred Heart Rehabilitation The Market Shops
review_text:
I love my Dr and his staff.

MY RATING FOR 5 STARS IS SPECIFICALLY FOR MY DOCTOR: DR HAL MARTENS.....  IT IS NOT FOR ASCENSION SACRED HEART.

provider_name: Ascension Sacred Heart Rehabilitation The Market Shops
review_text: Dr Hal Marten is an excellent rheumatologist. He explains everything in detail and listens carefully to what you have to say. His staff is always friendly and professional in the office extremely clean. I would definitely recommend this doctor to anyone that has arthritis problems

provider_name: Ascension Sacred Heart Rehabilitation The Market Shops
review_text: The nurses and  the staff are very attentive and friendly.  The doctor covered all of my concerns and listened to my questions.

provider_name: Ascension Sacred Heart Rehabilitation The Market Shops
review_text: The Rheumatologist was very helpful and knowledgeable of my condition. I'm returning in 2 months.

provider_name: Ascension St. Vincent's Southside - Inpatient Rehabilitation
review_text: Very professional,  caring and friendly staff. Whenever I needed help or just assistance, someone was right there. Beautiful facility too with spacious, pleasant rooms. I feel I got the therapy I needed to heal from my surgery and hopefully soon get back to my normal activities.

provider_name: Ascension St. Vincent's Southside - Inpatient Rehabilitation
review_text:
All staff considers you their #1 priority.  Happy, friendly faces greet you each time they enter the room.
The utmost care and concern is given to your every need.

The Therapy Staff is extremely knowledgeable in helping your reach your ultimate goals.

The facility is clean, spacious and inviting.

St. Vincent's Inpatient Rehabilitation Facility Southside, is the pinnacle place to go to get you on the road to your recovery journey.

Thank you One and All for Everything!!

provider_name: Ascension St. Vincent's Southside - Inpatient Rehabilitation
review_text:
There isn‚Äôt enough space to include the names of all of the wonderful care team members that worked with my 99 year old mom following her hip replacement surgery.  But, I would like to recognize several of her care givers‚Ä¶ Dr Hansen, Katie, the dietician, the pain management nurse, Tarah, her case worker, therapists (Katie, Sophia, Lana, Marissa, Ariana), PCTs (Jude, Paula, Marie, Kevin),  Nurses (Tiffany, Madhu, Jamie, Michael, Jasmin)‚Ä¶. The IR group also was amazing‚Ä¶ they have taken care of mama for about 10 years and Dr Sherard and staff (Amy, Michelle, Emily etc) are outstanding!

We are so thankful for the care given to my mom, the therapy, medical expertise and support and kindness shown to our family during a very trying time. Thank you and God bless each of you! üôèüèº‚ù§Ô∏è

provider_name: Ascension St. Vincent's Southside - Inpatient Rehabilitation
review_text: This rehab center is remarkable. You come in broken, for me unable to even walk, and they work with you with kindness, determination, and professionalism. I encountered caring, skillful people who helped me regain my confidence and my abilities.

provider_name: Ascension St. Vincent's Southside - Inpatient Rehabilitation
review_text:
5 stars doesnt do this facility any justice. The way they loved and cared for my mama made going through such a traumatic experience so much easier. My mother was there a little over 3 weeks and my mom went from no trunk control, bad slur and confusion, and little ability to do small tasks like brushing her own teeth. At discharge my mother could sit up on her own with little assist, speaking better, less confusion with better word recognition, brushing her teeth, eating on her own!!  We still have a long way to go, but I am so thankful to God for guiding us to Ascension inpatient rehab. They literally became our second family. It was almost hard to say goodbye to them, but we understand they got mama to her first destination in this long journey ahead. Plus they have other peoples lives to positively make a difference in.  Big shout out to Dr Hansen, Kaitlyn (ST), Liz (OT), Eric and Ariana (PT), our case manager Tarah, nurses Mrs Patricia, Michelle, Arnesha, Louis, and all others who cared for mama. You all are bright lights in this big world. A 1000 thank yous and even thats not enough!!!

If you are considering bringing your loved one here, TRUST ME, they will be in good hands!

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Asger K9. We rescued a Bully, and while I instantly bonded with her, she did not get along with my wife and stepson. It was a stressful situation, and I knew we needed help. After searching on Yelp, I found this trainer and scheduled an in-home evaluation.

From the start, Juan impressed me with his knowledge and professionalism. He even offered a 3-day boot camp at no cost, and when our dog came back, she was like a completely different dog. That alone showed me how skilled he was. We immediately enrolled her in the full board-and-train program, and the results were nothing short of life-changing.

When our dog returned, she and my wife bonded right away‚Äîsomething I wasn‚Äôt sure would ever happen. The trainer (shout out to Ronald) not only worked wonders with her but also gave us detailed explanations of her behavior, why she was reacting the way she did, and how to correct unwanted behavior going forward.
I get compliments all the time on how well trained my dog is.

Thanks to Asger K9‚Äôs expertise and dedication, our family now has the harmony we hoped for. I would highly recommend Asger K9 to anyone dealing with behavioral challenges or just looking to better understand their dog.

I had an amazing experience with Asger K9. Benji was very reactive towards other dogs and people, to the point that I could not walk him or take him out in public. Even aggressive in some cases. Benji came back a completely changed dog and for the better; more confident, refined, and obedient. Rey and Juan were super helpful from beginning to end and amazing at easing any worries or stress that I had. I would 100% recommend. Thank you guys!

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about AsgerK9. They‚Äôve been patient, knowledgeable, and dedicated to helping me understand and train my dog, Raya. It‚Äôs not just about commands‚Äîit‚Äôs about trust, communication, and making her the best version of herself.

They explain the ‚Äúwhy‚Äù behind everything, which has made me a better handler. Since training with them, Raya‚Äôs obedience, focus, and overall behavior has improved so much.

If you want a trainer who truly cares and gets real results, I highly recommend AsgerK9.

Outstanding Training Experience with Asgerk9

I am not an easy client and I‚Äôm very picky about everything and anything. With that being said,  I will always use Asgerk9 for training my pocket bully, Bruce. He started the program at 4 months old. I am thrilled with the outcome from their board and train program. From our first meeting with Juan, it was clear that he has a profound understanding of dog behaviors and effective training especially with my silly lil pup. The best part about that meeting is that he respected my particular ways with the dog. I wanted him to be trained with the least amount of treats possible and he eats a raw food diet. Juan was respectful towards my requests and they did exactly that.

Juan, Rey, and Pablo are always professional and communicated effectively whenever I reached out to them for updates on Bruce. They took the time to explain each training technique in a way that was easy for both Bruce and myself to grasp.

The training methods used by Asgerk9 were not only humane but highly effective. Bruce showed significant improvements in his behavior, particularly with focus, attention and on leash training, within just a few weeks. One thing i absolutely loved was that you can visit your pup wherever they‚Äôre training that day and see how the trainer works in action so it‚Äôs easier to understand when you pick him up. Asgerk9 also provided us with not only the tools but effective strategies to continue Bruce's personalized training at home, which has been incredibly helpful.

I want to emphasize the personalized training because there are certain things that I needed him to do as far as tasks and they made it very simple for me to go ahead and teach him these things.

Asgerk9's patience was and continues to be remarkable (both with Bruce and myself). Training can be challenging, Bruce is a pit mixed w staffy so even as a puppy they are strong and silly but AsgerK9‚Äôs calm and positive approach made the process enjoyable for Bruce and myself. Their kindness helped in establishing trust, which I believe was crucial to our success.

After completing the training program with Asgerk9, Bruce is now much more obedient, responsive, and well-mannered in various situations. He goes absolutely everywhere with us. And the best part is that he understands the program even if it changes.

We had a medical emergency at a restaurant for my son and it was very easy to go from a simple pace to a fast one. Bruce had the understanding of all the commands that he needed to accomplish, especially considering the speed that everything was going at in that moment. The transformation has been nothing short of amazing, and it's all thanks to Asgerk9's expertise.

I wholeheartedly recommend Asgerk9 to any dog owner looking for a skilled and no bs trainer. Whether you're dealing with basic obedience or more complex issues, Asgerk9 has the knowledge and approach to help.

**Rating:** 5/5

I can‚Äôt say enough great things about Asger K9! They did an incredible job training my 2 yr old Belgian Malinois in both obedience and bite work. It was so hard for me to leave her in training for 3 weeks but they would always answer the phone, send me pictures, and let me visit my baby!

I was unsure how well she would do considering she‚Äôs already an adult but the obedience training was amazing she‚Äôs a whole new dog!

The bite work was also impressive. They built up her drive and confidence.  It‚Äôs clear they truly love dogs and enjoy teaching them. I couldn‚Äôt thank Juan, Pablo, and Rey enough! I‚Äôm so happy with the results!

I highly recommend Aspen rehab rehabilitation. Today was my second Physical therapy for a broken right shoulder with Kimberly. She went above and beyond very thorough. She knows her stuff. Look forward to the rest of my sessions. I would say everybody there is excellent! I highly recommend.

Barely able to walk the first time I entered the Aspen Rehab, was so surprised as to how good the team there is and that I no longer use a cane and very close to being pain free. They are superb with their training and have made a very positive difference in my life. I had severe back pain and was finding it very difficult to move, stand and just function in general. Today I‚Äôm about pain free and can walk around a grocery store or mall again. I‚Äôm very grateful for the girls that worked on me. They truly know their stuff. I‚Äôve realized how important physical therapy is. Thank you to Aspen and the people that took care of me

Ana and Taylor were great once I was able to get them instead of the assistant which made my lower back pain worse.  Cudos to Ana and Taylor.

The Billing  department has a lot to be desired.  Been trying to get a simple bill for over a month now.  First they said pick it up.  Then it wasn‚Äôt ready, then the biller was on vacation.  Then the insurance company didn‚Äôt process it, considering they didn‚Äôt receive them.Left numerous messages and texts. Poor billing service customer experience,

I cannot say enough amazing things about Aspen Rehabilitation! I‚Äôve been dealing with dizzy/vertigo for the past year and was diagnosed by my ENT with an inner ear weakness. I truly thought I was going to be stuck this way forever.

After just a month of vestibular rehab here, coming twice a week, I feel incredible! Taylar has been absolutely amazing throughout my entire treatment‚Äîso knowledgeable, encouraging, and patient. Everyone else at the facility has also been wonderful. From the moment you check in to the behind-the-scenes staff, the service is truly 5-star.

I am so grateful for their help in getting me back to feeling like myself again. Thank you, Aspen Rehabilitation!

So grateful for Kim and the team at Aspen rehab. I started there with a hand injury that would not allow me to bend my middle finger more than 20¬∞ without lots of pain. Within a month I am almost back to full range of motion and steadily improving. The team of therapists are incredibly knowledgeable and did an amazing job challenging me during my recovery. The office team creates a seamless process for all of the admin associated with a medical office. Thank you very much for all of your help getting my hand back and working order.

provider_name: Aspire Physical Therapy and Wellness - Mobile Outpatient Physical Therapy Services
review_text: I am so glad that I learned about Aspire Physical Therapy from a friend. The work I received eased my back pain right away. The education and exercises have increased my awareness of my scoliosis so much that I have new confidence that I can live pain free. It is such a relief to have this resource! Thank you Andi and Jessica!

provider_name: Aspire Physical Therapy and Wellness - Mobile Outpatient Physical Therapy Services
review_text:
Awesome people! Had a complicated total achilles tendon tear that was surgically repaired in January 2025. By June 1st I ran a triathlon.

The arsenal of treatment modalities they threw at my injury was incredibly impressive. Through Graston massage, dry needling, hot stones, suction cups and directed physical therapy and more they were able to reduce my massive scar tissue considerably and return mobility and strength to my leg.

The transformation from before and after is truly unbelievable. Highly highly recommend them for incredible results.

My experiance with Apsire was far different from other physical therapy offices too. With others you might be one of half a dozen patients and they bounce between you and others. Here at Aspire I was always booked for an individual session and had 1 on one therapy the whole time.

provider_name: Aspire Physical Therapy and Wellness - Mobile Outpatient Physical Therapy Services
review_text: I saw significant progress in my strength and mobility, thanks to the personalized approach and encouragement I received. Jessica Windsor created a positive and motivating environment, making even the toughest sessions enjoyable.

provider_name: Aspire Physical Therapy and Wellness - Mobile Outpatient Physical Therapy Services
review_text:
I had Jessica treat my hamstring pain about a month ago. She was extremely professional and was able to generate a list of exercises for treatment. In addition, her needle/electrode treatment was able to lessen my level of pain.

I am now able to resume my normal level of activity thanks to Jessica. I would highly recommend her for physical therapy treatment to minimize pain for all types of issues to include neck, back, knee and shoulder pain.

provider_name: Aspire Physical Therapy and Wellness - Mobile Outpatient Physical Therapy Services
review_text: I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Aspire Physical Therapy and Wellness and the exceptional care I‚Äôve received from Jessica Windsor, DPT and Andi Pepper, PTA.  My husband John has been receiving treatment from them for some time, whether it be Plantar fasciitis or balance retainment these PT's are dedicated to your recovery.  I recently started receiving treatment for a leg and foot issue plaguing me for some time and I am finally seeing improvement. They will take the time to understand your needs and tailor a specific treatment plan.  They offer outpatient services and have recently opened a clinic in Satellite Beach.  If you‚Äôre looking for a physical therapy clinic that truly cares about your recovery, look no further than Aspire! Highly recommend Aspire PT to anyone in need of top-notch physical therapy!

provider_name: Assessment, Learning Evaluation, and Counseling Center
review_text: Clinic? One of my friends waited 4 months and was told "4 to 6 weeks" intially. provider_name: Assessment, Learning Evaluation, and Counseling Center
review_text: I don't know if I can express into words how horrible my experience has been at ALEC. It's been nearly two months and I still do not have my report from them. Save your $500, save your time, and go to an actual doctor for your evaluation. These people will not help you.

provider_name: Assessment, Learning Evaluation, and Counseling Center
review_text: For  my dance team

review_text: They are wonderful!!  I have been taking my babies to them for over  25 years.  They have taken care of all my fur children with kindness, love, understanding and compassion.  The Vet, the staff, the facilities are the best.

provider_name: Associates in Veterinary Medicine and Surgery
review_text: So compassionate and helpful. They have always been wonderful for us and our dogs even when we found cancer in our 4yo golden. The doctors and staff helped us through everything and were all so kind and helpful.

provider_name: Associates in Veterinary Medicine and Surgery
review_text: Dr. Scott and the entire staff are always professional, compassionate and attentive! Also feel that their pricing is very fair. Never left there thinking I‚Äôve paid too much.

provider_name: Associates in Veterinary Medicine and Surgery
review_text: My baby had to get her teeth cleaned yesterday. Oh my goodness how wonderful they treated her. And was told if I need anything to please call them. I love everyone at Dr. Larry Scott‚Äôs office. If anyone needs any vet needs please call them. They are the best. And not overpriced.üíúüêæüêæLove Hannah

provider_name: Associates in Veterinary Medicine and Surgery
review_text:
Great vet, he is kind and compassionate. They have reasonable prices and give sound advice.

Update: The two vets have shown themselves to be extraordinary, both in their knowledge and compassion. I've seen both vets, and they're both great, but our main vet is Dr. Larry, so I'll base this review on him. I couldn't recommend Dr. Larry Scott more. He cared for our two senior dogs that passed away within a few months of each other. He went above and beyond, not just a little; he went 1000% above and beyond for them during a very hard time for us. I am forever grateful for this. I believe he's the best vet in town. He doesn't do unnecessary procedures and gives you choices. We went to him on recommendation and feel so glad we did. If you want a kind vet that knows what they're doing, go to Dr. Larry.

I took my 10 year old recovering from a broken ankle. The doctor and David were fantastic. They explained everything and made it fun for her. She looked forward to attending. They were caring and understood her desire to get strong to get back to dance and she did. 10 out 10 recommend. Thank you guys!

When i first came my ankle was hurting super bad. I was always limping but when i got to Astro Health Care, they were massaging my ankle and doing excercisee on it so it can be better. I‚Äôve been coming here for a couple months and my ankle is healed i am walking normally and i am almost cleared

If you're an athlete looking for top-notch physical therapy, I can't recommend this place enough. The staff is not only knowledgeable but genuinely dedicated to helping you recover and perform at your best. The facility is well-equipped with modern therapy tools and equipment, making it ideal for athletes of all levels.
Wonderful facility for rehabilitation! Dr. Garcia and staff are very knowledgeable and professional. The patient‚Äôs well-being is always the priority. Highly recommended.
Great service Doctor Ramon and David helped me a lot on my recovery. I came in for treatment in a lot of pain and I‚Äôve been feeling much better. Thank you for the service.

Over the last 5 years I have seen countless practitioners who have not been able to pinpoint the root cause of my shoulder, rib and lower back pain. In our first meeting, Dr. Kyle and Dr. Matt performed an extremely thorough evaluation and identified several underlying issues contributing to my chronic dysfunction. Dr. Matt is incredibly knowledgeable, patient and takes the time to answer your questions and educate you on the "why." Whether it's manual therapy, corrective exercises, or strength and mobility training, Dr. Matt is attentive and encouraging throughout each and every treatment session. PT at ARC is like spending an hour with friends and leaving each session feeling better than when you arrived. I am so grateful to Dr. Matt, Dr. Kyle and Dr. Gianna for their expertise, support, commitment to improving my quality of life, and for being really great people who genuinely care and want to see you operating at your best.

I‚Äôve had a great experience with Athlete Restoration Company. Dr. Kyle is super knowledgeable, professional, and well rounded in his approach to treatment. Each session is 1 on 1, and offered a very personalized and focused treatment plan. I felt very confident in my care and was thrilled to return back 100% to normal activity after my sprain injury. I also learned some great foundational movements along the way to keep my body moving through an active lifestyle. I would highly recommend Dr. Kyle and his team.

I went to Athlete Restoration with pain in my left arm and hip. I was having a lot of issues and couldn‚Äôt even lift my arm properly. After going through therapy with them, I started feeling so much better. The improvement has been amazing, and I‚Äôm truly grateful for their care and professionalism. Highly recommend!

Dr. Matt and Dr. Kyle were extremely knowledgeable and helped me get my back pain under control. I was dealing with a partially slipped disc and they showed me exactly what exercises I needed to be doing and helped with dry needling and cupping. I am now more confident in my day to day movements and my ability to perform at my job. Overall my back is in much better shape because of them and I highly recommend them to anyone struggling with pain.

When my orthopedic surgeon recommended a total knee replacement I researched alternatives to at least delay the surgery. I am a competitive tennis player and previous college basketball player and at 69 still very much define myself as an athlete. I was fortunate to find Athlete Restoration and immediately connected with their progressive approach, team and deep clinical, physiological expertise. I signed up for 12 sessions and started with a knee that was painful, limited mobility, and almost no flexion‚Ä¶‚Ä¶the impact was almost immediate (generating synovial fluid) rebuilding muscle and stabilization of my knee, hip and ankle. Matt earned my confidence and respect from the get go and was a joy to work with‚Ä¶..he truly cared and knew exactly what to do to get me mobile, pain free and playing again. Founder Kyle and his vision for this disruptive approach is brilliant/inspiring and the facility he‚Äôs built is world class. Nothing but high praise for my experience/results.

I had an excellent experience during my first session at Athletic Recovery Services. Josh was the massage therapist I worked with during this session and I cannot stress enough how different and individualized his approach was. He started by getting a detailed history of what I was working through and then tailored the entire session to meet my individual needs. I had been going to a chiropractor to get additional relief for a herniated disc I had last year. They had been addressing the structural aspect but I needed some additional work for the musculoskeletal and nerves in the area. This was especially true of the stiffness in my traps, that he recognized almost immediately. He worked all of the muscles and nerves in my upper back and it immediately helped with stress and lack of mobility in the area. He recorded stretches and strength training lifts on my phone so I could continue my recovery at home. I was sore the next day, but I could already feel major relief from the work we completed during our session. Two days after, the soreness from the session was gone, but I had a lot more mobility and almost no pain from the injury. If you are on the fence or in need of a massage therapist for any reason, I would not hesitate and just schedule a session. I will be back to continue my recovery and look forward to the next session.

he is so intuitive and intentional with his therapies.  He is positive and has amazing healing energy. I have a broken femur with rod and screws going on 5 months and only started working with him in the last 6 weeks (from a referral from my PT) and my improvements have been noticeable and consistent.  68 yr old competitive tennis player before the accident, have no doubt he will get me there again- working together..
I would give 10 stars if I could! Josh is extremely knowledgeable and cares about his clients. he has helped me recover, move better and get stronger after several injuries.
Josh is the best!! I went from having achilles pain for months to him relieving it in one session and being pain free for my competition. He can definitely help with any ache or pain.

Athletic Recovery Services has done so much for me and has helped me a ton throughout my athletic career. I have overcome many injuries and obstacles with the help of this company and I‚Äôm thankful for Josh and his knowledge as well as what he has in his profession.

We‚Äôve been going to Atlantic East Animal Clinic for a while and have always been very satisfied. Even in urgent situations, they‚Äôve taken our dog in immediately and helped right away.

Their support is excellent. A few times we needed paperwork or certificates, and they prepared them quickly. They even gave us ointment for our cat free of charge and exchanged a product we had mistakenly bought in the wrong dosage.

The people here are incredibly kind and patient with animals. They offer treats, talk to the pets, calm them down, and show genuine care. They remember names and personalities, and always speak with warmth and kindness.

Highly recommend this clinic ‚Äî we always feel supported here, and our pets are treated with love and respect.

I have thw highest level of gratitude for the entire staff!  From my intial phone inquiry, scheduling (Next Day), thru my entire visit which, for me is very difficult.
My worries and concerns were all addressed not only in a professional mannor, but in a very custom approach that made my visit so much easier.

The Tech, and Vet were the best I could have asked for.   I have visited a few different Vet clinics in Jax, and i do not plan to change again.
Everything was discussed prior and the cost was not a pressure.
The consideration for my finiacial sitution was not something, i left feeling comfortable that everything I needed to have do was done.
The staff, did not pressure me into purchases or extras.

Thank you to Atlantic East Animal Clinic.
Rob & Itty Bitty

The doctor spent a lot of time answering all of my questions and she was very knowledgeable very patient and well informed. The staff was friendly and helpful. And the prices are ridiculously affordable. The amount of money I spent was half of what all the other doctors are charging.

So sad we‚Äôre leaving because their service is beyond my expectations.

We got our puppy this year and chose animal east as our vet clinic. They‚Äôve been nothing but helpful whenever I have a question (we‚Äôre first time pet owners so had a lot of questions) They‚Äôve always been available when every I needed a same day appointment and they always call back for results. Lastly, the staff are superb, they‚Äôre super friendly and informative.

Hopefully we find the same quality of service in our new home.

Thank you Atlantic East Animal Clinic for taking care of Bruce.

Growimg up in AB I've been taking my pets to Atlantic East Animal Clinic since I can remember having pets. Now I travel from Regency to have my fur family cared for.

Thank you AEAC!

I was recently diagnosed with Cervical Radiculopathy (neck pain) and my orthopedic spine specialist recommended physical therapy. I started therapy at Atlantic Physical Therapy. From the moment i walked in, and Dan did the evaluation, I felt that I was in good hands. I'm very satisfied with my therapy sessions. Dan and the staff are very friendly and professional. My neck pain is almost gone. I highly recommend Atlantic Physical Therapy.

I have know and trusted Dan for over a decade. His knowledge is exceptional and his honest expertise always fixes what I needed him for.  Kayla & Michelle are equally as dedicated and supportive of each person. The whole operation has contributed to healing my post-surgery needs.
Excellent staff and treatment by Doctor Dan, Karla, and Michelle.  I got great results in just a few sessions.
Very caring and kind , amazing work !! They saved my nipples after having a breast procedure.

I am generally a skeptic when it comes to this type of therapy, boy was I proven wrong !! The staff is great, Michelle and Monica.  Dr. Dan knows what he is doing, and so I give it a TEN STAR !

provider_name: Atlantic Rehabilitation Center - North Miami Beach, Florida
review_text: The best physical therapy place around. I've been to a couple different ones and smooth coming in, fast apt, accept insurance, very friendly staff. We feel very welcomed! So loving and caring.

provider_name: Atlantic Rehabilitation Center - North Miami Beach, Florida
review_text:

I am now a true believer in PT‚Ä¶especially now that my body is aging and needs strengthening and daily exercises.

provider_name: Atlantic Rehabilitation Center - North Miami Beach, Florida
review_text:
My experience at Atl√°ntico Rehabilitation Center has been truly excellent. The therapies I received significantly improved my mobility. From day one, I felt cared for, valued, and in the hands of dedicated professionals.

I am deeply grateful for all the support I received and wholeheartedly recommend Atl√°ntico Rehabilitation Center. Thank you for everything, take good care of yourselves!

review_text: This physical therapy office is amazing! The therapists here are fantastic, and the whole team ‚Äì shoutout to Amanda and Carlos ‚Äì has been incredibly supportive in helping me on my journey to recovery. Thank you both for everything you‚Äôve done to help me feel better! Thank you!

review_text:
I don't know where to start,
This was one of the few times in my life when I come across a business where every employee was kind, helpful and attentive every second I was there.

provider_name: Atlantic Rehabilitation Center - Pembroke Pines, Florida
review_text: My mom was a patient of Atlantic Rehab Center 3 years ago and we had a great experience. Unfortunately this year she came back as a patient and the experience was terrible. She did therapy with Cristian and he pushed her knee so hard and against her will.  Even though my mom continue to scream, cry and struggle he continue to push. I am aware that therapies sometimes are rough but at the end of the day they should NOT be forced. She got dizzy from the pain and ever since she has been in pain and extremely swollen. To me it is more than the pain but the fact that the customer service/care for patients was non existent. He did not take 1 sec to check in on her after, explain why he pushed so hard or even take a moment to speak to her. Monika who is the manager was also there and even though my mom directed her attention to her, she did not give her any importance on making sure her patient was well. Patient care should be a priority in a facility like this.

provider_name: Atlantic Rehabilitation Center - Pembroke Pines, Florida
review_text: I am beyond grateful to Monica, Claudia, Carlos and Laura for their help, support and camaraderie from day one until the end my left arm therapy completion. I went from not been able to move my arm to holding weights and moving it at a 100% Capacity. Very caring and motivating Team. Needless to say; the best Rehab Clinic in South Florida. Keep it your amazing job!!!

provider_name: Atlantic Rehabilitation Center - Pembroke Pines, Florida
review_text:
I cannot say enough about the Physical therapists at Atlantic Rehab Center. I had full knee replacement surgery. Read about rehab but you have to go through it to fully understand.  Monica and Wendy besides having me do exercises helped me understand the process of recovery.   Monica pushed me to the point of tears while Wendy held my hand as well as pushed me. They treat their patients like family. Always welcoming, asking how you‚Äôre feeling and truly listen. Have also been taken care of by Travis, Alex, Lisa and surely I‚Äôm forgetting someone. Today sadly is my last day but will swing by to say hi.

Update 1/8/24

Had my second knee replacement and once again taken very good care of by Monica and team at Atlantic Rehab. This time was no different. Everyone greets you and makes you feel welcomed and most important listened to your concerns and goals. Had a tougher time this go around but with Monica and the teams knowledge they got me on track. Will miss the people but not the pain I needed to go through. Thanks again!!

review_text: I've been in and out of physical therapy for decades at this point, between New York, New Jersey and Florida. Hands down ARC is the BEST I've ever had.
