It's hard to pick a single therapist to highlight, because they are all so good!

provider_name: Atlantic Rehabilitation Center - Pembroke Pines, Florida
review_text: I can only say THANK YOU!!! to Monica, and all her team at the center. They were a key part in my daughter‚Äôs rehabilitation after her knee surgery. Very professional, kind, and supportive. We recommend them fully. They were the best.  I will always be very grateful to them. üôèüèª

I can't say enough about the care and professionalism of Atlantis Urgent Care. Yesterday was the second time I have been there, and they are top-notch in every way. Registration online was easy, and the wait time was very short. Receptionists were courteous and welcoming. James, the paramedic whom I met first, was very knowledgeable and easy to talk to. My provider was Nicholle Rothengass, PA-C. From the moment she walked in, I felt at ease discussing my health concerns, and she really listened to me. She gave me great advice and a path forward, thank you! We are quite new to the area, and we are blessed to have Atlantis Urgent Care so close by!

As a medical professional, I hold high standards when it comes to patient care‚Äîand I can confidently say that the team at Atlantis Urgent Care exceeded them.

I brought my 10-year-old daughter in for strep throat, and from the moment we walked in, we were met with kindness and professionalism. The woman at the front desk was warm and welcoming, which set the tone for the entire visit.

The paramedic was kind, gentle and reassuring to my daughter and PA Nicholle was absolutely outstanding. She was thorough, compassionate, and incredibly skilled at making my daughter feel at ease while clearly explaining everything to both of us.

I'm deeply grateful for the exemplary care we received and would not hesitate to recommend this urgent care to anyone.

Absolutely love this walk in! We have been going here since they opened years ago. We recommend it highly to friends & ppl from out of town also. Extremely professional, prompt and knowledgeable. Office is very clean. The staff is amazing & very caring. Today I saw Lucas & James and they were awesome. Very fortunate to have this facility in our area. They take all insurance & also self pay. Pricing is very fair. Dont hesitate to go.

I have been here countless times with many family members for various things - and they always are amazing! Never a long wait, good communication. I pay out of pocket for my daughter and could pay less or nothing at other places but I can‚Äôt imagine going anywhere else. Bloodwork done in office while you wait for results. Great communication. Thorough and caring. They are upfront and conscientious when I‚Äôm self pay. I have stories of going to regular doctors and them missing or misdiagnosing-  or going to ER and being dismissed- then we come here and get true , real , and fast answers. I can‚Äôt praise them enough. Over 15 years I‚Äôve been coming here and always satisfied. It‚Äôs sad but that is rare in healthcare.

The most caring, intelligent, perfectly clean urgent care I‚Äôve ever seen. My daughter broke her foot and they helped her immediately. I also have to send a giant hug to our nurse,  Samantha who was sent from Heaven to heal people. She has the most beautiful calming demeanor that not only helped her foot but eased my daughter‚Äôs mind. Also, have to say a huge thank you to the excellent Doctors.

provider_name: Atlas Physical Therapy & Sports Medicine - Mandarin
review_text: I came to Atlas after a total knee replacement.  I had never had this extensive of a surgery before.  Leo Calderons was my therapist for the last 12 weeks and I am walking normally and finally feel happy I had the surgery.  Leo is so knowledgeable about the extent of the surgery, what the recovery is like and what to expect.  He‚Äôs very calm cool and collected.  Several times I went in for my session with questions and worries and he always knew what was going on and how to address without the blink of an eye. I highly recommend Leo and Atlas.

provider_name: Atlas Physical Therapy & Sports Medicine - Mandarin
review_text: I wholeheartedly recommend Atlas Physical Therapy & Sports Medicine to anyone looking for measurably effective improvement in their mobility and flexibility. I had the pleasure of working with Doctor in Physical Therapy Caitlin, who impressed me from the first session with her expertise and dedication. She assessed me and developed my personalized recovery plan that combined challenging exercises with careful progression, which helped me improve my mobility and flexibility, both of which were severely damaged after I suffered a complicated leg fracture. Her positive attitude, encouragement and attentiveness to my input in the plan of care which she crafted for me, provided continuos motivation and made working out fun and uplifting. I am very grateful to Caitlin for helping me improve. I also wanted to express gratitude for the whole support team at Atlas. Everyone there was helpful and courteous.

provider_name: Atlas Physical Therapy & Sports Medicine - Mandarin
review_text: I just completed a 12 week physical therapy regiment at Atlas Physical Therapy in Mandarin. Leo and Caitlin were my therapist. They both were very professional, knowledgeable and pleasant in their demeanor. I am much stronger and achieved outstanding results due to their guidance. All the staff contributed to a very helpful and caring atmosphere. I highly recommend Atlas Physical Therapy for all your therapy needs!

provider_name: Atlas Physical Therapy & Sports Medicine - Mandarin
review_text: I recently had my right hip replaced and was referred to Dr John Methvan for Physical Therapy. I choose to go to Atlas in Mandarin as it was close to my house, but I was very fortunate to have Dr John as my PT.  As this was my first time going to PT, I can't compare Atlas and Dr John to other PTs, but I have been extremely pleased with John's professionalism as well as the others at the clinic.  Not only has my hip has improved dramatically, but the entire staff at Atlas Mandarin are top notch individuals who truly care for you as a patient.  If I ever need more PT, this will be my first choice of clinics.

provider_name: Atlas Physical Therapy & Sports Medicine - Mandarin
review_text: TKR recovery is not easy! Having a therapist who is knowledgeable, supportive and encouraging during this time is a must. I can‚Äôt say enough about the care I got from Leo Calderon at Atlas Physical Therapy. At four months out I can now say it was all worth it. Thank you to everyone at the Mandarin clinic. Highly recommend them!

Visited Atlas for PT after hip surgery for several weeks.  Marlko‚Äôs approach, positivity, drive and consideration were simply perfect!  He knew when to push, & when to break, to accelerate my healing!! What I was told would be a somewhat lengthier recuperation, was surprisingly much shorter‚Ä¶. Within a few weeks, I was able to board a cruise with a simple cane, rather than a walker! Definitely a Gem in Cooper City!

The establishment is super clean. Marko is excellent and takes the time to listen to your concerns. He is always trying to find what is the best treatment for your condition. I was nervous to go since it was my first physical therapy 'experience' but he rapidly put my mind at ease. Highly recommend this place!

I found a diamond in the ruff. Been to at least 20 physical therapist in the last 30 years. Marco is the best of the best. Patient, caring, mindful, extremely thorough, takes meticulous notes, and does not try to sell you anything. He genuinely cares about your well being and you will notice right away.

Further, his establishment is super clean and you can tell he takes pride in that. Something other locations just do not do. I don‚Äôt make many recommendations, but when I find stellar service it is important to support them. Marco gets my full support. So much so, my wife and daughter go to him as well. He is especially excellent with kids in sports programs with injuries. I would highly recommend if your child is injured to see Marco. It speeds the healing and gets you on the right path to recovery! If you live anywhere near Cooper City, this is the place for PT.

Marco is an excellent physical therapist. He is knowledgeable, attentive, kind and patient. As a fellow health care provider, I couldn‚Äôt ask for a more well rounded health care professional.  I already feel better after my first session!

We are incredibly grateful for the care my father received from Dr. Cvetkovic. He had been struggling with persistent leg pain that impacted his mobility and overall quality of life. From the very first session, Dr. Cvetkovic showed a deep understanding of his condition, taking the time to listen, assess thoroughly, and tailor a therapy plan that was both effective and manageable.
Not only did my father experience significant relief in a relatively short period of time, but he also felt truly supported and encouraged throughout the process. After 4 spinal injections that offered no relief whatsoever and another invasive procedure scheduled, I ran into a patient of Marrow's who felt that he might be able to help me also.  I immediately scheduled an appointment, which turned out to be a life changing decision. The stabbing back and hip pain that I was experiencing was preventing me from sleeping, walking, playing tennis and working out.
Life was pretty miserable and none of the Orthopedic Specialists who had treated me could offer any other recommendations, short of surgery. This sounds dramatic, but my treatments at Australian Physiotherapy were nothing short of a miracle.  After only 3 appointments with Marrow, I was completely out of pain and shortly back to my normal physical routines.  What a difference this has made in my life!!  Marrow gets 5 stars from me, but there there should be a higher rating system.

Marrow is a magician when it comes to physio therapy. He is truly skilled, educated and passionate to help people improve (even at the risk of low return customer base..lol). I was fortunate to be referred to him many years ago for pain management. He not only helped with pain management, but taught me preventative techniques. I never encountered anyone who truly helped address preventative self care as Marrow has done. It still takes work, but he was definitely the right person to help guide the journey effectively. I am glad I don't need his service often, but I owe him many years without pain and a semi normal life. Thank you.

I came to Marrow Burnette and this practice with terrible sciatic nerve pain due to a herniated disc.  Any movement, even shifting while lying down was painful.  My entire life was impacted.  I'd been to physical therapists before and Marrow's practices are completely different.  Now, after working with Marrow for less than two months, I am pain-free.  He changed my entire outlook on lower back health.  I'm finished with my official physical therapy with Marrow but I continue to do the exercises that he provided and practice his methods religiously on a daily basis.  When you find something that works, you stick with it.

review_text: The Monarch teams.¬†Yanet, Reina, Pricilla, Talia, and Nicole have truly been lifesavers! provider_name: Autism ABA Monarch Behavior Analysis LLC - Autism Therapy
review_text:
Before Monarch my whole family was lost on what to do and how to adjust to our new life style when we got the ASD diagnosis for our son. His first half of kindergarten consisted of calls from the school everyday of him lashing out to avoid doing work, which caused him to have 2 suspensions....go figure a kindergartner (5 years old) getting suspended from school. The best decision I made was calling Monarch, who‚Äôs team wrapped us in their cocoon to help us develop, learn, and adapt. Personally, I was taught I wasn‚Äôt alone in all of this; and I wasn‚Äôt! With support at school meetings, together we were able to advocate for my son to attend the right school for him so he can be provided with the support and atmosphere he needed. Fast forward 2 years, with the most amazing, patient therapists, in the most amazing settings, and our son is thriving! They push and encourage him and the end result is always him accomplishing something he didn‚Äôt think he could. He has become more independent and self sufficient with his routines; I find I don‚Äôt even have to remind him what needs to be done. We are now looking at general education in his soon to be future, because he‚Äôs been doing so well in school!
This little boy, who would always cause such a commotion in public that I would get the piercing glares, has now become the role model of how to behave. My husband and I get compliments from friends and family about how far he has come and it makes us feel proud in our choice with Monarch.
Thank you Monarch for everything you have given my family!

I am sharing this review to help other families make informed decisions. Please be cautious with Dr. Greaux. He is not a licensed medical doctor, yet he presents himself in a way that can be very misleading. He has claimed to have trained a well-known spine surgeon at a major hospital in Miami and uses that statement to gain families‚Äô trust. Unfortunately, we have seen patients who, after being treated by him, ended up needing larger corrective surgeries because he gave them false hope and measured radiographs incorrectly.

His approach often leads families to spend thousands of dollars on treatments that are not effective and not based on accurate medical practice. Families deserve honesty and transparency when it comes to scoliosis care. Please do your research thoroughly before making decisions for your child.

I‚Äôve been seeing doctor Greaux for a while now, and I can honestly say it‚Äôs made a huge difference in my health and overall well-being. It‚Äôs rare to find a place where you feel genuinely cared for‚Äînot just as a patient, but as a person. provider_name: B & V Thera-Pro Associates Corporation - South Kendall
review_text: My experience with B&V is deeply personal and incredibly positive! I first joined as a contractor-therapist, working in-clinic, and saw firsthand the unwavering dedication, support, and genuine care that the therapists provide. Because of this trust, I enrolled my own son at B&V, and he has been receiving ST/OT for years with amazing results! I recommend this center to any Florida parents looking for a therapy center that supports their child‚Äôs learning. The owners, Bernardo Del Riesgo and his wife, are passionate leaders in the community, ensuring a fantastic system in place for continuity of care and excellence. And let‚Äôs not forget Annie in scheduling‚Äîshe truly is the backbone of it all!

Mrs. Brenda is an exceptional speech therapist! My 7-year-old son absolutely loves his sessions with her. She creates a warm, engaging environment that makes learning fun. His progress has been remarkable, and he looks forward to each appointment. I highly recommend Mrs. Brenda to anyone seeking speech therapy for their child!

Best physical therapy place ever, and I mean it. From the day one I walked in and Andrea greet me with smile and care, through all 12 sessions of treatment I felt cared for, and that is super rare now a days. I appreciate prompt schedule and great communication, I had never waited more than 5 min for my session also it‚Äôs great to work with actual doctors each time you come. I had significant improvement from 43 to 83 score throughout the treatment and I feel so much better. Thank you so much Dr. Ryan, Dr. Adam, lovely Andrea and the whole team, you truly make a difference in people‚Äôs everyday life quality, you certainly did for me. So best wishes for you and big thank you from the bottom of my heart. üíû

I came to B3 Physical Therapy for frozen shoulder. The team at B3 exceeded all my expectations.

Dr. Ryan, my physical therapist, is exceptional. He‚Äôs incredibly knowledgeable and patient. He listens, explains everything clearly, and pushes you just the right amount so you keep improving without overdoing it. In just eight weeks, I went from experiencing significant pain and barely being able to lift my arm to having almost 100% range of motion, and I still have a couple of sessions left. Each visit leaves me feeling stronger, more confident, and genuinely cared for.

The entire staff is professional, kind, and genuinely invested in your recovery. The facility is always clean and welcoming, and Aniya at the front desk is so friendly and helpful with scheduling.

I‚Äôm beyond grateful for the progress I‚Äôve made and for the positive, supportive atmosphere in this office. I highly recommend B3 Physical Therapy!

I highly recommend B3 Physical Therapy. Dr. Ryan and his colleagues were excellent in treating my pain. He clearly explained the steps and I always felt comfortable telling him about my pain.

He always made an effort to find out the cause of the pain, which could be related to mobility and stability issues I still have.

I feel much stronger after 8 weeks of treatment. Also, I was given the appropriate exercises to continue at home.

B3 physical therapy is  a comfortable place to receive a professional evaluation, and physical therapy treatment plan from trained doctors. The one on one approach and attention to the detail is extremely valuable.I worked with Dr. Adam Goltra, his experience and knowledge helped me  to achieve a lot of goals, including pain relief in my back. I highly Recommend all the doctors that work hard to help people!

Dear Dr.Matt,  I writing to sincerely thank you for exceptional care and support you provided during my physical therapy treatment. Your professionalism,patience and knowledge made a significant difference in my recovery. Yes, I made noticeable progress and all thank to you. I am grateful for the tools you have given me to continue improving on my own. Please extend my appreciation to your team as well.  I have been under care  of PT many, many times before, however your service is the BEST. I recommend you to anyone in need of physical therapy .

The stuff are friendly and Tom Larson is probably the best MPT out on the field. I thought I needed surgery twice once for pain in my knees and pain in my elbows. After a few sessions with Tom I was back doing normal activities with my knees. We ithin a week I had ko more pain in my elbows. I would recommend Tom to anyone withi joint pain. Let him take a look at you before you doing surgeries.

My son is three years old and has been in ABA therapy for only six months. This place has changed his life ... and the lives of everyone who loves him. The science of behavior analysis, paired with caring, loving, brilliant ABA professionals (BCBAs and RBTs), has brought him from nonverbal and unable to communicate to a babbling machine and able to use American Sign Language (ASL) for his basic wants and needs. Before ABA therapy, he was super frustrated not being able to speak/communicate and now he is back to my happy little boy, who joyfully signs his wants/needs. Never once has his team tried to ‚Äúchange who he is,‚Äù nor have they tried to force eye contact or stop stimming behaviors. They meet him where he is every single day and work to make his life better.  I am so grateful to all of the staff at BASS! We are looking forward to continuing our son's care here. We are super excited that they are offering Speech Therapy Services at this location as well. My son started about a week ago and he is making more and more verbalization, my little babbling machine. We are looking forward to the future.
Thank you BASS staff!

I remember coming here when I was a kid and this was very life changing for me! I made some autistic friends and also friends with the workers there! I don't remember their names but I know one is like a tall lady with black long hair. This brings back so many memories.

I highly recommend to anyone who needs physical therapy. Be Med PT
have excellent physical therapist very knowledgeable with years of experience in their field, they also have the best and most equipment to provide the most effective and efficient therapy to the patient‚Äôs according to the need. The place is always impeccable, the staff is loving and caring they make you feel like home, the environment here is very familiar and enjoyable, I can‚Äôt thank enough my therapist Jorge Fuentes, which has helped me to recover from my broken hand , the best therapist anyone can have , I also want to highly recommend Adrian Fuentes another physical therapist here at this location they make an incredible team of experts on everything that has to do with physical therapy.  The front desk Camille, Amanda , and Rose the technician who are always so caring with all the patients. Thank you ! You all make an amazing team ! And the most important brings joy to anyone who comes here . Congratulations

Ana Mays

Best place to be! Staff is super friendly and extremely helpful. I went in after my ankle surgery and they were able to get me back on my feet in no time. DJ and Adrain are they best therapist anyone can ask for. They helped me with my recovery and answered all my question. Camille was able to accommodate my schedule and was even able to help me with my insurance questions. Marian also helped me with my exercises and stretches. Overall, best place to go after ANY injury.

They have a very attentive and caring staff. Their service philosophy is second to none and they always go the extra mile to make you feel at home. The therapists George and Micky are super knowledgeable  and always looking for ways to help you in your rehab.

This is a great clinic.

My mom had a total knee replacement done in July. She began her physical therapy in another location which was not as professional as it should be. After she finished a round of therapies at the location, she was recommended to Be Med PT by a friend. On her first visit, she was happier than she had ever been in the other location. The staff at Be Med PT is extremely caring and attentive, the location is spacious and looks very clean and modern. The actual therapists are very instructed and focused on obtaining maximum success in your problem area. In just two visits, the therapist had cleared the knots that my mother had on her knee with massages, something that the other clinic had not been able to do after twelve visits. My mom is extremely happy that she made the change and I would recommend this physical therapy clinic to anyone looking for one.

The best physical therapists I‚Äôve been to. Jose and Henry are great and I actually feel like I‚Äôm getting better with them.

The staff are all great too. Everyone is honest, patient, and informative.

My daughter comes here for speech therapy and the therapists are great! However, the older lady at the front desk with reddish thin hair is extremely rude and unfriendly. Lacks proper customer service for the parents in my opinion. She was extremely rude to me today when I was inquiring about a reschedule from last week for occupational therapy. When bringing your child somewhere for assistance the customer service should be just as helpful and not rude.

Believe and achieve it.
Is the best decision I have made for my son.
Is going to be 4 year since my son started to come to Believe It and Achieve It.
Since day one we have been treated with respect, from all the therapist and staff. They are very professional and amazing.

All therapist take time to understand my child  unique needs and developed a tailored therapy plan that has led to significant improvements in our child, behavior, communication, and social skills.

The therapists are well-trained and consistently demonstrate their commitment to our son progress.

My son has been taking
- Speech Therapy
- Occupational Therapy
- Physical Therapy
- Feeding Therapy
- ABA Therapist
Our experience has been excellent and life-changing for our family.
We couldn't be happier with the progress and the services provided by all therapist and staff.

Thank you so much for understand and care for my son as well the support they have been giving me.

My daughter has been coming since March of 2023. I feel this office was an answer to our prayers. The front office staff Vanessa, Tiffani and Esta do an amazing job. Our new therapist Victoria  has made a such a difference in our lives. It was a smooth transition going from Emily to Victoria. the entire staff makes you feel like you're part of the family. Thank you so much from all of us .

My son has been attending therapy (both speech and occupational) at Believe It and Achieve It for about 4 years now. The entire staff is like family to us; they are all so supportive, and everyone goes above and beyond to help us. We've had the same OT since we started, and have been with the same 2 speech therapists for almost 3 years now as well. The consistency with the staff, and low staff turn over, has been really wonderful, as my son thrives on consistency. When we decided to pursue getting a speech device for my son, the therapists researched, and spent a lot of time learning the device so that they could better work with him. They know what works for him, and they go out of their ways to accommodate his needs. I absolutely recommend this company to anyone looking for therapy for their child.

My boys love coming here. One of my boys has OT with Mr. Patrick and Ms Cayle and Speech therapy with Ms Sara. He loves them and Angie as well who does the yearly evaluations with them. My other son only does speech and he also sees Ms Sara, he loves her and Ms Angie as well. They are not just professional but also personable. They are very helpful with any questions and concerns I may have. You can tell they take their patients VERY serious. The front staff is absolutely AWESOME! They are efficient, friendly, caring, and yet professional. These qualities are hard to balance for many in a professional environment but not for these ladies. As long as they stay this way, I don‚Äôt ever plan on leaving this office. They are stuck with us!

provider_name: BFITT Athletic Training & Fitness Institute, Inc.
review_text: At Florida State Men‚Äôs Club soccer tournament I received an injury and was taken care of by a very nice lady for B Fitt. The whole time I felt very confident in her ability and rehab strategies. I could not recommend hiring B Fitt at for any training needs in the future.

provider_name: BFITT Athletic Training & Fitness Institute, Inc.
review_text:
I thought I had a shoulder impingement, but Brit told me it was my anterior deltoid that had been bothering me. After one 20 minute session with her my shoulder felt brand new. She is absolutely electric athletic trainer!

Been getting treatment with Brit now for about two months. Every training session is awesome. I instantly feel better after each session which allows me to recover faster as well. She has taught me many things from arm therapy to stretches and massages that I can do by myself.

provider_name: BFITT Athletic Training & Fitness Institute, Inc.
review_text: I‚Äôve had some bad back problems for months now and I was having pain in my chest through my back. she broke it down for me and let me know it was a ‚Äúreferred pain‚Äù and she worked me out for about 20 minutes and my pain went away. Britt also left me with workouts I could do on my own and I will most definitely be implanting them into my daily routine.

provider_name: BFITT Athletic Training & Fitness Institute, Inc.
review_text:
This last weekend I was attending my daughter‚Äôs volleyball tournament in Orlando. I was not feeling right and was worried I might pass out in front of my daughter and her team. So I headed to the medical tent where the trainers attend to the players.
I explained to the trainer Dewayne my situation and he said to come sit down. He began to ask me questions then decided to take my blood pressure. It was very high.  He checked again and had another trainer checked.  High again. Dewayne and the trainers quickly decided to call in the EMTs.  When they arrived they took my blood pressure which was still very high.
The decision was made to take me to the hospital where my blood pressure read 200/122. Dangerously high. I was admitted and spent a couple days in the hospital before being released home under the care of my doctor.
Dewayne and the trainers made quick decisions that most likely saved me from having a stroke or worse.
These trainers aren‚Äôt just taping ankles and icing knees. They are trained to assess and make decisions that can save lives.
I am very grateful that Dewayne and his team were there that day.

provider_name: BFITT Athletic Training & Fitness Institute, Inc.
review_text: Great costumer service, Brittany came to our house and did such a great job releasing my muscles, she used a tool that i never tried before and I loved it, she also did acupuncture or needle therapy (I‚Äôm not sure how she calls it), I‚Äôm very pleased with her services!

Bonanza Equestrian Center is a hidden gem and by far one of the best investments I‚Äôve made for my 3-year-old daughter. The installations are amazing‚Äîsafe, clean, and ideal for kids. The horses are incredible‚Äîgentle, well-trained, and perfect for young riders.

From the very first class, my daughter‚Äôs smile and excitement were absolutely priceless. Watching her ride every Sunday is a highlight of our week. The classes are very reasonably priced, actually cheap considering all the added benefits like bilingual interaction, sensory stimulation, beautiful playgrounds, and even a petting farm.

Paulina, her instructor, is a true gem, kind, caring, and incredibly intuitive with children. She gives our daughter personalized attention and treats her with so much empathy and patience that she‚Äôs completely won her heart.

Jaime, the manager or owner, is extremely knowledgeable and professional. You can tell he genuinely cares about the experience of every client and goes above and beyond to ensure satisfaction.

I highly recommend Bonanza to any parent with energetic, curious kids looking to nurture confidence and emotional intelligence. This is one of those rare monthly expenses that doesn‚Äôt hurt, it actually feels good to pay because of the incredible value it brings. If I could give 6 stars, I would!

Bonanza Equestrian has become a very special place of healing for our family. Our son started riding near to two months ago and has been making such wonderful progress. We keep him busy and by far this is his favorite place to go to. Never a ‚Äúno‚Äù or complaint- rain or shine. I love getting to see him interact with the Jaime his coach and relax as he rides or bathe the horses. Nothing lifts the spirit of a parent like seeing their child, taller than they ever imagined!!! ü•∞üôèüèªüíï @jaimedelatorredr  @bonanzaequestriancenter

We have been attending Bonanza over a year and our experience has been amazing, we love it and our son does too. He has been training with Jer√≥nimo and we are beyond happy to see him thrive.
Words can not be put into this review to explain how much we enjoy this place and their staff, specially Santiago and Jeronimo , always so kind and patient with our son. We can see how much they love what they do.
Our horse is also here and they are beyond helpful and hands on with him. It feels like family coming to BONANZA. I fully recommend their classes and events.

My sons have been taking lessons at this facility for many months and we have really enjoyed the experience. They are learning so much and having a lot of fun along the way.
The horses always appear cared for, healthy and happy. The instructors are dedicated, knowledgeable and friendly. Scheduling has been very easy and they have always been super accommodating. Really great place for kids (and parents!) to get way from the hustle and bustle of the city and enjoy the outdoors.

We found Bonanza searching for a place for our 2 year old to ride a horse for fun. He was very shy and nervous at first, but his interaction with Jaime really allowed for him to open up fast and he quickly gained the confidence to take his first ride.

Our son was having communication challenges and  had been in speech therapy for some time. We had no clue about the benefits of equestrian therapy, but Jaime picked up on this and  explained to us how the center could help him grow.

He began taking weekly lessons and we have seen some amazing changes with our son‚Äôs focus and communication. He looks forward to it every week and tells everyone about his horses. Jaime and his team have really taken us in like family and supported his journey every step of the way. We have even been able to incorporate his speech therapy with his lessons. The level of care Jaime takes with our son and the goals he sets for him every week, truly speak to his dedication and passion for helping others through equestrian therapy. You can find them at on Instagram @bonanzaequestriancenter and @jaimedelatorredr

Bosh PT is exceptional for the expertise of the therapists, who are uniformly professional, compassionate and personable.  The office is unique in that it has Dr. Boris Shapiro in attendance to provide initial assessments of client issues; he has a doctorate in physical therapy and, therefore, is uniquely qualified to provide guidance and input both to the clients and the therapists. I have been in physical therapy three times a week since the end of September, first in Delaware for five months and at Bosh PT since the beginning of March.  Finally, I am achieving some relief since I started therapy at Bosh PT.  Bosh PT gets my highest recommendation.

Bosh Physical Therapy is by far the best in Miami Beach. Everyone there is super nice and they really know what they are doing. Unlike other physical therapists I have been to, you can expect a full 50min session. You leave feeling better and are equipped with specialized exercises to help the healing process in between appointments. I highly recommend Bosh Physical Therapy.

Bosch is a unique, caring, insightful, professional physical therapy organization. Everyone of the therapist are knowledgeable.
I feel lucky to have discovered this wonderful resource.
Neil (patient for five years)

Horrible place. Worse experience I ever had. I had hip surgery and went to BOSH for rehab after some time trying to get over the severe pain. The moment I stepped into that rehab room, Boris Shapiro, was all over me with insults. "I can't believe how much pain you're in". "I don't know what to do with you". "why did you want for so long". "Why don't you go home for 2 months and let your leg fall off". etc etc. He was outrageous. Rude. Unsympathetic. And he kept asking me personal questions about how I made my money. I felt very uncomfortable, under attack and couldn't wait to get out of there.

And although he claimed that the pain I was experiencing was unusual and he recommended I call my doctor, he performed rehab on me while I was in great pain. A good rehab person would have refused to perform rehab and instruct the person to go see their doctor to make sure all was medically good before rehab. And they would not be insulting their client.

Little did Boris Shapiro know that the CUP to my hip implant had fallen out of the socket and was moving around in my hip causing me the great pain. THUS, his belief that my late start of rehab was the cause of my pain was wrong. And his many insults unwarranted. He was unprofessional and a person I would never go back to.

I am now required to have a 2nd surgery to put more screws into the CUP so it doesn't fall out of the socket again. See attached image.

I wish I could give ZERO stars this outfit. The management and office personnel of this office is inept and lack courtesy and drive to assist potential patients. I was declined service because the office will not accept Cigna International coverage even though the practice is indicated as Cigna PPO participant. I was told by the manager that Cigna International PPO takes too long to disburse the payment for the services. If this indicative of the actual PT services one would receive I would discourage potential patience to use Bosh PT and look elsewhere.
There are many PT service providers in the area.

Better tomorrow has been an amazing and God sent. The personnel are professionals and the majority of them understand me and my issues because they have been through the same struggles I was homeless hungry and broken and they open their doors to me made me feel welcome and safe it has only been 16 days and I've already gained 25 lb my wardrobe has grown people in this program that want to get sober have reached out and  offered the shoes off their feet my therapist has made me actually think and found away from me to work through my issues finding some I didn't even know I had things that were holding me back my case manager is the most loving caring person I've met since my grandmother passed away 20 years ago her passion and drive the energy she shows everyday is such an inspiration I can't say enough good things about this program and it's personnel because it's basically saved my life my baby mother's life and possibly the 4-year-old that I may possibly become an actual difference in his life instead of a disappointment

My time Better Tomorrow treatment center was truly life-changing, and it all comes down to the incredible staff. From the moment I arrived, I was met with genuine warmth and compassion. They didn't just see me as another patient; they saw a person who needed help, and they treated me with dignity and respect every step of the way.
The staff's dedication and expertise are unmatched. The therapists are not only highly skilled but also incredibly empathetic. They created a safe and non-judgmental space for me to work through my struggles, and their guidance was instrumental in my recovery. The nurses and support staff were equally amazing‚Äîalways available to lend an ear, offer encouragement, or simply provide a comforting presence during difficult moments.
What truly sets this center apart is the staff's unwavering commitment to their patients' well-being. They went above and beyond to ensure I felt supported and cared for, and their positive attitudes were contagious. I am so grateful for their guidance and the tools they've given me to build a healthier, happier life. I highly recommend this center to anyone seeking a place where they will be treated with kindness, professionalism, and genuine care.
The case manager Amanda was truly a gift from above and I would like to express the gratitude I have for having her step into my life. There aren‚Äôt many people on this earth so caring and compassionate for others, she is truly heaven sent.

When I came to Better Tomorrow, I was at one of the lowest points in my life and didn‚Äôt know if recovery was possible. From the very beginning, the staff treated me with compassion, respect, and understanding. The facility itself is clean, safe, and welcoming, which made it easier to focus on my recovery.

Better Tomorrow didn‚Äôt just help me get sober ‚Äî they helped me rebuild my life and believe in myself again. I‚Äôm walking away with tools, hope, and a fresh start that I never thought was possible. I‚Äôll always be grateful for this place and the people in it.

My name is Marco and A Better tomorrow changed my life. I was a shell of a person when I first arrived, RJ‚Äôs therapy changed me. I‚Äôm more confident in myself, my self esteem is way better than when I first arrived, I‚Äôm back in my feet again. Gabi is an amazing case manager, and I really appreciate the care that Taylor and Brandon put into the program as well

Better Tomorrow treatment center and their staff are the reason I am still clean today. When I arrived I was defiant, depressed, and I didn‚Äôt have much will to live honestly. I struggled with severe trauma and with the help of an incredible therapist we started EMDR, increased sessions, and stabilized my medications. Better Tomorrow individualizes your treatment program because no addict is the same and no one‚Äôs recovery journey is the same either. Every staff member is involved in your journey, every step of the way! The owner, the director, the clinical director, therapist, BHT‚Äôs, everyone‚Äôs input is important! I trust and value the people the people here still and always will! I consider them family! I hope you will too!

Mr. Jack Frost was born with a oddly developed ear canal, causing complications and infections regularly. After 3 different doctors and multiple medications... Dr. Kerr helped our lil sweet boy! Jack had a full TECA done and is recovering perfectly üíô A huge shout out to Burnt Store Animal Hospital for loving Jack (almost) as much as we do!!! ü§çüêª‚Äç‚ùÑ

As always, we received exceptional care from your amazing staff. Tori has always been one of Henry‚Äôs favorites and now Amanda has been added to Team Henry.. Tori is always very thorough, but gentle in his care and Amanda is a great emotional support for him by giving him lots of love.
Tyler was also great with drumming this very dramatic hounds nails.
We Your entire team and all you do for our fur babies!

I went to this vet today to check on my dog‚Äôs ears and bladder. The Veterinary Nurse, Robert, did an exceptional job in making my dog feel comfortable, as she is on guard in environments she isn‚Äôt familiar with.

Dr. Chung also did exceptionally well at explaining her interpretation of the x-ray, as well as providing additional information - all while giving a solid recommendation moving forward.

This vet clinic is very personable, and good at what they do. I would absolutely recommend going here for any veterinary needs.

We are moving to Burnt Stores in a month from Knoxville TN! We are so happy that there is a vet close by to our new home. Look forward in meeting you guys! We have two beautiful cats names Mishka and Bagheera .

I have hesitated to post this because I do not take pleasure in criticizing a business, but my experience with this vet was deeply disappointing, and I feel others should be aware. My cat‚Äôs condition was misdiagnosed, and no additional tests were suggested when the initial treatment failed.
After three weeks of frequent visits and costly treatments, my cat had to be euthanized after 3 days at the ER. During this difficult time, NO ONE from BSAH bothered to reach out to show support or concern during his stay at the ER, or after. My heart is broken. How could a vet be so heartless? Pets are family, and for many of us, our children. Clearly, they seem primarily focused on money, overlooking the importance of empathy.
I have since met others who have had similar experiences. While some may have had positive experiences here, I was personally shocked by the lack of compassion and follow-up. I expect BSAH will respond defensively, but I strongly suggest they ignore me just as they did before and after my cat passed.   I have no desire to hear from them now and will never recommend this practice to anyone.

Ana is an angel. She treated my shoulder contusion and helped me improve my range of motion and strength. She is a shoulder whisperer. The facility is clean and employed with talented therapists and friendly front desk.

Ann wa excellent. I had to do 12 PT sessions prior to UHC approving my MRI. The exercises are a useful tool for helping with the pain, without aggravating my back. I've since had the MRI and have 2 herniated discs in my lower back.

struggled with a bad flare up which cased me extreme back pain.  The physical therapist was straight to the point and direct and the PTA Amanda was super attentive and detailed in creating a program which helped me learn how to better engage and prime my muscles. I recommend this place 10/10
Wonderful service and good therapy for my healing . Thank you for Amanda , Nava and Michell . Thank you so much !

I am very glad that I went to Back In Action for therapy. Amanda was very knowlegable and developed a plan of action for my therapy at their location and for my home. She was kind, patient and a good listener.  My progress was steady and after a few weeks I was able to continue at home with confidence that I will very shortly resume my active lifestyle.

I had a fantastic experience with the chiropractic care I received. From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was calm, professional, and welcoming. The chiropractor took the time to thoroughly assess my concerns and explained the treatment process in a way that was easy to understand.
Josh and Kelly were very patient and helpful in every way possible. I totally wish I had more time with them. Coming in made me feel like I was visiting family. I extremely appreciate the opportunity to have met and been apart of meeting. My relocation is the reason why I won‚Äôt be able to see them. üò¢ü´∂üèΩ

I truly appreciate the holistic approach they take to wellness and would highly recommend.

I seen Dr. Kelly Kane for chiropractic care while in my second trimester, pregnant with twins! It was the best decision I could have made, I felt immediate relief and over the course of the following days noticed a greater range of motion, along with less tightness and discomfort! She was also so profesional and friendly and made me feel very comfortable. I'm looking forward to continuing my care with her!

My mom and I started going to back in action after being in a car accident that left us with neck and back injuries. Dr. Kelly Kane and Joshua have been amazing with their Chiro and PT care. Rachel, the case manager is very informative and communicates great. The front office are very nice and helpful.
Thank you all

This place isgreat.  It has everything you need!! Lora Nelson and her assistant are just the best,  they are thorough and caring.  The front desk ladies are very knowledgeable, and the front waiting are is very clean and very well kept!!  I am also seeing Chiropractor Dr. Philip Toft and he is just amazing, he uses different techniques that work!!!!

Let me start by saying‚Ä¶ I am super impressed with the office at back in action. The staff were incredibly helpful getting me through my treatment.. Dr Kelly is the best.. always does a great job of keeping me well adjusted and always keeps the jokes cracking!

provider_name: Back In Motion Performance & Physical Therapy - Cape Coral
review_text:
I was seen by Dr. Sharon Sims for right SI joint dysfunction and right trochanter bursitis beginning the second week of July, 2025.
I was having difficulty walking and sitting for any length of time.
At my first visit, Dr. Sharon discovered that my legs were not equal lengths and recommended a shoe lift.  As soon as I began using the lift, the deep ache in my right hip significantly subsided.
Dr. Sharon also prescribed a variety of stretching, balancing and strength training exercises. The exercises were painful at first, but I diligently did them nearly every day.  The end result is, I am walking comfortably, sitting comfortably and can kayak for a longer time than before PT. Also, my balance has improved, as well as my flexibility and core strength.
I cannot recommend Dr.Sharon Sims enough!  She has great depth of understanding and experience with physical therapy!
Their office is immaculate, and Anna the receptionist is also very nice.

provider_name: Back In Motion Performance & Physical Therapy - Cape Coral
review_text: I recently completed a clinical rotation here as a PT student. I can truly say that you will receive excellent one-on-one care from some very skilled and experienced Doctors of Physical Therapy at this clinic. If you are looking for personal and excellent care then you should look in to getting your PT here. Whether you are dealing with an orthopedic condition, neurological condition, or even pelvic health concerns, this place would be a great fit for you! Dr. Anthony is highly skilled and trained to treat a variety of conditions, I recommend reaching out for any of your PT needs.

provider_name: Back In Motion Performance & Physical Therapy - Cape Coral
review_text: Anyone considering injections to relieve back, knee or arm pain should definitely consider looking into Back In Motion. They use stretching, massage and exercises to address the cause of the pain. I was about to do another series of injections when I was referred to Back In Motion and I gave them a try. After only a couple sessions my back pain was so much less. While I can't say my back is completely healed, the pain is almost gone and I don't feel the need for injections at all.

provider_name: Back In Motion Performance & Physical Therapy - Cape Coral
review_text: If you are ever in need of physical therapy, I enthusiastically recommend Dr Joe at Back in Motion. He has been by my side since my injury and assisted me greatly with my post surgery recovery. I'm back to full activity now and "feeling great again. Thanks Dr Joe. If you go to Back in Motion, tell him Mark sent me. üòÅüòé

provider_name: Back In Motion Performance & Physical Therapy - Cape Coral
review_text: Dr Sharon at Back in Motion in Cape Coral gave me my life and independence back. My knee replacement should have happened long ago but I put it off too long. review_text: I visited Back In Motion due to osteoarthritis in my knees and two herniated discs in my back. After an initial assessment with Dr. Gray, I began physical therapy with Dr. Fernanda Paulsen. Our sessions focused on improving flexibility, strengthening muscles, and using muscular manipulation to manage pain. Over the past 15 weeks, with 5 sessions remaining, I‚Äôve been impressed by Dr. Paulsen‚Äôs attentiveness, empathy, and skill in identifying pain sources. She tailored exercises to build core strength while accommodating my limitations. Although my recovery is ongoing, I highly recommend Dr. Paulsen for her exceptional care.

provider_name: Back In Motion Performance & Physical Therapy Fort Myers FL
review_text: I am a 43-year-old professional and mom of four kids. I live a very busy life and I‚Äôm always on the go as well as being active on our farm. Unfortunately, about three months ago I got injured working on my farm. I injured my thoracic expiring, impartial, lumbar spine Pulling a wagon. I was in agony for several weeks and I thought this was something I could just push through, but unfortunately, it was not. After my back was not getting better for several weeks a friend of mine had recommended me coming to back in motion. After a few quick sessions, Dr. Gray was able to quickly show me what I need to do to avoid re-injuring my back but also helping my back heal after about eight sessions, I am now 100% pain-free and back on the farm and I avoided surgery, injections, and taking medicine. If you‚Äôre looking to figure out why you‚Äôre in pain and what‚Äôs causing it I would highly recommend that you don‚Äôt wait and come in and see these guys.

provider_name: Back In Motion Performance & Physical Therapy Fort Myers FL
review_text: This very special place is a cut way above all my pt experiences, and I have had many on a long pain journey. I was so blessed to get fitness training from Coach Elizabeth Wetmore, and with such excellence and good nature she took me from a very weak place to being able to work out solo at the gym. And Liz always watched closely to ensure I was doing exercises with proper form. She is a gem and a real lifesaver! Coach Katy Hutcherson is absolutely amazing as well. The pt therapists there are brilliant, and I am grateful to get to work with Dr. Jenna and Dr. Dillon. Occasionally they give wonderful free seminars there, and at two of them I raised my hand at the end to sincerely thank them for offering such superior pt which seeks to address the root issue, and tremendous fitness training, and to say how much they are helping me. Each time, people in front of me enthusiastically turned around and said, "Same here! This place saved me!" I wrote them a card once that said their name could also be "Love in Motion", because that is what they truly do, by helping restore our strength and function with such expertise, and with such kindness and graciousness. Thank you Back in Motion! (And I must mention my deep gratitude to the brilliant Dr. Dan who just moved but whose positive impact on my life continues on!)

review_text: Last week, I had excruciating neck pain that came out of the blue. I thought I was going to have to go to the ER. provider_name: Back In Motion Performance & Physical Therapy Fort Myers FL
review_text: I highly recommend Dr. Fernanda for any woman who is having pelvic floor issues of any kind. Even if it seems minor, don‚Äôt wait! After my bilateral mastectomy, I started searching for physical therapy that focused on breast cancer patients, but it was surprisingly hard to find someone who specialized in this type of recovery. I discovered Back To Health because of reviews mentioning post-surgery shoulder/arm therapy, and it turned out to be exactly what I needed.

When I first came in, I was facing a deadline: in order to begin radiation treatment, I needed to achieve a certain level of arm mobility. It felt overwhelming, but Mindy guided me every step of the way. Through her expertise and encouragement, I was able to meet that requirement in time.

I still have a lot of work ahead of me, but I‚Äôm very happy with my progress so far with Mindy‚Äôs help. She understands the unique challenges breast cancer patients face after surgery, and she approaches therapy with both knowledge and compassion.

And yoga with Bill is a delightful bonus! It‚Äôs a welcoming class that makes stretching and strengthening feel doable, even for me, just over 3 months after my surgery.

I‚Äôm truly grateful for the care I‚Äôve received at Back To Health. If you‚Äôre a breast cancer patient recovering from surgery and wondering where to turn, I cannot recommend Mindy and Back To Health team enough.

Best therapy experience I've had. Everyone is professional and patient centered. Private room for intake interviews. Equipment is well maintained. Good variety of treatment modalities. Very friendly staff. Bill is awesome.

when I started .
The place is well organized, the staff is welcoming and friendly , the equipments are well maintained. I strongly  recommend Back to Health to anyone that needs a good place for therapy.

After examinations by three different orthopedists I was diagnosed with spinal stenosis as the primary cause of near debilitating back pain. Once physical therapy was prescribed I set about finding a therapist near my home with the training and experience that felt compatible with my outlook on health. I‚Äôve been working with Bill Rodowsky at Back To Health for several months and the improvement has been dramatic. Using  myokinesthetic principles and practices Bill  identified and treated weaknesses in other parts of my body that were contributing to my discomfort.  Bill doesn‚Äôt simply apply treatment in our sessions but also provides detailed training and guidance for home-based exercises to both reinforce the work done in session  and to help build good habits for maintenance and continued improvement. I cannot recommend Back To Health and, specifically Bill Rodowsky, strongly enough.

Six weeks post-op for rotator cuff repair surgery. I‚Äôve never had PT before and I thought it would be painful. That is not the case at all. I‚Äôm moving at baby steps. I actually think of my therapy as a spa treatment which feels good. Icing is my friend. Thank Mindy!

provider_name: Back To Work Physical Therapy - South Tampa
review_text:
5-Star Review for Sarah and Garrett:

I cannot recommend Sarah and Garrett enough! Their expertise and dedication helped me recover to full duty ten times faster than I ever expected. Their personalized approach, encouragement, and professionalism made all the difference in my healing journey. Thanks to them, I feel stronger and more confident. Truly exceptional top notch professionals.

1-Star Review for Management:

Unfortunately, my experience with the management was disappointing. Due to overbooking and scheduling issues, I often felt I didn't have enough one-on-one time with Sarah and Garrett. This made it difficult to get personalized attention and could have impacted my recovery. I hope they can improve their scheduling to better support both clients and therapists in the future.

I've also observed that Sarah and Garrett are truly dedicated professionals whose quality of care significantly contributes to the success of the practice. If it weren't for their commitment and expertise, the overall quality of service would potentially suffer. However, they often seem overworked and under significant pressure, which may impact their well-being and the high standards they set. Addressing workload would not only support these valuable team members but also ensure the continued excellence of the practice.

Additionally, I have experienced frustration with the owner's frequent scheduling of himself multiple times a week during the times I needed one-on-one sessions with Sarah and Garrett. These sessions were essential for my recovery to return to full duty, and often, his scheduling limited my access to those personalized times. I believe prioritizing patient-focused schedules and limiting unnecessary disruptions would greatly benefit both clients and the team.

I‚Äôm not sure why this office gets good reviews. They may have technical competence, but the way they treat clientele is subpar. The communication is poor. If using their breeding services, they charge $51 each visit for a ‚Äúbreeding management recheck fee‚Äù that is supposed to include vitals. We cannot say enough good things about Bannerman Pet Care! During the last hurricane to hit Florida, our family had to evacuate from Tampa Bay to Tallahassee with our senior dogs. Their willingness to help out strangers in need speaks volumes about their dedication and kindness.

If we lived in Tallahassee, Bannerman Pet Care would be our go-to vet without question. Thank you, Dr. Thabes and team, for being there for us and our pets when we needed it most!

Dr. Thabes and the entire staff at Bannerman Pet Care are so kind. They go out of their way to accommodate and care for our dogs. I trust Dr. Thabes‚Äô advice and judgment implicitly. Thank you for all you do!

I‚Äôm truly great full that I came here! I was able to get the help for mental health I deserved. The staff were extremely helpful and the food was delicious. Between the techs and therapists, Banyan saved my life for a better direction and brighter tomorrow. Thank you.üôèüèæ

I am leaving another review later with the break down of everything.

This one here is strictly for my BHT's hands down they are the best and they say a good team starts from the head down and you see that operating here Rachel does a phenomenal job managing her staff and making sure that we are treated the way we're supposed to be treating she's even on the floor talking to the clients making sure that our needs are being met when we put something in the suggestion box it's not just thrown away if she can do it it gets done then we have her lead text Keisha and Steven two of the most awesome people I have ever met Keisha has saved a lot of people's lives with her words of wisdom a encouragement. Steven is just funny and on his shit!! Miss Pam gives a lot of love and Yolanda will help you with whatever she can in real time she's not one of those staff that say okay I'm going to do it and you never see her again. Then we got my dog chill Will he going to do his job and joke with you at the same time. Greg is cool. And you got to love Donnie he is a sweetheart and also will do anything for you that he can. Cody is great on the night shift. Lena is cool 2.. there are two other ones that I don't know their names the white lady that work in the morning time and the big dude that work at night also awesome staff.
I appreciate the way they let me grow at my own pace and although I do my treatment a little unorthodox they still notice the changes that I was making and I appreciate that.
Not like I said in a few weeks I'm going to give my overall experience here but I want to take the time out to shout them out right now!

This is my first time in treatment and I am impressed with the facility. It is very clean and well taken care of. The staff is very nice, I have a great therapist she is really helping me out, CAse Manager was very helpful in meeting my needs, the chef cooks amazing food, techs are helpful as well, and the treatment I am getting is really working for me. It is located on the water and you can go outside on your breaks and even fish. I recommend it very highly.

The facility and staff are all excellent. Kamala is a great therapist. Every single one of the cooks could be working at a five star restaurant. So many of the techs are wonderful. Keisha is very inspiring. Jen is so kind. Davidson is the coolest. Brittney was my case manager for my time here and she did everything she could for me. The nursing staff was incredibly helpful and supportive as well. There's just too many good memories I've made in my time here to list them all. Can't recommend this place enough. If you're hurting and hopeless, they'll give you someplace to heal.

review_text: The best Physical Therapy, the staff is amazing, the therapist are wonderful and show concern about you, the place and equipment are always very clean.  I highly recommend them, I feel welcomed and cared for. They greet you with a smile and are always willing to help.

review_text:
