My son has been going here for 2 years now. He loves it. The staff is amazing. The program is amazing. They even do field trips with parents once a month. Everyone is so friendly, and kind!

Words can‚Äôt express how special Believe is!! Dayna and Trevor have created such a special place where kids thrive and truly feel loved, encouraged and supported to do their absolute best. Overall it‚Äôs a very welcoming and familial environment that I haven‚Äôt experienced anywhere else that we‚Äôve taken my son for therapy. My younger son LOVES going to cheer on his big brother and interacting with the other kiddos and therapists. I can honestly say that each of the Believe therapists show the same passion and excitement for each of their kiddos. They employ creativity, innovation and collaboration to fit the unique needs and circumstances of each child they are treating but above all else they ensure therapy is FUN! They have tons of specialized equipment which allows them to really explore what may work best for each child. We‚Äôve done two intensives with our son and each time he has shown so much progress. He responds so well to each of the Believe therapists and it‚Äôs honestly been really impactful to his overall development. Because we had such a positive experience during his first intensive we started regular PT sessions at Believe as well. I cant recommend them enough and feel very blessed and fortunate that our son is part of the Believe family!

There are not enough positive words to describe Believe Therapy and their therapists! You will quickly see and feel the love each and every therapist has for every child that attends.  They are so very passionate about what they do and it definitely shows. I nanny for a child who attends regular PT and has done their intensive therapy sessions as well, and the overall contentment he shows when being there is truly so heartwarming ! I've seen him grow and accomplish so many new things and I am so excited for him to continue hitting milestones!  Another amazing thing about Believe, is the instant family feel you get! I often times have to bring the youngest sibling, and it's something that they encourage and love. He loves  going and cheering on his big brother and interacting with the other kids who also attend therapy there as well! If you decide to send your child to Believe, your child's life will forever be changed and it will be the best decision you will make!

We have been going to Believe Therapy for many years, and we couldn't be happier with the care and professionalism they provide. From the very beginning, the team has been incredibly supportive, knowledgeable, and dedicated to helping our son, Ben.

The therapists are not only highly skilled but also deeply compassionate, making each session a positive and encouraging experience. They have gone above and beyond to ensure Ben receives the best possible care, and we have seen so much progress thanks to their expertise and commitment.

Every visit to Believe Therapy reassures us that we are in the right place. The team is always welcoming, patient, and genuinely invested in the Childs well-being. We are so grateful to have found such an outstanding therapy center and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for professional and effective therapy services.

Thank you to the entire Believe Therapy team for everything you do!

Alex, Louise and Ben Louth

Believe is truly the best of the best when it comes to physical therapy for your child. I really feel like we hit the jackpot when we met this team of therapists when we took a chance on bringing our daughter there for a PT intensive almost 4 years ago. She has since done 11 intensives and it is the single most beneficial program she has ever done in her journey.

We've seen new therapists added to their team and they are always sure to make sure each new team member is the right fit and going to be the best person for working with the kids who come to them. They're always learning and trying new things to help their kids and clients progress forward.

Dayna, Trevor, Chris, Patty, and now Tiffani make a truly exceptional team. We also see Dayna and Patty for traditional PT and it is hugely beneficial to my daughters progress.

I would recommend Believe to anyone!

I have been a patient at Believe Physical Therapy since 2010, traveling all the way from Las Vegas, Nevada, as often as possible for intensive therapy sessions. Every time I came to Florida, I got stronger. In 2020, I happened to be in Orlando when the pandemic hit. Unable to fly home right away, my family decided to stay indefinitely.

When things started opening back up, it was still a scary time for me because of my lungs. But everyone at Believe made sure I felt safe enough to continue therapy. They were such a blessing‚Äîa light in uncertain times. That was when my family decided to make Florida our permanent home, and now I not only get to do intensives but also weekly traditional PT.

The benefits have been incredible. My lungs are stronger. I am stronger. I know I call the team at Believe my friends, but really, they are family. They have been part of my journey for over a decade, supporting me in everything‚Äîeven my biggest (and sometimes wildest) goals, like getting strong enough to ride Guardians of the Galaxy at Disney World. And guess what? I met that goal and so many more!

Trevor, Dayna, Chris, Patty, and Tiffani are the absolute best. Not only do they push me to be my strongest, but they make therapy so much fun. I truly cannot recommend Believe PT enough. They have changed my life!

I love the friendly atmosphere at Belleair Health Care Center. The staff are warm, helpful, and always make me feel cared for. Their physical therapy program helped me get back on my feet quickly, and the whole team is dedicated to recovery. I‚Äôm excited to return here again for my next appointment.Jackie the concierge was amazing and welcomed me here right away and made a great impression and still til I am discharging she has always been helpful and kind and just everything.

I have been in rehab at Belleair healthcare center for two and a half months dealing with a bad infection. The treatment has been well above average. The Consierge Jackie D greated me with kindness when I first came in and was able to assist me with packing up as I left.

Other notable staff include detailed kind nursing from Nurse Kim among other nurses who were kind and understanding of my needs. Many Certified Nursing Assistant stand out as excellent in their job. Marco, Virginia, Javier, Kera,and Rita are some of the ones that stand out. Over all they treated me with care and kindness.

The rehabilitation staff were top notch most of my care from those departments were lead by John who saw my need for advanced healing techniques and recommended me for a HydrOx treatment which entailed bathing my wound in cool saline steam alternated wirh pure Oxygen for nearly an hour. Danya in occupational therapy pushed me to going above my baseline making sure I didn't regress in my mobility. She also noticed a pain symptom in my shoulder not even related to my wound area and gave  me relief with Stems treatment. Nate and David along with Kelce, Gabi, Danielle were all attentive and made therapy enjoyable and not a chore.

I felt extremely comforted during my stay at Belleair Health Care Center, where the modern facility and friendly staff provided me with the highest level of care and support.  my Physical Therapy and Occupational Therapy was great!The cleanliness of the facility and the care received in these programs played a huge role in my recovery and  my overall experience at this wonderful rehabilitation center. The nursing staff was excellent! Jackie the concierge was very nice and helped me move in and packed me up and check up on me frequently. I would recommend any loved ones to come here for care. Thanks to the admissions team. And creige for getting me all set on my discharge. Amazing stay! Thank you all.

Mom was sent to this facility to recover her physical strength after a heart attack. The staff has been very helpful and supportive. The food does not look great, but what institutional food looks good? She looks very comfortable in her room. She‚Äôs in with a permanent resident who does crafts and knitting so mom has a friend with similar interests now. It seems nice and they say that there are otters in the pond out front.

I've had experience with two elders at this facility - one for hospice respite days for me , the other passed away here as well. The staff works hard to stay up to speed with the needs of the wings and efficiency with the paperwork and admin stuff is kept simple. Caring people, laid back but busy. Jackie Alesandro did my admissions work with excellence. I felt well taken care of, and my elder is very comfortable and safe here.

provider_name: Berkower Pain & Spine Rehabilitation: David Berkower, DO
review_text: I cannot speak highly enough about my experience with Dr. David Berkower. From the very first appointment, it was clear that he is not only an incredibly knowledgeable and skilled doctor but also genuinely personable and caring. He takes the time to listen attentively to my concerns, making me feel heard and valued as an individual. His compassionate approach and genuine interest in my well-being truly set him apart. Despite his busy schedule and long hours, Dr. Berkower always makes sure to prioritize his patients and provides exceptional care. The entire staff is equally impressive‚Äîprofessional, friendly, and incredibly organized. Appointments are easy to schedule, even with such a high volume of patients, which speaks to the efficiency and dedication of the team. Overall, I am beyond grateful for the outstanding care I receive at this practice. Dr. Berkower's expertise, combined with his personable nature and the supportive staff, creates an environment where I feel confident and cared for every time I visit. I highly recommend him to anyone seeking a doctor who truly cares and goes above and beyond for his patients.

provider_name: Berkower Pain & Spine Rehabilitation: David Berkower, DO
review_text: I‚Äôve been a patient of Dr. Berkower for several years now.  He‚Äôs approachable and makes you feel comfortable and informed. The office staff are also attentive and cordial.  Whenever I reach out with questions or concerns they relay the message and get back to me quickly. Recommended!
Got Dogs‚Ä¶this is a must go. Makes everyone happy! The Kids, the Dogs, and us owners. Oh yea, you get  support a great local cause.

After just a bit of confusion was resolved about this being a U-Pick, I learned  that this is an absolutely delightful school and U-Pick facility!   For now, the U-Pick is only available on Tuesdays.  I learned that everything here is organically grown and they even have free range chicken eggs!  Awesome staff for awesome kids with awesome produce!  You will be happy you came!
Amazing people and great produce. Huge variety of herbs, plants, roots, vegetables, fruits and things to see. Definitely worth a visit to purchase produce or volunteer.

I have been gardening for over fifty years and had the opportunity recently to tour these gardens. The size and variety of plants was intriguing.  Tom Armstrong the garden supervisor is very knowledgeable and caring for both the plants as well as the students. This is a wonderful and enriching opportunity for students with physical and mental handicaps to get caring and professional help in agricultural education.
A hidden gem in Jax. I missed this week‚Äôs Tuesday market, but will be back soon. Good people doing great things in Jax. Wish we heard more about this on our local news!

I cannot recommend Estivin enough! I brought our 4-year-old Rottweiler, Teemo, to him for a month of board-and-train, and the results have been nothing short of life-changing.

Before, Teemo was reactive on walks‚Äîbarking and lunging at birds, dogs, people, bikes, and even cars. Walks were stressful, and I honestly doubted if a dog his age could still be trained out of these behaviors. I worried he might never be able to enjoy public spaces calmly.

During Teemo‚Äôs stay, Estivin worked with him daily and took him into real-world environments like malls and Armature Works to desensitize him and teach him how to stay calm around distractions. He trained Teemo to walk politely at my side, stop pulling, and ignore his triggers. Estivin also leveraged some of Teemo's favorite activities, like playing with his ball, to creative positive associations with his surroundings. Estivin also provided me with an e-collar and a cot so I could continue reinforcing the training at home.

What really impressed me was Estivin‚Äôs communication and transparency throughout the process. He gave me regular updates with photos and videos, always explained what he was working on, and set clear, realistic goals for each week. I always felt involved and reassured that Teemo was in the best hands.

The transformation has been incredible. Teemo now walks calmly on leash, no longer reacts to everything that moves, and is extremely obedient at home. I was initially nervous that he might come back like a ‚Äúrobot,‚Äù but that couldn‚Äôt be further from the truth‚Äîhe‚Äôs still the same loving, playful dog, only now he can truly enjoy walks and outings without all the chaos.

Even after the official training ended, Estivin continues to check in, answer my questions, and offer helpful pointers. It‚Äôs clear he genuinely cares about the dogs he trains and their long-term success.

My only regret is not bringing Teemo to him sooner. Estivin completely exceeded my expectations and gave me the gift of being able to enjoy life with my dog in a calmer, happier way. I have the utmost admiration for Estivin‚Äôs dedication to his craft‚Äîhis passion, skill, and love for training shine through in everything he does. Truly a master at what he does.

We sent Arthur for a two-week board and train program with Bespoke Canine Training, and the change we have seen is amazing! There are so many great things to say about Estivin and the work he has done with our pup! Arthur came home an all-around better dog and with lots of new tricks to show off. Estivin is very committed to what he does, and it shows in the quality of work you get. Not only does it show in Arthur, but we received a daily update of what Arthur was learning and his progress. Leaving your pup is hard, but I always looked forward to the updates. I would and will recommend Bespoke Canine Training to anyone looking to train their pup. It is an investment, but it was worth every penny for a better pup! I can not thank Estivin enough for the work he has done! Bespoke Canine Training is amazing!

Estevin did a wonderful job with our high energy Doberman! We now have a much more disciplined dog at home and in public. Estevin did a fantastic job of communicating with us throughout the entire process, learning details about our dog before training, and ensuring that we knew what to expect along the way. During the two week training, Estevin sent daily progress updates (photo and video) documenting our dog‚Äôs new skills. At the completion of training Estevin spent two hours teaching us the dog‚Äôs new commands, and observing our delivery of them. Estevin also followed up after the training to confirm that the dog‚Äôs new skills are being maintained. 10/10 highly recommended!

Last December, we adopted Blaze, a Malinois X puppy who came with a little bit of extra energy‚Ä¶ okay, a LOT of energy. I‚Äôve trained all my dogs myself before, and never had a problem‚Äîuntil Blaze. This guy has a prey drive so strong, I was half expecting him to start chasing his own tail just to see if it moved. At home, he‚Äôd listen to commands, but the second we stepped outside, it was like unleashing a Tasmanian Devil. No car, bike, or innocent pedestrian was safe. We actually stopped walking him altogether because we were worried he‚Äôd end up hurt.
Enter Estevan from Bespoke Canine, the dog whisperer we didn‚Äôt know we needed. With just a few private training sessions, Estevan worked his magic, showing us tools and techniques that made so much sense‚Äîit was like a light bulb went off. We followed his instructions to the letter and in just a  month, Blaze is a whole new dog. We can finally walk without fear of him lunging into traffic or trying to drag me into a bush to chase a squirrel. Now, he listens, stays calm, and I don‚Äôt need to hold my breath every time a car drives by.
If you're looking for a dog trainer who truly knows their stuff and can bring real, lasting results, Estevan is hands down the best. We couldn‚Äôt be happier with the progress Blaze has made. Highly recommend!

Words cannot express our gratitude for Estivin and Bespoke Canine Training. We enrolled our 8 month old Golden Retriever, Ollie, in the two week board and train program.

Throughout the entire program, Estivin was awesome about sending us daily progress updates, pictures, and videos showing what Ollie had learned and practiced each day. We were pleasantly shocked at his progress after just the third day!

Estivin exhibited the utmost professionalism and care throughout our experience with Bespoke. We struggled a lot with leash pulling and impulse control prior to sending Ollie to work with Estivin. When we got him back after the two weeks, it was like night and day. Taking Ollie on walks around our neighborhood is now one of our favorite parts of the day, and many neighbors have given compliments as well on how well behaved he is for such a young pup.

We sincerely cannot say enough how thankful we are for Estivin and Bespoke Canine Training. We recommend his services to any and all friends and family looking to make a huge, positive impact on their fur babies‚Äô and family‚Äôs lives.

Anyone who has suffered from vestibular issues knows how miserable and impactful it is, so to have someone like Cassie on your side is truly invaluable. Her bedside manner is the best I've ever seen in a physical therapist, her skills are top-notch, and she goes above and beyond to make the struggle of vestibular issues, whether BPPV (positional vertigo) or chronic and difficult to treat dizziness (both of which I suffer from), far more tolerable through her kindness and care. She is an exemplary physical therapist worth every penny and one whom I would not hesitate to recommend to anyone in need of top-notch vestibular care.

Wow! My knee feels significantly better after just one visit! This girl knows her craft. My session with Cassie was worth every penny. I have been going to physical therapy off and on for over 4 months after surgery, and this one visit with Cassie has done more for reducing my pain and increasing my range of motion than all the other sessions I've had combined. Make your money count and go see Cassie. You won't regret it!

I have had the opportunity to be treated by Dr Cook for two separate injuries. The first was a fairly severe frozen shoulder. My orthopedic physician ultimately recommended surgery for my condition. I was determined to avoid that at all costs and I can tell you that Dr Cook was absolutely the reason I am 100% fully recovered with no surgery needed. She is thorough, knowledgeable and just an incredible human being! My second injury was to my other shoulder and I skipped seeing my Orthopedic entirely and went straight to Dr Cook instead and as you may guess, I am completely restored to 100% once again within a few short months of treatment from her! Her methods work and I 100% recommend everyone I know see her for all of their physical therapy needs. Her specialty is treating vertigo and I am so grateful to know she will be my go to if that condition every arises in me or anyone I know. Thanks for listening and you will not be sorry if you visit Bespoke PT and allow Dr Cook help you with your physical therapy needs! She is the BEST!

Bespoke is the absolute best physical therapy practice out there.  I know that Dr. Cook heals her patients with a combination of attentive and focused assessments, carefully honed skill, a vast knowledge base, and lots of tlc, but there‚Äôs still a part of me that suspects she has magical powers. ü§î Did my shoulder pain really completely resolve with carefully prescribed stretches and strengthening exercises‚Ä¶ or was some faerie dust or magic wand employed while my back was turned?  Either way, after being treated by Bespoke my quality of life has improved significantly.  Thank you so much for your help and care! üßö‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüôÜ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èü™Ñ

Dr. Cassie Cook is truly gifted! I have been to other physical therapists in the past, but for me she has been the best. She has a "bedside manner" that I needed to feel comfortable and she does not leave you wanting for communication, she truly listened and put me at ease. I highly recommend you choose Dr. Cassie and Bespoke for your rehabilitation.

We had such a great experience working with Karyn! When we started training, our puppy was just about 10 weeks old, and we wanted to make sure we set a solid foundation early on. Karyn was incredibly patient, knowledgeable, and supportive throughout the whole process.

Thanks to her guidance, our puppy quickly learned how to walk nicely on a leash, ‚Äúplace,‚Äù and follow the ‚Äúdown‚Äù command. Karyn gave us the tools and confidence to continue the training at home, and we‚Äôve seen such amazing progress in a short time.

We‚Äôre so thankful for her help and highly recommend her to anyone looking to start their puppy off on the right paw!

Karyn is absolutely wonderful. She knows so much and was such a great guide to leading my pup to becoming the best boy he could be.  From the initial consultation alone, my dog showed immediate improvement in his behavior and began listening so much better.  She‚Äôs given me so many tools to continue working with him as he‚Äôs grows (he‚Äôs still a puppy).  We even addressed his resource guarding that was getting pretty concerning and now he doesn‚Äôt really do that anymore.

I ended up adding a few sessions because we were learning so much and the practice was great for our little pup.

Karyn was also so helpful with many questions, even after our last lesson.  She‚Äôs a delight to work with.  Thank you Karyn!

Karyn is so easy to work with and her technique is easy to follow and very effective. We called on her expertise with our new puppy to start good habits. Karyn worked on training us along with our new puppy with ease. Our puppy is turning one this week and is the best behaved puppy I‚Äôve ever owned. I highly recommend her services!

Karyn did such a great job with our two girls (6 & 3). We are now able to take them in public and they are so well behaved. We did training sessions with Karyn in our home, around the neighborhood, Home Depot, Arts Market, and Memorial Park. They love Karyn so much they are more excited to see her than they are us. We cannot recommend Karyn enough!!

Karyn was an absolute god send for my pups! They were super reactive before and walked terribly on leash but now it‚Äôs like I have 2 new dogs. They walk GREAT on leash. They do commands without me even having to tell them. They truly are the best behaved pups and we can‚Äôt thank her enough for all her help!

We highly recommend Dr. George she was amazing as was the staff. We just got our first kitten and Dr. George spent an hour answering our questions and advising on what to do. Dr. George and the staff were kind and gentle and our kitten was relaxed and happy. I can't recommend them enough. This review was approved by Fiddich üòÄ

Today we visited best friends Animal Hosptial, where we were welcome by Taylor, who was the front receptionist/back medical tech she was warm and inviting, and I had talked to her on the phone and she was just as sweet. I had explained the situation about my dogs being attacked in the past by larger dogs. My small dog gets very anxious and has anxiety around big dogs. I kindly asked if we came and there were big dogs in the waiting room that we would wait out in my car until it was our turn. Taylor happily said if there‚Äôs no dogs in the lobby, then I would let you know that if there is a dog in the lobby that is bigger I will check a room to see if we have one available for you and we will put you in the room well obviously the lobby was empty and when we got there, Taylor greeted us and put us in the room, and she began to take our information And askToday, we visited our best friend‚Äôs Animal Hospital, where we were warmly greeted by Taylor, the front receptionist and back medical technician. She was incredibly friendly and inviting, just like she had been on the phone with me.

I explained to Taylor about my dogs‚Äô past attacks by larger dogs, which made my small dog very anxious and fearful of big dogs. I kindly inquired if we could wait in my car until it was our turn, as there were large dogs in the waiting room. Taylor happily agreed.

When we arrived, Taylor greeted us and led us to a room. She proceeded to take our information and ask pertinent questions about my dogs. Taylor meticulously recorded all the information and informed me that Dr. George would be with us shortly.

We did not have to wait long. Dr. George arrived, introduced herself, and proceeded to examine our dogs. I thoroughly enjoyed the experience because she performed all the necessary procedures in front of us. If I had any questions, she answered them promptly or provided helpful suggestions. Dr. George is highly professional and possesses an exceptional bedside manner.

After our visit, Dr. George excused herself, and Taylor returned to the room to check us out. She reassured us that if we had any questions, we should not hesitate to contact them. They would be more than happy to answer any inquiries or provide additional information.

To express my gratitude, I would like to extend my heartfelt appreciation to Dr. George and the entire staff at Best Friend Animal Hospital for their warm welcome and exceptional care. the pertinent questions about my dogs she took all the information Taylor took the information back and said Dr. George will be right with you. We didn‚Äôt have to wait long. Dr. George came in introduced herself and then proceeded to examine my dogs. I really love the experience I had because she takes and does the shots and everything in front of you and then, if you have any questions, you can ask her questions and she will answer your questions for you or give you suggestions Dr. George is very professional and has a great bedside manner After we were done with our visit, Dr. George excuse yourself And Taylor returned to the room to check us out. Taylor replied if you have any questions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to call us. May be more than happy to answer. Any questions you may have forgotten.

To think Dr. George, the staff at best friend Animal Hosptial For welcoming us to the family

Outstanding in every way! My Valentine and I are treated like family. Professional, kind and treats Valentine like royalty! Seriously, one of the best vets we‚Äôve been during out 10years of dog-venture! The grooming services match! From the very first welcome we knew we came to the best! ‚ù§Ô∏èüê∂‚ù§Ô∏è

I almost stopped coming to this vet months ago due to another issue but decided to give it another try. Unfortunately, this is not the care I‚Äôm seeking for my boy.  The person answering the phone today seemed like it was an inconvenience to answer the phone she never asked for my dog or my name.  When I asked if she could look up his name to see when he was due for his exams/vaccines she huffed and I hung up.  That was enough for me.  Do better please.  I would like to say this review is geared more towards some of the staff at this location.  A couple of them are great but there are some bad apples in the bunch who don‚Äôt seem to care.

THIS PLACE!!! Everyone was SO great, caring and understanding! They all really listened and we could tell they REALLY care about our pets! Our cat, Max‚Äôs veterinarian was honest and didn‚Äôt mince words, which we really appreciated. She gave us some options, offered advice and a plan to work out with Max.
Her first concern is with Max, and his quality of life. All of our pets will be coming here in the future!
Thank you!!

provider_name: Better Life Physical Therapy & Wellness | Federal Injury Center
review_text: First visit today. Brock Pominville was very attentive and helpful in making my first session a great one. He directly addressed my concerns and gave me some exercises to perform at home. Will definitely recommend Better Life Physical Therapy to anyone that is looking for a knowledgeable and professional PT in the area.

provider_name: Better Life Physical Therapy & Wellness | Federal Injury Center
review_text: Better Life Physical Therapy lives up to its name. Since I became injured, they have completely helped me in many ways that I couldn't have imagined. I've heard horror stories about worker's comp facilities not listening to the patient's needs. I felt heard from intake, meeting with the physician Katelyn and Dr. Corbin the Physical Therapist. This place has wonderful and I mean wonderful staff. Dr. Corbin has made this process very easy with his knowledge and nurturing approach. The massage therapist are top tier. Renee has healing hands of an angel. Maria and Leah are very talented therapist that offer an approach that will have you moving like you weren't injured to begin with. James and Brock will have you working on your form correctly and educate you as well which I love. Dr. Mitko, a Physical Therapist, is very knowledgeable as well. He has the best stories and a gentle approach. In my opinion in doesn't matter who works with you, they all have the same approach which is to put the patient first.

provider_name: Better Life Physical Therapy & Wellness | Federal Injury Center
review_text:
From the moment you walk through the doors, it‚Äôs clear this isn‚Äôt just another physical therapy clinic. It‚Äôs a place dedicated to real recovery, compassion, and professionalism at the highest level.

The entire staff operates with exceptional professionalism, creating an environment where you feel not only welcome but truly cared for. With a vast team of knowledgeable and attentive caregivers, there‚Äôs always someone ready to support and guide you. Their commitment to your betterment is second to none. You‚Äôre not just a patient, you‚Äôre family.

Special thanks to Dr. Mitko, a highly skilled and compassionate Doctor of Physical Therapy. His depth of knowledge, hands-on expertise, and personalized approach make every session incredibly effective. You always feel like you‚Äôre in capable hands when he‚Äôs involved in your care.

Also, a huge shoutout to Renee, whose attention to detail and warm, professional demeanor make her an absolute standout. And Maria Coleman is nothing short of exceptional. Her massage therapy is both restorative and deeply healing. She has a rare talent for understanding the body and easing tension with precision and care.

Dr. Corbin, the owner, deserves major praise for running such a tight, efficient, and patient-focused operation. His leadership sets the tone for everything. The team‚Äôs deep expertise in workers‚Äô compensation cases is especially impressive. They know how to navigate the system, advocate for patients, and keep the process smooth and stress-free.

Whether you‚Äôre recovering from an injury, surgery, or dealing with a workers‚Äô comp case, this clinic is the gold standard. It‚Äôs not just therapy. It‚Äôs a powerful, team-driven path to getting your life back.
- Chris C.

provider_name: Better Life Physical Therapy & Wellness | Federal Injury Center
review_text:
Better life Physical Therapy has given me a new lease on life! After literally limping around for years, my mobility was getting much worse. It was an effort just get through the day. After seeing a podiatrist, an orthopedic surgeon and years of adjustments by a chiropractor, I was directed to Better Life.  Finally I was the one that put the equation together: The right side of my body was severely out of alignment, yet none of the ‚Äúprofessionals ‚Äú I had seen even considered a body part outside of their area of certification, or that my ailments might be connected! But upon my very first appointment, Dr Corbin assured me that he could help me, and wouldn‚Äôt be surprised if I could feel the difference after the first appointment‚Ä¶ and he was right on. He told me it was going to take awhile, but I would feel better and I would regain my mobility.
I have been working with James who listens to my feedback, is very knowledgeable and caring. His passion for what he does for you really shines through. I am so encouraged as I have been improving steadily. I have more endurance throughout the day and my stamina has increased hugely. This body may have a few miles on it, but I truly believe that with the treatment I am receiving I am taking care of myself in a way that honors my/The creator.

provider_name: Better Life Physical Therapy & Wellness | Federal Injury Center
review_text: Corbin and his staff brought me from searing pain and inability to walk more than a few feet to a functional person.  Through use of myofascial release and individualized exercises, the physical therapists at Better Life Physical Therapy and Wellness gave me the relief that five prior therapists were unable to.  The office staff is pleasant and efficient, scheduling and reminding patients of visits. I highly recommend this practice!!

I cannot say enough good things about Danielle, Angie, and Better Living Solutions, but the most important aspect is that Danielle truly cares about the clients and takes a wholistic approach to wellness and Angie works tirelessly to accommodate the needs of BLS clients. While Better Living does help with eating disorder recovery, they offer comprehensive therapeutic services and are able to accommodate complex issues, so I highly recommend BLS regardless of need. Danielle is highly skilled at addressing complex situations and works towards conflict resolution and healing. If you are researching therapeutic options in Tallahassee, BLS is the solution. I highly recommend making an appointment.

Unsure i could put into words how thankful I am for Danielle and her team as one of her first five clients years ago to seeing where they are now. Bls not only saved my life but changed it and gave me the tools to find recovery for myself now almost 10 years in recovery I can not thank the bls team enough. Danielle and Amanda truly care and give everything they can to help their clients.
We are so grateful to the staff at Better Living Solutions. They saved our daughter‚Äôs life.  She is getting better every day.  BLS truly cares about and never gives up on their patients.

There are not enough amazing things I can say about better living solutions. I have never been to a place that truly cares SO MUCH about their patients. Nari and Christy have changed my life and helped me overcome a lot. Even with the move to online because of the pandemic, everyone has been so flexible, supportive, and accommodating. I have grown so much because of the wonderful people here and I recommend BLS to anyone who is struggling.

If it wasn't for Better Living Solutions, my sister would not be alive today. BLS has provided her with the treatment to combat the eating disorder and depression she has battled for half of her life. She finally has the will combined with the necessary support and encouragement to become eating disorder symptom free. My family cannot be grateful enough to Danielle Shelton and the BLS family for helping my sister learn to live a healthy and fulfilling life.

Better speech of palm beach (Ms.Donna) has been amazing. The therapists have been super nice and professional, and super patient. They build trust with the child and parents. In our case this has been a great experience and I was able to see improvements in my both of my daughters speech after a few sessions. Thank you!

Amazing, never disappoints. No matter the lesion or the trauma Monica is always able to provide me with relief. Her extensive knowledge and the passion she puts to every treatment she does is admirable. I had knee surgery a couple of months ago, came to Beyond to receive treatment and she has worked miracles. My consistent pain disappeared after just one session.

I would highly recommend the services of Beyond. I would definitely continue to use their services.

I started coming to Monica to help with body pain. She was great. She really took everything into consideration before developing a plan that would help me fully recover. She was knowledgeable, precise, and always professional. Each session was productive and fun. Overall, I recovered quicker than expected and that‚Äôs all because of Monica.

What I found the most interesting was that she was willing to try different things to best address my needs and help me heal.
This in turn, allowed each session to not be the mundane routine that most other therapy sessions tend to become. Her facility is clean, has tons of tools and equipment, and spacious. Everything is there for a reason and staff is accommodating. Each session was fun and result-driven. Nothing is boring or wasteful here.

I would definitely recommend everyone to come here for all of their physical therapy needs!

Monica is the very best therapist I have ever encountered. She is kind, patient, friendly, extremely knowledgeable and a true professional.  I am so lucky I found her! She made all of my therapy sessions such a pleasant experience and made me feel so much better. I highly recommend her for anyone seeking a super hero therapist.  Thank you Monica for all you do and who you are, your patients are so fortunate to have you.

I had been suffering from sciatica for years. Went to so many different therapy clinics and got nowhere. Met Monica, and I can honestly say I finally see improvement. She's taught me the right way to sit/stand and do my house chores. I actually look forward to coming to my therapy appointments. Not like other places I've gone to. Highly recommend Beyond PT if you have back pain. You won't regret it!

Since my first meeting with Dr. Guzman she has been extremely attentive to my requested needs and has also given me so much knowledge as well. She is by for the best Physical Therapist I have been and I continue to see the progress in my pain relief due to her.  So grateful to be in her care.

Amazing service! My daughter loves getting services with this group. They are very caring and passionate for what they do! Is very rare find a high quality therapy place where the kids are the priority. If you are looking for a place to really help and support your kids with Speech, occupational and feeding, this is your place. The amount of progress my daughter has made since we start is unbelievable.

We are so grateful for Beyond Speaking Rehab Specialists! From the very beginning, they have treated us like family. Everyone is caring, professional, and truly invested in my daughter's progress. I‚Äôve seen such a wonderful improvement in her speech, and they always make sure we feel supported every step of the way.

A special thank you to Ms. Maybelin, who is absolutely amazing! She is experienced, knowledgeable, patient, and so kind. She has a gift for connecting with special needs children and making therapy sessions engaging and effective. Her dedication and encouragement have made such a positive impact on my daughter, and on us as a family.

I can‚Äôt recommend Beyond Speaking Rehab Specialists enough. The staff is very caring, kudos to Tiffanny for being so patient and kind. If you are looking for caring, experienced, and truly exceptional providers, this is the place to go!

I was in desperate need to get my son started speech therapy ,I contacted many places, many stated yes we are taking new patients but did they follow up with me after sending emails and placing many phones calls?? NO!!!  Beyond speaking was the only place to reach out back and help me with a smooth process, it has been a great experience and I'm beyond grateful that  God guided me there. The staff are very professional, so supportive, friendly, and  most importantly very attentive and patient. They take time out of their busy schedule to listen about my son's day in school so that they know how to better support not only my son but myself as well. As a parent you know your child best but when it comes to your child education needs; it takes a team effort with everyone involved such as you the parent, teachers, speech , behavior therapists just to name a few.  My son's well being and how people see him and treat him means a lot to me knowing that it isn't easy, Beyond speaking treats us as family, my son is loved by everyone there, Ms. Heather, Ms. Maybelyn, etc!!!!he is always so happy to go for his sessions because he said I'm going to have fun! Ms. Stefanie always call me to remind me of the appointments which I admire so much because as busy parent , we do forget ! however my son is on top of it too,
Thank you so much guys for the great work, for providing a fun , loving, welcoming and beautiful learning experience for my son and the other children in need of it.

We truly appreciate how much Beyond Speaking has helped our son with the help of trying out new foods. They're method has been fantastic and encouraging to our little one! We strongly recommend Beyond Speaking and will continue to bring our little one without any doubts!

Franchesca is my children's speech therapy teacher and the patience and charisma she has with children is wonderful, her way of teaching recreationally is great. If your child has speech problems, I recommend them 100% they are so professional and transparent, I love seeing them.

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
I cannot say enough wonderful things about this speech therapy program! From the moment you walk in, everything is spotless and welcoming. The front desk staff are always friendly, polite, and greet us with big smiles that make us feel right at home.

My son‚Äôs speech therapist is truly amazing‚Äîalways happy, kind, caring, and genuinely excited to see him. I‚Äôve seen so much positive progress in his development since starting here, and it fills me with hope and gratitude.

I am also beyond thankful for the owner, who has been such a blessing in our journey. She has not only supported us but has personally guided me through the process of autism, giving me the tools and encouragement I needed as a parent.

This place is truly a gift, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for caring, professional, and effective therapy for their child. üíñ

Beyond Therapy has truly been a game changer in my child‚Äôs therapy journey. His therapists, Laura and Stephanie, are beyond amazing ‚Äî there are simply no words to express the impact they‚Äôve had on my son. Their dedication, patience, and compassion have helped him make real progress, and I am endlessly grateful.

The front office staff ‚Äî Elizabeth, Carol, and Nancy ‚Äî are always welcoming, warm, and professional. They greet us with a smile every time, creating an environment that truly feels like family. This level of care and attention is rare and makes Beyond Therapy one of a kind.

Recommendations:
While our experience has been overwhelmingly positive, I would love to suggest a few improvements:

‚Ä¢ Cleanliness: A bit more attention to floor cleanliness and disinfecting would go a long way, especially since this is a medical office where many children come and go throughout the day.
‚Ä¢ Parent Comfort: As a parent of a child with unique abilities, we often spend extended periods of time here for multiple therapies. Having a small coffee station or some light snacks available in the waiting area would make a big difference. Many other pediatric therapy offices offer this, and it really adds to the overall comfort and care experience.

Despite these small suggestions, we are incredibly thankful to be part of the Beyond Therapy family. The team‚Äôs commitment to each child‚Äôs growth is truly unmatched.

I just want to say how thankful I am that I found Beyond Therapy! A huge shoutout to Carissa‚Äîwhen I first walked into the office, she greeted me warmly and really took the time to listen to my situation. She was incredibly hands-on throughout the entire intake process, and because of her support, we were able to get my son started with both occupational and speech therapy.

I absolutely love the therapists‚ÄîLaura is an amazing OT, and Stephanie has been fantastic with speech. Even in a short amount of time, I‚Äôve already seen small wins in my son‚Äôs progress, and that means the world to me. I‚Äôm truly excited for what‚Äôs to come. Thank you so much to the entire team at Beyond Therapy!

I couldn‚Äôt even get my daughter into this clinic. We moved to the area from Texas and I was struggling to find an in network provider. I reached out to Beyond Therapy to get my daughter set up for PT, ST, and OT to continue her progress from past clinics. The original call with the Beyond therapy front desk told me they needed insurance info, referrals, notes for past therapists, etc.

I provided the documentation they needed on a Friday and was told they would call me back to set up her initial evaluations/appointments early the next week. I got to the end of the next week and called and they told me they hadn‚Äôt processed it and that would hear back the next week. A week later they said the person who processes it went on vacation and that I would hear back the week after.
I called a week after and left voicemails and couldn‚Äôt get through. This process continued until I got through to reception. They answered, apologized that they hadn‚Äôt gotten back to me and promised a call back. I received no call back and when I tried to call back it went to voicemail.

I was trying to do the best I could for my daughter and this clinic was close to where we were living and was in network. They seemed to make no effort to update me on the progress of reviewing her paperwork or the status of getting my daughter scheduled. I ended up finding a clinic that was farther away but was very responsive and they got my daughter set up with her evaluations that same week.

The lack of responsiveness was very frustrating and made everything more stressful. My wife and I were already stressed about moving and then we also have a daughter with developmental issues and getting her set up in a new place with new insurance was tough to do. Beyond therapy did not help at all. Months after starting therapy at the other clinic I finally got a follow up email from Beyond Therapy asking for my number which was the first time I had heard from them in months. Again, not responsive or helpful and their lack of care in helping us when we were in a tough spot showed me how much care they put into running their clinic. Glad I found one that is responsive to help my daughter reach her developmental goals.

You would be making  a tragic mistake entertaining the thought that Beyond Therapy will provide the necessary services to address your child's needs. You will first hope they follow due process to get the necessary steps completed to get your child on there calendar.  To which is a challenge of its own, waited over a month after the approved referral and evaluation,  only to forward me over 3 different people who gave me 3 different reasons for the delay in scheduling my son.

Tried them before for speech and the cancellation rate on my son's sessions in just 1 month was incredibly alarming. This time around was for occupational.

I am a parent looking for the best treatment for my son . if your reading this review its because you are probably also a parent looking for the best for your child. Trust me Beyond Therapy Is NOT the way to go. Disappointment is unfortunately all you will find with this company.

I'm grateful for the trainers at Beyond the Leash for taking such good care of my energetic/ anxious lab. It's by far the most relaxed boarding experience we've had. The daily updates and photos were wonderful. I could see her getting more and more comfortable each day. Highly recommend and look forward to working with BTL trainers in group classes, private lessons, and dock diving. Thank you!

I recently rescued a 1.5 yr old boxer and wanted help training her to fit into our family as I have a 11yr old mini schnauzer and a 4yr old son at home. Beyond the leash has given me the confidence that I needed to make sure we could all have a happy and safe environment. The training and daycamp have been our most valuable investment and I would recommend them to any dog owner who is looking for help. They really care about your dog and are very happy to help us humans succeed in our training goals.

I cannot speak highly enough about Beyond The Leash. My pup Ollie considers it his second home. He loves going to camp every week! The trainers and staff are so welcoming, positive and reassuring to help you meet your goals. Plus the added conveniences for grooming, classes, vet services and boarding! They‚Äôre just the best. My saving grace as a first time puppy mom :)

We are so grateful for Beyond the Leash!

As first-time dog parents, we honestly didn‚Äôt know what to expect, but joining Beyond the Leash has been one of the best decisions we‚Äôve made for our puppy, Ollie.

We‚Äôve taken two classes so far (Puppy 101 and Pawsitive Beginnings) and the growth we‚Äôve seen in Ollie has been amazing. He‚Äôs more confident, eager to learn, and we‚Äôve grown just as much alongside him. We feel so much more equipped to understand and meet his needs, thanks to what we‚Äôve learned.

Puppy 101 was the perfect introduction to life with a dog. Kim, the owner, is incredibly knowledgeable and supportive. She helped lay a strong foundation, not just for Ollie, but for us as dog parents. We walked away understanding what it truly takes to raise a happy, fulfilled pup.

Pawsitive Beginnings with Rachel has taken things to the next level. Rachel is such a thoughtful, encouraging trainer who clearly loves what she does and it shows. Ollie lights up every time he sees her, and we love watching his confidence grow in every class.

On top of that, Ollie also attends their day camp, and I have never seen him so excited to go anywhere. The whole team clearly loves and cares for each dog like their own. Every time we drop him off, we know he‚Äôs in amazing hands.

A special shoutout to Rachel and Amanda, who adore our boy and make him feel so loved. Their kindness, patience, and genuine passion for what they do make such a difference.

We truly can‚Äôt recommend Beyond the Leash enough. Whether you‚Äôre brand new to dog parenting or looking to deepen your bond with your pup, this is the place.

We‚Äôre already looking forward to taking the next class! Thank you to everyone at Beyond the Leash!

Beyond the Leash has been amazing! The trainers are all so helpful and informative. We‚Äôve done classes, private sessions, and day camp where Churro gets lots of attention working on her areas of need! She still has a ways to go, but we‚Äôve seen so much progress since working with the trainers here!

review_text: If it wasn‚Äôt for this academy‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt know where we would be today. provider_name: Big Bear Academy PPEC Miami - Medical Daycare
review_text:
When I first considered placing my son in a PPEC I was so uneasy with the idea. After visiting other centers I definitely thought this was not for us but then..... I walked into Big Bear Academy and immediately saw the love and care they give to the kids!
Almost 3 years later and I can not imagine our journey with out them.  They help meet me at Doctor Appointments, take him for blood work and most importantly, give him the best care!
Our family loves Big Bear and we are so grateful to have them in our lives!

Gabriel, where have you been all my life! I can't say enough good things about Garbriel.  I felt like I was in truly capable hands with him.  He took the time to understand my injuries (lifetime of tennis) and goals for recovery.  He tailored my needs and explained each therapy.  He has genuine care and encouragement.  I have been several sessions and feel much stronger even after the first session. He has also given me exercises at home that I didn't know about all these years.  Gabriel is a very skilled and compassionate therapist.  I can't thank him enough

Gabe is really more than just a PT - he is a spinal alignment & mobility coach. I've been seeing Gabe for a few years now, he's helped me work back from a number of Spinal and nerve related Ski and Mountain Biking Injuries. When I had a concussion, Gabe mobilized the Fascia around my cranium/skull to loosen nerve endings and help me get back to normal brain function. I felt immediate head relief as I left Gabe's office and could not have gotten back to 100% without that treatment.

Gabe not only is an absolute pro at mobilizing your joints, his ability to recognize a pattern and diagnose an imbalance is second to none. With Gabe, I get vital stability exercises and alignment techniques which many do not have the skill or knowledge to target. When I have a fall or over-use injury, he finds a way to mobilize and help me work through it, as opposed to being sidelined. Since I've been seeing Gabe, I no longer look at injuries as sidelining or adverse experiences, I see them as an opportunity to learn about my body and get stronger.

Gabe's approach to physical therapy is nuanced, and customized to how your body is feeling on that given day. It is rare to find a Physical Therapist who is A) willing to listen to your body's feedback and introduce gentle, nuanced treatment but also B)
can provide strong, pressure point and fascia treatment that will have you mobilized (and maybe a little sore) the next day. Whatever the injury, Gabe will listen and choose the best route forward for you!

Gabe has my highest recommendation ‚Äì he is an incredible physical therapist!  I have seen him for a couple of years at his prior location, and will miss him a lot!  I‚Äôve seen him for a wide variety of issues, and he did a great job with all of them.  I‚Äôve had lots of issues due to a chronic illness, and later being hit on the ski hill.  Gabe has helped me get better and has given me things to do so that I can help with my own healing.

Gabe makes sure that he understands the issue before he begins treatment - he is super smart and thoughtful, and his knowledge of anatomy is impressive.  I think that his experience as a professional dancer gives him a greater understanding of the body and how all of it works together, and how pain in one area might actually be related to an issue in another area.  He does not just think about one small area ‚Äì he considers anything that might be related to the issue to develop a treatment plan that is effective.

While Gabe is a fantastic therapist, another huge benefit to being Gabe‚Äôs patient is that you get to interact with Gabe.  There‚Äôs something really special about who Gabe is as a person ‚Äì he creates an environment that is calming and conducive to healing. Gabe listens carefully, has a thoughtful and effective approach to treatment, and cares about his patients.  He is an absolutely wonderful person who puts a lot of thought into his treatment, and gets great results!

Gabe is an amazing physical therapist!! I am a 16 year old dancer. I dance many hours a week, and have participated in local and national competitions. When I have been injured, or am in pain from overuse, Gabe has been there for me. Gabe could always figure out what I did to cause my issue and how to fix it. Because he is a dancer, Gabe was also able to help me in ways that no other therapist has been able to do - he knows dance so well that he could help me figure out how to adjust the way I was doing certain dance moves to avoid re-injuring myself. He understands exactly what parts of the body should be used for certain moves, and helped me understand that, so I could improve the safety and quality of my dancing for the future.

I also enjoyed getting to know Gabe as he worked on me. He is a very cool guy who is supportive, easy to talk to, and creates a space where anyone can feel comfortable. I know that Gabe genuinely cares about me, and even though he has moved to Florida, I look forward to staying in touch with him!

I highly recommend Gabe!

Gabe is AMAZING! He has helped me heal a multitude of injuries while keeping me dancing through them all. He has a great knowledge and understanding of my needs as a dancer and was able help me recover without sacrificing my training. Along with this I left sessions seeing actual results and feeling stronger than before. He also gives an amazing regiment of exercises that helped push my training to the next level while also keeping my body safe from further injury. Gabe is a great PT and an even better person and I would highly recommend him to anyone!

A couple of months ago my family moved to Port Saint Lucie. I was nervous about having to switch my toddler to a different office for her OT and ST. From the very beginning, Elizabeth made me feel so comfortable and took a lot of care with my 2 year old. She has so much passion for what she does. She was able to schedule my toddler with Vanessa and Rita, and get us started very fast. My little one had a tough time adjusting but both Vanessa and Rita had so much patience with her and were able to get her comfortable with the new setting.
Now that we‚Äôre having to do online therapy sessions because of COVId-19, I am even more grateful for both of her therapists.
It‚Äôs been quite a ride to get my toddler adjusted, but again with all the patience in the world they have really made it happen! My daughter looks forward to her zoom sessions with her therapists and we‚Äôre able to get so much done! I have seen such a difference with my toddler! I absolutely love everyone in this office and consider them family. It‚Äôs a great place with very caring therapists. ‚ù§Ô∏è

My son has been seeing Miss. Rita since the beginning of the school year and we absolutely love Miss. Rita and Bilingual Key Therapy. Anytime I have questions the office staff is so accommodating. They work great with our school and schedule. Elizabeth was great at our evaluation and on top of my sons progress with Miss. Rita. We can‚Äôt thank Miss. Rita enough for all the time and love she gives our son.

My daughter has been going for a few months so far for speech therapy, and we have seen progress at home. Ms.Maitelyn has done a great job on my child. We are able to understand my child more than how she was before. Also, great and amazing staff they are all caring and loving towards the kids. They truly show their interest in teaching children and the love towards what they do!

Ms. Wanda is my toddlers therapist and he has shown such an improvement since we've been going here. He is a very active and hyper boy, so I love that she is very patient, creative and implements activities that keep his attention. The facility is always very clean and inviting. They have a fun activity wall in the waiting room to entertain the kids while we wait. I'm very satisfied with the services offered and would highly recommend. Thank you Wanda and Elizabeth for everything.

Elizabeth has been my kids speech therapist for years . She‚Äôs very nice , professional and educated! She treats my kids with such love and kindness. I fully recommend her! My kids have improved drastically and they also feel very comfortable with the attention she gives them!

I'm deeply moved to share my experience with Bit-By-Bit Medical Therapeutic Riding Center, a haven of healing and hope. This remarkable organization provides therapeutic horseback riding and equine-assisted activities, transforming lives and empowering individuals with physical, emotional, or cognitive challenges.

The center's expert staff and trained horses create a safe and supportive environment, tailored to each participant's unique needs. I've witnessed firsthand the profound impact of their programs, as individuals with disabilities or difficulties experience increased confidence, improved mobility, and enhanced well-being.

The therapeutic riding lessons are carefully designed to promote physical, emotional, and cognitive growth, while fostering a sense of connection and joy. The staff's dedication, compassion, and expertise are truly inspiring, making a lasting difference in the lives of participants and their families.

What sets Bit-By-Bit apart is its commitment to providing a nurturing and inclusive environment, where individuals can grow, learn, and thrive. The center's passion for equine-assisted therapy is evident in every aspect of their work.

I wholeheartedly recommend Bit-By-Bit Medical Therapeutic Riding Center to anyone seeking a holistic and transformative experience. Their programs offer a unique opportunity for personal growth, healing, and connection with nature and these magnificent animals.

Bit-By-Bit has earned my deepest admiration and gratitude. Their work is a testament to the healing power of horses and the human spirit. I look forward to continuing my involvement with this incredible organization and witnessing the continued growth and success of its participants.

I‚Äôm a disabled veteran.  I was a sergeant in the Marines, eight years, full-time active duty.  My VA counselor suggested equine therapy because I love horses so much!  The VA approved my equine therapy with Bit By Bit in beautiful Davie, South Florida.  I started in November 2024 and fell in love with the program.  The whole program, everything, and everyone are a five-star rating.  The horses are treated with love from everyone (I‚Äôm vegan on a spiritual level so this is most important to me and it reflects to all the staff who also LOVE horses!).  I‚Äôm also blessed with my timing to have seen the most recent building of their most beautiful arena overhead cover protection roof with huge fans in the ceiling but the location also has a beautiful natural breeze  there as well.  I have to also mention the beautiful location.  It‚Äôs seriously like a paradise located far far far away from any traffic or noise.  These horses have it all too.  Beautiful clean and organized stables, and free roaming areas.  Then there‚Äôs the staff!  They, and all he volunteers are incredibly kind, graceful, knowledgeable, and respectful.  They all (horses too of course) bring me great joy.  I‚Äôm so grateful!  THANK YOU AND BLESS YOU ALL!  Jozeph

Bit by Bit Therapy in Davie, Florida, is truly a gem for families seeking physical, speech, and occupational therapy. The unique incorporation of horses into their therapy sessions sets this facility apart, making the experience enjoyable and engaging for my children. The therapists are not only highly skilled but also incredibly compassionate, creating a welcoming environment that puts both kids and parents at ease.

One of the highlights of Bit by Bit is the opportunity for my kids to connect with the horses. These gentle giants play a pivotal role in therapy, helping to improve balance, coordination, and communication skills in a fun and interactive way. On rainy days, the facility seamlessly transitions to a cozy indoor space, ensuring that therapy continues without interruption. The thoughtful planning and adaptability of the staff make each visit productive, regardless of the weather.

My kids genuinely look forward to their sessions at Bit by Bit. The joy and excitement they exhibit when interacting with the horses and the dedicated therapists speak volumes about the effectiveness of the program. I wholeheartedly recommend Bit by Bit Therapy to any family in search of a nurturing and effective therapeutic experience. It's a wonderful place where healing meets fun!

Highest recommendation for Bit By Bit Therapy. You must experience it to understand the healing behind it. Denise is such a pleasure to work with and extremely knowledgeable. She wants the best for her patients and will strive for it always. Go to them for any of your PT/OT needs, their staff is genuinely cares for you.
If you're looking to volunteer with the equestrian community.  This is the place, owners are very thorough with the care of their horses. Not suitable for the wheelchair bound population.

provider_name: Black Creek Pet Clinic at Poochies
review_text: Poochies Park is the BEST PLACE EVER for friendly dogs and their owners. I often think that half of my dog belongs to Poochies - we are there at least 5 days a week and we both love it! I've made friends and my dog gets such good play and exercise! Thank you for such a great place!

provider_name: Black Creek Pet Clinic at Poochies
review_text: such a good clinic. always helped my cat until his last day. and they made that the most positive experience they could.

provider_name: Black Creek Pet Clinic at Poochies
review_text: My cat Milo gave great reviews with this clinic lol. People are very friendly helpful and courteous!! I texted to order and pick up my cats flea meds quickly and was extremely convenient.

provider_name: Black Creek Pet Clinic at Poochies
review_text: Excellent staff, very caring and considerate to your pets needs.

Had the pleasure of attending a talk given by Mr. Baker which was factual, inspirational and definitely engaging!! I would highly recommend attending presentations given by this therapist who is both engaging and knowledgeable!

Great presentation... during the recent "Man Up to Wholeness workshop,  MTB's  points of interest and tips for stronger communication were well received. Thoughtful and insightful.

Nicely done,  kind sir!

I really can't put into words of how grateful I am for Mr.Baker. He has been my therapist for almost two years. My confidence amd belief in myself have grown so much in that time. If you are looking for a great therapist that is relatable, encouraging, God fearing and has a great sense of humor. Mr. Baker is the one.

Mr. Merland is an exceptional person and therapist.  He listens, hears and genuinely cares for others.  He has worked with my family for over 5 years now.  He has been a Godsend for my sons and I. We were in the middle of a challenging situation and Mr. Merland walked right into our situation.  He is driven by his Christian values and principles.  He gives sound advice and guidance.  My family and I feel safe to share our struggles with him.  We trust Mr. Merland.    He is trustworthy understanding, compassionate, dependable and professional.  He has done more than what we expected; he has given us hope.  We are ever grateful.  He is a rare gift.  I highly recommend Mr. Merland to individuals and families alike who are seeking genuine, attentive and compassionate counseling.
I met Merland Baker through my sister.  Since knowing him, he has always been encouraging and has a smile on his face. Always thoughtful and welcoming.

I‚Äôm so happy with the service I‚Äôve received from this agency where my daughter will be starting her ABA therapy. Her insurance referred me to them, and from the very beginning, everything has been excellent. I called and was helped by Shelly, who was incredibly kind and efficient. What impressed me the most was how quickly she assisted me and sent all the documentation we needed to get started. It‚Äôs clear that they truly care about the families and the children they work with. Thank you for your dedication and professionalism

I highly recommend this place for families with special needs children. They have been an incredible support for my kids, providing them with the right tools and therapy, including Ava devices, which have made a huge difference in their progress. The staff is knowledgeable, compassionate, and dedicated to helping every child reach their potential. I‚Äôm so grateful for everything they‚Äôve done to assist my children in their growth and development. It's truly a place where kids get the help they need to thrive.

I highly recommend this place for any special needs child in need of therapy services. The staff is compassionate, patient, and truly understands how to work with children of all abilities. They provide excellent care, personalized attention, and make sure both the child and family feel comfortable and supported every step of the way. It‚Äôs clear they are passionate about helping every child reach their full potential. I‚Äôm so grateful for their dedication and the positive progress we‚Äôve seen.

I‚Äôm incredibly grateful for this place and all the support they‚Äôve provided for my children with special needs. The Ava devices have been a game-changer in their development. The staff is highly professional, caring, and always ensures that each child receives the personalized attention they need. They‚Äôve made such a positive impact on my children‚Äôs lives, and I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the progress they‚Äôve made. It‚Äôs a place where you truly feel that the kids are a priority.

I highly recommend this place for any special needs child in need of quality therapy services. The staff is incredibly kind, patient, and knowledgeable, and they truly care about each child‚Äôs progress and well-being. They take the time to understand each child‚Äôs unique challenges and strengths, creating a supportive and encouraging environment. It‚Äôs a wonderful place where children can grow, learn, and thrive. I‚Äôm so thankful for the care and dedication they show every day.

I can't say enough wonderful things about this clinic. Our child has made incredible strides while attending Bloom, and we are immensely grateful for the love, consideration, and patience they show and instill in our child everyday while preparing him to thrive in the world. The facility itself is an immaculate, inviting space and the staff is friendly and professional. Thank you, to everyone there, for all you do for these amazing children.

As another client has stated ‚Äúexpelled‚Äù so were my children,  due to negligence of cleaning toys keeping sickies on going and not honoring physician notes for absences.

They also fraudulently billed tricare days after our last day attended on 2/13 through 2/21 and other days that we missed. So beware and Pay attention to billing. Beware how quickly the owner will have an inappropriate attitude towards questioning any issues that your having.  Staff ‚ÄúRBT‚Äù would tell me child hit head wouldn‚Äôt have a report ready at hand and would deny it  saying fell on butt instead. I believe he was being pulled ‚Äúforced‚Äù falling back from hand being pulled. Not waiting him out.
During SLP/ OT evaluation my child was forced to sit in a desk highly upset and sick with a fever. Blowing bubbles in his face while he was obviously dazed out in a absence seizure or confusion not even relating to me being there. Had a fever that morning and DR note. Ignored it. Kept him for 6 hours with a fever no notice to me crying/ grunting all day. No meds. Within an hour of being home he had tonic clonic episode. Takes days for him to recover. Forcibly want the child there not putting them first. Owner instructed staff to pressure me to leave him even after said he‚Äôs sick. Later that night had seizure after not having one for over a year! Started meds and consults and other diagnoses. It was too stressful for him.

At our new place not once has there been an issue with missing days while actively having a fever. Don‚Äôt want all the kids or center to catch the bug.

Bloom wants the money daily don‚Äôt have the best interest of the child at hand. children cried turning into the parking lot of this place! Hand full of others kids cried daily. My gentle giant was being accused of biting out of his character. Both kids love new their new center not once they been upset walking in. Not forced to apply immediately allowed to be redirected or waited out. My child is used for tour kids/ new clients. Other saying words. This place is not a fit for anyone that questions them or If you put your child first.

My son attended Bloom for OT related to hand strength. He absolutely loved working with Samantha Edgar and improved at a rate that exceeded all of our expectations. His improvement aside, the excitement and joy he had while working with her is something that made a positive experience into a wonderful experience.

Bloom Behavioral Solutions is exceptionally inept. Our kiddo 4 y/o kiddo attended for 5 months. Our family communicated daily with the staff.  Only to have the rug pulled out from under us; when they expelled the child with no warning from services. For those who can appreciate how important routine is for ASD kiddos, this was devastating.  Then to add insult to injury, they failed,  after our repeated requests, to provide timely invoices so we could benefit from reimbursements from Step-Up. Needless to say, we lost that too.   Bloom Behavioral Solutions is not worth the headache and heartache they‚Äôve cause us.   BEWARE!!

I have nothing but amazing words to say for Bloom! My son has turned into the best version of himself with the help from all the RBTs, office staff, and Shannon. A thank you will never be enough. If you are looking for a safe, loving, informative, and resourceful facility this is the place. So happy to of found Bloom‚ò∫Ô∏è

I cannot recommend Kristy enough! I started seeing her during my pregnancy to prepare for a natural home birth, and the care and knowledge she provided made such a difference. She helped me build strength in my pelvic floor, learn how to push effectively, and feel confident going into labor.

Because of her guidance, my home birth went beautifully with no tearing. Throughout every session, Kristy was kind, understanding, and so encouraging. She pushed me in such a positive, uplifting way. Her expertise and calm presence made me feel supported the entire time, both before and after birth.

If you‚Äôre pregnant or postpartum and looking for a pelvic floor therapist who truly knows what she‚Äôs doing and cares about you as a person, Kristy is amazing!

I came to bloom to post-birth for pelvic floor recovery. I had done PT after my first pregnancy but my issues were not fully resolved. Paige is my physical therapist and has exceeded my expectations for teaching about the pelvic floor, understanding my individual concerns and providing an approachable plan to recovery. Paige is the most personable health professional I have ever worked with, she listens and makes it clear she really cares about her clients. I will be sad once I am fully recovered to not have consistent visits with Paige - she's that good!

Kristy is phenomenal at what she does! I'm so thankful I found her and am getting the help I needed.

I've been coming here now for about 6 months. Through that time she has helped me heal my stomach tremendously, giving me new tools to use every time I see her. She allows me to move at my own pace, she makes me feel confident and comfortable, and listens to me every time I communicate with her.

A year ago I went to numerous doctors, spending too much time trying to figure out solutions, and taking medicines that only made me feel worse. Finally, after going to the Mayo Clinic, my doctor instructed me to find a pelvic floor physical therapist.

After months of excruciating daily pain just from simply drinking a water bottle, I never would have thought that massages, exercises, and yoga would cure me, but here we are.

Now, my stomach pain isn't even my first though in the morning and I'm thankful I've gotten here. There was a time I never thought that would be possible.

I hope for anyone who is even hesitant about physical therapy can hear my story and simply just give it a shot. This has literally been a life changer. Thank you to Bloom and Dr. Kristy Clements!

I highly recommend Bloom Pelvic Floor Therapy to anyone experiencing pelvic floor conditions. In a very short period after starting therapy, my symptoms improved dramatically. Saige Evans put together a personalized treatment plan that includes therapeutic activities that I can perform at home to enhance the overall experience.  Seeking therapy at Bloom was an excellent decision in my treatment journey.

Dr Kristi is awesome! I sought her help when I was experiencing significant pelvic floor pressure while running, about 1 year after having my first child. Her assessment was thorough and every session built on each other until I was ready to run again. I just had my second baby, so I'll definitely be back to see her to ensure I'll be able to run again.

Excellent professionals at the service of the community
This place has been a game changer for my son. He loves his therapist and we love the staff. I can't recommend Blossom enough!

Sheila and the team at Blossom have worked miracles on my daughter‚Äôs behaviors. My daughter has been with them for a year and a half and her behaviors have improved and she is talking so much. When she started she could not speak.

Whenever I have shared a concern with Sheila she listens and addresses the situation. Same with other members of the team. I have also done parent training sessions with them so I may continue whatever practices they use at the center at home with my daughter.

Sheila and her team genuinely care about the kids and their development.

Blossom Behavior Therapy has done so much for my daughter. When my 3 year old began speech therapy she was barely speaking a word and wouldn't call me mom. Now she's speaking like a parrot and one of my favorite phrases is, mommy I love you. They even helped me potty train my little one in a short period of time. Sheila is an amazing owner/therapist who's passionate about helping children with delays. Everyone in this institution is very professional, kind, loving and flexible. I'm glad to have them in my daughter's corner. I recommend this institution to all parents who are dealing with similar challenges I've faced and continue to face.
