provider_name: Blossom Speech & Language Therapy- Boca Raton
review_text:
**Review of Blossom Speech Therapy**

I am pleased to share my experience with Blossom Speech Therapy, where my 4-year-old son has been receiving support for nearly a year. From the outset, the staff has been exceptionally kind and attentive, creating a welcoming environment that has significantly eased the therapy process.

The office itself is always clean and organized, which adds to the overall positive atmosphere. One of the standout features of Blossom is their commitment to communication. The team is accommodating and works diligently to fit sessions into our schedule, making it convenient for our family.

Most importantly, I have witnessed a remarkable improvement in my son's daily life since starting therapy. The strategies and techniques implemented by the therapists have made a substantial difference in his speech development and confidence.

I wholeheartedly recommend Blossom Speech Therapy to any parents seeking effective speech therapy for their children. The combination of a supportive staff, a clean environment, and impactful communication truly sets this practice apart.

provider_name: Blossom Speech & Language Therapy- Boca Raton
review_text: Blossom Speech is an amazing place with wonderful people! Elisa is always so helpful and accommodating. Our daughter, Sierra, has worked with Emily ‚Äî who is so sweet and patient ‚Äî and is now working with Bella, who she‚Äôs taken to just as easily. Sierra has made huge improvements since starting with the Blossom team, and we‚Äôre excited to continue seeing her growth!

provider_name: Blossom Speech & Language Therapy- Boca Raton
review_text:
My son has been receiving services from Blossom Speech Therapy for the past 3 months, and I can't say enough good things about our experience! My child has been working with Emily, who is not only skilled and knowledgeable but also warm, patient, and incredibly engaging. We've seen great progress.
We've also had the chance to meet other members of the team, and it's clear that the entire staff is equally dedicated, kind, and professional. The environment at Blossom is welcoming and supportive.
A special shoutout to Elisa, she‚Äôs been absolutely amazing. Her responsiveness and clear communication have made scheduling, tracking progress, and navigating any changes feel effortless. Her professionalism and reliability help everything run smoothly, and it‚Äôs been such a relief to know we‚Äôre in good hands.

review_text: The staff is amazing and extremely friendly. My oldest son is autistic and my younger son has a speech delay, so I had the opportunity to work with Mallory, Erin, and Karissa. They are all very patient, knowledgeable, and thorough. When the speak to me about what each child needs to do, they offer great advice and insight.

provider_name: Blossom Speech & Language Therapy- Boca Raton
review_text: We love Mallory! She is a very warm, friendly and welcoming speech therapist. We have been coming here for 6 months and we can see a big difference in our child‚Äôs progress. I love this kennel, and my dogs love this kennel. Love this family-owned business!
Angus had the time of his life playing with a pack and enjoying being a dog!

100% trustworthy!!  They truly love and care about  my dogs and my MIL‚Äôs dog.  One could not find a better place for their pets!!

I believe my baby was fully taken care of; and spoiled!!!

We‚Äôve had a wonderful experience with the care behavior therapy services provided for our child with autism. Since starting therapy, we‚Äôve seen noticeable improvements in our child‚Äôs behavior, communication, and daily functioning. The team is compassionate, patient, and truly dedicated to understanding our child‚Äôs unique needs.

Their approach has made a real difference in our lives, and we‚Äôre incredibly grateful for their support and expertise. I highly recommend their services to any parent looking for effective, personalized care for their child.

My experience with Blue Care Behavior Therapy has been incredible. The team is exceptionally dedicated to helping children overcome their challenges, especially in key areas such as language and behavior.

What impresses me most is the warm and nurturing environment they provide. The therapist are highly trained and demonstrate endless patience with each child, creating a space where they feel safe and understood. Furthermore, the individualized attention they provide to each child is outstanding, allowing each to progress at their own pace in a way that suits their unique needs.

Their approach is holistic, helping children not only learn to communicate but also to function more effectively in their social environment. It is evident that their primary goal is children's well-being and development, and they achieve this excellently.

I recommend you the services of Blue Care Behavior Therapy to any family seeking professional support for their child's development.

I have a son with high functioning autism, and I began using the services of Blue Care Behavior Therapy a few months ago. The amount of growth that my child has achieved in working with his therapist has been absolutely mind blowing. She is patient with him and creates a safe space for him as he works through his behavioral therapy, which speaks not only to her professionalism, but also the company that she works for.

If you have a child who needs ABA therapy or any other kind of services that relate to autism Or spectrum disorders, I could not recommend this company enough. I even carry business cards with me to pass out to other autism moms that I meet, knowing that the care and support that they will receive will be life-changing.

I highly recommend Blue Care Behavior Therapy!!

Blue Care Behavior Therapy It's a company that has it all, in my opinion. From the professionalism of its BCBAs, BCaBAs, RBTs, and other staff involved in ensuring the highest ethical standards, as well as the ongoing development and training of its staff, to the service provided to each client and their families for a better quality of life and, above all, the best possible integration of children into their environment. They achieve new skills, autonomy, and improved behavior. Where beautiful work is done and everyone wins. I recommend it 100%.

I am the mother of a child diagnosed with ASD. I am very happy with the therapy my child receives from this company. There is good communication and well-trained professionals to address any doubts or concerns, as well as respect, interest, and commitment to my child's progress. Any mother in this situation would want support and a service like this, which is why I recommend it 100%.

I find that Scott‚Äôs advice and sincerity has been very helpful in my healing. He demonstrates great, listening ability and has tremendous sympathy for those who are struggling with day-to-day issues. I highly recommend this gentleman and his practice Who need help in life?

Someone really needs to review this guy's license to practice. We brought our kid here to get therapy and he let a child manipulate him and turn him against the parents. I showed up for a parents session and he provoked me in his office and continued to do so all the way to the elevator. This guy is incapable of recognizing manipulation from troubled kids. I wonder how many parents he's had thrown in jail because they stood up to him for provoking them in his office. I would never recommend his services to anyone!

I called this office 5 times with no return calls. I was an established patient and this is how I was treated. No excuse is good enough. I wouldn't go to this provider if he was the last one in Brevard County!! That is totally unacceptable!!
Dr. Harcourt went above and beyond for my daughter. He was very nice, took his time with us and made sure we had all we needed to move forward. If I could give 10 stars I would! Highly recommend.
Dr. Harcourt is above and beyond awesome. Super knowledgeable and very helpful. Hands down the best.

Dr Olivia Carelli literally saved my life. I deal with depression and was at my lowest point in my life. On my first call with Dr. Carelli, she instantly showed compassion and empathy. She listened and asked thoughtful questions, peeling back the onion of my life. I HIGHLY recommend Olivia Carelli to anyone who wants someone to talk to that is easy to listen, and ask pointed questions and you know she is listening to every word I say and every word I do NOT say. That is a skill that makes all the difference in the world.
Bottom line, Dr. Carelli made me feel my life is worth living. Thank you Olivia for your dedication to your field. You are a blessing.

I‚Äôve been seeing Dr. Carelli for over a year now and the counseling she has given me has been invaluable. She is smart, empathetic, practical and has helped me transform my life in the most positive way. I recommend her to everybody in my life who is needs a bit of extra support because the care she puts into her clients is one of a kind. It‚Äôs an amazing feeling to feel so seen and supported through very difficult periods in life. I can‚Äôt say enough great things about her, Dr. Carelli has truly been a light in my life and I am grateful to have built such a meaningful therapeutic relationship with her.

I can attest to Olivia‚Äôs professionalism, empathy, and expertise. She‚Äôs provided resources that other providers have never mentioned. She‚Äôs a system thinker with an understanding of complex intersectionality. She‚Äôs a mother and understands the trials and tribulations inherent to both body and mind. She‚Äôs on her game, and she‚Äôs there for you. I felt fortunate when she took me on, and each time she sees me, I gain a pathway of agency. It‚Äôs been a game changer for me and my family. I am forever grateful that she is who she is.

I‚Äôve made such strides since beginning therapy with Lee 6 months ago. It‚Äôs been such a safe space for me to process very difficult feelings/circumstances and he‚Äôs patient with me yet challenges me when appropriate. This balance in a therapist is hard to find. He‚Äôs also got a great sense of humor and allows for laughter amongst processing heavy things. Cannot recommend enough!

Dr. Carelli is extremely compassionate and understanding. As a client, she has inspired me with hope and perseverance. She has worked with me through highs and lows and I could not imagine a better therapist. I appreciate her candor and gentleness when approaching tough situations. From family trauma to self-image, she has been supportive and helpful in all endeavors.

Overall, Dr. Carelli is empathetic, caring, and supportive. She spends time explaining and validating concerns, as well as celebrating your successes and grieving your losses alongside you. She is an amazing therapist who is truly in tune with her clients.

I am incredibly grateful for the support and guidance I have received from Blue Minds LLC, and in particular, from Carolina. From the very beginning, Carolina has been an exceptional source of help, compassion, and knowledge. She took the time to truly listen to me as a parent, understanding not just my concerns but also the emotional weight of advocating for my daughter.

What stood out the most was how patient and thorough Carolina was in explaining every step of the process. She provided clear, practical information and made sure I felt supported and informed at every stage. Her willingness to go the extra mile‚Äîwhether it was answering my questions, helping me access resources, or simply offering words of encouragement‚Äîhas made all the difference in this journey. After years of misinformation and struggling with my daughter I can see finially a light.

Knowing that someone so professional, empathetic, and knowledgeable is in our corner has brought immense peace of mind.

I wholeheartedly recommend Blue Minds LLC and Carolina to any family seeking understanding, personalized support, and real solutions. Thank you Carolina

I 100% recommend BlueMinds for anything related to therapy for children. In Mrs. Caro, I have found the ideal support to help my son make progress in his relationship with food. She has been extremely clear, has explained the process thoroughly, and has guided us step by step so that, as a family, we can better support our son, who feels very comfortable and calm going to therapy‚Äîhe has fun, learns, and even enjoys foods he previously wouldn't eat. Don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out to her!

can‚Äôt say enough good things about Carolina. She was instrumental in helping me navigate the challenging process of finding resources and obtaining an ASD diagnosis. She patiently answered all my questions‚Äînever once making me feel like a burden‚Äîand consistently followed up after our conversations. Her support was truly exceptional. I haven‚Äôt experienced this level of care and dedication anywhere else

From the moment we met Carolina she has been so informative and she helps us to understand every single detail to help and making our process smooth. Carolina I don't know how you do it but hats down to you because you do an amazing job. We have had the great pleasure of having Mrs. Patricia as an RBT working with our daughter and she exceeded our expectations. Patricia has a heart of gold and she due to her strategies and relentless efforts we have seen so much improvement with our daughter.  We are forever grateful for Mrs. Patricia, she communicates everything with us so we always feel included on things we can work on at home with her and our daughter even asks for Mrs .Patricia even at home ... so we know in so many ways that our daughter likes her aswell....
We have also had a great pleasure of working with Mrs. Xio which we met in the summer program and she also left such a good impression on us as she would suggest different skills that actually works for our daughter.  And lastly Saara Alam is amazing... she is makes you so comfortable and she is always open and ready to offer great resources to educate us on important information to educate us on everything we need to know, we have learned alot with Saara. Thank you Blue Minds for helping us through this journey , we are forever grateful for each of you.

In a situation that can be confusing and difficult to manage on your own, the Blue Minds team is exceptional at making you and your family feel seen, confident and understood. As a first time parent going through the process of having a special needs child is so challenging and Carolina Xioreli, Niggle and Saaraa were there every step of the way to ensure that we will get through all the challenges. We had the best and most knowledgeable RBTs who made every session so much fun for my son that he had no idea how much progress and learning he was doing! Blue minds changed our lives for the better! I am so immensely grateful for this team!

What a disappointment! Called a month ago and was informed that they do not take my insurance. I was confused being their website states they did, so I reached out to them via social media. When they responded I was informed that I was given the wrong information and that they do in fact take my insurance. At that time I was informed that someone from the office will call, they never did. I ended up following up and speaking to the office manager Sara. When I spoke to her she apologized for the miscommunication and told me that they do in fact take my insurance and I was even given Dr.Hamiltons NPI # for my insurance. Today a month later was my appointment for my daughter and I. Took my child out of school early and traveled 30 minutes to the office. We arrived at the office five minutes before my appointment to be informed from the office manager that they stopped taking my insurance. I asked to speak to Sabrina the owner who was the one that told the office manager that they are no longer taking my insurance, to which Sabrina would not speak to me. Though when I was speaking to the office manager she slipped up on her words and said that Sabrina was not accepting new patients. There is a poor lack of communication from the owner Sabrina to the office manager and front staff. I waited a month for this appointment for them to completely drop the ball. The owner Sabrina should have came out from the back to address the situation instead of putting it on her office manager Sara. Very sad this is what the health industry has come to, complete negligence and no care for patients.

You as the owner did not even have the consideration to come to the front to speak with me. My daughter and I both had appointments scheduled that we waited a month for. It has nothing to do with system transition. It had to do with the incompetence of you as the owner deciding two weeks before our appointments to no longer accept new patients. You as the owner should has told your office manager to reach out to patients to let them know you are no longer taking new patients. You agreed to see us for what? To just bill the insurance company that you supposed on no longer take. If you no longer take it, you wouldn‚Äôt be able to bill for it. You are getting caught in your lies and it‚Äôs very sad as a vet and a professional that you would act like this and not accept your fault as an owner. Also just like the picture below of your website states that you take sunshine health. Falsely advertising?

I honestly feel so blessed to have been recommended to Brittnee Spooner, Family Nurse Practitioner. After years of battling migraines, she has given me 5 strong months completely migraine-free. That feels like a miracle to me.

Brittnee is not only incredibly thorough but also so caring and genuine. She listens, she understands, and she truly goes above and beyond for her patients. I can‚Äôt thank her enough for giving me my life back. She is nothing short of amazing, and I‚Äôm forever grateful.

I had a wonderful experience with Stephanie as my primary care provider. She took the time to listen to all of my concerns and provided truly holistic and caring care during my visit. I felt seen, heard, and supported, and she addressed my health needs in a way that made me feel comfortable and confident in the plan we created together. I am grateful to have a provider who genuinely cares about my overall well-being.

Had THE BEST EXPERIENCE üëç

I can tell you that she listens, cares and is honestly so knowledgeable and sincere.  The office is beautiful.  They do everything in the office, blood work, tests etc.

Sabrina makes you feel like she has known you forever.  We are so happy and they are now our entire families family practice ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

Its nice to have someone actually listen and care‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

I called for an appointment and got in the same day and the staff was exceptional. They took their time with me. The PA her name is Amy was so thorough and I really felt like she listened to me. I had a little ear issue and they were very thorough and Gave me a peace of mind that nothing was wrong with my ear. I would highly recommend Blue Skies Wellness Center. The owner Sabrina came out personally to introduce herself. It was a great experience and the facility is beautiful. They will be my primary care center.

Blue Sky Therapeutic Services is best source for personal growth, development, and healing.  Dillon Welliver provides open communication and a safe environment to address all of life challenges.  I cannot recommend them enough for any individual looking for help.

Dillon and Allison are amazing therapists. They are empathetic and invested in their clients. Combined, they have a wealth of experience in a variety of areas that make them an excellent team well-versed in almost all challenges you might experience as an individual seeking services. I highly recommend their services to anyone who finds him or herself in need of support or guidance with life challenges

I've known and worked closely with Dillon and Allison for the past 6 years. They are utmost professionals, really know how to get to the heart of what a person is needing to work on, and provide compassionate and understanding support along the way. You won't find better online counselors than these two. They really understand adolescent issues and the challenges of expatriate life. I heartily endorse!

I have been working with Dillon at Blue Sky since 2021, and , have not regretted it one bit. I was referred to him for chronic pain. I do not get along with psychologist but I accepted the offer to at least hear him out. So I did.
The initial appoint was basically the norm of getting to know each other patient to doctor and vise versa. I was fully expecting to fire him immediately. You see, I'm a combat vet with alot of issues, lol. Dillon's approach to the first meeting led me to be intrigued and since 2021 I see him once a week and just learning stuff from him about my head.
In Dec 2021 Dillon realized I was an extremely bad alcoholic and bought up the idea of a rehabilitation facility for alcoholics. I said "heck no". But went insane one night and Dillon did his as always "Over The Top" burning the midnight oil, Dillon magic. He got me to where I needed to be to tackle my mental well being from a place of sobriety and I can never thank him and Blue Sky enough. I am sober now for over a year, loving it and not looking back. Thank You Dillon, I owe you my life.

Very Respectfully
Fred Wiggins
SFC US ARMY (Ret)
Allison and Dillon make an excellent team! You're sure to get the quality of service you're looking for at Blue Sky Therapeutic Services.

Never fun to have a sick kid on vacation but after driving to multiple places who don‚Äôt take sick out of towners we found this place! Mark was fantastic! We were in and out quickly. The rooms were clean. The waiting room had five year old approved toys and he even got a rubber duck as a parting gift. We obviously hope not to have a sick kid on vacation here again but if we do we will be back.

Such a great experience! We went in as a new patient urgent care walk-in visit and warmly welcomed by the practice manager, Mark. The office was so clean and kid friendly, especially for my daughter who gets very anxious about any kind of medical visit. We were very quickly seen by the nurse practitioner, Sarah, who immediately connected with my daughter and made her feel seen and heard. I‚Äôm so happy to know they were available when we were in a pinch and have very open office hours as well.
I had an amazing experience with everyone Nurse Mark was amazing, gentle and kind. Dr. Richard was very well educated, kind, caring. Everyone bring your kiddos here

Absolutely incredible experience here. We went to a previous pediatrician who had us waiting for 2 hours, charged us close to $250 and spent 5-10 minutes with us.

Decided to come here after. We spent less, had 20 ish minutes with Dr Paul and they were on time.

We left feeling educated and respected. Have been telling all our friends about this place since! 10/10 recommend

We walked in for a sports physical and in about 15 seconds, Dr. Rich made an on-the-nose diagnosis on a condition my son has had for about 5 years that 4 previous medical professionals failed to see. I'm beyond impressed. Additionally his communication was both easy-going, informative and professional.  My experiences with the other staff have also been very positive as they have been very kind, approachable, and professional.  I highly recommend.

BluePearl Neurology department saved my Samoyed puppy Yeti‚Äôs life. They‚Äôve been informative, kind, caring, supportive and really everything I could want or ask for when it comes to my sweet puppy‚Äôs care. I‚Äôm eternally grateful to Dr. Knight and the whole tech team for diagnosing and treating my Yeti boy quickly. He has a long road to recovery but he wouldn‚Äôt be here today if it hadn‚Äôt been for this place and the wonderful team who took care of him.

Super grateful for Dr. Goodson for her care and support for my cat, Mac. He was diagnosed with GI lymphoma over 2 years ago at the age of 5. We just celebrated his 7 year birthday and he is doing so well. Much much better than he was back then. Dr. Goodson has been seeing him every 3 months over the years and has made adjustments to his care to ensure he is at his best. The time I have with him and quality of life he has because of the care, is invaluable. Thank you also to the support staff who love and care for him too. A wonderful place to go for your fur baby.

There are no words to convey the level of my appreciation for the skilled care and compassion received when I brought my pup, Willow, in for an emergency Neurology appt. Both Dr Knight and Dr Stark expertly evaluated, diagnosed and treated her. I truly feel that her care is in the best of hands with this dynamic neuro vet duo. In addition, the office staff was receptive and kind. The techs were professional and excellent in communication. Everyone showed a love of animals, including for my sweet girl, that was the added touch that I needed through this rough time. Thanks BluePearl‚ÄîMaitland Neuro!

I took my little fur baby, Star there yesterday and they took such good care of her. Everybody was so nice and friendly. We were able to get in last minute, thank goodness. The Veterinarian doctor came in and explained everything very thoroughly which I thoroughly appreciate and really took the time to go over everything. They quoted us a price of low too high of what it could be, and to be honest with you, I thought it was gonna be the high price, but it was actually more of the low price which says a lot that they‚Äôre actually not just after a money grab for sick pets But truly have their best interest. I would highly recommend them based on my experience.

A Life-Saving Experience at BluePearl Pet Hospital
I cannot thank the incredible team at BluePearl Pet Hospital in Orlando enough for saving my dog, Luigi. He was diagnosed with a severe spleen tumor, and the entire staff‚Äîfrom the front desk to the ICU teams‚Äîwas a lifeline for my family and me during the most difficult time.
Luigi is now home and on the road to recovery. He wouldn't be here without the skill, dedication, and genuine care of every person at BluePearl. I highly recommend them to anyone in need of emergency or specialized veterinary care.

provider_name: Bo Nose K9 Training, Daycare and Boarding
review_text:
I‚Äôve been coming to Bo Nose for over a year now, and I absolutely love this place! I have four dogs‚Äîtwo big, two small‚Äîand I can bring all of them here without a problem. Each of them has gone through multiple levels of training with Crystal and Brianna, and I constantly get compliments on how well they listen, follow commands, and how I‚Äôm even able to walk all four at once!

The whole team is fantastic, and I always feel confident that my dogs are in good hands. I‚Äôve used Bo Nose for training, daycare, and boarding, and every time my dogs come home happy, healthy, and tired (in the best way!).

Crystal and her team are especially great if you have a working line breed‚Äîthey truly understand their needs. They even have two pools and offer one-on-one swim time, which my dogs love. I know when I drop off my little herd, they‚Äôre safe, secure, and well cared for.

Best place in Cape Coral‚Äîhighly recommend!

provider_name: Bo Nose K9 Training, Daycare and Boarding
review_text: We boarded our 3 German Shepherds at Bo Nose for 3 nights. I was so happy to find a place that could board my 2 intact females, because it can be very difficult to find. My girls, Sierra, Indigo, and Echo, were all happy when we picked them up. Crystal said they were welcome back anytime and they had lots of fun. We asked to have their nails trimmed and they were able to provide that service as well! Very pleased we will definitely use BoNose again and highy recommend them to others.

provider_name: Bo Nose K9 Training, Daycare and Boarding
review_text: I can‚Äôt say enough about how satisfied I am and I totally recommend the dog training and boarding of Bo Nose K9!  My dog Bandit is so well trained now. I tried two other trainers prior to this experience and was not happy. My Vet recommended Bo Nose K9.  I am thrilled with the results. Gwen Mowrey is patient with the dog (and the owner) and really gets results! I give this business 5 out of 5 stars.

provider_name: Bo Nose K9 Training, Daycare and Boarding
review_text:
Crystal and her team are second to none! There is no one else I would trust to effectively and efficiently train my dog. I was shocked with how quickly my girl went from wild child to well-behaved, and Crystal and her team trained and equipped me with the tools to continue her success for the long-term.

I also board my girl with Crystal when I'm out of town, and I am overjoyed to have found a place where they not only treat my girl like family, but that she is always excited to go back to again and again!

If you're looking for a boarding and/or training facility for your furry family member, stop looking and head to Bo Nose!

provider_name: Bo Nose K9 Training, Daycare and Boarding
review_text: Crystal and her staff are amazing! I had to move unexpectedly and had nowhere to take my two German Shepherds. She was able to take them for me for almost a month. Her training is amazing, as well as the care she gave to my babies. I highly recommend her!

When I got my mastiff 4 years ago, I knew I needed to ensure she was well trained and manageable. I found Vicky and really
Helped my confidence, knowledge and ultimately helped my giant puppy learn manners and basic obedience.
3.5 years later we sought out  Vicky  again for
Help with our new Golden Retriever, and has been instrumental in our bonding and training journey.
Vicky is incredibly knowledgeable and has helped me train both of my dogs in ways that are fun, engaging and positive for them and has always adapted to their specific needs (enrichment, activity, learning style , etc).
Pictures are of the place command, watch me and leash walking

As a professional pet sitter and dog walker, I see firsthand the impact of great training and grooming and Bo‚Äôs Pawsitive K9 Services excels at both. One of their longtime clients, Max, is a joy to walk thanks to their expert training. He‚Äôs well-mannered, responsive, and a pleasure to handle. Their grooming is just as impressive Max always looks fantastic after his appointments. It‚Äôs clear they put great care and skill into their work, and I highly recommend them to anyone looking for top-quality dog care.

I absolutely love how each session was designed for our family and our fur babies needs. I have a 5 year old husky that wouldn't stop ripping my arms off while walking him. I had given up and decided it wasn't worth it to take him on walks. I was referred to Vicki and thought I would try. I didn't have a ton of hope but after the third session my fur baby was waking like a champ and not a sled dog. She even helped us with basic commands and obedience. One is the biggest things that made this experience so amazing was that my baby loved every time she would come over and it never seemed like torture. I am able to do things with my doggy I never thought we would do. I am absolutely going to keep utilizing her in the future. Especially for public handling and help him become a good K9 citizen. I would 100% recommend this company. My whole family gaining a lot from these sessions.

Kara always makes my boy stitch look so handsome, I will never trust anyone else to take care of him! Always is so gentle and patient with him. Vicky has also worked with us and our very stubborn girl blue. Teaching us so many things to get a better understanding of her and help her. I trust no one else with our babies

Over the years of owning a dog-reactive dog, Vicky has been a tremendous help in helping my fianc√© and I to understand how to assess and rectify stressful situations for our Stormie. I don‚Äôt know where we would be without her training, and the results have been apparent with how well Stormie can handle seeing a dog nowadays. Kara is a stellar groomer,  who takes all the time in the world to make sure dogs in her care are comfortable throughout the whole grooming process. I can‚Äôt recommend this service enough‚Äî these are people who will advocate for your dog and go to great lengths to ensure that owners understand every bit of training, body language and care there is to know about their individual dog!

This recovery center is not adequate to help people (physicians/nurses/APPs) struggling with addiction or mental health issues. Please see the many Yelp reviews of this place that are far more indicative of its quality than these five star reviews on google. I am writing under a pseudonym since I fear retaliation from the owners of this establishment as a former BoardPrep client mandated to be there by RPP. Stay away from this place. It is a money grab and a poorly run center that doesn't offer what many other more established rehab centers do. They do let you have more freedom and access to smart phones than other similar facilities. Some of the five star google reviews are from people who work there (either former or current).  Their programming is sophomoric at best with tedious repetitive sessions. Their discharge process was unpredictable and atrocious. The staff were NOT abusive or overly rude but definitely had an agenda and lack of thorough knowledge of recovery/therapy. The cost is around $17,000 a month and they tended to keep physicians there at least 90 days to get the full amount of money out of them.

Avoid BoardPrep Recovery if you can help it. There are a lot of other more professional and experienced rehab centers for healthcare professionals. The experience I had over more than three months was subpar to say the least. It's hard to even call this place a rehabilitation center. The Hardens (John and Elizabeth) who run the place you'll never see in person while you are there. If you are a physician referred by a PHP or other state physician health program like South Carolina RPP, they will most likely keep you over 90 days regardless of what they tell you from the beginning. Expect a lack of transparency and inadequate programming. The cost is $17k/month, which is cheaper than other rehabs. They do not provide food though they do provide housing. You sit in sessions from 8-2:30pm every day that are taught by barely competent therapists who often have you read aloud from printouts. They scratch the surface of topics like DBT/CBT/recovery. They have basically two therapists who run your sessions with occasional visiting lecturers who spitball topics in recovery. I found most of these sessions useless. You have weekly "art therapy" where you draw on paper with markers and do meditation sessions to start out your mornings. You have a once a week therapy session with your assigned counselor who projects on you what they think your problem is from the start. The staff don't prepare much for your sessions, and you sit in the same room everyday with a small group of men/women between 8-20 people. You have to rely on fellow rehab clients for transportation since the living quarters aren't close enough to the center or "coaches" that they employ. They take your technology/phone away for the first 1-2 weeks then give it back which is better than other places. You attend daily AA or NA meetings in the evenings in the area and have a little time to workout if they let you between 3pm and 6pm. You don't have much to do on the weekends except go to meetings and volunteer in the morning on Sunday at a soup kitchen for the homeless. They drug test you weekly randomly then charge you for it later. You see a psychiatrist and a NP once a week who gaslight you about discharge dates. When you leave, you typically have to do a weekly remote alumni zoom meeting for which they charge you $200/month. They take forever to draft your reports and drag their feet during discharge. The discharge process is disorganized and often involves extending your time there. They get angry when you try to get specifics. When you are ready to go it's often with a few days notice leading to expensive last minute travel plans. You fortunately get your own room in the living quarters which is nice, and they do inspect your room/count your pills regularly which is typical of rehabs. They will want you off of any controlled substance even if it is prescribed by your doctor. People got in trouble for having legally prescribed benzos or stimulants. If you test positive for alcohol when you arrive (either breathalyzer or Peth), they put you on a withdrawal protocol with benzos which is poorly monitored and often not evidence based (using a CIWA scale for instance). In summary, there is a pattern of poor programming, poor communication and just poor quality at BoardPrep. It is hard for me to see how any of the reviews are positive.

Board Prep has definitely given me a second chance at the rest of my life again! They helped me to regain my identity and sense of self that I had lost somewhere along my journey. I am able to brave the bright exciting adventure of sobriety with the necessary tools and support that I was missing before! Can't say thank you enough to everyone there, but especially my counselor Will and the kindest doctor I've ever met, Dr. Robben!

BoardPrep Recovery really changed my life! I was broken and not in a good place going into treatment. I had a lot thrown at me while in treatment and the staff helped me get through it.  The intense therapy had a positive impact on me! I no longer have to take depression medication. ALL of the staff are supportive, caring and nurturing. I can now say that I am almost 4 months sober and I am thriving and loving life! I would hands down recommend BoardPrep to anyone and everyone!

BoardPrep is fantastic. The entire group of therapists are amazing. Liz and John Harden did everything they could to create a safe, welcoming, and therapeutic environment. I am forever grateful for Dr. Derek Robben, Liz and John, to all of the therapists (Will, Julia, and Leora), and treasure my time at BoardPrep, as well as the immense knowledge and insight I‚Äôve gained. Thank you, all, for everything you do. You are truly saving lives!

Nice facility in one of the largest cities in Florida.   The last few hurricanes didn't do this area any favors however I'm confident give it a little bit of time they have it cleaned up and beautiful again.   Congratulations Florida State Fair Grounds,  you are on the right track.
Sophia had a house show here and the facilities were amazing. This place is as grand as the concessions were great and the area for performances was huge.

We really enjoyed watching our granddaughter compete in the State 4H  Show! Our only complaint was the concession stand closed mid-afternoon! It was very hot so we would have appreciated some cool drinks!
PCHA shows at the Bob Thomas Equestrian Center give competitors of all ages a great opportunity to learn, show, and make wonderful memories.
Amazing arena gret atmosphere

I wanted to take a moment to thank Dr. Meghan Braun for her guidance and expertise with my son's return-to-play plan.  He is a high school lacrosse player suffered a knee injury just prior to the beginning of last season.  In addition to being concerned about the knee itself, I was also concerned about him missing out of an entire season and being left behind.  After doing traditional PT at JOI I felt that he needed to be involved in lax even though he was not able to to participate in games or practices yet.  After doing some research I could not believe it when I came across the website for Body Mechanics because it was a continuation of PT but with a structured approach to begin strength training again while doing lax-specific lax drills and exercises.  His made a full recovered in time for his summer travel league and has been playing pain-free since then.  As a parent, my biggest concern was knowing what the right amount of training would be.....basically finding that balance between working through an injury vs. doing too much suffering a setback.  We absolutely could not have had the success we did without Dr. Meghan.  In addition to her knowledge, she is an athlete so she understands the difference between playing while not being perfect vs. having an actual problem and how to handle this.  Plus, she is extremely nice!  I could recommend her more!!!!
Pain is not growth after 50, it‚Äôs just pain. Doc Braun helped with stretching techniques and identify muscle groups to strengthen. I‚Äôd tell my contact list about her services.

Meghan is incredible! She immediately was able to relief my pain. She also showed me ways to keep it from coming back! I highly recommend her to anyone who needs or wants someone who is sincere and professional.

Dr. Meghan helped me get to the root of some hip pain that I've been experiencing for years. She is a great listener and provided exercises for me to do at home. Appointments were easy to schedule and I always looked forward to them! Will definitely be back! Thanks again!

Choosing a Physical Therapist can be daunting and difficult‚Ä¶ I am hoping this review provides a framework for future clients to consider utilizing Dr. Braun as an excellent provider for injury rehabilitation and physical performance enhancement.
1) Location and Hours of Operation are convenient‚Ä¶ Duval County is huge, but quality care is worth the drive.
2) Scheduling can be done online, which makes rescheduling or canceling efficient.
3) Free Consultation is a huge bonus‚Ä¶ You will get clear communication from Dr. Braun about the treatment process and concise answers to questions about your goals.
4) Highly qualified injury expertise‚Ä¶ I suffered from Frozen Shoulder. This type of injury is incredibly painful, physically limiting, and takes time to heal properly. Dr. Braun was a multi-faceted PT PRO, using a range of skills to gently and efficiently address dysfunctions in my neck, back, arm, and shoulder, to calm inflammation, reduce pain, and get ease of movement back into my whole body.
5) It‚Äôs a collaboration‚Ä¶ Dr. Braun has written a series of books that enhance the healing experience through personal journaling. Not only did this help keep me motivated, it managed expectations, supported me emotionally, and addressed mental blocks. As a client, I felt very empowered by this tool, and much more invested in my rehab outside of treatment visits with Dr. Braun.
6) Trust. I had an intricate injury, plus pre-existing conditions that made my case (at times) complex. I never lost faith that my shoulder would return to optimal function and I could relax, and believe in that because Dr. Braun is honest, and forthcoming about all aspects of treatment.

Lastly, I felt comforted and supported on my difficult days, and during periods when progress was slow‚Ä¶ physical therapy can be tough, Dr. Braun stayed invested and committed to providing the best outcome for me, I am so grateful.

Highly recommend. Book Now!

So thankful I found Body Mechanix when my back pain expanded to numbness in my right leg and knee.  After the free consultation where Dr. Brandon began to understand my lifestyle and goals, he was able to determine if Physiotherapy was the right treatment for me.  Once we began, he developed a treatment plan and was very transparent as he explained the reasons for the pain and provided the methods to become pain free.  I have learned so much from Dr. Brandon over the past 6 weeks about back pain and made it to Graduation Day!  Not only is he an awesome Physiotherapist, he has a great personality that makes you feel welcomed as a friend.

Dr. Brandon Alkire is very knowledgeable and provides a variety of options for recovery. He wants to understand what your goals are and utilizes his experience and patience to deliver those effectively. The practice is well organized, clean, and provides a great layout for all your needs. The ability to make you feel welcomed and keep things personable is also an extra bonus. I highly suggest going here for recovery, gaining strength, more flexibility, and enhancing your overall body mechanics!

I had low back and hip pain for a few years. In less than a month, Dr. Brandon was able to alleviate the tightness and pain. I was able to start running pain free for the first time in years. While there is still work to be done, it was amazing how quickly I saw results.

Very knowledgeable with anatomy. He was able to pinpoint exactly where I needed corrections. My chronic hip pain was gone after a few weeks and I regained flexibility and mobility. I‚Äôm grateful I made the appointment for PT, it was a game changer!

After my car accident, I started working with Dr. Brandon at Body Mechanix Physiotherapy and Fitness. From the beginning, he helped me not only recover physically but also understand what was happening in my body. Each session gave me more clarity about my injuries, the pain I was experiencing, and how my body‚Äôs own healing systems work. His approach made a real difference in both my recovery and my confidence moving forward. Thank you, Dr. Brandon!

Lisa is AMAZING. I needed her in a squeeze and she got me in that day. She is so knowledgeable in myofascial release, as well as nutrition, essential oils, and overall holistic health. I felt 100% better after our session. I am so grateful I met her and can‚Äôt wait to continue therapy with her.

first off ..... WOW !! what a amazing experience I had for my post surgery lymphatic massage. I am 4 days post op from lipo 360 / BBL / arm and chin lipo with jplasma and the professional masseuse that took care of me was Colleen . she made me feel so comfortable for my first time , especially with being sore . I was worried and she took all that worry away.  when I first made the appointment I talked to Lisa on the phone and she was so knowledgeable and you can tell she genuinely cared about me getting the correct treatment of healing post surgery , NOT just saying things to get another person through the door.  the ladies were so welcoming when I walked in and the place was so clean and set up beautifully. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND coming here if you are post surgery or not . I know I will definitely be looking into the classes when I'm healed and other services. thank you so much for making me feel amazing, relaxed and rejuvenated!!!

You need to read this!!!!!!
Hands down the best place to leave your stress OMG!!!!! What an amazing place . Let‚Äôs start with the staff so welcoming and warm‚ò∫Ô∏è Tammy and Lisa know what they doing!!!!!!! I have never been an such a Beautiful room it feels so relaxing, so quiet and clean‚Ä¶.. come onnnn the oils they use!!!! Smell like heaven. Thank you all for sending me back home so relax 10/10

I am truly speechless after my experience.
I had Tina and she was an actual angel.
I‚Äôve been a licensed esthetician for 6 years now I try to be religious with my monthly massages so I‚Äôve been to many spas before and I have never experienced what I did today in my service.
The energy and the room first off had me sold!
The moment she walked in I felt calm. I felt every knot and every bit of soreness was addressed she truly is very intuitive in what she does.
I am beyond pleased and honestly will never get a massage anywhere else. Best I have ever had!!

HIGHLY recommend Body Mind Spirit Wellness! I scheduled my first ever eye brow lamination/tint and eyelash lift/tint with Kayla and it was amazing!! The atmosphere of the building is so calming and Kayla has such a calm presence. She really knows what she‚Äôs doing and she is super gentle. She answered all of my questions and made sure I was comfortable throughout the entire process. It‚Äôs been about 5 1/2 weeks since my service and my lashes still look like I just got them done! Can‚Äôt wait to go back to her.

I had an amazing experience with BodyFX Melbourne! From the very first call, the staff was friendly, knowledgeable, and incredibly accommodating. I was able to get an appointment within a day, which was a huge bonus given my tight schedule.
When I arrived, the clinic was spotless and welcoming. The team was highly professional and took the time to explain the treatment in detail, making me feel completely comfortable and confident. I received a StemWave treatment on my right shoulder, and I have to say that the whole experience was top-notch, and I saw noticeable results even after the first session!
If you‚Äôre looking for a clinic that offers fast booking, expert care, and outstanding service, I highly recommend BodyFX Melbourne. Can‚Äôt wait for my next visit!

Perfect treatment! Not the typical cookie cutter physical therapy that some providers offer. They address the issue then use manipulation treatment, stretching techniques, massage, offer home exercises. It is an hour hands on program. No sharing your valuable time with other clients.
They offer easy rescheduling if you have a problem. Give a nice discount if sign up and pay for their 4 times package.
I found out about this place through a very satisfied friend who recommended them.

The team at BodyFX is an absolutely essential aspect of my training. I would not be able to chase 2500+lbs powerlifting totals without their expert care and treatments! I have never had an issue that they have not been able to rectify and get me right back on track. They are also FANTASTIC for preventative maintenance sessions! Do not wait until you are injured, make the appointment, go see Courtney. She will get you moving better, and keep you at 100% performance whether it is daily life or pushing your body to it's limits. If you are looking for a place to act as your pit crew to keep you at top performance you need to go in and get them to work on you!

BodyFx staff are very knowledgeable that work with you to identify issues and prescribe the best physical therapy treatment for your needs and abilities. In addition, their Hands-on treatment is the best and they take their time working on the area of issues. Great explanation of treatment, and help pinpointing problem areas as well as exercise to overcome issues. I have brought my mom for her shoulder limited mobility and pain and she felt greatly relieved just from the first session. I have myself used for my shoulder and my knee and they went above and beyond. Looking forward to my next session.

I‚Äôve been to BodyFX three times now. Each time has been a great experience.
I‚Äôve received dry needling for my psoas muscle.  I‚Äôve seen Courtney twice (so far) for help with my hips and both times I‚Äôm amazed at how much of a difference it makes!  When she adjusts my hips, I feel relief throughout my whole body.
Oh, my husband is a big fan of Alexis, the massage therapist. We actually both have her coming to the house soon! üòÖ
We‚Äôre big fans of BodyFX and so thankful they‚Äôre apart of our local community. ‚ù§Ô∏è

My experience at Bolanos Associates was excellent. To be honest, I was expecting just a typical physical therapy place, where they give you exercises and barely check on you‚Äîbut what I received here was completely different.

Angie and Nathalie were my occupational therapists throughout the entire process, and I couldn‚Äôt have asked for better care. They were genuinely invested in my recovery, constantly making sure I was improving, both in-clinic and at home.

I had a flexor tendon and nerve repair done on my index finger, and the location of the original cut made recovery very challenging. But thanks to them, I‚Äôm now fully recovered and able to use my finger like I used to.

They went above and beyond, spending extra time with me during appointments to work on scar tissue, mobility, and strength. They never let me slack because they were fully committed to helping me get back to normal.

I‚Äôve never experienced this level of dedication from any therapist before. I highly recommend Bolanos Associates 200%! They are truly the best at what they do.

They were awesome, very much appreciated, their patience, ability to adjust when necessary, working with you and how your body felt on the said day. I would recommend Bolanos to anyone, i would certainly go back if ever there is a need. Friendly, communicative, accomodating - yet they kept me on task!  a super nice group of therapists.  Thanks Guys I am walking straight again head held high thanks to all of you!

I finish my OT sessions for my shoulder and feel 100% healed üôåüèº Angie and Joshua are the best!! Very professional and empathic. Manny is so supportive too! I am continuing with my PT for my back... so, more reviews to come.. üòÅ. I will definitely recommend them to all my friends and family! üí™üèº They were recommended by my Dr. and he nailed it!üíï

Excellent atmosphere, very friendly, quiet, and peaceful place, focused on providing each patient with the care they need to address or resolve their physical problem. The treatment I received from Andrew and Alan in particular has been exceptional.
I highly recommend it!

I have had the best PT experience at this facility.  The staff is always friendly and personable.  They understand the injury and make sure the therapy is comfortable and not too much to handle.  I highly recommend them and will continue to go whenever I need therapy.

Amanda is absolutely amazing! She has been a part of my son‚Äôs OT journey since the very start! She saw us early on and helped identify a tongue and lip tie within the first week of his life. She then set us up with a pediatric dentist, and has helped our son with the recovery from the procedure as well as general OT for his body. She provides tools and exercises to help with the development of our son‚Äôs sucking ability and overall health that is key for our child‚Äôs development. Amanda is warm, knowledgeable, understanding, patient, and flexible. Would recommend her to any mama in need of OT services for their child!

To have Amanda part of our care team is a BLESSING beyond words. As first time parents to a babe who‚Äôs had difficulties with body tension, oral ties, breastfeeding, bottle feeding, and colic‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs been a lot. We feel so supported going to see Amanda. Not only do we see huge improvements in the time we‚Äôve been working with her, but our girlie enjoys being there, and she gives us tangible information and exercises to do at home. She truly makes you feel SO involved and supported in our child‚Äôs care. I feel comfortable and confident with the exercises I‚Äôm doing at home in between appointments. It‚Äôs been amazing to watch our girl hit developmental milestones with ease and fun! Outside of the appointments Amanda is checking in and I always know if I have a concern she will touch base with me, which is EVERYTHING as a first time mom. I truly feel like Amanda is invested in our child‚Äôs care, progress, and continued development. I‚Äôm so glad we found bold child co, it has been life changing for us ü©∑

I HIGHLY recommend Bold Child Co to any moms having issues with feeding/breastfeeding after a tongue tie! My son had a tongue tie and was not able to latch so I had been pumping to feed him and keep my supply. Our pediatrician and doula recommended we see Amanda at Bold Child Co for help. After just the first visit and a week of doing the stretches she recommended, as well as using the bottles she recommended, my baby boy was able to latch! No shields or anything else needed. He also was getting a little bit of a flat head and she gave us tips to help that as well. We had the follow up visit two weeks after and we were all good! Baby boy is doing great now. Absolutely worth it and would see Amanda over and over again! She is personable and does great with babies! She was such a great help for us on our bf journey!!

We had a wonderful experience with Amanda at bold child! Our baby girl had a minor tongue tie and Amanda was incredible helpful in providing us with exercises to help her with feeding. She was so sweet and gentle with our baby, and made us feel very at ease. Feeding can be challenging, and I felt so supported by Amanda whenever I had any difficulties. Can‚Äôt recommend enough!

Amanda and Kate were so helpful in my breastfeeding journey, my son‚Äôs torticollis & head shape. Amanda was great in teaching me various techniques for feeding and helped me figure the right setting for my pump. Kate was amazing in helping us with PT so correct my son‚Äôs head shape. Both ladies were great to work with, checked in with me between appointments, and seemed to really care. I recommend all moms I know in need of help to them!

I miss you all, especially the front desk receptionist Ronnie, I thank you Bold City Therapy so much for everything you all have done. I hated going to physical therapy, but it made me stronger. The physical therapists are great and they feel like family. Trust me, you are going to have some fun while working hard at the same time. They know how to make your day even when you don‚Äôt feel like working out and you have had a bad day before walking in to complete physical therapy. You are going to have good laughs.

I would like to thank Casey and the dynamic staff at Bold City Therapy. They gave me a tremendous experience during my rehabilitation from my auto accident. The staff treated me like I was a part of their family and helped me to improve from when I first started to the end. True professionals at every level from check in to therapy was a great experience. Thank you, for taking care of me during my time of need. Blessings to you all my new friends.
RAP

Bold City helped me so much to recover after an accident. I was afraid that my daughter and I wouldn‚Äôt get better but they truly cared and were with us the whole way. Everyone there is kind and very knowledgeable and listen to what you have to say. The facility itself is clean and nice. Katie, at the front desk, is welcoming and funny. Lisa, Michael, and Casey (the owner) all helped and really made sure that my daughter and I were improving. I‚Äôm forever thankful.

For the last couple of years, I‚Äôve developed a family in Bold City Therapy! They listened to me as a patient and came up with a plan that helped get me to where I am today. There‚Äôs major improvements from the beginning of my therapy to now by following their care plan but also doing the things they recommended at home. Although I‚Äôve completed my sessions, I wouldn‚Äôt go to anyone else for any flare up‚Äôs I may go through. It‚Äôll always be Bold City Therapy ‚ù§Ô∏è  I really appreciate all you all have done from being understanding with missed appointments due to forgetfulness, to making sure I got the best from my therapy, Thank You!
Jasmine P.

This place is amazing! The staff from Ronnie up front all the way to the physical therapists Alejandro, Michael, Fabian, and Casey are all amazing!
Ive never felt better! They truly care about their patients wellbeing. Wouldn't go anywhere else in the city!

I have been to many different pt groups and Buldoc is the only group that made every effort to support my physical wellness. They were skilled and committed to improving my condition. Other groups have given me a list of exercises and beyond that, have no interaction. No heat/no massage/no effort. Thank you Buldoc for your professionalism and enthusiasm üòÅ

It was an amazing experience. The place is spotless, as people are keeping it like that,  Allison, the front desk lady, is very kind and always has a smile and good word for you. I had my knee PT with Arthur, a gentle and caring person, a really good professional who helped me to improve my mobility and get rid of pain.
I am grateful, and I want to thank him and the entire personal there.
I strongly recommend Bolduc PT.

I had a total left knee replacement December 13, 2023 and since January 3, 2024, after my initial evaluation appointment with Christian Bolduc, I have been working with Christine Armstrong at the Boynton Beach location. Christine is caring, encouraging, knowledgeable and professional as she works on my knee and helps me maximize my rehab strengths, face ongoing challenges and strive for improvement. Appointments are always on time and the facility is clean, comfortable and not overly crowded during sessions. I know that I am in great hands, literally, as I work to regain total mobility and strength. I am improving and it feels good. Thank you, Christine!

What a great team of professionals! Allison greets you with an incredibly warm welcome and is spot on with all things"business". For over a month the strength in my knee has increased considerably under Audra's treatment plan and I am thrilled! My  movement has improved and the pain is now managed with the program they help me execute. Couldn't ask for a better team to aid in my rehabilitation.

‚ÄúI got better at Bolduc Physical Therapy!‚Äù I want to wear it on a t-shirt, put a sticker on my car, and scream it from the roof tops. üòä Now details. At BPT, Coconut Creek, I was recovering my strength after the meniscus surgery. During the 6-week period I learned a lot about the employees there. I was impressed how each of them takes pride in their work. I felt that their main goal was my success and recovery. I also observed how Allyson, Donna, Audra, and Arthur, each treated their patients professionally and with respect. They were partners in my recovery. They explained how the stretches and exercises would help my strength, carefully created a plan for me, answered all my questions and carefully listened to my suggestions. My part was easy ‚Äì to follow all their directions, which I did and got better!

Dr. Padilla is the kind of veterinarian you always hope to find. He is consistently thorough and attentive during routine visits, but where his true compassion and dedication shine is in a crisis.

Recently, while my husband and I were out of town, our 18-month-old Labrador had a severe allergic reaction with welts and swelling. Our adult son rushed her to the clinic and waited in the parking lot at 8 a.m., unaware that the day before the clinic had been struck by lightning and was without power.

Instead of sending him away to an emergency clinic, Dr. Padilla immediately came out to the car with his scope, assessed her condition, checked vitals, and administered the medicine she urgently needed. He provided relief on the spot, followed up the next day, and arranged additional procedures and care to ensure her full recovery.

The entire team is incredible‚Äîcaring, responsive, and truly devoted to their patients. It is rare to find a clinic where you can so clearly see their love for animals and dedication to the families they serve.

We are beyond grateful and cannot recommend them highly enough‚Äîif we could give 10+ stars, we would!

We came here for a last minute vet trip when our primary vet wasn‚Äôt available. If we didn‚Äôt love our current vet so much , this is where we would be. The staff are so friendly and the doctor explains everything well and in detail, which I love. They truly care about their pets and customers. And they were able to squeeze us in on short notice! I highly recommend!

Boulevard Animal Hospital has been great for both my dog Ciara and cat Ava. Kayla is always super friendly, helpful, and makes every visit easy and comfortable. You can tell the staff and doctors genuinely cares about the animals. Highly recommend for anyone looking for quality, compassionate pet care.

Dr. Padilla is hands down the best veterinarian in the area. When our Boykin spaniel, Roux, started having severe GI issues, Dr. Padilla and the staff quickly worked hard to get us in to have her seen. He was compassionate, knowledgeable, and professional. He quickly gave us possible reasons for her issues and came up with a treatment plan to best help her in this situation. Would recommend to anyone Stuart, and Roux is as happy and healthy as ever!

After losing pretty much all hope of finding a decent vet in the area after my babies being treated poorly by so many, I was recommended Dr. Diamond by a family member and it was by far my BEST decision to go and see him. Not only does he have the best crew (that my babies LOVE to get loved on from) but there‚Äôs no one I‚Äôd trust with my babies more than him, he is kind, caring and is always honest and will explain whatever is going on in terms that you can understand and will ALWAYS put the animals first. You can tell Dr. Diamond not only loves his job but he loves helping animals, it is so hard to find someone that cares like that. If you are looking for a vet and are running into the same problem I did, I urge you to go see him. He is truly a DIAMOND in a rhinestone world. My family and I love our vet and our babies do too. üñ§ These are our babies, Peanut and Little Man. Peanut‚Äôs life was saved by Dr. Diamond and his techs, Little Man passed away due to complications with diabetes that were beyond anyone‚Äôs control. Thank you Dr. Diamond & techs, you guys are the best!

The entire staff was very welcoming & professional. I felt I was in a safe space to discuss what my needs were & how we could address them. B came up with a specialized program to help me progress in my recovery. I was really impressed with his passion for helping people & knowledge of his craft
I would recommend Bounce Back as they have a personalized approach to healing. You are not just a number.

Honestly one of the most best places I‚Äôve been to. From the front desk down to the Doctor. Everything is also extremely clean.
Everyone is extremely professional, amazing conversations that flows so well. I never feel rushed out. Definitely have recommend to my friends and family.

Dr. Adam Hilliard and the entire team at Bounce Back Physical Therapy are absolutely outstanding. My father, who is 70 years old, faced a very difficult recovery after his knee replacement surgery, struggling with intense pain and limited mobility. From the moment we started treatment with Dr. Hilliard, everything changed for the better. His deep knowledge, gentle approach, and unwavering commitment to his patients have been nothing short of life-changing.

Thanks to Dr. Hilliard‚Äôs expert care, my father has made remarkable progress  he is walking again and managing his pain more effectively than we ever thought possible. Dr. Hilliard takes the time to listen, explains every step with clarity, and treats each patient with genuine respect and compassion. It‚Äôs rare to find a doctor who is not only highly skilled but also so genuinely invested in his patients‚Äô well-being.

The entire team at Bounce Back Physical Therapy deserves the highest praise. They are professional, friendly, and always create a warm and supportive environment. You truly feel like you are part of a family that cares about your healing journey.

We are forever grateful to Dr. Hilliard and his incredible staff for giving my father hope, strength, and a path back to a better quality of life. I cannot recommend them highly enough

I can‚Äôt say enough things about Dr Adam and Therapist Be,
from my very first session, they made me feel comfortable, understood and supported.
Their knowledge, skill and genuine care have made a huge difference in my recovery .
I recommend Bounce Back  Therapist  highly, they are like nowhere else I have been to.

After my knee replacement surgery, I faced one of the toughest challenges of my life. The pain was overwhelming, and I struggled just to move. Thankfully, I found Dr. Adam Hilliard at Bounce Back Physical Therapy. From the very first visit, I knew I was in the best hands.

Dr. Hilliard‚Äôs care, knowledge, and kindness made all the difference in my recovery. Thanks to his treatments and constant support, I have been able to start walking again and manage my pain much better. He not only treated my condition he gave me hope and confidence to move forward.

The entire team at Bounce Back Physical Therapy is exceptional. They are professional, patient, and truly care about every person who walks through their doors. I will always be grateful to Dr. Hilliard and his wonderful team for helping me get my life back. I highly recommend them to anyone in need of compassionate and expert care!

My daughter has been at Brain Balance for 4 months now. In that time her behavior, focus, social skills, and ability to reason have all improved. She has been trying new foods, doing much better in school, and her sleep has also improved which is huge for her. Meltdowns have decreased and she is a much happier kid! I‚Äôm so happy we found Brain Balance so she could reach her full potential. The director Sabrina and Coach Cozy are amazing. You can see how they truly care. Thank you Brain Balance!

I have had my daughter enrolled at Brain Balance of Coral Springs for 4 months now and we love love love all of the coaches and directors here! This therapy has improved her cognitive abilities when it comes to focusing better and her balance as well. I would recommend brain balance Coral Springs to anyone looking to help their child.

So, I have to admit I was a little hesitant at first to bring my child here. Best decision I could have made. The approach they use is like a miracle sent straight from heaven. When a place and the people care instead of just doing their job it shows, and from Sabrina in the back pulling the strings to perfection to the warm smile of Vienna not only greeting people but going above and beyond reading to children in her spare time because it brings joy you won‚Äôt find a place that actually cares for your child like you will like this place. Keep doing what you do!!

Brain balance has been a blessing to us! Our child loves it and looks forward to going every day. Everyone in the center is so nice. We love rose she‚Äôs the best coach and Sabrina and all the staff is outstanding!

Amazing!! My daughter has been coming here for several months now, and I have absolutely seen such positive changes in her behavior.  She is finally recognizing things that she never did before. The coaches and directors are all amazing! They really make you feel like family!

provider_name: Breakthrough Pediatric Speech-Language & Occupational Therapy Services - ASD Clinic Davie
review_text: Breakthrough Therapy Services has been wonderful for my daughter. The therapists are kind, professional, and truly care about her progress. They make each session supportive and encouraging, and I‚Äôve seen such positive changes. I‚Äôm so grateful for the amazing care they provide and highly recommend them to any family.

provider_name: Breakthrough Pediatric Speech-Language & Occupational Therapy Services - ASD Clinic Davie
review_text: Our time here was well spent and my son made incredible progress over a 4 year span. The manager Lesley  is a breath of fresh air and very knowledgeable and insurance and extremely accommodating with schedule changes. She and most of the therapists will be missed but we‚Äôve had to change to a provider closer to home.

provider_name: Breakthrough Pediatric Speech-Language & Occupational Therapy Services - ASD Clinic Davie
review_text: My daughter has shown so much improvement since she started at Breakthrough. Her speech and occupational therapists are amazing.! They are compassionate and professional. I feel very comfortable dropping my daughter off here for therapy. Also, the office staff is very helpful! Special shout out to the front office girl Vanessa. She is awesome! Jessica , occupational therapist is awesome and ilia speech therapist is awesome as well. Everyone who works there is so caring and considerate, best place in South Florida for speech and occupational therapy by far. Give them a try and you will see.

provider_name: Breakthrough Pediatric Speech-Language & Occupational Therapy Services - ASD Clinic Davie
review_text: We have had such a great experience with the Breakthrough team. Thank you for all you have done for my son. From OT to Speech therapy, your efforts have really made a world of difference - THANK YOU! The staff and facilities are top notch and we look forward to our time at Breakthrough.

provider_name: Breakthrough Pediatric Speech-Language & Occupational Therapy Services - ASD Clinic Davie
review_text: My daughter started with breakthrough when she was two years old. The therapist has been nothing short of amazing. When my daughter began her sessions, she could have been more vocal. In three years, she has been talking more and expressing her wants and needs more effectively, and her fine motor skills are much more refined with OT. I am happy that I decided to take my daughter here because the staff has become family to both myself and my daughter. I also want to take the time to thank Lesley. As an office manager, whenever I have questions or need to make adjustments to sessions, Lesley always, and I mean always, goes above and beyond. I appreciate her so much for always being happy to accommodate my needs. If my daughter's school didn't offer full-time therapy five days a week, she would still be coming here because that is how great the staff is. Thank you for all you have done and continue to do for our kids!

Truly the best! The entire office staff and both doctors are so caring and loving. I stopped by recently for my elderly dog to pick up medicine and the whole crew took time and chatted with me about how he is doing AND checked on me and my spouse to see how we are doing.
We‚Äôve trusted them with the care of both of our elderly dogs, one has since passed and they handled his end of life care with such grace.
We have since had a new fur baby addition and they are providing the always excellent service for him as well.
Cannot recommend them high enough!

We‚Äôve been bringing all five of our dogs here for the past three years, and the care has always been outstanding. The entire team is compassionate, knowledgeable, and truly treats our pets like family. They take the time to explain treatments and options, and we always feel confident that our dogs are in the best hands. It‚Äôs rare to find a veterinary facility that combines professionalism with such genuine love for animals. We‚Äôre grateful for the excellent care and highly recommend them to anyone looking for a trustworthy vet.

I paid $120 to have my dogs temperature checked and a simple anal check because he was throwing up the night before and the next day also some scary stuff. Then I was told an X-ray was $300 which could lead to possible surgery! They gave me 5 pills of some type of antibiotic and 4 pills for nausea and he wouldn't take any of them even when I tried to put them way back in his throat ! Bottom line is after getting rest and water heater slowly got better and I wasted $120.00 for nothing ! These Veterinarians don't seem to want to work with people much who are on limited funds.

I wish I could leave more than 5 stars because everyone at Brentwood Animal Clinic is incredible. Dr. Hightman is knowledgeable in traditional Chinese medicine in addition to veterinary medicine and has decades of experience. When a prior vet told me it would take a huge chunk of change to diagnose a mole on my dog, Dr Hightman gave me a natural remedy that cost about $10. Later, when my dog developed cancer, the clinic was always able to squeeze me in for an appointment when an issue arose. My dog LOVED this place! Oftentimes I'd have to bribe her with a treat to get back into the car haha. She knew that everyone there loved her too (and had access to yummy treats!) This is by far the best veterinary practice in Jacksonville.

DO NOT go to this clinic for your fur baby. I was quoted 3 different prices and was talked to like I was dumb by the surgeon. They were very rude to me and made my emergency 10x worse while trying to get help for my baby. I would never recommend anyone to this place.

Wow! what a great experience. The knowledge,care and concern Dr Burnett and vet tech Christina gave my cat during a very difficult procedure was beyond the call of duty. These humans truly care and will make sure your animals receive the wellness to live their best life! I am leaving my current vet to bring both my cats here from now on. Animals deserve the best care with great knowledge people. These humans are the real deal.

wanna give them 5 stars because the vet & techs are awesome but wait times (with appointment) are ridiculous‚Ä¶ in exam rooms (talking 3 hour visits) & with admin for check-in/out & good luck getting someone on the phone to help in under 10 min or without calling back numerous times.   also, prices aren‚Äôt much better than average vet and you have to pay for a script - $10 just to have them print it out.

all that said, again, I want to stress that the caregivers & staff are excellent‚Ä¶ just make sure you clear the afternoon or morning for a visit.

I have taken both of my dogs to Brevard Aid to Animals, and I feel that my pets are treated with care and kindness. Walk-ins are welcome, but there may be a wait; however, it is well worth it because of the excellent treatment my fur babies receive. The veterinarian and the technicians are extremely knowledgeable and always help me make the best decisions for my dogs' needs. The prices for visits and treatments are very reasonable.

They are amazing here. I have a 10 year old germand shepherd, Sarge that is the life of our family. He developed a mass on his side, but for to his large size, most local vet offices would not even schedule for an appointment. However a friend referred us here and they made an immediate appointment and fit my Sarge in! God bless üôè for people that truly cat about animals well being not just the $ they can profit on a family's worst nightmare.
Carol and Dr Burnett were truly caring and honest straight shooters . Very impressive. Love this place. Thank you.

We love the Brevard equestrian center and all the care they put into their horses. Lillyana is literally one of the nicest trainers and so so good with my little man. She is so patient and kind and very good at teaching. I have learned so much and would highly recommend them.

In my experience; my daughter enjoyed it was a great experience for my 3 year old and her instructor was great but I don‚Äôt think it worth the money.
Personally; I‚Äôm disappointed ‚òπÔ∏è, my daughter loves horses and this is her second place we found to practice  and ride horses.

I think the riding process should be more than 20min we been there for 2 months now I know everyone has the mechanics in the process of have ready the horses but I feel like the small kids will enjoy more the riding experience the four last lesson my daughter is only having between 10min to 15min for the hour ride we pay.

Thanks for your patience and understanding.

Brevard Equestrian Center is a great and affordable place for your child to not only learn to ride, but to learn all aspects of taking care of the horses. Krisi is a fantastic, compassionate teacher that is a great fit for all personalities. Krisi is a highly skilled communicator that eliminates the stresses and pressure of learning new skills to make riding enjoyable for all riders.

Parking and bathrooms are available.
Private and semi-private lessons available.
BEC has the most knowledgeable and kind instructors.   I have never seen a more friendly and family oriented facility.  The people that board and or ride there are the  best!
