review_text: Pablo was my rep that came in to drop off our machine. He walked me through the machine set up and the features of the monitor. I was confident at the end of the training process and know that we will be just fine setting everything up at home. It‚Äôs pretty straight forward and simple. It‚Äôs also good to know how to contact the company if anything seems off and he showed me where that information was on the monitor and the best number to call (and what times).

provider_name: CHILDREN FIRST HOME HEALTH CARE SER
review_text: Ordering is always smooth, and we love our visits from Nelson! He's been with us from the very beginning. He always goes above and beyond to make sure all of our equipment is working, even when he only comes out to do our oxygen checks. We know we have everything we need to provide the best care for our little one!

provider_name: CHILDREN FIRST HOME HEALTH CARE SER
review_text: I‚Äôve been working with Children First for years, and our experience has been nothing short of amazing. They have always gone above and beyond in caring for my daughter. Nelson and Maria, in particular, are incredibly kind-hearted and helpful they consistently exceed our expectations and make sure she is well taken care of. Truly outstanding service.

provider_name: CHILDREN FIRST HOME HEALTH CARE SER
review_text:
Nelson is a wonderful technician always giving the extra mile. And Mrs Anna Rodriguez (manager ) will always be attentive with our services.

Awesome.

Kudos for everyone!!!!

Jessica, Pam, and Harold are the absolute best! This is the best Physical Therapy place I have ever been and would recommend everybody go to.  Even if Citimed has multiple locations, nothing beats the Hollywood crew! They have more time to give quality care and they think of every innovative way to help you to the best of your ability. I would give 20 stars if I could!

I‚Äôve been going to Citi Med‚Äôs Hollywood location, and I can‚Äôt say enough great things about this place. Mr. Alan, Ms. Denise, and Ms. Jessica are hands down the most caring and attentive professionals I‚Äôve ever encountered. From the moment I walked in, I felt truly welcomed.

Mr. Alan and Ms. Denise take their time with me during each session, making me feel like their number one priority. They really focus on my individual needs and recovery, which has made a world of difference in my physical progress. Their dedication to helping me get better has been so encouraging, and I always leave feeling more confident in my journey to recovery.

The entire team is amazing, and I highly recommend Citi Med for anyone looking for compassionate, personalized care. You‚Äôll feel like family here!

The office is always clean !! Amazing bathrooms and they‚Äôre are always practicing the best ways to keep us safe by having us wash hands everytime we come in and everything is wiped down and sanitize just an amazing location with amazing people !!
Fantastic physical therapy center! Jessica at the front desk is incredibly helpful and welcoming! My sister has been making great progress with her treatment here. Highly recommend!
10/10 experience. Denise, Jermain, Pam, Alan and Delia made me feel welcomed every time, would reccomend for anyone looking to undergo physical therapy.

I read some reviews on this place and can‚Äôt say anything negative (so far). I guess its all about who tends to you. I was lucky enough to be seen by Trish (a physical therapist) at this location and she was very attentive to my needs and asked me about my pains and problems. Thanks Trish. Hope next time I come, I‚Äôm treated just as well by your colleagues.

UPDATE (8/31/2023):
If you read my last review, I said "Hope next time I come, I‚Äôm treated just as well by your colleagues"
I meant the next visit that week. Well, unfortunately I'm back for another accident years later. FORTUNATELY, some of the same staff is there and everyone is still awesome. Pam has been a savior since the last time I came (3 years ago), especially treating my sciatic pain.
ADVICE: Physical therapy is not a "spa day", you have to help yourself for them to help you. Expert stretches and targeted exercises are what help you get better. If you don't know what this is about, let them teach you. Don't come with a preconceived notion, thinking that this is a massage and cucumbers on your face because it's not. Thanks Pam, thanks Alan

Everyone at Communicate Speech has been absolutely amazing since the day we started! The scheduling of my sons evaluation was seamless and therapy was started that week. Ms. Shirley is amazing and does her best to accommodate busy schedules while also getting students what they need. My son has shown great progress with his therapist, Ms. Janet. Everyone is extremely patient, knowledgeable, caring, and willing to go the extra mile to make sure each session has success. We love Communicate Speech and Occupationak Therapy and highly recommend using them for all your speech and occupational therapy needs.

If you are looking for pediatric speech or OT therapy in the St. Cloud area, I highly recommend Communicate! We have a nonverbal autistic 4 year old and the therapists here treat him with so much warmth and love. They truly listen to parent concerns and work to build a collaborative therapeutic environment that fully involves the parent. Communicate provides consistent scheduling and you are working with the same therapist at every visit. They are incredibly responsive to emails or calls and we were very impressed with the thoroughness of our child's evaluations and treatment plan. After each session, your child's therapist will speak with you about what they worked on, what activities they used so you can emulate at home, and your child's progress. They understand the behaviors that Autistic children can present with and meet them where they are at with grace and understanding. Ms. Shirley, Ms. Elizabeth, and Ms. Adrianna have been phenomenal throughout our Speech and OT journey! Therapy is fun for our little guy and we are thrilled with the progress he is making!

Absolutely recommend Communicate Speech Therapy! They are a wonderful company‚Äîvery responsive and professional from start to finish. The referral process was smooth and easy, which made things so much less stressful. We were lucky to work with Ms. Shirley, who is incredibly kind and patient with kids. She takes the time to really listen to parents‚Äô concerns and worked diligently with our child. One of the things I appreciated most is that she meets with you after every session and clearly explains what she worked on, which makes it so much easier to support progress at home. Highly recommend!

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about the speech therapy we received. The therapist was incredibly patient, knowledgeable, and truly cared about progress. Sessions were engaging and tailored to individual needs, and we saw noticeable improvement week after week. Communication became easier and more confident. Highly recommend to anyone seeking real results in a supportive environment!

Thank you very much Janet

We absolutely love Communicate speech therapy! From the very first visit, the team has been incredibly welcoming, professional, and caring. My daughter who is 4 years old, loves to go to her therapy and always looks forward to every session, and we‚Äôve seen such wonderful progress in her communication skills. The therapists are patient, knowledgeable, and truly passionate about helping children thrive. It‚Äôs such a comforting feeling knowing she‚Äôs in great hands. I highly recommend this clinic to any parent looking for outstanding speech therapy support!

The clinicians at CORA Therapy in Cape Coral are amazing and very professional. They are thorough in their instructions on how to do the exercises tailored to your needs. Their attention to cleanliness between clients is impeccable. Dennis always make sure that i am modest during exercise and that nothing you don't want to show is showing. Taylin,  on the other hand is gentle and firm at the same time during therapy sessions. Your best asset is Brenda ,who always has a smiling face and pleasant demeanor
during check in and checkout process . Michael runs a tight ship in this location .I definitely would rave about them at my next Doctor visit.

I absolutely love it here. All staff are very caring for you and the physical therapist are the BEST!!!! They work with you and make sure you‚Äôre always doing good and better. I highly recommend it here at the Cape Coral Cora. Very friendly environment and always make you feel more than just a patient they make you feel like family.Thank you Taylin and Lester for all the amazing work you do with and for me. Thank you Brenda for always having a beautiful smile on your face and happy to see me all the time

I can‚Äôt say enough great things about this clinic! The staff is incredibly friendly, professional, and genuinely cares about their patients‚Äô progress. My therapist took the time to really listen, explain each step of the treatment, and create a personalized plan that made me feel confident and supported. 5 stars!!

Everyone from Brenda at the front desk to the physical therapists Lester and Taylin were wonderful. My daughter needed physical therapy after knee surgery and I'm very happy we choose CORA PT. Not only were the physical therapists knowledgeable and caring but also accommodating to each individual needs and are great with kids. I highly recommend CORA physical therapy Cape Coral. Thank you for taking such great care of my daughter.

I cannot even begin to express my satisfaction! I wouldn‚Äôt feel as good as I feel today if it wasn‚Äôt for the time I spent with Michael!  I could go on and on and on and on about the positives but my fingers would get tired from typing!  10/10 Would recommend! I‚Äôll do my best not to get hurt again but if I do, I know I‚Äôm in good hands.  Thank you Cora PT and thank you Michael, you‚Äôre a wonderful human being and sharp as a tack! #Blessed #MichaelFixedMe

So I have had 4 surgeries on my right hand. And lots of therapy. With that said my OT therapist Lydia at cora on waters is the best I have ever had hands down. She has just the right amount of skills and compassion. I'm positive that this will be my last surgery because of her skilled after care. She is flat out amazing. This is where she got me in just 30 days. Before I could not open or close my hand now I can do both my surgeon is good but she took it all the way home for me. She is skilled,understanding,and thoughtful. I'm so happy with the progress we have made together.

CORA physical Therapy is a beautiful atmosphere the physical therapists that works with me they all are friendly, attentive and caring. I would recommend them to everyone. All the employees there are so nice and very friendly.  Keep up the good guysüôÇ

Becky at the front is one of the most personable, kind, helpful, caring, and supportive person you will meet. She goes above and beyond for the patients to make sure they feel supported on their journey. Cannot recommend this office enough, you are in great hands with anyone here!

We were impressed by the front desk staff and therapists. The place was humming and seemed well-run.
My husband is a high fall risk, and they took care to keep him safe while doing his exercises. Therapists were very encouraging and offered positive reinforcement.

1. Hello, I am a patient at this amazing facility and my therapist is Lydia. I had a dupuytren's contracture surgery and after my finger was hurting a lot and was kind of bent and very stiff, red and swollen. I came in with low expectations and I was suddenly surprised when she showed knowledge and a technique to work on the scar tissue left after surgery. You ask her questions and she has the right and undoubtedly the correct answer. In just 1 session Lydia made my finger better, the sweling is down and the finger moves better and is not crooked anymore. My surgeon is truly very impressed and I am impressed as she proved me wrong and my expectations are now high. I know there is no one in the whole world that's as amazing as she is and as knowledgeable as her. She works hard, is kind, respectful, patient and willing to go above and beyond to help her patients feel better and get better. Lydia is the definition of phenomenal and amazing, truly the best there is. Her passion for her work is shown in the process I made in like I said 1 session and her skills are beyond anyone's I have ever seen. Don't take my word for it, go and find out yourself and ask for Lydia the best hand therapist. Her boss should be impressed with her as everyone is. Thank you to this facilty for having me as a patient and to Lydia for her hard work and for the help she gives me every week.

2. I broke my foot back in December 2024 and in January of this year 2025 I had to do therapy for my foot as it was weak and hard to move the fractured toe and I ended up seeing Beth most of the time and she helped me recover in 2 weeks. I also see her for dry needling  for my hand and lam truly impressed, she has truly phenomenal skills, she is knowledgeable about the procedure and she does it with care and patience. She explains and talks to you, treats you with respect and sincerity, she makes sure you are comfortable and that you are healing properly and that the procedure is working perfect. Beth truly respects and cares for every patient and I am truly thankful to have met this amazing person and therapist and how she has helped me get better in this journey of healing. I know is your job and I can tell you truly care for your patient's well being. Thank you Beth for being truly committed to helping me and everyone who is in your care.

3. Becky is wonderful, she's always so helpful and informative at the front desk. I've had a great experience with her when visiting for hand therapy with Lydia or dry needling with Beth. She's communicative, respectful, and genuinely eager to assist. Any questions or concerns you have she makes sure to help you resolve the issue in seconds. Her kindness and professionalism make a big difference. Thank you Becky for all your help.

OMG! What mess! Never go there!
The PT room is in full view of the waiting area. Ever here of a back room a privacy?
As far I I could tell 2 people on duty and 15 people waiting. My 2:00 appointment would have been at least 3:00 or longer
The waisted has about 4-5 chairs
The overflow was sitting around on the exercise tables! How unprofessional can it get?

The team at Cora Therapy work hand in hand to make sure you get the correct treatment . They try  to accommodate an appointment ASAP. The therapists Debi and Sidney are great to try to get you back on your feet. However it is a pity they don‚Äôt have many more therapists to make it more on a one to one . More therapists are needed. They try to do their best they can with the shortage.

I have been receiving physical therapy at the Clearwater location for 13 sessions for shoulder impingement. All of the staff have been outstanding,  experienced, knowledgeable and friendly. I have been well satisfied with my treatments, and I have seen great progress in a short period of time. The facility is clean.  I would highly recommend Cora Physical Therapy for your needs.

I had a great experience twice at Cora physical therapy Clearwater. Michelle Richman who is the senior clinic manager was beyond my expectations ! She was extremely knowledgeable, professional and friendly truly a joy to work withüëçüòá

I have been receiving physical therapy at the Clearwater location for several months for my shoulder and neck. All of the staff have been accommodating, professional, knowledgeable  and effective during my rehabilitation journey.

I have been steadily improving and increasing my range of motion because of the  Without their encouragement and  capacitytechniques  they provide.  I am encouraged when I feel that I cannot push through.

I would recommend this facility to anyone who requires physical therapy.  They really have your rehabilitation goals in mind and they are trained to help you meet your goals.

I have had two separate sessions of physical therapy at Cora Physical Therapy in Coral Springs and I consider the staff here to be excellent providers. The environment there is quite welcoming. The ladies at the front desk respond to clients as soon as they enter. Appointments were flexible and met my needs. The therapists worked well together with a pleasant attitude . I have been treated by most of them and I observe them as they work. I would certainly like to recognize them all, but since Monica was my therapist at my last session, I say ‚Äúkudos‚Äù to her. Thanks to all of you for a job well done.

After coming here twice for two separate knee surgeries, I‚Äôm pretty sure I‚Äôve made the All-CORA first basketball team. Thanks to everyone who has helped me regain my performance, including all the staff up front who are always on top of all my records so that I can focus on healing. Special thanks to Jarrod for always making everyone small, Patrick for bringing tons of experience and hilarious stories, and Steven for working me harder than most personal trainers. Because of you, I hope to stay healthy enough to never see any of you again!

I can‚Äôt say enough great things about this rehab center! From the moment I called, Shanna at the front desk was absolutely wonderful‚Äîshe scheduled me right away, made the process so easy, and is always incredibly friendly and welcoming when I come in. She answers all my questions and is extremely helpful!

My physical therapist, Monica, has been nothing short of amazing. She is patient, knowledgeable, and truly cares about her patients. She goes above and beyond to make me feel comfortable, always checks in on how I‚Äôm doing, and creates such a supportive environment. I feel like I‚Äôm in the best hands with her guidance.

I‚Äôve also recently started working with Stephen, and he has been absolutely fantastic as well‚Äîknowledgeable, attentive, and very patient.

I‚Äôm so grateful for the entire team here. They‚Äôve made what could have been a stressful process feel encouraging and hopeful. Highly recommend!

I completed my physical therapy at Cora center after my knee replacement surgery and I couldn‚Äôt be more pleased. My therapist Inez was patient, knowledgeable and encouraging every step of the way helping me regain strength and mobility.
The entire team at the center is professional, friendly and supportive. From the front desk to the therapy staff, every one made me to feel comfortable and supported. I highly recommend both my therapist and the center to anyone in need of quality physical therapy.

I just finished almost a month and a half of physical therapy for my frozen shoulder, and I am beyond grateful to the entire team. From the moment I arrived, everyone made me feel supported and cared for.

A special thank you to Monica and Stephen‚Äîyour professionalism, dedication, and encouragement were truly amazing. I came in with a severely damaged and painful shoulder, and thanks to your guidance and support, I am now back to normal!

The front desk staff was also incredibly friendly and helpful‚ÄîI‚Äôm so grateful to everyone!

Your advice on home exercises, showing me the correct techniques, and your constant motivation made all the difference. I honestly don‚Äôt think I could have achieved these results without you.

Thank you so much for helping me heal and for making this experience so positive and uplifting!

I had such a positive experience with Jackie! She helped me with my lower back pain and was incredibly supportive and knowledgeable throughout my treatment. After every appointment, she made sure I got time with the TENS machine and a heat pack, which I absolutely loved. They really helped me relax and speed up my recovery.

Jackie always explained everything clearly and made sure I understood not just what to do, but why it was important. She was patient with my questions and gave me practical tips I could easily follow. On my last appointment, she prepared a full set of ‚Äúhomework‚Äù exercises for me, explained them step by step, and even suggested some great tools I could use at home to keep building on my progress.

She genuinely cares about her patients and goes the extra mile to make sure you‚Äôre supported both in the clinic and at home. Thanks to her, I feel much better and more confident in managing my back health. Highly recommend Jackie if you‚Äôre looking for a physical therapist who is kind, professional, and truly effective!

Everyone at Cora was very helpful in assisting with recovering from my shoulder injury. Jackie and Marianna we‚Äôre great to work with in helping me strengthen up my shoulder and eliminate pain.  Also, the Frontdesk Jennifer is always very friendly.

Cora in Dania beach has been a very satisfying experience for me. Six continuous weeks of physical therapy before my back surgery has brought back my confidence and strength to my body. Mayte Vargas, the Clinic Manager, put all her experience and knowledge into directing a therapy full of challenges but with very surprising results that prepare me to face surgery with much more energy and preparation for a post-surgery period that I am sure will now be more bearable. Thank you Maite, thank you Cora for such excellent service, for your empathy and for giving me a wonderful experience that led me to meet new friends, colleagues and people who, like me, fight to move forward despite their physical ailments.

I highly recommend it.

An incredibly professional clinic from start to finish! From my very first phone call to schedule an appointment, to my sessions with Mayte Vargas, who is exceptionally knowledgeable in her field, the experience has been outstanding. I highly recommend this clinic for anyone in need of therapy. I have pain on the left side of my hip and back, and the simple exercises they've providing are already making a difference. If you're in pain, don‚Äôt hesitate‚Äîgo here!

Since having my  rotator cuff surgery I have been seeing physical therapist Mayte Vargas 3x week . I cannot say enough wonderful things about Mayte. She totally makes the place.   I feel that through her exceptional care my shoulder has significantly improved.  I would recommend Mayte to my family and closest friends. She is a great physical therapist with vast experience. Furthermore she brings a warm personal approach when treating her patients.  I look forward to seeing Mayte and doing my exercises. Thank you so much !!!

I went there a number of months ago. It was the worst absolute worst experience of my life. I had an appointment waited 45 minutes for somebody to see me for three seconds, and that was the intake appointment. They didn't collect any money at me at the time, then started sending me an incessant amount of bills for $12 when calling in to make the payment I was treated rudely and still have not received any physical therapy because I just don't wanna have to go through this bullshit again with another company and definitely not with Cora do not go there do not go there. They are the worst of the worst of the worst dishonest, horrible unreliable. The place was dirty. It was a nasty nasty place including the bathroom, the tables, they didn't wipe things down. It was a horrible disgusting experience I'm supposed to go to someplace and feel like I'm gonna get healthy and I felt like I was going to get more sick. What a rotten place with rotten people. There is even a cockroach with little cockroach, friends crawling on the wall by the waiting area. It was so nasty who can actually get healthcare there?

The therapists are fantastic‚Ä¶they listen to everything you say about your injury. I have had all of them working with me. They are very supportive during your workouts. And on occasion made them fun. The front desk is very helpful with scheduling appointments. I‚Äôve been to other physical therapy establishments but would pick Cora Physical Therapy Davie every single time!

I had a great experience with the therapists at this facility.  They were all very attentive and concerned about my needs.  I felt like they are my family.

Each one who attended to me gave me the direct exercises to help me.  Before I began a new exercise it was modeled to me and then ensured I did it correctly and then I was checked during my reps.

They all worked as a team so I received the best from each one!  There were very professional, polite and accommodating to the many changes in my schedule.  Thanks and best wishes!

I recently had a reverse total shoulder replacement. Rehabbing after this surgery is hard and painful work and I can‚Äôt say enough about CORA therapy. They know what they‚Äôre doing and I can‚Äôt thank them enough for my progress. Dr. Williams, Monica & Leon are skilled and caring therapists. Maritza and Victoria run the front desk and keep everything organized and moving. What a terrific staff! I look forward to each and every session because I know I‚Äôm in great hands. I also see them working with other patients who have a multitude of therapy needs with similar results to mine. I highly recommend CORA therapy for any and all therapy needs. They‚Äôre an amazing team!

I came to Cora for PT for my shoulder ..arthritis. Anna, Michelle and Christina were great..friendly efficient and helpful.
Gil is a super physical therapist..knowledgeable and competent. Leon was super with my ongoing therapy sessions.
The facility was very clean and bright. Everyone was friendly and helpful.
I made great progress in 3 weeks of therapy and my strength improved tremendously.
I would recommend this facility to anyone. I give it 6 stars.

provider_name: CORA Physical Therapy East Pembroke Pines
review_text: Thank you so much to all of the staff at Cora! Front Desk is always in point and courteous, Liz, Joann and Natalie are very professional! Special thanks to my amazing Occupational Therapist, Luisa. My hand is finally working properly!  AND MY physical therapists, Dara, Tony and especially Nina!! My knee feels 1000 times better. Its been a mission but you guys always made me feel like family when Im here.

provider_name: CORA Physical Therapy East Pembroke Pines
review_text: All the stuffs are  very helpful and friendly ‚ù§Ô∏è especially the front counter and all the therapist are good and teaching well how to make the patients know better there exercises and how to move carefully  , they are good üëç

provider_name: CORA Physical Therapy East Pembroke Pines
review_text: CORA is the absolute best! From the Front Desk Personnel (who are extremely efficient and nice), to the Therapists - top notch all the way! This is my 3rd "go-round" with CORA Physical Therapy... 3 years ago I had lower back surgery, a year ago I had OT for a broken wrist. Luisa (the OT) was phenomenal and a pleasure to work with - always has a smile! Luisa works you hard, but has sense about your progress and seems to know your "limit". She got me back on the course and playing golf in "no time"! This year I had a total hip replacement and "Dee" the PT is an absolute superstar! She is thorough, supportive, and the best at what she does. Her goal is to get me better than I was before surgery, and we are well on our way! I cannot thank her enough as she is AWESOME, and like I said a "SUPERSTAR"! In fact the entire team is like a family, and they all encourage you to improve each time you come in! I am so happy I found them, and I guarantee you will not regret the decision to get therapy here. I'd give them 10 STARS if I could!

provider_name: CORA Physical Therapy East Pembroke Pines
review_text: Is with great pleasure and honesty that I write this comment. When I arrived to this CORA PT Center I didn't know what to spec, but Joanna with her great smile and kindness assisted me with my Therapist and appointments. Dhara , Tony and Sedrick are real professionals and took great care of me, I'm feeling much much better from my injury. I don't know about the other CORA Centers but, I will definably recommend this one, the people here are just great. Simply the best.

provider_name: CORA Physical Therapy East Pembroke Pines
review_text: My physical therapist Luisa is the best. I have had hand therapy before here in the same address and I didn't like the therapist I stopped going. With Luisa I stayed the whole time 12 sessions. Joanna the front desk she's very professional, friendly, helpful. I will miss them. Highly recommend!
One of the worst place for physical therapy. The front desk lady they're busy with their own. Long time waiting and just 30 minutes evaluation without any exercise.

I came here in hopes of being able to skip another steroid injection for an injury - and great news - after 6 weeks here, it looks like I‚Äôll be able to!

I love Cora because they have extensive hours and everyone is very nice. Cory was my main therapist and he always greeted me with a smile, was very kind, answered my many questions, and really helped me. Not to mention he‚Äôs got good music taste, lol!

Julio was also another therapist who helped me and was extremely kind.

I‚Äôm glad I came to Cora!

It‚Äôs so unfortunate I was sent to this place. I have been going there for months and they didn‚Äôt even know my injury nor the surgery I had. They didn‚Äôt even know my doctor restrictions, had me trying to lift 15 pounds over doctor restriction at shoulder height. Now my shoulder hurts so much. It‚Äôs so sad I was sent to these people now I‚Äôm in pain with no medication. Please god help me! Please protect your family especially those who cannot afford setback to healing process. You deserve better! They are saying they didnt know what surgery i had when i explained to them what it was, and one of the staff even said he had same injury and he even recommended surgery! Now you don't know what injury or what surgery? Trying to blame my doctor.

Its a good place to go for therapy but it stays fully loaded with people you just have to get in get called and get your exercise on in there they have good staff that will take care of you and they have plenty equipment for all your pain issues

I was badly injured and over the course of 2 years went to different physical therapy clinics.  I am very thankful I was referred to CORA Physical Therapy o er the last several months!  Their staff are pleasant and professional.  The therapists are knowledgeable and hands on and I have seen improvement in my condition with their care.  I would highly recommend CORA Physical Therapy.

I've used CORA Physical Therapy once before a few years ago for a Plantar Fascitis issue that they took care of.

I came back for a left knee injury and the PTs that took care of worked me hard, but it was all for getting my knee back to a usable state.   After visiting them for the past month in a half, they got my knee feeling better.  I'm able to put some weight on it.  I'm back to walking (not running yet) and well, at least I'm moving.

You can't go wrong with the treatment here.    Thank you CORA for getting me back in motion again.   :)
My daughter has been going to physical therapy for almost a year here for her knee problems. They helped her before and after her surgery, and i will forever be grateful for their work!

An unexpected family. I have nothing short of great things to state about the individuals and my appointments experienced at this facility. I imagine that a large number of clients serviced here do not write reviews because they are taken care of which is why you may not see many reviews.

I had torn my ACL and underwent surgery back in late February of 2018. By the third week after surgery I began to undergo physical therapy and did not have the faintest idea as to what that would entail. I recall Ron‚Äôs sense of humor, kind personality and welcoming demeanor made my appointments something to look forward to when I was bedridden. I ventured from crutches, to a knee brace and now am able to run freely. Each exercise I was instructed to do elevated my recovery time through muscle strengthening and conditioning.

Towards my fourth and fifth months of treatment, Katie provided me plyometric exercises to improve my cardio and gain more strength in my knee. I was out of breath after each drill but enjoyed the sense of accomplishment when I stretched a little further or was able to do more than I had anticipated on my recovering knee. Every time I thought I had mastered or strengthened a particular exercise ‚Äì I had the staff here introduce a new one. My desire to recover coupled with the knowledgeable and experienced staff at Cora made this all possible.

There are no shortcuts or fancy machines for recovery (in my opinion) just good ol‚Äô fashioned hard work. Come with a positive mindset, quit complaining about what you can‚Äôt do and try! That‚Äôs how you get better than you were yesterday. Ron, Katie, and Scott ‚Äì Thank you endlessly for your insight and care. Also, thank you to Miriam for your wonderful appointment reminders and professionalism, you‚Äôre awesome.
Beautiful clinic with amazing and caring staff. Best PT facility in Ft Myers!

I was very pleased with the Cora location at 6900 Daniels Pkwy. Rachel at the front desk was always friendly & helpful. I had Luke for my therapist, who was wonderful! He showed & helped me with a wide variety of exercises to build my muscles. He was always so nice, helpful & encouraging! He made it fun & kept it interesting. I had a great experience & actually enjoyed. I had no idea what exercises to do for my specific problem. Now, I know lots of exercises & can do on my own. I recommend this location & Luke to anyone who needs physical therapy. You could not have a nicer, more encouraging or better therapist!

Cora Physical Therapy it‚Äôs a great place . Since day one that I went with a very strong flank pain, I came home with. 70% less pain. Every therapist very professional and dedicated. The place itself is clean and in order. From the front desk to the back I give them a high qualification. Thank you allüòä

I do not recommend this place at all. First of all, I got shuffled between therapists and none of them took me serious or even focus on getting me better. They gave all their attention to the elderly patients and not so much on young patients.

One of the male therapists there was so rude to me and just completely ignored me all throughout my session with him. I was pretty much doing my own thing during the session because he was just focusing on his other patient; as if I did not matter.

I always arrived super early and they always called me late to start my session and they did the bare minimum with me. I was not getting the treatment or care I needed there. And some of the staff are fake and racist towards black patients.

I asked to talk to a manager to raise my concerns and they literally had me talked to a therapist instead. Most of the staff there are Hispanic; so they mostly nice to Hispanics and white patients and not so much towards blacks.

I stopped going there and went to a different and better PT facility; Select Physical Therapy is the best!

Abysmal.

This place is awesome. Great service. Wonderful therapists. I‚Äôm so very happy to have found it!

TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!  HIGHLY RECOMMEND YOU THINK TWICE BEFORE USING CORA PT.

Eric Ortiz is a complete professional from evaluation to starting physical therapy. He‚Äôs very cordial in greeting me on arrival, during the sessions and at departure.
I have a rare chronic condition and physical therapy is a key factor in my care, Eric has knowledge about it and he modifies some exercises to cater to my limited mobility and makes me feel motivated to do more. He‚Äôs very attentive, always courteous and pleasant.

I recently completed multiple therapy sessions for an issue with my right hand. I am so glad that I chose this location, and that Kelly was the one who helped me. Today was my last appointment, and honestly, I almost wanted to cry (in a positive way!) because I will miss her. She is really sweet, caring, and attentive.

Since I wasn‚Äôt used to physical therapy, I was worried that I would not be confident enough to voice my questions or concerns, but with Kelly, I actually felt safe and heard in every appointment. She constantly checked in on me, made sure I was comfortable with each exercise, and truly listened whenever I was in pain or uncertain about how to do an activity.

She also gave me advice on affordable, practical ways to continue the therapy exercises at home, which I am very grateful for. I just wish I could have Kelly as my doctor for everything, lol.

I‚Äôm graduating from therapy, but I‚Äôll definitely miss seeing her and might stop by just to say hi.

I also want to mention that the front desk staff is great. They are always kind and quick to help with rescheduling or cancellations. The clinic itself is clean, with plenty of seating in the waiting area, comfortable parking, and even nice music playlists to make the atmosphere enjoyable while you are at your session.

Overall, my experience at CORA was really nice from start to finish. Thank you Kelly! Thank you CORA team!

Moises is an outstanding professional - incredibly patient and kind with his patients. Since my mom started therapy with him, her mobility has improved dramatically. This is a fantastic facility, and I wholeheartedly recommend it 100%.

I recently injured my MCL, but luckily did not require surgery. Instead, I got a prescription for physical therapy. I needed to find a good place that was relatively close to my house, but also took my insurance. The doctor provided a list of therapists, and this CORA location worked out perfectly.
I was able to get a next-day appointment for my evaluation. They tested the limits of my knee to see my range of motion and strength level and then provided a list of exercises that I could do on my own at home. These exercises were also available for me on their customized MedBridge app. The app shows how to do the exercises and you can follow through with it for the entire session.
Additionally, I go in for PT twice a week. The staff is very friendly, understanding, and welcoming. They cater to people of all ages and different activity levels and injuries. Odane has been excellent in providing a variety of extensive strengthening and mobility exercises to help stabilize the injured area. He is extremely attentive and corrects your form to ensure you achieve the best results. They will also provide ice or heat after sessions, depending on what each individual needs.
If all other CORA facilities are run in this manner, I would highly recommend seeking them out if you ever are in need of physical therapy. And if you live close by, be sure to check out this location. You'll be back on your feet in no time.

To the entire staff at the center, thank you so much for being attentive and compassionate. I want to give my sincere thanks to Moises, who was my therapist and who invested so much in my recovery, which he achieved. Thank you for supporting me and helping me recover.

I have been receiving PT at the Palm Bay location with Hannah. There are not enough accolades that I could give Hannah for helping in my recovery from total knee replacement 5 weeks ago. Each therapist is assigned so many patients at once that you barely get five minutes of direct attention during your session.

I even asked if there was a less busy time to schedule, but the best I was told was that around noon the therapist might ‚Äúonly‚Äù have three patients at the same time. That didn‚Äôt feel like real, focused care to me.

In the end, I canceled my future appointments because it seemed less about actual healing and more about rushing people through for the business side of things. It‚Äôs unfortunate because the staff is great, but the setup makes it hard to feel like your recovery is the priority.

I was in the middle of physical therapy with CORA. I have used them for various injuries over the years. Now, this obviously doesn't make sense as they did the initial evaluation, it's the same injury, the same prescription, just the insurance change.

I had already done my research and knew that a new evaluation is not needed whatsoever as far as insurance companies go. The only beneficiary to this would be CORA as they would happily take an extra payment from myself or the insurance.

The employee I spoke with said that this was the direction from the manager. I don't like to use the word "SCAM" or "FRAUD", but I really hope this was just an error in judgement from someone that didn't think things through and not an actual corporate mandate.

The lengths that entities will go for the extra buck continues to amaze me.

I did the only thing we can do in this day and age and took my business elsewhere.

This place used to be good 20 years ago. I went there for a torn rotator cuff and were great then.

Now it‚Äôs an old person farm. Their goal is just to have as many exercise sessions with 2-3 other people during it. It‚Äôs all old people.

I went here for back problems and they didn‚Äôt know what to do other than give me a bunch of sessions that didn‚Äôt address it.

Very friendly and caring team

Amazing! Excellent experience. Wonderful people. At the front

Well this was not my first time working with this guy's. I worked with Kelly before. As always kind and caring. I simply could not ask for a better team! They have a great staff and awesome PT's that helped me recover from my ACL surgery. Forever thankful and highly recommend! Good luck!

I have been calling the billing department for over a month to resolve a mistaken bill. They say the will call you back but don‚Äôt. CORA in Ormond Beach, Florida has been a Godsend on my healing journey.  Jenny at the front desk is so kind, professional and really works to help schedule my therapy when it works best for me.  Though I‚Äôm continuing my journey, the therapist Dusty, Jeannette and Adam have helped me every step of the way.

Dusty has greatly impacted my life.  I don‚Äôt think I knew how far I had to go until U met with him.  He devises a therapy plan that‚Äôs very specific to me.  He‚Äôs a brilliant doctor who listens to needs.  He is teaching me life skills that I will take with me forever.  I‚Äôve learned so much from him.  He never hesitates to explain exactly how an activity will help improve my health.  He takes his compassion and empowers me to be motivated every session.  He cares about me as a whole person which has built my confidence to not be as fearful when facing new challenges.  I know he cares.  He communicates with me and my doctors as we are a team.  I could never thank him enough.  He is going to be leaving this CORA as he travels to different places around the country to practice his physical therapy skills.  I‚Äôm already missing him as he has a way of giving me a new tool to help me improve.  I didn‚Äôt know how to ask for what I needed but he seemed to listen and use his great expertise to give me the exact tools needed.  Thank you Dusty for my toolbox and your willingness to so graciously share your skills and talent with me.

I have worked with Jeannette several times as well.  Her energy, passion and compassion can be seen and felt the moment you meet her.  What‚Äôs amazing about CORA in Ormond Beach, Florida is each therapist has different sets of trainings and specific expertise.  She used a metal tool that relieved the pain in my knee.  She messaged or rubbed the metal tool and the pain eased up‚Ä¶I felt like I could finally take a breath.  She has been with me through the tears and challenges‚Ä¶.she is a true angel in my life.

Adam runs the center and I must say he‚Äôs terrific.  To create a place of healing with caring professionals,  wow!

They have all changed my life for the better!

Sandy Russell

The staff here is great. I especially appreciate Dusty and Jeanetta. However, the color scheme at the Ormond Beach, Cora office is atrocious. Please repaint those horribly colored walls something more neutral and pleasing.

Good luck trying to get past the woman who answers the phone and works the desk. She will not listen. She is very condescending. She will argue with you instead of just answer the question.  Moving forward is not something she is capable of.  There is no chance that I would be willing to endure someone so miserable, especially in the morning for physical therapy.  And I am not sure where these pictures came from‚Ä¶ But this place is less than impressive.
Super nice staff!!! Clean Facility! Great equipment and experience everytime! Very satisfied and thankful for their time and team!

Cora Physical Therapy has an incredible team, especially Shane and Peter. Shane has an amazing ability to explain complex movements and exercises in a way that's easy to understand, and he's always encouraging. Peter is equally exceptional, with a sharp eye for detail and a knack for identifying exactly what needs to be worked on. His supportive and caring approach made every session feel worthwhile.

They create a supportive and friendly environment that makes a difficult process feel much more manageable. I'm so grateful for their expertise and dedication. I highly recommend Shane and Peter to anyone in need of top-notch physical therapy.

The male therapist I had was rude, condescending, and actually did more harm to my injury.  I finally quit therapy when he yelled at me for not following his instructions when I did not understand what he wanted.  Ive had physical therapy two other times in my life and it was beneficial and professional.  This was not.  When I reported why I wasn't returning,
there was no follow up and no one cared.  I will never go back and will not recommend this business to anyone.

I've had the PLEASURE of being a patient here twice. I said pleasure! The people! They are great. The therapists. The staff. All of it. They listen. They work on your plan as you go. They work on your needs! They are with you every step of the way. Do not hesitate to visit this location for your rehab needs. They took of my neck the first go round and kept me from needing surgery. It was a great experience.

‚ÄúFun‚Äù might not be the first word that comes to your mind when describing physical therapy.  CORA can change that!  Everyone on the staff of CORA Palm Bay exhibits upbeat, caring, & respectful behavior and that‚Äôs made a big difference in my recovery rate.  Working with different therapists means you get a variety of approaches and no burn-out.  The young, engaged staff does a great job of helping me learn, heal, & laugh!

The Palm Bay clinic has been beneficial to my therapy. They care about you personally. The front desk ladies, Nicole, Monica and Kaylene smile as everyone enters the door and makes clients feel good right away!  The PT‚Äôs Hannah and Sebastian listen to you in your evaluation and sets the bar so high.  I have enjoyed all my follow up appointments with the PTA‚Äôs. Each one is different and full of energy.

provider_name: CORA Physical Therapy Palm Beach Gardens
review_text: I received excellent care at Cora Physical Therapy. The entire team is professional, friendly, and genuinely dedicated to helping their patients. I especially want to recognize Beth, who has great experience treating patients with sacroiliac joint issues ‚Äî her knowledge and personalized approach made a real difference in my recovery. I truly appreciate the outstanding service and highly recommend Cora Physical Therapy.

provider_name: CORA Physical Therapy Palm Beach Gardens
review_text: The best physical therapy around!!!  The front desk gals are so friendly and welcoming.  The therapists are caring and very knowledgeable providing outstanding results.  They are very thorough and listen to the patient to provide the utmost attention to your needs.  Beth is exceptional in that she can do the massage knowing exactly what points to hit making me feel much better each and every time.  I highly recommend Cora Physical Therapy.

provider_name: CORA Physical Therapy Palm Beach Gardens
review_text: Beth is incredible. She is so good at her craft. She is my favorite physical therapist just don‚Äôt tell my husband who is also a physical Theraphist. He doesn‚Äôt work at this center and he is not my hired Theraphist. Ha ha! Beth is kind, patient, knowledgeable and gets it done all in our time allowed. I had a really bad car accident and she is very understanding. I love working with her

provider_name: CORA Physical Therapy Palm Beach Gardens
review_text: The service at Cora PT in Palm beach Gardens is exceptional to say the least. I was referred there by my doctor after meniscus surgery and Liz, my therapist helped me get back to fully functioning in just a few weeks! They made sure that I made follow up appointments to keep consistent in physical therapy. While I hope I never have to go to PT again, I would definitely recommend everyone to come here! Such a great team and super helpful.

provider_name: CORA Physical Therapy Palm Beach Gardens
review_text: Beth, genesis, and Cindy are truly amazing!! Thanks to them my experience at Cora truly felt so welcoming and friendly,  I genuinely enjoyed my time there,  and thanks to all there help I feel so much stronger and confident after my knee surgery. Highly recommend them:) thanks for all the help, you guys rock!

If I'm honest I really wanted to go to my regular physical therapist. I had to go to Cora for my workman's comp... I was pleasantly pleased how amazing their staff was. Alan, my therapist instructed me with all the exercises and helped improve my ankle tremendously. I sprained it really bad and know that I will still need to continue to do exercises to keep strengthening the tendon. Tracy the front desk clerk was super nice and so friendly and efficient. She is another great asset to Cora. I would highly recommend Cora physical therapy. Their staff is professional knowledgeable and very efficient

Therapist was nothing but a disappointment!He had another patient arriving within 5 minutes of me... I was just rushed and didn't really get any help-
Just gave me a piece of paper with instructions and wasn't even going to do the electrical stimulation prescribed on my referral because, according to him " it doesn't make a difference". I paid $55 copay for a 30% deductible from my insurance and could have found better information(and help) from a YouTube or Instagram reel... Waste of money and time!
Update- I put a complaint with my insurance and they lied and lied- In the phone the front desk inform me they don't do "one on one" therapy and to the insurance they state that my case did not qualify for it- how about the lady in the wheelchair sharing the session with me???Also I was not late for my session and I did express my dissatisfaction right then and there!!
I would gladly recommend Cora. I had Stacy and Allen and they were great with my therapy . Tracy at front desk was always happy and helpful.  . Feeling much better.

My experience with cora front receptionist was great . both staffs that work in the front are very professional. while i was getting my therapy i had gotten an important call from my children‚Äôs father. it was an urgent matter concerning the kids. kelsey the physical therapist/mg  heard me on the phone i was not loud . i was disturbing anything or anyone. she rudely told me since im on the phone i can not receive therapy. i told her i can hang up but the call was importantly. so she basically refuse service to me . she could have handled that in a more professional manner. by letting me know that there was a no phone use. instead of denying service. i am going to change my pt. i am so unhappy with the way i‚Äôve been treated . however, she allowed another patient use there phone then said it was an emergency to justify her reasoning on why she denied me service. i felt discriminated against and i hope no one have to feel like that going in that specific establishment

I wanted to take a moment to express my sincere gratitude for the exceptional care I've received during my physical therapy sessions.

The staff is extremely helpful and friendly, creating such a welcoming environment. I‚Äôm thrilled to say that I truly enjoy coming to your clinic, especially in the early mornings. It‚Äôs a wonderful way to start my day!

I would especially like to highlight Hailey‚Äôs expertise. She is extremely knowledgeable and professional, making each session not only productive but also enjoyable. It‚Äôs hard to believe that it has already been a month since my full knee replacement surgery, and I can feel myself getting better every day, thanks to her guidance and support.

While I know I still have a long way to go, I am confident in the progress I‚Äôm making with your team's assistance. Thank you all for your hard work and dedication to helping me through this journey.
Dominique Couhysder

Jamie and Kayla, at CORA, were amazing.  Jamie is super experienced & knowledgeable. The few times I worked with Kayla she was great too.  They are professional, considerate, and able to problem solve. When my muscles and knee were uncooperative.  they found ways to get things moving better with less pain.  The equipment and space is clean and nice. The staff is friendly.  I really appreciate the way they care about their clients.  thanks to all. I recommend CORA to all my friends & neighbors needing PT.

I went to CORA in Port Orange for an evaluation on my shoulder. Thanks to Jamie and her team, I had a thorough evaluation.  With their ability to recognizing the possible problem, I was recommended to see an Orthopedic Surgeon where I did end up having rotator cuff surgery. My shoulder is great now. Even though the staff is busy, they have always been friendly and courteous. I would recommend.

The therapists at CORA are top notch. They listen to your needs/pain level and customize a program for you. They‚Äôre friendly and show genuine concern for my well-being.  I never have to wait get taken to the therapy room right away. They have all kinds of equipment for every joint therapy. I can recommend the staff and therapists at CORA Port Orange without reservation.

These are the most professional, talented, sympathetic physical therapists that have treated me.  All of the staff are friendly and always cheerful and make you feel important to them. Lately I have been treated by Jamie and she is terrific.  Doesn‚Äôt matter how I feel when I arrive she always makes me feel better when I am leaving. Cora P/T gets 5 stars!

I was advised to bring my 12 year old here after  rear end car accident we had. The staff made her feel extremely comfortable. Used words and terms on what was going to happen but didn‚Äôt talk to her like she‚Äôs a child. We went back for I think 9-10 weeks and Everytime she had a smile and they her feel like part of the team‚Ä¶.  Why cool  Top shelf folks here ‚Ä¶. From the younger pretty  redhead at the counter when you check in to everyone before you check back out with that cute redhead ‚Ä¶ think her name is spring or Autumn‚Ä¶‚Ä¶thank you !!!

I could not be more pleased with this CORA location.  Marivic, Brad, and Camille are absolutely awesome!

I was skeptical about physical therapy as I have never experienced PT before. However, after a few sessions, I found that not only is it helping me manage my pain and strengthening my core, but PT is something I should have been doing my whole life.

Marivic and Brad do an amazing job choosing the right therapy for my back and then showing me how to do the exercises.  I feel good about the progress I am making thus far and contribute this to their excellent support.  Camille, the patient service coordinator is always pleasant when I check in, and does her best to meet my needs when making future appointments.  Thank you for all that you do.       Andrew N.
Great staff. Very friendly and knowledgeable. They helped me recover quickly and accommodated my schedule whenever needed. Thank you for everything.

I love this place !

I would like to express my deep gratitude to the physiotherapy center staff for their professionalism and care! From the very first days, I was surrounded by attention, given detailed explanations about each procedure, and provided with a personalized treatment plan.

After completing the therapy course, I noticed significant improvements: the pain decreased, mobility was restored, and my overall well-being improved. Every procedure was conducted in a comfortable environment, and the kindness and support of the specialists made the recovery process much easier.

Thank you for your hard work, dedication, and willingness to help! I highly recommend this center to anyone in need of quality physiotherapy.

So grateful to the staff at CORA Regency for helping me with my plantar fasciitis prior to a major trip. The at home exercises were easy to complete and the results worked - I was doing more than 50 miles walking/hiking a week without pain. Thank you again!

I am doing my clinical as a PT student at CORA Regency and it‚Äôs been awesome! It‚Äôs so evident how much the staff cares about the patients and their success. It‚Äôs been a great place to work that cares about life-work balance and individual success of the staff. I would recommend it for any patient or any student looking for a clinical!

I started PT at Cora Riverside 1 week after my rotator cuff surgery.  Andrew Ganung, a Doctor of Physical Therapy and the Clinic Manager, was knowledgeable, helpful, patient and professional.
In addition to my office visits, CORA has a great app that walks you through your at-home exercises with a person modeling the excercise, a timer and a rep counter.  With this I had no excuse to skip my home exercises between appointments and progressed much faster as a result.
I was previously warned by many (including my doctor) that I might need 6-9 months of PT to regain my full range of motion and strength, but my time with Andrew got me back in the pool quickly and gaining strength and range of motion each week.
If you‚Äôre willing to invest in yourself by showing up regularly, on time, and willing to do the work you will have a great experience.

I started physical therapy at CORA Riverside after a less than stellar performance at the 2025 Gate River Run due to tibial tendonitis. I was evaluated and did most sessions with Andrew Ganung (DPT & Clinic Manager) who was an absolute pro. He was incredibly knowledgeable, professional, and helpful as we rehabbed my leg. Within a short amount of time, I was back to running pain free.

I came to CORA after rotator cuff surgery. After maybe six or eight weeks their interest in healing began to wane, and the therapist would tell me an exercise to do and then go back to the laptop. Sometimes I might sit doing nothing for 10 minutes between instructions. They would always say that I'm coming along, but the assessments are almost all completely subjective and they never shared results with me. If I wanted to discuss my shoulder, I always would have to initiate the conversation and they never asked about home exercises.

About three and a half months after therapy had begun I saw my ortho and he was concerned that I wasn't coming along. (I'm 69 and the shoulder had begun to fray nearly 15 years ago.) I told CORA that I thought they were not engaged enough in my recovery, and they suddenly discharged me.

They make no bones about preferring to treat athletes, so if you're older and just need functional help, find someone else. I went to Brooks and am much happier.

Thank you Andrew and Team for your support and amazing customer service.  LaNeija assists me with scheduling my follow-up appointment
Best

This is my second time coming here to CORA Physical Therapy. I came before shoulder surgery and now I‚Äôm back here again after surgery. Everyone here is so wonderful to work with and be around. The therapist here , Andrew , Dylan , and Joel are always a pleasure to work with . They are always checking to make sure you‚Äôre doing good and that you aren‚Äôt uncomfortable or in pain while doing the exercises they have you do . They‚Äôre always in such happy , upbeat moods that you can‚Äôt help but have an enjoyable time while you‚Äôre here . And the receptionists are both very wonderful as well. I‚Äôm so glad I started coming here to Cora because everyone is wonderful and I can definitely see improvement in my shoulder since being here.

10/10 highly recommend them to everyone.

Update : I‚Äôm sad to have to leave this wonderful group of people I‚Äôve spent over a year with during my journey to work on my shoulder. They were there for me before I had shoulder surgery and they were there for me when I came back after surgery and I must say, they are absolutely amazing ! Each and everyone of them are so knowledgeable and care so much about each patient that came into the clinic ! They did everything they could to help me get back to normal and I am so thankful for every one of them !‚ù§Ô∏è I‚Äôm sad I graduated out of PT but I am so thankful to move on with my life ! I‚Äôll miss everyone of these lovely people !‚ù§Ô∏è

The physical therapists at Cora took excellent care of me!! everyone was always smiling, friendly and more than helpful! I felt very much at home there. I regularly dealt with Gina, Walter and Kristi. You never would've guessed Kristi (who worked with me the most) was an intern at the time, she was very patient, explained (and demonstrated) each exercise very clearly. She pushed me to my exact potential and was careful not to let me go to far to quick. They know exactly what they're doing and will have a perfect plan for your specific recovery needs. I have all of them to thank for the recovery of my Sprained knee which temporarily kept me off the fire truck. I will continue to use several of these exercises as part of my routine at the fire Dept. Thanks again!

Awesome place to come for therapy... the staff is a very well trained... they help you accomplish what you need to accomplish when it comes to physical therapy..  i cant thank them enough for what they have helped me accomplish George always know how to get ur body in motion and takes care of ur pain with his heat/ice techniques ...Vladimir also is the man makin sure u get that wake up call to come in and also works with u in anyway when u check in... (HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PLACE))üíØ

For the past 5 months, I've had my physical therapy at CORA at the Vineland Road office, and everyone (from the front desk ladies, Brianna & Autumn, to the truly caring office manager/PT (Darion), and amazing Physical therapists, Jorge & Lorena) were welcoming, professional and very helpful. This is a group of people that genuinely care for their patients' well being and their overall physical improvement. They want you to always come out of your therapy better than how you came in, at least, that has always been my experience. I raved so much about their service that my mother that lives in another state (1,000 miles away) transferred her physical therapy from her state to their office in Orlando (I was so glad her insurance was accepted by CORA!) and she couldn't be happier. So yes, the 5 stars is well deserved!

The entire team here at CORA is top notch for physical therapy. From the initial intake process to the therapists, we could not be happier.

Daryon and Lorena saw my son at his initial visit and their care for him since then is truly a 5 star experience. They are patient, kind, and knowledgeable. We worked with JT as well and he was super patient with my son and explained everything to him in detail.

We could not be more pleased with the treatment and results CORA has given my son. They have truly given him the care he needs to get through his pain and have his quality of life back.

I was referred here from my health provider after I hurt my back. The reception staff was great in finding me an appointment that fit in with my work schedule. My therapist, Walter, was great right from my first appointment. He was very patient and thorough in deciding what treatment I needed. All of the therapists are extremely professional and friendly and Walter has been so helpful in getting me back to full health again.

Gina and Rosa on reception are both very friendly and efficient, I particularly like that they know and use my name as it makes the whole experience feel friendly.

I can‚Äôt thank Walter enough for the way he has helped me and it‚Äôs always reassuring to see how professional all of the staff there are with their patients, I would definitely recommend Walter as a therapist and Cora at Sandlake road to anyone who needs any kind of physical therapy.

The entire team at Cora, Satellite Beach, creates a positive, professional, and caring environment. Marta, and Hanna performed my initial knee surgery assessment with great care and attention to every detail which guided my treatment to recovery. Shannon was my Physical Therapist, who carefully and with exceptional concern, helped me to re-gain the strength and flexibility I needed to resume a comfortable lifestyle. She is outstanding! And, with every visit, Susie greeted me with a smile that set the tone for the session to follow. She was always helpful whenever I had to make a change to an appointment. I am thankful to her, and the entire Cora team for the excellent care they provided to me. Thank you!

I guess pain is part of my life I'll always have to deal with , but the Compassionate and Understanding staff of Larry and Samantha make dealing with a very trying time as anyone would be getting 5 vertebrae fused and replaced with all titanium discs,screws, and rods. That being said ; I'm in PT from this cervical fusion ....as difficult and at times tremendously tenuous these times can bring  , the staff at Cora is attentive to your needs and makes the process of post surgery recovery that much easier. Everything  from scheduling,  to the  attention and patience of the hands on Therapist Samantha ; it makes me feel I have a fighting chance to heal with my best intentions in their care ...Thank you for the ongoing and consistently kind care !

I just finished my Physical Therapy at Cora Health Services. My Physical Therapist were Shannon, Kayla, Jordon. I had the best individual care from each one of them. Very pleasant, helpful & even though I was there to exercise & work thur getting stronger I enjoyed going knowing the ladies always had a smile & a caring attitude & a story or two to tell. Made me feel very comfortable. I also want to mention Susan the receptionist also, she always had a smile & very pleasant even when she was very busy. I would recommend Cora to everyone. They were the best.

I have been doing PT at this location for 4 weeks so far, due to shoulder surgery. I have been very impressed with the care i have received and how informative the therapist have been. I have had the opportunity to work with Sam, Shannon and Emily which all have been great. I would definitely recommend this location for rehabilitation. From the front desk where you are always greeted with a smile from Larry to the girls who do your therapy it has been a real pleasure. I have several weeks left to go but I feel they have been instrumental in my recovery.

I don't know where the pictures come from that are linked to this place, but that isn't this facility.  The one picture of the front door is, but that is it.

I have been to 8-10 different PT facilities in my life and this facility is anything but class leading.   It suffices to provide bare minimum, but that is it.  Location is small and not well updated.  Carpet is old, ceiling panels are stained, lights in the ceilings are not working.  So you walk in and it is just not a brightly lit place that gives off a positive vibe.  You end up sharing your PT assistant with at least one other client.  Today there were two PT assistance working with FIVE clients.  How is the PT assistant going to watch your form and effort and give you positive reinforcement when they are off on someone else?

This poor review shouldn't reflect on the people working there.  The people are great.   They care.  They know their craft.  They just need owner to write the check and give them the facility they deserve and properly schedule clients that allow PT to give each client the attention they deserve.

A Really great place to get therapeutic intervention.  The staff is kind,
Caring and very professional.   Many thanks to the staff for my progress.

I am so beyond grateful that I decided to go this particular Cora location! This has been the best PT I have ever received BY FAR . If you don‚Äôt read past this, know this: I have had a Meniscus surgery - and a year later a total knee replacement and a total hip replacement - within seven months of each other.  The latter surgery having been Feb 24th, 2025. My world has relied heavily on PT and I wish everyone had access to this level of care and attention to detail. It is evident that this location is wonderfully managed from the morale and tone that is set. The therapists are great. It is clean.  They run on time but don‚Äôt rush people.  The list of pros goes on and on‚Ä¶..

I did a lot of research on Physical therapy offices and read a lot of reviews in preparation before having the total knee replacement in August of 2024. I had a meniscus surgery a year prior and was not impressed with the PT at Jewett Hospital. I made the decision to go to the Cora in Rockledge, FL - and they were awesome! I was really happy with that decision. I had great results which really impressed my Clinical team at Jewett. Then, I found out that I needed the total hip replacement. Since I was going to be in Lakeland following my surgery and during recovery, I found this Cora location and booked. I feel so blessed and so grateful I did. I have been having a complicated case and Keyshla and Cheryl, my 2 therapists, have been so incredible on so many levels. They are warm, caring and delightful, and what‚Äôs more,  is that the way they practice is so helpful because they are thorough, informative and attentive. They explain things and reasons as to why and what the exercise is going to do in addition on how to - and they pay attention and correct form, which is major! They really take their time and you can feel how much they care about and watch out for their patients. They and the clinic operate at a high standard of excellence that I wish all therapists and offices would do.   I feel bad for people who don‚Äôt know what this level of care looks like or that it even exists. Everyone there is great! Go here!

I came to this location yesterday for the first time for my Mom‚Äôs physical therapy. Katie was super professional and treated my Mom with friendliness and made her feel at ease. Today we returned to continue therapy. I loved the way Katie takes care of her patients and listens to their questions and concerns. I definitely recommend this location if you are in need of physical therapy. Thank you so much Katie for taking care of my Mom‚Äôs physical therapies.

I had a great experience here. I have nothing but good things to say about this company. Each physical therapist not only cares for their patients physical health but they truly care for you as a whole. All of the therapist are very knowledgeable and are very willing to modify or adjust their patients therapy routine to best suit their patients. The front desk staff are equally as great. They are knowledgeable about medical insurances and working with the doctors to get paperwork and referrals completed. The schedulers also consider each patients schedule and try to find them the best appointment time to fit their needs. Over all, I would highly recommend this physical therapy office and if I ever need PT again I will be going back to Cora.

Absolutely the best physical therapists I have ever known. They are outstanding at diagnosing and explaining your problem. The exercises they propose are designed to challenge you just enough to continue making progress without getting discouraged. Along with the office staff, the therapists are friendly, highly professional and caring people. They lowered my pain level and improved my walking ability. I would not think of going anywhere else if I need future therapy.

When I went for my orientation for therapy, I was warmly greeted by two front desk representatives. I believe one of them was Clarissa, though I can't recall the other‚Äôs name. Both were incredibly kind, sweet, and attentive, ensuring I had all the necessary paperwork completed while also taking the time to understand how my injury information needed to be processed before I was seen.

A special thank you to Sean for truly listening and understanding the type of physical therapy I needed to address the pain in my left side, including my back, foot, and knee. Each session I was able to feel the difference. I still need to work on my back an foot but at least now I know how to work on it properly. Mucho Gracias Cindy for making sure each session I hit my target. The extra sessions definitely helped.

I highly recommend this therapy center to anyone in need of physical therapy.
Everyone is great an the vibe is also good they all work very well together. They are all very kind an very understanding an make you feel very comfortable üòå
Throughout my sessions, every staff member has been amazing‚Äîyou can tell they genuinely enjoy helping others. Thank you so much for targeting my most painful areas and making a difference in my recovery!

Definitely a go to for  Physical therapy üòå

Thank you kindly
Cora family you all was amazing

üêû

This is the BEST place for PT and OT! I have been here multiple times, before and after 2 surgeries on my knee and my left shoulder. The therapists are incredibly  knowledgeable, so patient and kind. I am currently having PT on my knee after a replacement surgery. All the current PT therapists (Chanel, Sean, & Isamae) have taken great care of me. The therapist/Manager Cindy is so great too. I can‚Äôt forget the front desk staff; they are friendly, professional and very helpful with insurance and physician issues. I highly recommend this outpatient rehab facility!
Very friendly, knowledgeable, caring therapists.  The front desk ladies are awesome, caring, understanding and very helpful.  I highly recommend should anyone require therapy.
I am taking my mother here for physical therapy.  They're knowledgeable, very polite and easy to get along with.  She actually seems to enjoy it too!

The facility is inferior to anyone of its like ... exposed to the street, dingy, dusty and crowded without any sense of  privacy. Patients who are being "treated" face those who are waiting for their turn. And the wait could become longer if the therapist is having a business meeting in some private room.
Actually, the rules vary all the time: lunch time differs in accordance with the day and the team. So, if u need anything from the staff, u must wait until they have resurfaced after their unspecified lunch break.
And the day is usually one hour shorter in the morning and one hour shorter in the evening for telephone users.
The funniest thing about this place is that rules are not equally respected. So, at the time when one therapist can train 2 or 3 patients simultaneously, punctuality must be religiously observed by the patients although the length of the session is decided by the therapist on the spur of the moment.
But the worst feature I happened to encounter in this place was lack of cleanliness. Those tools and machines were never wiped in my presence. Some of them had the tag "Clean" stuck to the wall next to them, but the tag was never moved or removed. Actually, the walls had papers, memos and greeting cards that looked at least one or two years old. And I always asked myself whether this place had ever received a clean-up job, especially every time I touched the slippery handles of this or that machine.
My plan was to leave this facility for ever at the end of my course, but a silly clash with the vindictive reception manager who was ready to sacrifice the whole world in return for some extra minutes of her long weekend made me change my mind and warn others against getting involved in this business.

My experience at Cora South Tampa was incredibly positive. In the very beginning, the staff helped me sort through what my insurance would cover and allowed me to have no stress around the paperwork associated with my appointments. The facility is always clean and very well organized. It‚Äôs a small space, but they maximize every single inch of it to allow for room to do any type of therapy needed. By far, the highlight of my months of physical therapy, was my amazing physical therapist, Carlos. He has talent beyond words and has the best mix of compassion, collaboration, and the ability to push forward to allow the body to heal without ever making it feel forced. His incredible talent is complimented by his wonderful personality. I truly believe that the healing from my surgery only occurred because of my work with Carlos. This experience was my first time at physical therapy and by working with Carlos, I realized the importance of this step in order to get to complete healing. I loved my physical therapy experience so much that I am actually quite sad that it‚Äôs over. I have such deep gratitude to Cora and to Carlos.

I am a patient at South Tampa Cora. I want to say that Carlos has been an Excellent therapist for me. I love his expertise. He gives the best service and care every single time. I appreciate everything he does for me helping get better. Sincerely, a grateful patient.

CORA physical therapy South Tampa is truly exceptional! From The Moment ay walked in I felt Welcomed. The staff is incredibly knowledgeable, professional, and genuinely caring. I had the opportunity to work with Carlos Ballesteros. He took the time to understand my needs and created a good plan that help me recover faster than I expected. He was very attentive and encouraging and always making sure that I was comfortable and confident in my progress, all therapist were great facility was clean and well organized. I had to recommend CORA 21 looking for top notch physical therapy in Tampa.

Shout out to Cora staff, I appreciate how they care for me and my body! I have some extra inflammation in my left knee and Justin uses some Rock tape to give the fluid a route to move more freely through my leg. This modality has made a huge difference in the pain I experience with the left leg knee area. Thank you all so much!!!

Justin and the whole crew always make me feel so welcome and are very on point with the care they give! I‚Äôd most certainly recommend Cora to any of my friends or family that are looking for physical therapy!

provider_name: CORA Physical Therapy St. Lucie West
review_text:
A BIG Thank You to everyone at Cora Physical Therapy for making my physical therapy experience such a positive one.
Kerri and Herschel‚Ä¶ both were incredible! I really appreciated their patience, encouragement, and the way they kept things both challenging and fun. This experience made a big difference in my recovery.
Also a shout-out to the front desk‚Ä¶. .Whether it was scheduling, check-ins, or just a hello, they helped create a welcoming environment.
