- your pup also practice small obedience training while there, as their a very structured & professional place. That was a bonus for us!!

provider_name: Canine Linguistics - Dog Training and Boarding
review_text:
I can‚Äôt recommend Angel and Rose enough! My dog recently completed a board and train with them, and the results have been incredible. We came in struggling with on-leash reactivity, and by the end of the program, I had a much more confident and obedient dog.

What stood out the most was their honesty and communication throughout the entire process. They kept me updated regularly with realistic, no-fluff feedback‚Äîeven when my dog was having a tough time. It meant a lot to have trainers who didn‚Äôt sugarcoat things but instead helped me understand what was really going on and how to move forward.

They also made sure I, as the owner, was fully equipped to maintain the progress my dog made. They explained everything I needed to do clearly and gave me the tools and support for post-training success. The follow-up care and guidance have made all the difference.

If you‚Äôre on the fence‚Äîdo it. Angel and Rose truly care about your dog and your ability to continue the training once they‚Äôre home. I‚Äôm so thankful for the transformation I‚Äôve seen in my dog!

provider_name: Canine Linguistics - Dog Training and Boarding
review_text: Couldn‚Äôt be happier. I just got my 5 month golden retriever back after 4 weeks of puppy obedience training. Avee is so well behaved, follows commands, and has a great puppy baseline. She will be going back to continue her training when she‚Äôs older to become a service dog. How they presented her training was clear from the start, they love my dog and truly care for her, and their training guidelines, when I got her back, are easy to follow. I love how much they communicated during training as well.

provider_name: Canine Linguistics - Dog Training and Boarding
review_text:
I cannot recommend Canine Linguistics enough! From start to finish, their expertise, professionalism, and passion for dog training were evident. Rose, her husband and her team took the time to understand my dog‚Äôs unique personality and tailored their approach to meet both our needs.

The results were amazing‚Äîmy dog has transformed into a well-mannered and obedient companion, an amazing service animal, their work has been meticulous, our Tokyo graduated by traveling on an airplane ride with the trainers.  Their positive reinforcement techniques made the training sessions enjoyable and effective. Not only did my dog learn essential commands, but I also gained the confidence and skills to reinforce good behavior at home. Best of all is the ongoing support we receive from them. They have been available at all times and most important they have been successful a training us the humans of the house to better handle our ball of fur.

The team at K9 Linguistic is knowledgeable, patient, and genuinely cares about every dog they work with. If you‚Äôre looking for top-notch training that delivers real, lasting results, look no further! Highly recommended!

Thank you, K9 Linguistic, for your outstanding service!

provider_name: Canine Linguistics - Dog Training and Boarding
review_text:
I can‚Äôt say enough fabulous things about Rose and Angel at Canine Linguistics. My college daughter adopted a deaf puppy and we were overwhelmed with training her. The pup was biting hard and out of control. Much different than all of the other puppies we have had.
Rose took our pup for in-home training for 30 days and the results were unbelievable. Our pup came back calm and trained through hand signs as well as leash control. We can now have her out and interacting with our family and other dog with no worries. I have been so impressed. Best of all, our baby loves Rose and Angel and will be going for regular doggie daycare to play with all the friends she has made. ü©∑

provider_name: Canine Technology Institute - Miami Dog Boarding & Training School
review_text: Absolutely love canine tech! My pup has shown  such great improvement in four weeks and I‚Äôm so thankful for the amazing staff that has helped with that! The trainer Jason was extremely knowledgeable and patient which I loved! Reliable and effective is what you‚Äôll get when it comes to Canine tech! I was worried about being away from my dog for so long but they sent photos every few weeks and kept me up to date with his progress! If you‚Äôre looking into training for your dog this is the place!!!

provider_name: Canine Technology Institute - Miami Dog Boarding & Training School
review_text:
I can't say enough about how appreciative I am for Dorian and Canine Tech team! They completely transformed my dog for the better, and provided me with proper the tools and training to succeed when I am out in the real world no matter what the situation. I had a rehab situation with my 1 year old Shiba Inu, if you know anything about this breed you know that they are VERY stubborn and can sometimes be aggressive. We were having some severe resource guarding and aggressions issues towards myself and other dogs. I had even gotten bit a few times drawing blood. I was almost losing hope and then I was referred to Dorian from Canine Tech.

I gave him a call and from the jump he was asking me all the right questions and knew exactly what I was going through. A few days later I dropped my dog Nobu off for the 30 day obedience fundamental course. I will admit it was hard at first to think about being away from my dog for that long but Dorian took the time to physically see what was going on he assured me he would be in good hands and walked me through the facility. Throughout the course of the 30 days Dorian and his team checked in with me and sent picture and videos updates of the progress Nobu was making.

After the 30 days were up my wife and I came in for our first one on one training session with Nobu and I could not believe the dog before my eyes! Nobu was so obedient and happy to see us. During the multiple training sessions they taught us the proper commands and guided us with the right tools for working with our dog. Dorian even threw in an extra lesson at no charge because he wanted to be 100% certain that we were confident we were good to go and we were confident in ourselves.

Nobu is back home with us and happier than ever, I can't thank Dorian and his team enough. I would highly recommend, it's worth every penny to live the rest of your life with a happy and obedient dog. Just make sure you keep up with the training.

provider_name: Canine Technology Institute - Miami Dog Boarding & Training School
review_text: Dorian and his team is the best in the business!! When I first started the program my dog had zero training was doing whatever she wanted. Long story short my dog is now off Leash certified in 30 days. Canine tech made it happen, they have great instructors Jason was professional and did a great job of coaching me up when it was time to pick up Cali. I gained a new level of respect for what these guys do. Truly!

provider_name: Canine Technology Institute - Miami Dog Boarding & Training School
review_text: I simply want to start with the fact that the staff is genuinely outstanding. They‚Äôve been very thorough with everything and I most definitely noticed 100% a huge improvement in my dogs training, and that‚Äôs without mentioning the training that they give you the owner. Jason will make sure that both you and your dog are properly trained so that they‚Äôre job doesn‚Äôt go to waste. Jason has been very helpful in teaching me all of the commands and how to properly execute them. Thank you soooooo much to Jason and Dorian for the amazing service that you guys provide. Canine Tech is a company that likes to establish a long term relationship with they‚Äôre customers and because of that I will be back.

provider_name: Canine Technology Institute - Miami Dog Boarding & Training School
review_text: This was the best thing ever for my Pocket Pit Bentley. Jason is an amazing trainer, he took his time in the training with me my dog and my girlfriend was also impressed by the professionalism during the training. He wanted to be sure all the commands were understood and applied before we took Bentley home. My dog is a playful pit so he can be hard to get focused but somehow they did it and I couldn‚Äôt be happier . Jason gave me extra tips and tricks to my gf about slowing the dog down and not getting pulled everywhere outside and it‚Äôs helped so much since we‚Äôve been home with him, she has much better control. They were also very good with random questions and willing to do anything to help the transition for the price you pay so it will be worth every penny. 5 stars for me I hope you all have a wonderful experience like we did!

Brianna has been a fantastic trainer to our 1 yr old Golden and 8 yr old Great Dane. We did the 4 week board and train with the Golden and received daily updates and videos demonstrating the tasks they were working on, as well as instruction on what to follow up on at home. We have also been doing at home training and have seen such progress with both pups that our vet commented on how it was like having a different dog at visits! Highly recommend, as she is professional, caring towards the dogs, and teaches the owners too!

My rescue, Enzo suffers from fear aggression. Brianna and her team have worked with him, and we‚Äôve been boarding him since 2023. He shows them the Enzo I live with - soft, sweet, and eager to be loved.
Canine University - Highly recommended!

CANINE UNIVERSITY is literally the BEST place to train your dog/puppy, if you are on the fence about choosing this place, this is your sign to go ahead and do it! Brianna, Sofia, Riki, & Danya are all fantastic and amazing dog/puppy trainers! During Everest‚Äôs board and training (4 month old) They always kept up to date with us and let us know what our pup Everest was up to and his progress, they truly care about all the pups they train and it shows through their communication and professionalism. I will indeed be training our pup later on when he is 1 years old to continue for his mastersüòÅ LOVE THIS TEAM !üòä check out his ADORABLE graduation picturesüíï

We booked a private lesson with Brianna to help our new puppy learn some basic commands and structure. She was able to quickly establish a bond with him and he became very eager to learn. Throughout the lesson she made sure we understood how to reinforce what was being taught. We are extremely happy with her level of expertise and enthusiasm.  We will definitely use Brianna and Canine University in the future for any follow on training.

I had the best experience with Brianna as my dog‚Äôs trainer. She took her time, asked all the right questions, carefully came up with a personalized plan for my specific situation, and absolutely nailed the execution. I realized that it all takes time for the training to come into its fruition but once it did my dog has been absolutely wonderful. She is so sweet with everyone who meets her and I have yet to meet a person who doesn‚Äôt adore her. Brianna even found ways to make sure I would be able to walk her despite the fact that I‚Äôm disabled in a wheelchair. It has been a dream come true living with my dog ever since her training and nothing but the best of times. Strongly recommend such a professional.

Susan and her horse farm were absolutely perfect.  My daughter and I decided to go horseback riding at the
Last minute and Susan was very good at getting us in and matching us with perfect horses!  I loved my horse so much that I decided to lease!  Strongly recommend for an outing or more!

We did horseback riding with Canopy Oaks for my bday. We had a wonderful time.  The staff was amazing. We each worked with a different person (I am so sorry I can‚Äôt remember all of your names). And we were well matched to the horses chosen for us. We got to learn how to care for the horses pre and post ride. Brush down, hoof cleaning, bug prevention, rinse down, and treats. And it all allowed us to really connect with the horses: Rio, Garvey, and Cinnie. We got to get comfy riding in the corral before riding out with the instructors walking along a beautiful forest trail. We then got to ride them out in an easy arena before rinsing them down.
We definitely want to come back‚ù§Ô∏è

One of the best experiences I‚Äôve had with horses Susan and Heaven we‚Äôre patient in teaching us how to groom and things about the horses and even during our riding time my daughter, my granddaughter and myself. My granddaughter is seven. It was a great experience for her to learn how to groom the horses learn things about the horses and  ride. She had a great time we all did it is something I would recommend for anyone who wants to get to know horses

Not your ordinary riding stable. We also learned how to groom the horses and some anatomy and personality traits. The staff was very helpful and friendly. It was more if a lesson than just a ride. This is a great introduction to horses and riding.

I absolutely love it here. I have gone on many trail rides and the beginner lesson/trail hibrid was above and beyond any of them. I loved getting to bond with my horse before and after the ride while grooming and helping tack up your horse. They are very safety conscious: they have at least one person walking next to the horses on the ground all the time for beginner rides. The horses are well cared for, I love the small setting and everyone was friendly and knowledgeable, and the trails are beautiful. I enjoyed every minute here.

I can't thank Cape Coral Pet Crematory enough for their exceptional care during one of the most difficult times in our lives. From the moment we reached out, their team treated us with compassion and professionalism. They offer both private and communal cremation services, ensuring that each pet is treated with the utmost respect.
Their on-site facility is fully equipped, and they provide a variety of affordable urns and remembrance products, allowing pet owners to honor and remember their furry friends. The paw print memorial they created for Dallas is a cherished keepsake that will always hold a special place in our hearts.
For anyone facing the heartbreaking loss of a beloved pet, I highly recommend Cape Coral Pet Crematory. Their dedication to providing compassionate and dignified after-care is truly commendable.

My sweet baby Cooper passed away and Cape Coral Pet Crematory made such a hard thing so much easier. Their care and compassion for their clients is unmatched. The whole process was handle with love and care. They have SO many options for every taste and size. Highly recommend this family business for your end of life pet care.
The people of Cape Coral Pet Crematory were very kind, respectful and compassionate in helping me through the process. I will cherish the beautiful keepsake of my little dog, Tito‚Äôs paw print.

Cape Coral Pet Crematory has taken care of my family pets & they have done an excellent job of  making a difficult process a little more manageable. They are kind, caring & wonderful people. I don‚Äôt know how they do it!

The owner of this facility is so genuine and caring. He previously assisted us with the loss of one of our four legged family members with such compassion and respect. We unfortunately lost another last night and although we couldn‚Äôt connect with him during business hours he reached out first thing in the morning to express his condolences. I cannot recommend these services and this local business owner highly enough. In such heart breaking times this gentleman is truly a breath of fresh air

I want to preface this with I have been going to Cape Coral pet for the last few years and have been happy with their service.  I called a few weeks ago to make an appointment for my little guy for annual shots and his pro heart injection.  When I made the appointment I was quoted $185 for annual shots and exam and when I asked about the pro heart injection, I was put on hold so they could check because its done by weight.  The nice girl came back and said it would be about $40 and I wrote that down.  We go today and they tell me the pro heart injection is $200!!!  For a 12 pound guy??????  Last September my 83 pound dog's pro heart injection was $157.  How does this make sense?  They said it's now a flat fee and it doesn't matter what weight the dog is????  Really, isn't heart worm preventative always done by weight?  I am disappointed in them as this seems like an extreme increase.  I was upset enough to cancel all future appointments and ask them to forward me all health records. I also want to mention that I researched the average cost of this injection for a 12 pound dog and it is under $50.
Love that I found a great vet so close to home. All the staff from the moment you walk in make us feel welcome and my babies feel loved from the beginning.

This place is a pet owners ideal mix of care and cost in my opinion. AND IS PRIVATELY OWNED.
Excellent pet plans which make care AFFORDABLE.
Much lower cost compared to competitors (especially corporate)with kind and compassionate staff.
I highly recommend.

I took my 1 year old tabby cat in for a nail clipping. The staff was very friendly, building was clean and the visit was simple and fast. They make you and your pet feel right at home the second you walk in. This will be my go to place for any veterinarian services we may need. Well done and THANK YOU!

Update: 6/3: we have now seen all three Veterinarians at this business, Dr. Vickers most recently and I can say that this place is the best or listening to your concerns and needs and finding their solution to address it. We are so thankful for all three Veterinarians and super thankful right now for the amazing support of Dr. Vickers as Arlo has been navigating a surgery on his booty. They have dealt with this nervous momma and dog beautifully each and every single visit. Thank you for your patience with me!

Bring your dog here! Dr. Lomnicki saved our dogs life and our vacation all in one! We were getting ready for an international flight, our dog had some ‚Äújuice‚Äù come out of his butt, I was worried it was an anal gland infection and we were blessed to get in. Turned out it wasn‚Äôt anything to worry about and we went home. My kiddos were eating grapes, and our youngest fed our dog grapes before we realized it! Grapes can kill your dog and we were 3 hours out from being on a plane! I called the vet in a panic and they had us come back immediately. No hesitation, they knew this was serious! Dr. Lomnicki, kept my husband calm as she took our dog to the back to make him vomit. He vomited the grapes whole and the doctor came in and explained that since they were whole and not chewed he would be ok. We can not express our gratitude enough! It was obvious her care and concern was all around our dog and that just meant the world to us. Cape Coral Pet Vet reacted to our situation and saved the day! We are loyal to them through and through, again and again they show us they are in it for the animals! We can not express enough how wonderful this facility is! Thank you to everyone who not only saved our pup but also our vacation! You guys are the best!

Dr April absolutely saved me from a lifetime of misery with a man I was preparing to marry.  We were having major toxic fights and communication issues.  I tried everything.  Dr April helped me understand the dynamic, more importantly that I had been repeating behaviors from childhood trauma, and redirected me to absolute joy and happiness w a new partner that literally checks every box I wanted in a life partner/man.   I have found true joy and happiness thanks to her patience, care, and loving approach.

My husband and I were lucky enough to attend an intimacy couple's retreat with Dr. April Brown at Peace Retreat in Costa Rica. She is so knowledgeable, compassionate, understanding and easy to talk to. She gets to the root of any issue and gives you new and helpful tools to use, while creating a path towards positive change. She helped my husband and I understand each other better, and helped us work through 12 years of unresolved issues. I can confidently say that she helped save our marriage. I am truly grateful for all Dr. Brown has done for me and my family.

Having Dr. April as a therapist is a breath of fresh air. Definitely the 1st session I have ever had where i did not feel judge or left feeling worse. She goes above and beyond and I can really appreciate that. My husband and I are both amazed from how educated she is and the information we were given to better not only ourselves but our relationship. We both walked away feeling more confident in our relationship.
Dr. Brown is an extremely wise and creative therapist. Her warmth coupled with her profound insight and therapeutic skillset are life-chamging. Be ready to grow!

I was able to communicate more effectively and comprehend my partner's viewpoints thanks to Dr. April. Our relationship gained fresh life from her emphasis on playful intimacy, which also reinvigorated my interest in my faith. She was not critical. We felt at ease talking about our thoughts and feelings since she established a welcoming and safe environment.
A great experience!

We couldn‚Äôt be happier with our experience with Ms. Gabby at Capital Speech & Occupational Therapy. She is patient, caring, and truly goes above and beyond. My son has grown so much in his speech since working with her. She makes each session fun and engaging. He‚Äôs excited to go every week. She also gives us helpful tools to support him at home. You can tell she is passionate about what she does. We are so thankful for the progress our son has made. Highly recommend!

Provided exceptional speech and language therapy services. Their team is highly skilled, professional, and dedicated to delivering measurable results. They take the time to understand each client‚Äôs unique needs and create individualized plans that foster real progress. Their professionalism, communication, and commitment to excellence make them an outstanding resource in our community. I highly recommend to anyone seeking high-quality speech therapy services.

Ms. Taylor has been the biggest blessing to our family ‚ô•Ô∏è My girl was barely talking and she has made leaps and bounds in progress thanks to Taylor and her expertise. She truly loves what she does and has such a special way about her with children. I am so grateful we found Capital speech and Ms. Taylor! She will always be apart of our families story ü•π‚ô•Ô∏è
Capital Speech & Language has the best staff. They make therapy so fun and engaging! Bonus they take CHP

We have had such a wonderful experience with Capital Speech. Cannot say enough good things about Ms. Maya and Ms. Elizabeth. Both are gifted therapists, and very patient and kind with their clients. We‚Äôve seen so much progress and very quick results. Thank you!
Excellent veterinary hospital. Caring, compassionate and best of all knowledgeable. Excellent communication. My dog has lung cancer and he is getting top notch treatment.

This is the most caring and impressive veterinary clinic I have ever encountered. The staff is truly invested in your pet. The medical care, procedures and equipment are unlimited in scope. They even have a blood bank and will match the blood type! My dog Bella had a hidden upper GI bleed. Using diligence and a variety of imaging they located the bleed and will undergo surgery. We will see how things turn out but nice to get answers. The surgeons are renowned and I know Bella is in good hands. Staff and range of diagnostics A++

I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this vet clinic. From the moment we walked in, the staff was incredibly friendly, compassionate, and knowledgeable. My dog, Loki, was diagnosed with IVDD, and after being told by other places that he needed immediate surgery, I was feeling overwhelmed and scared. Thankfully, I decided to bring him here for a second opinion.

Instead of rushing into surgery, the team here took a thoughtful and thorough approach. They started with pain management, which already showed improvement, and then added laser therapy. Thanks to their care and patience, Loki is now back home and on the road to recovery. It‚Äôll be a long process, but seeing him improve without the trauma of surgery means the world to me.

I‚Äôm beyond grateful for every single person who looked after Loki this past week. They treated him like family, and that kind of care is priceless. I would recommend this place with my eyes closed‚Äîseriously, they‚Äôre that good. Thank you from the bottom of my heart!

Everyone from the desk staff, to the techs to doctors do an amazing job. They explained my options and the pros and cons of each route; after I chose the surgery route, Dr. Jehn then explained what would happen next and then in the future. I felt very informed and comfortable while my corgi wad experiencing all the stages of her ACL surgery. They answered my questions and elaborated with visuals from the X-rays. I called with questions and they answered with efficiency and care. I live 2 hours away, and this facility was recommended to me since Dr. Jehn is a specialist. I agree, they are worth it the drive and the money. I feel like the price wasn‚Äôt bad compared to other canine ACL surgeries I‚Äôve heard about from friends in the southeastern US.

My experiences here were 5 star with everyone until I encountered Sofia Morales, well encountered isn't the right word since she's never bothered to speak to me, explain anything to me or give me an opportunity to ask any questions. I still paid full price for her services though. I handed over thousands of dollars without hesitation because my vet told me this was the best place to go but she couldn't even bothered to speak to me. I don't even think she bothered to examine him at his last appointment so that money feels like it was just a donation. I had to go home and Google his diagnosis and figure it all out for myself. 3wks later we switched to another Dr only to find out that her plan wasn't going to work because the disease was already too progressed. But at least Dr Sorrento tried to do something. He was kind and thoughtful even though he was very honest.
My beautiful 5yr old dog is dead now and I can't help but think maybe had she actually examined him at his appointment, maybe had she bothered to speak to me over a year ago when it was identified. Is it laziness? Incompetence? Maybe Great Danes and Liver Disease just aren't exciting enough for you.I genuinely hope every day is the day you deserve, Sofia Morales

I do NOT  recommend coming here‚Ä¶

This review is long overdue, but Rachel and Melody have been wonderful for my Mother. It is great that they are part of her routine and care. Very professional. The place is super clean and tidy, and the service is top-notch. Highly recommended.

Dr. Chris Carrier is an amazing vet! He has taken care of my dogs and cats for years, and I‚Äôve always appreciated how much time he spends with each visit. He doesn‚Äôt just rush through‚Äîhe really listens and works to find the root cause of what‚Äôs going on. My whole family now brings their pets to him, and we‚Äôve all had the same great experience. His staff is kind and helpful, the prices are fair, and he‚Äôs been there for me anytime I‚Äôve had an emergency. I feel confident knowing my pets are in such good hands. I highly recommend Dr. Carrier and Care Animal Clinic to anyone looking for a vet who truly cares!

I just want to say that we are very, very happy. We took Clarence in today as a walk-in they took care of him. The doctor was fabulous. He was very personable very very reasonable price. We are coming back for sure and I‚Äôll be getting all of my dogs records from my old vet and to take them to there‚Ä¶..And Makayla Ward was fabulous she took real good care of us and him

I‚Äôve trusted Dr. Carrier at Care Animal Clinic with my cat Taz‚Äôs care for years, and he has always been professional, compassionate, and genuinely dedicated to his patients.

Recently on Tuesday night when Taz suddenly became very ill and was showing signs of dying, I rushed him to Vets ER off Socrum Loop. I explained clearly to the ER vet that I was under financial strain and needed honest guidance about his condition. Despite that, they barely examined him, missed obvious signs of jaundice and liver failure, gave him fluids and a stomach injection, and sent us home‚Äîcharging me a significant amount in the process. Taz continued to suffer for 24 more hours, which could have and should have been avoided had they taken his condition seriously. Given how advanced his symptoms were, euthanasia should have been compassionately recommended then.

On Wednesday morning- the next available appointment I could get him in, I brought Taz back to Dr. Carrier. Without needing additional testing, he immediately recognized that Taz was jaundiced and in liver failure. He handled the situation with grace and empathy, helping me make the heartbreaking but humane decision to end Taz‚Äôs suffering. I‚Äôm so grateful for the care he showed not only to Taz, but to me as well in such a difficult moment.

If you‚Äôre looking for a veterinarian who truly puts your pet‚Äôs well-being‚Äîand your situation‚Äîfirst, I can‚Äôt recommend Dr. Carrier highly enough. His compassion and honesty stand in stark contrast to what I experienced elsewhere.

I brought my "furry" son Cooper to see Dr.Carrier for the first time last week. I was scared because my dog doesn't like men in general,he will bite. They kept us all safe and they helped my sweet boy feel better. Highly recommend,the whole staff was amazing.

I love Dr. Carrier! He‚Äôs a great vet, and answered all my questions and gave my two dogs great care! The PROBLEM is his staff!   Rude, unfriendly, sent us home on two occasions with flea meds for a 40+ pound dog, yet both of mine are under 20! If I hadn‚Äôt noticed it myself, my dogs could have wound up terribly sick or worse. Then a week ago, our older dog was dying, and we talked to Jessica at the office asking for price for 2 shots to put our dog down, we were told $289!! My husband questioned that amount, and asked if we could get a discount because of our other two dogs being patients there, and that we‚Äôve spent hundreds of dollars there, she became a rude, non compassionate smart alleck !  Totally hurtful and unnecessary! Our hearts were broken and she could have cared less.  So we are done there. But Dr Chris, it‚Äôs not you, it‚Äôs your staff, especially when someone‚Äôs fur baby is at deaths door. Totally uncalled for. She broke our hearts further with her behavior.

I've been bringing my pets to this clinic for over 20 years, and I wouldn‚Äôt go anywhere else. The staff is consistently friendly and welcoming, and the doctor is truly one of a kind‚Äîalways personable, compassionate, and deeply experienced. With over 30 years in practice, his dedication shows in every visit. I recommend him to everyone I know.
Thank you~Martika

I have so much praise for Dr. Batista and his staff and would highly recommend him to treat your beloved pets. I bring all of my kitties to him and he and his staff are the most sincere, experienced and caring people that I have ever met. He tells it to you straight so that you can make your important, sometimes sad decisions, and sometimes the outcome cannot be helped as it is your fur-ever babies time to pass on, but a lot of times it is happy because the treatment works, to make your beloved pets well again. He cares, he works hard to diagnose, treat and keep you informed of everything he is doing. A HUGE thank you for his work and to his staff for the help with my beloved Cheena (also Lola and Sukee and Simone).

The doctor and nurses are amazing. The doctor takes all the time needed to explain in detail what my kitties need. I feel that the cost isn‚Äôt too high, especially when it comes to our little ones‚Äô health. I‚Äôm truly grateful for all the care they give us.
They are AwEsOmE in identifying and addressing your pet sickness, an excellent friendly staff, and definitely, a customer problem solving experience. Huge thank you in the name of Gizmo and Parents.
Dr. Batista has been our family veterinarian for over 18 years and the staff are all very caring, very accommodating and professional.  I highly recommend Care Corner Animal Clinic.

I must say that this place is awesome! I felt treated with respect and the lady Michelle who flushed my ears did so with so much kindness and respect. Excellent experience both times I‚Äôve been there. The staff is truly amazing! They are very kind and caring. I would most definitely recommend this urgent care to anyone!! Best experience I‚Äôve had!! Thank you for your great customer service service and caring about the patients‚Ä¶

The nurse who took my vitals was so amazing she was the sweetest lady ever and extremely understanding and helpful ! Let's just say, this company has a lot of growing to do!!! Also, they do not allow their nurses to work extra hours. If you don't have a nurse, THEY GOING TO LEAVE YOU WITHOUT ONE, INSTEAD OF PAYING THE PREVIOUS NURSE EXTRA TO COVER A FEW MORE HOURS.

They offer flexible care plans to help manage costs when your pet needs more frequent vists. What impressed me most recently was learning that Dr. K also treats chickens! He loves all creatures.
Doc was very informative and open to all my crazy questions. Super happy to find a chicken vet!

They are AWESOME üëç  I don't have Pet Insurance, but they have a Plan that works great for me üòÅ there is 2 types of plans. I am extremely happy with everyone at Care Pet!!! I was surprised at how thoroughly the Dr checked my Lucy. They are a little bit more pricey, but when you get such good service, It Is well worth it. Took my two cats in for their first checkup, shots, neutering, etc. Everyone was incredibly sweet and seemed super excited to meet my two sweet kitties! Despite how pleasant the people and atmosphere are, there is a flaw. It's a bit disorganized.

I had to fill out documentation several times over because the system was a bit wonky. I didn't really mind, but it did tack on another 20 minutes to the time I spent there. Also, I went in under the impression I'd be paying around $440 for both cats to get seen (this is the quote they initially gave me). They then informed me that this price was for one cat and that the total would be somewhere around $900. THEN I was informed that the information was put into the system wrong and that I would need to pay $1200. I think this is a reasonable price for everything that was getting done, but I really do wish someone could've told me from the beginning...

Overall great place! Very pleasant people who really do love your animals. It just needs to be streamlined for better logistical efficiency.

brought my cat in and they made it seem like maybe he just had a tummy ache and needed a few days to get over it. a week later, after 3 appointments and spending over 1k, he died. still had no idea what even was wrong with him. do not go here if you want to give your pet a chance at survival.

edit to respond to reply:

i was never told it was an emergency, my concerns were shrugged off in the first visit. therefore if i am given an expensive list of different and unnecessary things i will decline some for financial reasons. i was told i could personally choose between treatment options, dr never recommended a specific route, and i am not an expert. by the last appointment, he was was in respiratory distress, and clearly much worse condition than his first visit, and i was just sent home with an appointment scheduled for the following WEEK (as if he would make it that long) instead of to an emergency vet. he died that same night.

I adopted a cat and a couple days later he was sick. I called care pet and they got my in the next day. It took 3x for us to get my sweet Milo feeling better but they did. I saw 3 diff doctors and they did an amazing job with my sweet boy. All the vet techs were so nice to us and wanted the best for sweet Milo. David, and our tech today and the lady at the front counter Kathrine I believe her name was are some of the best. I will be bringing my sweet boy back anytime I need something. Another thing is they called and checked on Milo all the time. Love that they care

We bring our dog to Care Pet for all of her needs. This time was for teeth cleaning in which the pet is put under anesthesia. Thank you to all of your staff for taking care of our pet. She is family.

Lisa at the front desk is also amazing‚Äîso warm, caring, and always made me feel welcome. I‚Äôm so grateful for their kindness and highly recommend their office to anyone looking for compassionate, knowledgeable care.

I am so grateful for the care I've received from Dr. Robert and his amazing staff. As a holistic doctor, he has a truly unique and caring approach. I first came to his office to seek treatment for my anxiety, and from the moment I made my first appointment, the staff made me feel comfortable and right at home. Dr. Robert is not a doctor who rushes through appointments. He takes his time to listen thoroughly, offer thoughtful advice, and provide genuine support. He helped me find the right path to managing my anxiety, and the acupuncture treatments he recomm

The entire staff is outstanding! Alyssa, Ashley, Lisa, and Lily are all so kind, professional, and attentive. They always greet you with a smile and go out of their way to make sure you're comfortable and cared for. Their energy truly makes each visit something to look forward to.

And of course, a huge shout out to Dr. Adam‚Äîhis expertise and personalized care have been life-changing. Since starting treatment, my pain management has drastically improved, and I'm finally getting consistent, quality sleep again. I feel better both physically and mentally thanks to his work.

Acupuncture with Dr. Rob has been wonderful for helping regulate my nervous system. I always feel great every time I leave this facility. I highly recommend!

I broke both of my legs and the team here has been incredible throughout my recovery. The entire staff is attentive, supportive, and genuinely dedicated to helping their patients heal. I‚Äôm truly grateful for their care and highly recommend this place for physical therapy. I also appreciate that it‚Äôs so close to Miami shores and have plenty of parking spaces.

I have already reviewed this place and after a few years I feel to remark how resolutive it has been for me and my daughter, for many issues we have had. He is so sweet, answers to any question and it looks like he talks with your body. I also appreciated the touch he had with my daughter to have a female therapist to do some treatment on her hips. Exercises are effective, he teaches you and gives you the time to learn during the session and next time he checks you are doing them (don't cheat, he knows) and more important, how you execute them. The place is clean, big and peaceful but you still have your privacy in the treatment room. It's more like a spa than a clinic. Happy to be his patient. What a hidden gem in miami!! The staff is extremely knowledgable, friendly, and extremely professional! We are so happy that we discovered this place for physical therapy after an accident this summer.

Very professional and caring for their patients PT place. I‚Äôve been going for a knee injury the last couple of weeks and I am very impressed with their work. I am almost heeled but I‚Äôve also seen the progress on others.  I am super happy I found them. Claudio and all his staff are truly great!

Great experience working on my mental health

provider_name: Caroline's Speech Retreat LLC | Tallahassee Pediatric Speech Therapy
review_text: As a bilingual child, my son initially found speaking English challenging. Caroline has been instrumental in helping him grow and gain confidence. With a variety of materials and thoughtful approaches, she made the most of every session. Her passion, along with her ability to spark my child‚Äôs curiosity, made learning an engaging experience. She also provided helpful resources for us to practice at home, ensuring consistent encouragement beyond the session. I am deeply grateful for her dedication, warmth, and unwavering commitment to my child‚Äôs progress.

provider_name: Caroline's Speech Retreat LLC | Tallahassee Pediatric Speech Therapy
review_text: We have loved our time with Ms. Caroline! She‚Äôs everything you could want for your child‚Äôs speech therapist- intelligent, organized, but also so fun and kind! My daughter loved getting to go and play games with Ms. Caroline. I really appreciated the videos and education she provided me with to help support my daughter at home. We are so lucky to have her in Tallahassee!! Highly recommend!!

provider_name: Caroline's Speech Retreat LLC | Tallahassee Pediatric Speech Therapy
review_text: My daughter had a lot of difficulty with pronunciation early on and, although I found it adorable, I realized around 4 years old that she was becoming frustrated with trying to communicate. We got her in with Caroline and within a few months she has perfect diction! Caroline is very professional, energetic and always kind. Highly recommend!!

provider_name: Caroline's Speech Retreat LLC | Tallahassee Pediatric Speech Therapy
review_text: I cannot express enough how thankful we are for Mrs. Caroline and the incredible impact she‚Äôs had on our son‚Äôs speech development. Her knowledge, patience, and kindness have made all the difference in his progress. Not only does she provide invaluable strategies during sessions, but she also offers helpful resources for us to practice at home, which has truly supported his growth. We‚Äôve seen major improvements in his speech and, most importantly, his confidence when talking to others. Mrs. Caroline goes above and beyond to ensure your child meets their milestones, and we are beyond grateful for her dedication and care. She is truly an outstanding therapist!

provider_name: Caroline's Speech Retreat LLC | Tallahassee Pediatric Speech Therapy
review_text: Ms. Caroline was helpful in the development of speech for my son. After only a few months he went from very little words to full sentences and able to express his needs clearly. He worked with Ms. Caroline for a year and she was very communicative with his progress via phone, progress notes, and videos of sessions. I am happy we were recommended her services through the school.
This farm is absolutely stunning, and the trainers are top notch. My niece rode fire who was a very sharp little lesson pony. Libbey was her trainer and she did an excellent job teaching.

I‚Äôve been a client of Carriage Hill Farm for nearly 6 years and can confidently say that every member of their team puts the horses‚Äô and riders‚Äô safety above all else. Not only have I gotten multiple horses from CHF themselves, but they have found my dream horses from states away, ensuring that they are the right fit for me. They have riders who are just sitting on horses for the first time, and riders showing consistently in the A circuit; they welcome any level and will move at each individual‚Äôs speed. They have completely transformed my riding and have spurred my confidence immeasurably, but most importantly, take care of my horses as if they are their own. They have 100% of my trust when it comes to proper horse management. If you want a barn filled with highly knowledgeable professionals that prioritize the health and safety of their horses and riders, Carriage Hill Farms is the perfect place to be. It truly has become a second home for me in the past few years, with the most welcoming and caring trainers, grooms, and group of riders.

I have been riding at Carriage Hill for a little while now and I absolutely love it. They take care of my horse wonderfully. He is loving it. I love everything about the training too. It really helps get your legs stronger so that you can improve on your riding. I love all of the big rings and the grass ring too. This barn is the way to go. Definitely the best!

My daughter and I have been riding at Carriage Hill Farms since she was a little girl, more than 15 years. We have owned/leased several horses through the years, all brought to us by the CHF team, and we continue to have the most wonderful experience at this barn! Education, safety and fun are paramount at CHF and I highly recommend you check out this barn if you want to ride. The trainers, grooms and our fellow equestrians are the best!

I lease a horse at Carriage Hill and everyone is so nice and professional! My lessons are amazing and safety is a top concern. Ever instructor is knowledgeable and helpful and I always have a blast with the other people I ride with!

Danielle at Cascade, the most caring, professional, knowledgeable person. She works with every patient on their individual needs. I feel her therapy is one of the main reasons I have the mobility I have in my hand.  She is very aware of your pain level because she is in tune with your recovery. I would highly recommend her. By the way she is not a therapist that tells you to do something and walks away, she stays with you and encourages you. Danielle is the best therapist!!! Brittany in her office staff is kind, smart and efficient. I love going to this office

I have had the privilege of being mentored by Danielle at Cascade Hand Therapy, and her experience has been invaluable to my learning. She goes far beyond textbook knowledge, providing the perfect balance of evidence-based protocols and encouragement of clinical reasoning. Danielle sets an incredible example of what it means to be a skilled and compassionate CHT, and I aspire to follow in her footsteps in my own career.

My hand specialist recommended me to this facility. The place is very clean and staff are very friendly. Ms. Danielle is such a talented and patient therapist.  She can use the materials to contour to your hands/fingers with the best functional and comfort possible.  I am so happy with her skilled work and highly recommend any patients who have hands injuries and need any custom made splints or hand Rehab.  A+ service and way to go!

Absolutely love this office! Danielle is an amazing Occupational Therapist!  She listens to how you are feeling and then creates exercises that will be best for the recovery on my hand. She is very knowledgeable and caring . Brittany is wonderful as well! I feel very comfortable going to my therapy for my hand.
Great logo too !

Danielle is a true expert. Her years of experience, professionalism and warm personality combine to achieving my hand rehabilitation goals in a positive and relaxed atmosphere. She uses many effective techniques to achieve results. I can‚Äôt thank her enough. I recommend her highly and unequivocally.

provider_name: Casper's Camp Hope Gainesville Dog Training
review_text: We had our Giant Schnauzer puppy Lucy do her basic functional obedience training at Casper's. Although I was initially apprehenisive about board-and-train programs, this was the best money we have ever spent. Lucy was on her way to becoming an unruly and destructive adolescent dog when Jimmy and Dania stepped in to save us. The team at Casper's loved our dog and helped her build her self-awareness and impulse control. Lucy came back to us a different dog (still the same goofy and boistrous spirit) but now with obedience and self control. She was returned happy, clean and in great condition. Lucy is now so much happier knowing what is expected of her. Having a calm well-mannered dog is such a gift to our family. We could not have trained this difficult breed on our own. Jimmy and Dania spent many hours working with us and our kids to get to know Lucy's commands and handling. I recently dropped Lucy back off at Casper's for a weekend boarding and she was so excited to see her old friends. It was clear she had good memories of her experience. We hope to keep working with Jimmy and his team for more advanced training as Lucy gets older. So happy to have found Casper's.

provider_name: Casper's Camp Hope Gainesville Dog Training
review_text:
I cannot say enough wonderful things about Casper Camp Hope. When I first brought my dog here, we were struggling with serious aggression issues‚Äîwalks were stressful, visits from friends were impossible, and I worried constantly about his safety and ours.

From day one, the trainers were patient, knowledgeable, and completely dedicated to helping us succeed. They didn‚Äôt just ‚Äútrain‚Äù my dog‚Äîthey took the time to understand his triggers, his body language, and the root cause of his behavior. Every step of the program was tailored to his needs, and I received clear guidance on how to continue the training at home.

The results have been incredible. My dog is calmer, more confident, and able to be around other people and dogs without the constant stress we once had. I‚Äôve also learned so much about how to be a better, more confident leader for him.

If your dog struggles with aggression, do not hesitate‚Äîthis camp is compassionate, professional, and truly life-changing. My only regret is not finding them sooner.

provider_name: Casper's Camp Hope Gainesville Dog Training
review_text: Casper‚Äôs Camp Home saved my dogs quality of life. We were out of options for my aggressive, anxious, insecure dog and Jimmy and his team allowed him to have a normal life that he feels comfortable and confident in. My dog had SEVERE separation/storm anxiety and aggression towards other animals. I‚Äôm talking he‚Äôs jumped out of a second story window, ripped out his own teeth/nails, and broken through countless crates and doors. He has been on multiple strong prescription medications and still no change. I felt like there was nothing that could help him. After completing the board and train program, he is a completely different dog (in the best ways). He has not had another incident of aggression nor harming himself due to anxiety. The only place I will use for boarding! I know he is in good hands when he‚Äôs at Casper‚Äôs Camp Hope. Can‚Äôt recommend or thank them enough.

provider_name: Casper's Camp Hope Gainesville Dog Training
review_text: The trainers are amazing! Our dog has come such a long way since we dropped him off. It‚Äôs been really nice having videos and pictures to see your dog‚Äôs progress as well. I would highly recommend Casper‚Äôs Camp Hope!

provider_name: Casper's Camp Hope Gainesville Dog Training
review_text: We sent our 4 month old Rottweiler to them for obedience training and she‚Äôs been doing so great! We wanted to make sure we trained her properly because we have 3 young children and not much experience with teaching dogs commands. I feel very confident that I will have all the tools to keep going once she comes home! And they‚Äôre so knowledgeable and are always available to answer any questions we have. So thankful for them!

We love Casperey Stables! We've been riding here for 4 1/2 years and have loved every minute of it. Excellent trainers and owner. They instill a wonderful sense of purpose, dedication and responsibility ‚ù§Ô∏è. And, they have the sweetest horses üê¥

The goal was to increase the muscle mass on my right leg in order to prevent pain and injury to my knee. Today is my last session. Thanks to dr Brent treatment, I can squat, do lounges, and complete exercises that involve balance. I am no longer afraid to fall.

Brent was amazing and immediately helped diagnose the source of my issue and resolved my calf issues in a few weeks! And can't forget about Johanna at the front desk! She is so sweet and adds light to my experience from the moment I walk in! 100% recommend coming here to find relief!

This was the answer to my aches, pains, and nuances. Everyone at Catalyst is friendly, kind, and want the best for each patient. Dr. Jenn listens to your needs, celebrates your improvements, and always helps you get better.
Went in with foot and ankle pain, walked out pain free! Big thanks to Dr. Jen and her amazing staff. I will continue to refer friends and family.
