I Highly recommend them to any parent with concerns for their young children!

I pickup meds for my grandsons here as per their insurance. Usually no issues despite different staff every visit, high employee turnover didn't look good. Also don't like the fact that now one has to pay for a rewards benefit.
They truly are the most amazing people. They‚Äôre so kind and helpful

I wish we found Catching Up much sooner! They have been amazing and very grateful we found them. My kid loves going and so does his RBT‚Äôs. Their staff and space is one of a kind.  Denise and Amaris are very prompt, supportive, caring, and accommodating. It was definitely worth the drive for us. I highly recommend!
They‚Äôre great! They have helped my Son so much. He feels at home there and loves Amaris and Denise.

reviewer_name: Ma. Carolina Ramon de los Rios
review_text:
We work with Jerry for several years and had the most amazing experience. My son improved a lot. Being a child with ASD is overwhelm and Jerry coached us wonderful, gave us tools and advices to be better parents. He also trained my child to use the restroom and less than 3 days my son was ready. He is an independent boy with great tools.

We only have gratitude with his kindness, his passion for striving to do better and commit to achieve goals. Highly recommended
Amazing center! Great staff all around and impressive sensory rooms and jungle gym. Perfect environment for kids to thrive.

I took my autistic son there because i was struggling with his behavior and that he didn't want to try new food and all i can say is that jerry is the best, he was able to introduce him to new food, he was able to sit down and do work, he was able to walk outside instead of running, he learned how to use the toilet.

Cathy came as a recommendation from a good friend and she has been amazing! I was having pain in my hip and between her therapy sessions, at home exercises and adjustments on how I stand, sit, walk, workout has completely helped heal that pain! She is incredibly knowledgeable and has a very mindful way to work with your body! I can‚Äôt recommend her enough! Love you, Cathy!! Thank you!!

Cathy is a wonderful physical therapist- unlike any I have ever seen previously (and I have seen many). Her approach is to evaluate not only the area having the problem but your whole body. This approach allows her to find root causes of your pain.

She is literally very ‚Äúhands on‚Äù - this allows her to make adjustments that facilitate healing. She follows every session with detailed emails with videos showing exactly what needs to be done to fully resolve your issues.

I have seen Cathy for shoulder, neck, foot and most recently hip issues. I am never disappointed and she always helps resolve my issue. A further plus is her extensive knowledge of the body and enthusiastic attitude.

I strongly recommend seeing Cathy for any issues you may have.

Cathy is very nice and super smart about the whole body and she helped me to feel better with her unique hands-on adjustments and helped to understand the root cause of the lower back issues that turns out started already when I was much younger. She gave me very valuable information and exercises and self-release techniques that I can do at home to work on my posture and alignment and be able to live pain-free! Thank you, Cathy!

I saw many doctors,  chiropractors, acupuncturists, and osteopaths over ten years about my shoulder pain and migraines, sometimes with relief but no cure. The first session Cathy diagnosed the root cause of my shoulder pain. I was able to get full relief after working with her over a few months which I never thought was possible. Now that I know where the pain comes from I can stretch the right places to avoid getting into that cycle. Yes, they are difficult sessions (this is no gentle yoga sesh) and out-of-pocket but I could not be more grateful!

Cathy is amazing and quickly identified what was causing pain in my knee and arm.  I am all fixed and back to my normal routine.  Highly recommend especially if you have not been able to get relief through other PTs.

As a child welfare worker with years of experience. I trust Cayer Behavioral Group with my child. Cayer accommodates his therapy demands. This has been an amazing experience for us. I look forward to my son‚Äôs continuous progress in the future. Cayer Behavioral Group‚ÄîHighly Recommended!
I love CBG!!!! They help every child to their specific needs!!! Anyone who says otherwise is ignorant.

Because the owner mistreats both employees and clients. The therapists, besides 1-2, are great. The owner is publicly known as a pretty terrible person and has very unprofessional billing procedures and has kicked clients out for being unable to pay thousands at a time, and kicked my 3 year old out because I stood up to her. I loved my therapist, but would never advise anyone to take their child there because of billing and mistreatment being so prevalent there. Work closely with you insurance when going here. My insurance called me and said they think there was fraud going on, at best neglect with timely claims procedures, which led to multiple problems. We also had therapists who were not experienced or certified to lead my child's therapy program working with him-another major insurance issue. My 3 year old has regressed since we have gone over a month without services since we were kicked out with NO NOTICE over the owner's personal issues with me (I mentioned my experience with my support group, and someone told her about it and she lost her cool in fear of more bad PR), note I am not her client (my 3 year old with severe nonverbal autism is) but I am his mother who paid this company thousands in co-pays, and the insurance paid her around 150,000 per year. Pretty awful to do to a kid no matter how you look at it. It's about the children. We are glad we are gone from Cayer Behavioral, but we are deeply saddened to see our little boy regress so much and lose valuable time in therapy. We will be much happier when we begin with Engage. I would even choose BMC over Cayer because of the aforementioned. Be careful with your children.

As an educator in a school setting I can tell you first-hand what an amazing staff Cayer has. Their staff goes above and beyond for their clients. Every staff member I have met has been dedicated, knowledgeable, and passionate. They have been a tremendous support to me in the classroom. I cannot say enough good things about this group.

Cayer Behavioral Group is an amazing organization that has helped me, help my students. I'm a teacher for adults with disabilities with ages 18-22. Whenever I've needed advice or insight, the staff has always been there to help. I love CBG!

I'm glad to see this place has the one star it deserves! Dr Dial is the doctor who misdiagnosed my son with GDD at 3. After the results appointment he said well now you can go get the disability check. I think he believed the racist trope that all Black moms want a government handout. For the record my son is now 11 and he is never received a disability check. But thankfully Social Care Services properly diagnosed him with autism.

Since my son was 2 going on 3 I heard so much great things about this place but still went through different venues for care because I was not convinced that my son was autistic at that time.  When my son was 8 I finally decided to try CARD and after a year of gathering everything they asked me for I was told I was going to be placed on the waiting list.  FIVE YEARS LATER I finally got a call and had a psychiatric evaluation for my son.

I cannot aptly describe my shock at how terribly things went and my extreme disappointment at the deliberate strategy of the psychiatrist to use his training to gaslight me, belittle me, disrespect me, berate me, and create a distressing and frustrating environment during the entire evaluation.  This same strategy was applied to my son to undermine his accomplishments and underrate his achievements to disprove his aptitude and further gaslight me regarding his achievements. Everything my son did correctly he said it was incorrect.  He asked my son to show him something and my son pointed to it, then he said my son is incorrect and actually asked me later when did my son regress and stop pointing.

My son's teacher said he is the best student in her class and this man was acting like he was totally academically incapable.  Furthermore his attack on my education, parenting, intelligence and worth as a person lets me know that this organization is not ready to work with parents of Autistic children.

Parents, please do not let these professionals discourage you.  You are highly skilled, socially capable, brilliant, loving, strong, knowledgeable, respectable, courageous, resilient and magnificent.  Keep pushing forward for your child and don't ever doubt your certainty of their skills and aptitude.  It is not an easy road and you deserve a team that will honor your hard work by working with you and your child instead of against.

I am not sure if I should still give this place a chance.  The reviews here are all one star so far and are all accurate.  The lady who did the intake was nice, but the antisocial behaviors of the psychiatrist overshadows that by far.

After being on the waiting list for 18 months and finally being seen. I was told that my non-verbal child could not be diagnosed with ASD because he was able to interact with the Doctor through play. I know many autistic people personally and publicly that are more that able to interact in their own ways! Many have jobs, get married, have children etc. I would not recommend this place to anyone. We went for a second opinion with another Doctor and we‚Äôre diagnosed with ASD the same day.

I took my son to all the appointments did everything they ask it‚Äôs been 5 months later and they still have yet to give me a diagnosis. I called them 2 times and the first time they said the doctor will call me for an appointment another month goes by I call again and they tell me that someone on the team will call me to go over the results not the doctor and I ask why is the doctor not going to do it and they say that the doctor already gave me the results that‚Äôs a lie haven‚Äôt heard from him since I met him. I really don‚Äôt even know if the results even mean anything to me since this is how they do business the whole place is lost and confused somebody needs to come in and show this place how to do there job or they need to be shut down permanently.
No help at all.

CFCC strives to be a support and buffer for children and families in the community by engaging with children in their language, the language of play. As a therapist with the agency for almost 2 years, I see on a daily basis the need for mental health services for children, especially as we are still in the midst of a pandemic.  I feel very lucky to have been able to continue to provide support during this challenging time, and know that what we want most for all children is for them to be healthy and happy.

The trainings that the Center for Child Counseling provide are both informative and engaging. I especially appreciate the wealth of knowledge shared on ACE's, toxic stress and Play Therapy. I've attended no less than 5 trainings with CFCC over the past 3 years and I can say they've truly helped me develop a strong foundation as a clinician working with Children and Families.

Center for Child Counseling really helped me and my family. Our therapist - Darla was so helpful in my child's growth. she has helped me navigate his fears and anxieties, has helped me become a better parent and understand my child better, and has helped my child come out of his shell and grow in his confidence. there are not enough words to express what a difference Darla has made in our lives.

After waiting months to receive services they offered a counselor who on our first conversation told me that she was leaving in a few weeks. My options were take this counselor for my child who had been referred due to concerns of self harm or go back in the waiting pool for months longer. Needless to say that counselor was kind but not very helpful. Second counselor SAMANTHA LOFORTE was unprofessional and very obviously inexperienced. She was unwilling or unable to connect with my child and after scraping up $150/week for multiple sessions she attempted to exit her stating she didn‚Äôt know how to connect with my child. When I spoke of why she was there she said she had no idea the last counselor didn‚Äôt take any notes! When I inquired why that would be she stated it was to protect the family. ü§î

HIGHLY recommend you do NOT use this agency or if unavoidable that you avoid SAMANTHA LOFORTE.

As a parent I only wanted my child to get help md feel safe and that was not something she could Accomplish and put minimal effort. My child is kind, sweet and introverted.

Very disappointing experience.

Center for Child Counseling is an amazing agency that is dedicated to help children and families in our community. It is a trauma-informed agency that also helps everyone in our community to become trauma informed to promote resilience and social-emotional wellbeing in children. They have passionate well trained therapists and variety of workshops to help children as well as their caregivers.

provider_name: Center for Child and Adult Psychiatry (CCAP)
review_text: I submitted the paperwork online for my son almost 2 months ago. Called 2 weeks ago for a status, and never received a call back. I called again today and spoke to scheduling and I was informed they have no availability at all for my child.

provider_name: Center for Child and Adult Psychiatry (CCAP)
review_text: I submitted new patient paperwork online for my son at the beginning of December and have never heard from anyone. I even left a message mid-January asking for a call back which I didn't recieve. Just now I had an appointment in the same building and couldn't find this practice. Does it even exist anymore? Very weird.

provider_name: Center for Child and Adult Psychiatry (CCAP)
review_text: I have great experience with the practice. Scheduling was thorough and smooth. My provider Rebekah is very knowledgable and patient. She really listens to my concerns and asks the right questions to get to the bottom of my symptoms.

provider_name: Center for Child and Adult Psychiatry (CCAP)
review_text: I am so thankful that I have found Dr. Gregory Thorkelson and Center for Child and Adult Psychiatry. His wealth of diverse knowledge, thorough evaluation and follow-ups, his kind and genuine approach have improved my mental health conditions tremendously. After years of struggling and seeing many psychiatrists, I finally found a doctor that is able to look into and treat the root cause of my mental health conditions. I have never felt this good in years. I have referred friends and family to him and strongly recommend Dr. Thorkelson to those that need psychiatric care.

provider_name: Center for Child and Adult Psychiatry (CCAP)
review_text: pretty disappointed. Ive been trying to set up myself as a new patient here , when I call I get told to fill the online application. I filled it out more then a week ago and have yet to get any reply. neither a call nor email

provider_name: Center for Family Services of Palm Beach County, Inc.
review_text: I was going thru the lowest and hardest moments of my life. I called and asked for counseling to help what I‚Äôm going through. You have to wait 6 weeks for an appointment. I went through the hardest moments and pain during that time. When I finally received therapy with them, I thought there wasn‚Äôt much hope and help left to offer but I was wrong. It‚Äôs been very helpful in navigating my relationships and it‚Äôs challenged me to do better. It‚Äôs honestly really helped and I‚Äôm grateful for it.

provider_name: Center for Family Services of Palm Beach County, Inc.
review_text: I used to see my therapist there, After my post separation abuse, they were really great.

provider_name: Center for Family Services of Palm Beach County, Inc.
review_text:
Awful! They called us to repair a roof leak that was causing havoc in their medical area. We did a great job at a great price and stopped the leak on the first visit. The roof is in really bad shape and it was very difficult to fix.

Now they tell us that they don't have enough money to pay the contract amount. They say they can't pay a lot of their bills and that they are very sorry

If they can't pay their bills what kind of medical service can they provide that is safe. I'm telling you. I would not go their to have my toenails trimmed.

STAY AWAY!!!!!!!

provider_name: Center for Family Services of Palm Beach County, Inc.
review_text: This place is doing Gods work on a daily basis. I credit them with saving my life 2 times now. They are so kind, so attentive and thorough. If you need help but don't have a lot of money, they help you on a sliding scale. Don't suffer alone. Let them help you.

provider_name: Center for Family Services of Palm Beach County, Inc.
review_text: If u need help and need someone to talk to this place is amazing. I'm sorry and feel bad that they can't pay their bills because they probably don't have enough funding. But I don't get what not paying ur bills and medical needs have in common.  Just cuz some places do pay there bills doesn't mean they take care of ur medical needs.This is just my opinion.

Our advocacy company, IEP Partner, has worked with Center for Health, Learning, and Achievement for many years now. They are amazing and experts in their fields! We refer our clients to CHFLA all the time!

Alicia Braccia is an amazing Psychologist who does the most thorough testing and provides very comprehensive recommendations. I am always very impressed by her work when I refer clients for her services. She has excellent staff as well who have provided top notch services to our mutual clients. Alicia just happens to know everything and everyone in town too, so if you ever need guidance of where to send your child to school, or what other professionals to seek that come highly recommended in town, she‚Äôs it!

Alicia Braccia has my enthusiastic recommendation.  Her credentials, experience, and knowledge are extensive and impressive.  I admire her professional work, especially her detailed reporting.  I believe she has a powerful voice in our school community, speaking up for the needs of children.  Not only is she an excellent psychologist, but she is truly special for her compassion and commitment to helping others.

Alicia Braccia is an extremely dedicated, caring and knowledgeable psychologist.  Her work ethic is surpassed by none, she truly cares about every child's well being from the moment they meet.  You can be certain that Alicia and her staff will do everything they can to help you with your children, and will always ensure you and your child are treated with the utmost respect.

Alicia Braccia and her team are an amazing resource for the children of Central Florida. I brought my daughter for testing to Alicia and I am so appreciative of the insights that she has given our family about my child's learning needs. Thank you to Alicia for everything that you have done for our family!

provider_name: Center for Psychological Growth and Wellness
review_text: My family and I have been patients of this clinic for a few years and everyone is so warm and inviting. Abbie at the front desk is a true joy to speak to and is always so kind. Dr. Quiana, Dr. Anderson and Dr. Schwartz are all FANTASTIC. Favorite therapists to date for my children and myself. Thank you for your dedication to your patients ü•πü´∂üèæ

provider_name: Center for Psychological Growth and Wellness
review_text:
The Dr.‚Äôs at the Center for Psychological Growth and Wellness are amazing. Both Dr. Brianna and Dr. Jeff have been vital to the growth of my children and I have truly noticed a difference at home with both their attitude and way they conduct themselves. They are happy to go and always leave better then when they came.

Along with them, Ms. Abby at the front desk, is always puntual with responses or passing along any messages I need. If I reach o it to her for whatever reason, she replies in a timely manner and helps me as best she can with anything I ask or need.

I really don‚Äôt have anything negative to say and look forward to taking them to their sessions and seeing them happy after. Highly recommend! A+++

provider_name: Center for Psychological Growth and Wellness
review_text: I never believed in therapy until I gave it a try. Melissa was very helpful in getting me set up and insured me I was making a good decision. Best choice I ever made thank you for your help

provider_name: Center for Psychological Growth and Wellness
review_text: I cannot say enough on how fantastic this office is. I have two children that see Dr. Swartz and Dr. Gentle. I highly recommend both of them. Any time I have an issue, I know calling Abbie at the desk will get the problem resolved!

provider_name: Center for Psychological Growth and Wellness
review_text: As a client and parent of a couple of clients I would have to say that this place takes the cake for psychological services. The staff, psychologists, and therapists are all extremely knowledgeable and professional in providing care ensuring that everyone is treated appropriately and seen in a timely manner. I highly recommend especially if you are struggling with mental health issues or general life struggles!

The Center for Speech & Language has been a game changer for my daughter who has needed additional help with reading. The office staff is always there to help quickly for any questions and scheduling. The therapists have been so patient, kind, and professional. They have been able to cater to my daughter's specific needs and focus on areas that she needs to work on the most. I highly recommend their services.
My daughter has flourished at The Center for Speech and Language. I am so thankful for their help in aiding my child in speech, language and reading skills. We consider them family!

I had such a great experience here for my two year old son's speech delay evaluation. I left the appointment feeling like the SLP really got to know my son in the time we were there. I went somewhere else first and didn't like it, and this place just exceeded my expectations in every way. Clean, professional, and comfortable. I would recommend to any mommy feeling nervous about speech therapy.

I have always had prompt service from the nurses or the physical therapist that arrive at my home. They are knowledgeable and personable. Jamie does a fabulous muscle massage. She really gets in there deep. Bettina and Stacy And Jennifer have been big helps to me.

All the Centerwell staff are excellent and caring. The answered any questions and were quick to respond. Our Nurse, Theresa was excellent, a wealth of information and a godsend to us. Our Physical Therapy person was very good as well.

Bettina is doing a fantastic job with my wife, it is a long hard road because chemo meds make her weak, but the therapy is definitely helping! I would recommend Center Well to anyone who needs Physical Therapy or anything else they do.

Uncaring and very unprofessional nurses. Tried to cancel my visit and I called and left a voicemail for my nurse and she admitted that she just got ready to go and left and did not check her voicemails. I also called the office and spoke with the answering service and they sent a email to her and she also admitted that she never checked her emails before she left the house. When I called and spoke with the answering service they transferred me to the triage nurse and the triage nurse acted and gave the attitude that she was too busy to deal with it. Never use this company and I am filing a complaint with my Medicare insurance company over this. Melissa is very unprofessional and very unorganized. Plus I get the feeling she is just going through the motions and I have not even seen her face to face as of yet, just dealing with her over the phone.

The nurse that was sent, was very personable and contacted me over the phone before she was to arrive at my house. However, no one contacted me about the physical therapy visits, no one contacted me at all. I was never really sure about what she was entitled to as far as services.  I am my mother's main caregiver and I tried reaching out to no avail. Family members need to know what's going on.

To leave my family member without supplies is a joke, Director Jessica  and Amy don't take accountability for anything when it comes to supplies!!!!!!!!!!! leaving an older person without supplies....is unacceptable!

CenterWell is the best home care agency we've ever had. All the healthcare workers that came were kind, compassionate and did an excellent job in healing my brother. They made sure we had all the medical supplies we needed for his care. Thank You Centerwell.
I was stood up twice and was given contradictory information from the nurse and the social worker.

They have completely turned things around for my grandmother. Through therapy, she has become stronger, ambulating without difficulty and back to her old self she was before her fall. Special shout-out to Soeurette Georges and Joe Lowry. They were absolutely amazing and my family will forever be grateful to them for what they‚Äôve done to teach my grandmother to get her strength and independence back!
I used services from 4 different departments,  all were very professional,  very knowledgeable. It was a great help with home health needs

CenterWell is an amazing home health care company. The staff was wonderful. They made sure that the treatment dates were good for me. They  were always on time,  made sure that I was comfortable with my treatments, and showed genuine care and concern. I looked forward to see them coming, from the nurse to the treatment staff and supervisor. I would definitely request their services again and highly recommend them.

Our experience with CenterWell was really good. The nurses treat you like family so you don't feel like strangers are coming into your home. They know what their doing but most of all they care about what they're doing. You don't feel like it's just a form that's being filled out, they really care how your progressing.

My experience with Centerwell was outstanding. The staff members were all compassionate , knowledgeable, and willing to answer any questions I had.  I really appreciated their attention to detail and suggestions for my
Continued well being. I am amazed how much I improved under their care.  Special thanks to our nurse Yeshic, Luis and Eric. You are the best.

I've had in-home rehab multiple times with different providers but I've never had the level of service that you guys provide. Both Lewis and Eric have been amazing. They are very professional but more importantly they are truly compassionate and sincerely care about the patient's well being.
Center well provided me with my medical and physical needs as I was healing from a major surgery.  I was pleased with the staff services, courtesy , and respect  I received.

we loved centerwell. Everyone was very professional, always arrived in a timely manner. we will definitely be calling if in the future we need you.
Jessie
Donna
Meredith
Jen
Elise
Alice and
Hollis. you guys are the best.  thanks for all your great help and a few laughs

Excellent home health group. Wonderful therapist group that knows exactly what they are doing. Husband is a 97 year old WWII veteran who is recuperating from a fall. We chose this group and was totally amazed at all they did to help Don regain most of his mobility. Every one we dealt with was very professional , friendly and knowledgeable. We highly recommend CenterWell Home Health Group.

I am very satisfied with the care and concern shown by the nurses and physical therapists who took care of me after my surgery. Aside from being extremely professional, they exhibited real empathy for my situation. CenterWell is fortunate to have such wonderful employees. I'm very grateful for the care I received from all who came to my home.

Centerwell has the best employees ever.  I am so impressed by their professionalism as well as their dedication towards getting the clients well.
I am only going to recommend this company for home health care.  You all are the best üòò
Thank You and God Bless each and everyone of you.
Respectfully,  Madeline McMahon

I cannot speak highly enough about Centerwell Home Care. I have used this company twice and found staff  to be prompt, knowledgeable, and very kind. Being a nurse myself for almost 30 years gave me a good baseline by which to evaluate this group. Renee was the nurse admitting me‚Ä¶.she explained things in an expert manner and took her time to get to know me a little bit. I truly enjoyed talking with her about the changes in healthcare over the years. She listened to me when I said I had reactions to adhesives and did her best to prevent blisters under my PICC line dressing.  Michaela was my primary nurse. Both she and Renee worked around my many doctor appointments to schedule their visits and that was very much appreciated. All staff showed a great deal of empathy towards my situation. (Caregiver becoming the patient) which, while not unique, was quite hard on me. No one complained about where they work either. One would think no one would disparage their own organization when talking to a patient but I have had it happen a number of times with other companies. During my last hospitalization, Centerwell told the case manager they could not admit me to service until Monday ; however, I was determined to discharge Friday. When I had an issue over the weekend, I called center well and they did their best to problem solve  with me even though I was not yet their patient. I cannot recommend them any more highly!

CenterWell has made a difficult situation a lot more manageable. The nurses have all been very compassionate and skilled. Even the answering service has been helpful when I had an emergency after they closed. Having the home nurse care has made a huge and positive difference in my recovery after surgery.

Everyone was very nice and professional!  They call the night before they are visiting, and let you know the time.  Charlie, the occupational therapist, gave us some good suggestions for Companies to call for help with personal care, and companies who will come in and put hand rails in the shower, to make it safer.  Thank you very much CenterWell Home Care!!!

Everyone from Centerwell was awesome. The PT assessor, Francis, was so nice. Mark and Marie, my nurses were top-notch!!  Christie, my PT, was a joy and so knowledgeable!!  Great company; I highly recommend them.
All therapists we were in contact with were wonderful (PT, OT and nursing).  Showed great compassion and interest in the patient and were very encouraging every time they came to visit.

I am so grateful for the services and personnel of CenterWell! It has given me back my life, when I had come to believe my life was ending. Your respect, and kindness and awesome care has made such a difference. Nursing, physical and occupational therapist, have all been so great...I have no words yo express how awesome you all have been. It has been such a wonderful experience. And I will miss the visits simply because you each brightened my days with your visits.

Everyone who came to our home to help my husband post stroke was amazing. He had both physical therapy and occupational therapy. He enjoyed both PT and OT and it gave him a nice bridge from the rehab center to outpatient treatment. He is doing so well now and I give Randi (and Moira) and Lisa (Occupational Therapist) credit. He enjoyed working with them.

Everyone has been so wonderful!! They make sure I understand what I should or shouldn‚Äôt do and if I have any issues that I let them know right away ‚ÄúAnd I have had issues since Feb. ‚Äú everyone has made both me and husband like family. And long as I am able to use CenterWell for my therapy I will. Thank you everyone so much!!!

I've had the pleasure of working with a few of your nurses/therapist. April is my nurse and she is the best she lives close and if ever I need her she comes as soon as she possibly can. I know because I have had a small emergency. She really does care for her patients!! Been mine since 12-23. Then Miss Vinni and Dominic with physical therapy have been great to work with.
Vinnie is very professional but yet so funny enjoyed talking with her about her country.
Dominic is great at what he does and always has a smile on his face!! Over all experience with CenterWell
Has been great!
P.s. Can I keep April? üòä

My mother is the client with CenterWell in Gainesville, FL. All of the medical professionals have rewarded her life with compassion, respect, and care. My mother is forever a happier and healthier person because of CenterWell. Thank you to
Physical Therapist Maura, Nurse Lisa,  Physical Therapist Michael, Case Manager Leah, and Nurse Alicia.

Your representative was a completely trustworthy. Who is only thoughts were improve my medical condition. I will miss my visits with him. He was completely knowledgeable was able to help me with my pain conditions. If ever I need this type of service again I surely will call her when y‚Äôall.

Thank you is never enough for putting my heart at ease. When I got recommended to come see your office I was a complete with mess with my cat and yall got in me same day and seen a video of my cat then called me back not even a hour later say yes definitely bring him in. But I didn‚Äôt realize when I got there it was so much better than I ever imagined!! Your front desk ( I forgot her name :( ) was absolutely amazing and welcoming. Every single person I saw was so nice and comforting to me and my cat. Thank you so much from this momma and her cat Furi.

A very kind, empathic staff. Extremely organized and clean. I also appreciated the all female staff since my girl, Charlotte, doesn't do well with the male gender. I highly recommend Central Animal Hospital to anyone needing a qualified and safe environment for their fuzzy babies' medical needs. Dr. Sanchez rocks!

This was my first visit with my new kitty Shadow. I am very happy with the service I received. The place was clean & the staff was so friendly to me & Shadow. The veterinarian Andrew DeStefano was great about explaining treatment for Shadow. I would recommend this place to anyone who loves their pet.

I have been a client here for a few years. They‚Äôve always been helpful. However this last visit they were amazing!! They went above and beyond to help me find the medication my dog needs at a lower price. That saved me a lot of money. And Dr. DeStefano was great with my dog and knew right away what was wrong. Thank you to whole team!
I love my vet office. Best in town. Dr Sanchez is the best! She always explains the plan of treatment and reason why. Shout out to Belinda and Sam the best vet techs!

I have 3 year old triplets currently receiving therapy from different companies. CFPTA is the only one I have never had any issues with billing/insurance. Our feeding/speech therapist Kat is amazing. Thru her hard work and incredible dedication my boys are now able to chew and swallow solids and are able to communicate their needs. I definitely recommend this company!

These people are amazing with special needs children, they really care about you and your child as their own. I have a 10 year old daughter with cerebral palsy and epilepsy and she had brain surgery last year and lost a lot of her speech and mobility, but just after a few months back into therapy and she‚Äôs already making great progress. If your a overprotective mom Like me this is the place for your child, no doubt about it these women are totally committed to your child‚Äôs needs however minor or severe they may be. Thank goodness there is a place like this

I cannot day enough amazing things about the therapists at CPTA. My son had therapy w Amy, Cheryl and other staff from 6 months of age (cerebral palsy) until he graduated high school. They are wonderful!!!
Great place! Our occupational therapist Sara is the greatest. We work together to help my son and i couldnt ask for a better therapist for my son. üòä

I just came across the review page when i look for the contact numbers of the doctor office. I saw some pretty bad reviews and thought of giving my opinion of this facility as my duty. We have three kids and we have been visiting this facility over 10 years now. Doctors are exceptional and specially Dr Jenarious  and Dr Ragavan are my kid's favorites. I always thank God for giving my kids good pediatricians like them. It is true that sometimes the staff dos not care much about your time. Which doctor office does not have those weird characters? As parents we should learn little bit of patient anyway.

Loved my daughters pediatrician but, not worth dealing with their incompetent staff. 9 times out of 10 the person sending out a referral never gets it done. Then you are told you need to come back in for another appointment because they lost your referall!! This happen 2 times with theverything same referral!!!!! Eventually I told the nurse I wanted to talk to the doctor and she complete did the referall. While the nurses can't do anything right the doctor has to do most of the work to have anything completedone correctly. Then after all these issues I talk to the manager and she tries to blame my insurance company. Neither I or my husband have had such trouble on our lives with our insurance with referall. After waiting weeks sometimes months for the many referrals my daughter needs because she has alot of therapist and specialis the she needs. I had enough and went to another doctor. Where I don't have to risk my daughters health.

Its a good place for your kid. I always go for regular check up of my kid. His doc is also very good and staff is very supportive. But yes its always have lots of patients, so need to take appoitmet before you go. But in case of sick kids, they always gives first preference to sick kids.

Dr. Janarious is awesome, but for 16 years my son saw Dr. Velez-Vega, but unfortunately he retired and no one was notified.  I make an appointment and clearly said with Dr. Velez, no one said anything until I arrived.  I made appointment in the morning and was given a late appointment.  When I arrived I was told My son couldn't be see because he has to switch doctors with his insurance, meanwhile, I waited all day and no one care to verify insurance to avoid the embarrassment.  Spoke with office manager who was totally incompetent.  The Janarious is the number one there now without Dr. velez.  Referrals is a nightmare.  Sons specialist appoints were all cancelled during the summer because referrals we're never received on time, now my son has to miss school to get things done.  Most of the office staff have horrible ethics, they always hanging out in that office behind front desk gossiping and they show how stress and tired they are at front desk.

I literally called there every single day for almost two weeks to attempt to make an appointment for my childs 9 month vaccination. I made sure I chose the correct extension for "appointments" but no one answered the phone! It literally rang and rang and didn't even go to an answering service. I finally get through and make an appointment. The day arrived and I was running late due to a busy work schedule. The receptionist called me and very rudely told me "I don't know who you think you are but we won't wait on you to show up". This is not the first time I experienced issues with ther very unprofessional staff!

provider_name: Central Florida Speech and Hearing Center
review_text: I recently went to the walk in clinic.  I was treated with professionalism as any customer. I had a simple question about using the volume/direction using blue tooth for my new hearing aids.  The audiologist confirmed my answer and gave additional information to use in noisy  restaurants.  I was pleased & satisfied with my help.  I appreciated having this walk in policy. .

provider_name: Central Florida Speech and Hearing Center
review_text: I brought my one year-old here to have his hearing checked upon leaving,  I just had to leave a good review. I can‚Äôt remember the name of the doctor we seen, but she was very patient and kind with him and took the time to play with him beforehand, so he could feel comfortable before she even started checking his ears. It‚Äôs not often you go somewhere anymore they aren‚Äôt trying to rush you in and out. I highly recommend!!!!

provider_name: Central Florida Speech and Hearing Center
review_text: This was my first experience with CFS&H and it was excellent. The facility is beautiful and comfortable. The staff were very courteous and thorough. review_text:

Tomi explained my hearing aid regimen to me, answered all questions and is available for follow-up consultation.  I am very pleased with the hearing aids she recommended, as well as her service.  She is a good listener which makes her an excellent medical provider.

provider_name: Central Florida Speech and Hearing Center
review_text: Yesterday it was the second time I used the walk-in hours and Jennifer took care of me. She was excellent in her professional yet very caring and concerning persona. I would highly recommend not just a facility but each of their audiology specialist. My initial encounter and placement of hearing aids was with Logan and I can‚Äôt praise her enough for her professionalism, her knowledge and very caring and concerning that I receive the best possible hearing aids to give me the best possible hearing ability. They are all amazing‚Ä¶ right from the welcoming to the departure.

Love central Florida therapy the staff are amazing and go out there way and beyond for there clients all the stuff is amazing! Miss Gwen Which is speech therapy and Elizabeth which is occupational therapy are the most amazing they got my 4 year old son jamyiah sims to come  a long way more independent as well I'd recommend Central Florida therapy for anybody that needs therapy in speech or occupational to use them

We LOVE Central Florida Therapy! My kiddo has been going there for about 6 years now and the progress she‚Äôs made is wonderful! They‚Äôre flexible with scheduling, are wonderful with communication, and everyone there treats us like family. If your child needs services, you should absolutely try them out! I always recommend them to friends.

In this place we have found much more than therapists, we have found a family that accompanies us in all the processes of our son. We have been going to this place for almost 3 years and it is wonderful.

My Thomas is the happiest boy when he comes to his therapies with Mrs Gwen and Mrs Donna, he loves giving hugs since he arrives. Mrs Kari is always very kind and loving with all the children.

My son absolutely loves all of his therapists! They are all truly amazing. They have all the patience in the world for him and I couldn‚Äôt be happier with all of the services provided by them. The therapists are dedicated and have all the skills and knowledge to help each child accomplish all of their goals with love, patience and understanding. Everyone there makes you feel like family!

We are so happy to be part of the Central Florida Therapy family. The clinic is full of knowledgeable and caring therapists and staff. My son comes for both speech and occupational therapy and we have seen huge growth in both areas. He loves coming each week which speaks volumes!

I am very happy with the services provided by Ms Valerie to my son Adrian. He was receiving services before in other center and the experience was not good at all. As soon as we switch to this location with Ms Valerie my son started improving.

Thanks so much for all your help, patience and excellence service ! 100% recommended for speech therapy. Ms Valery has been an angel to us. Thank you!
My son loves coming to speech therapy with Mrs. Valerie. He leaves so happy and learning so much with just one visit a week! Cant recommend Enough!
This place is awsome. My son has autisum and was at two other places for speech before this one. Everyone is supper sweet and have helped my son so much.

My daughter has really started to shine after attending speech and OT with Ms. Maddy and Ms. Jenna.  They make the experience comfortable and are so patient with her.  I can't recommend this place enough!

My son is has been coming here for 2 years for speech therapy and we are more than satisfied with his progress!!!  This place is absolutely amazing!  The staff is extraordinary!!  Everyone is thoughtful, caring, kind, compassionate, considerate and very professional!!!
We are absolutely happy to have our son receive services here.  He just got approved for occupational therapy as well and we are extremely happy to say it will be here with CFTS!!!
And Miss Liz is absolutely amazing!!  She has been extremely helpful with the whole process of joining CFTS and  everything for our family!!  Her wonderful personality and knowledgeable skills means the world to us!

We had a very positive experience. The speech therapist who did an evaluation was very friendly and attentive to our child. The report was detailed and provided the information we needed. We didn‚Äôt have to wait at all to get taken back to the evaluation room. It was a lot of questions for the parent over the course of about an hour. My son has been receiving PT here for three years now and has made loads of progress. Not only has his physical abilities improved, but his self confidence, as well. The staff here are so helpful, caring and kind. I feel very confident in the care he receives here and so does he. His therapist is so amazing. We love her and she feels like family at this point. I would absolutely recommend Central Florida Therapy Solutions to anyone with a child who needs the extra support and help. Trust that you will be in good hands.

I was looking for a location providing speech therapy and Occupational Therapy for my daughter and I was told about Central FL Therapy Solutions with the awesome help by Liz for onboarding and Nancy the Owner/Operator they have made it a seamless process to get my daughter the push she needs to get her ready for the world. Thank you to the rest of the therapists and staff who are going to be attending to and teaching my daughter valuable skills! We really appreciate all the work they do helping the kids and Shelby does a amazing job with my daughter.

My son loves coming to his weekly therapy session with Mr. Mario and Miss Chont√©! He really looks forward to it. I have seen so much improvement in his speech since we started coming here. They are really doing great work. You can truly trust the staff here with your child‚Äôs learning and development.
My girl Delilah, Norwich Terrier was a mess. Sue & team did an amazing job today. Lil girl feels better I'm sure & looks SO pretty. Thank you both!

My dog is a rescue and won't let many people touch him. Our Scottie had a bad experience last year with a groomer while wintering in Florida. I was very apprehensive about taking him to an unknown groomer again. What a great experience we had @Central Park Grooming. He looks wonderful and he was a calm and happy boy when the grooming was completed

Beautiful facility ! Great staff, the owners are amazing and the staff just the same. Highly recommend it

I‚Äôve been coming to this clinic for 9 months now. Beginning with Dr. Gomez-Padron, Adriana, and Diamelys the entire staff are always very professional and personable. The clinic is always clean and tidy. I speak little Spanish, they always make sure I understand my labs results, appointments and medications. I love the transportation to and from my drs. appointments. Like Tony the Tiger says ‚Äúthey‚Äôre GREEAAT!

Worst place to go unless you have the whole day to sit and wait.  This morning I spoke with the nurse she is aware of the allergy that I have. Got to the clinic at 9:30 am and is 2 pm still waiting.  They have several receptionist and none care.
Specially the one who sits in the middle with glasses.
Worst place to come.

had an excellent experience with this facility. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted by a friendly and efficient team. I highly recommend Centrum Health to anyone looking for a reliable primary care provider!

I have very bad experience in this clinic.  Have an appointment for 7.15 for blood exam, at 7.40 ask the front desk if they attend for appointment or for order walk in. She tell me for appointment.  I said my appointment was for 7.15. She tell me the person who take blood came late, so you need to wait until they call you. At 7.45 another person who came after me was called.  So I decided to leave. I think that's is disrespectful. If I arrive in time for my appointment.  Your staff need arrive in time.
Telemedicine  appointment ufff.. dr never call you. When you waisted your time and go to the clinic just for exams results and  you ask the dr why they never call, she only reply.  I don't have the time for calls. So why they offer this service when the dr doesn't have the time to do the call.
This is insane.
Today‚Äôs visit was amazing and everyone was nice and friendly and welcoming

Job is hands down the most amazing therapist I‚Äôve ever encountered.
I‚Äôve worked with therapists in the past, but I never stuck with any of them  until Job. He‚Äôs different. He really puts himself in your shoes and helps you see yourself clearly. He‚Äôs empathetic, straight to the point, and genuinely caring.

He doesn‚Äôt just talk he gives you tools. Whether it‚Äôs book recommendations or actionable steps, he‚Äôs always helping move the process forward.

I honestly give him 10 stars across the board. I pray that God blesses his business double for how much he‚Äôs helped me and others.

If you‚Äôre thinking about booking him don‚Äôt second-guess it. Just book. You‚Äôll be grateful you did.

Ashley has been nothing short of amazing. I was so nervous about opening up in couples counseling, but she created a space that felt so safe and free of judgment that both my partner and I felt comfortable being truly honest for the first time in a long time. It wasn‚Äôt easy facing some of the things we needed to talk about, but Ashley guided us through it with such care and understanding. Because of her, I‚Äôve grown not just in my relationship, but also in how I see myself. I‚Äôll forever be grateful for the way she helped us heal and reconnect. If you‚Äôre looking for someone who genuinely cares and knows how to help, Ashley is the one.

Job is the best therapist I have ever encountered. I am so grateful to him as my therapist.From the moment I walked into his office, I felt a sense of warmth and acceptance. He created a safe and non-judgmental space where I felt comfortable opening up and discussing my concerns.

His expertise and knowledge in the field were evident throughout our sessions, as he provided insightful and thought-provoking perspectives. He is also incredibly attentive and empathetic, actively listening to my thoughts and feelings.

His ability to ask probing questions and guide me towards self-reflection was instrumental in my personal growth and development. Overall, I highly recommend Job as a  therapist to anyone seeking support and guidance in their mental health journey.

Job, your impact on lives is truly remarkable. Through your guidance and support, you have played a crucial role in shaping the best version of myself. Thank you for your unwavering commitment to making a difference.

I have been seeing Ashley. She has been an incredible help for me in my journey. She is professional and has a wealth of knowledge to draw upon. Ashley is also empathetic and has an uncanny way of making you feel seen and heard. I recommend her to anyone looking for a therapist!
Ashley is a great listener and is very insightful. She has definitely helped me a lot in the weeks that I have been seeing her. I would highly recommend her to anyone.

Doctor D is the best! He's personable and incredibly knowledgeable. He's attentive and takes the time to address any and all concerns.
Wendy is so friendly and made me feel comfortable from the start. I have nothing but good things to say about my experience and actually look forward to my visits.
I truly cannot recommend Champion Chiropractic enough.

I‚Äôm beyond thankful for finding someone who took my back pain seriously. In just a few session my pain improved drastically. With spinal decompression and adjustments I always walk out feeling better than when I walked in. A very kind and trustworthy team!! Definitely recommend checking them out!
Damian and Wendy are so welcoming and patient with me. They walk you through every step of the process and put your health first! Highly recommend....A+++
Dr D. Is the best. Very professional, family atmosphere, convenient for the working people. I highly recommend Champion Chiropractic.

Absolutely recommend Champion Chiropractic Dr. Damian goes above and beyond to help you feel better. Also I didn‚Äôt know he treats vertigo and dizziness I had few of those episodes and treated me for it plus acupuncture. It is my to go place now. Wendy at the front is very caring. You‚Äôll be in good hands. Thank you Dr. Damian and Wendy for helping me with get better and accommodating me.

Our Charley knew a few things but wasn't consistent. We decided to give formal training a shot. It turns out we were doing it all wrong and once Mike steped in, Charley showed she was an all star. I recommend this course to every dog owner out there. Your dog will not only flourish but you will also learn how to be a better dog owner.

Exceptional Dog Trainer!

I recently had the pleasure of working with Michael, and totally highly recommended. They have transformed my dog, Bolt, into a well-behaved and obedient companion.

They have a genuine passion for their work. They were patient, knowledgeable, and incredibly effective in teaching both my dog and me the necessary skills for successful training.

The progress we've made in such a short time is nothing short of remarkable. Bolt now follows commands with ease and has become more confident and relaxed. Michael tailored the training to meet our specific needs and ensured that the sessions were enjoyable and stress-free.

I am truly grateful for the positive impact Michael has had on our lives. If you're looking for a dedicated and talented dog trainer, look no further than Champion Dog Training.

Once I described my concerns with our 1.5 yo rescue Mike was very detailed in how he would address them. Gizmo was quick to respond to his demands. My 13 yo daughter had no difficulty practicing with Gizmo at home. Extremely satisfied with the results

Mike is the best trainer around. We have taken all 3 of our Belgian Malinois to Mike to do the board and train program and it‚Äôs a night and day difference every time. All 3 of our dogs are always the most well behaved dogs anywhere we go, which is saying a lot considering their breed. They listen to commands easily without having to repeat ourselves and also are trained in protection with Mike making our home feel safer. We could not be happier with Mikes services and would recommend him to anyone needing help with dog training.

Mike is the best trainer and we trust him only for training.  We have 2 German shepherds, a 13 year old and a 9 month old) and both have been trained by Mike. He‚Äôs always willing to help with additional training if needed!

Our family has been using champion wellness for many many years and there is no better complete and total body way to stay healthy and consistent treatment and work from the most caring people on this planet. Here‚Äôs a picture of a result of a true champion that has been going here since he was 10 and finished second in the world.

They have a fantastic staff!
The doctors are very knowledgeable and share their knowledge with you!
They have addressed my neck and hamstring issues!
I would recommend going to Risoldi Chiropractor!

This office is all about wellness. The chiropractors are amazing along with the massage therapists. The staff are more than helpful with all your healthcare  needs. The supplements are of the highest quality. I highly recommend this office for most of your healthcare needs.
Fantastic experience, Dr Mike is amazing with his diagnostics & treatment. He has made such a difference to my daughter‚Äôs back pain.
Very good! Staff is really friendly. I have been doing the softwave therapy and It has been amazing!! 100% recommend.

Best experience! Everyone is amazingly helpful with any questions you may have. Different breeds of dogs have distinct traits that make them suitable for specific tasks or roles. This diversity allows for a wide range of skills and abilities among dogs, enhancing their usefulness in fields such as search and rescue, therapy, herding, and hunting. Chews A Puppy, with proper training of the owner, has exceptional puppies for your specific needs. I would love to have all of them:) A+++ Recommend!

We got our yorkie last year from Chews A Puppy. We had a great overall experience from a very caring staff. Yes, she was a bit pricey, but I am so happy with the purchase. She is such a loving and fun dog. I need to go back and get her a friend eventually !!!!!

Wonderful service! Absolutely clean service with great prices. The staff are all super patient, polite, helpful, friendly, and understanding. We walked with a beautiful healthy pup. Everything was included in one great price. Can‚Äôt find this kind of service or pricing anywhere nowadays. Ms. Felicia especially was so kind and helpful during this whole process. Chews A Puppy was a great experience for getting
my first puppy. The ladies there were super nice and I got to meet a couple puppies before making my final decision. The overall process was very fast and simple. The only reason i'm not giving it 5 stars is because I find it was a bit overpriced, however the pups are in extremely good condition and well taken care of!

We got our Malshi from here.  The staff were very knowledgeable and professional.  They explained everything to us in depth, to help us make a decision.   Overall it was a great experience and we love our baby, Fondue.  If you‚Äôre looking to get a new puppy, I highly recommend this place.

We recently hosted our son‚Äôs first birthday at Cheyne Ranch, and it was absolutely perfect! From start to finish, Sally & her team made everything so easy and stress-free. The property is beautiful, spacious, and very family-friendly ‚Äî there were so many fun activities for kids of all ages, and the animal encounters were such a hit.

Sally went above and beyond to make sure everyone felt comfortable and safe, and the team was so kind and patient with all the little ones. Our friends and family couldn‚Äôt stop raving about how unique and memorable the experience was. It truly made our celebration special, and we‚Äôll cherish the memories forever.

Cheyne Ranch is, without a doubt, one of the most incredible and unique organizations I‚Äôve had the pleasure of being involved with. While there seems to be no shortage of riding facilities popping up here in Central Florida, I‚Äôd like to highlight all of the ways that Sally, her family and her team are unique and desperately needed within our community. Warning, this is going to be long but it‚Äôs worth sharing.

First and foremost, Sally has truly created a safe haven and safe space for kids (and adults) of all different abilities and neurodiversities. When we first started going here, we were in the thick of it trying to find places where our neurodiverse son might be welcomed. Parents with neurodiverse or disabled kids know all-to-well how much time, energy and resources go into finding therapists, specialists and opportunities to help your kid(s) thrive. They also know how few places there are that genuinely work to understand your child as their own person with their own needs, feelings and preferences.

Cheyne Ranch was the FIRST facility my son ever went where, rather than getting a laundry list of complaints at pick-up or multiple calls throughout the day, I instead arrived at camp pickup to receive nothing but glowing remarks about how great, easy, sweet, loving and all around wonderful my kid is. Over 2 years later and I can still vividly remember how monumental that felt and still cry writing about it now.

Sally makes everyone feel welcomed, seen, heard, valued and respected and she gives these kids the opportunity to thrive. She also gives them a chance to do hard things and realize how capable they actually are. Since we started homeschooling last year, my son gets to start his Friday mornings off with horseback riding lessons and then goes straight into a Homeschool Nature Club where he gets to hang out with kids who are both just like him and kids who are nothing like him. Each and every one of them thrive there.

Many of the animals here are rescued and have personalities bigger than most people. The kids get to learn from the animals while also learning the importance of proper animal care. Sally sets clear, easy to follow, ground rules and her entire organization centers around the importance of trust and mutual respect. I‚Äôve seen my son grow SO much from being here and can say without a shred of doubt, that I would continue homeschooling just for his time at Cheyne Ranch alone. Sally also works with local specialists like OTs and Speech Therapists to incorporate classes where the kids can receive therapies WITH the animals. Idk about you but I‚Äôd pick that over a classroom any day.

Last, but most importantly, Sally‚Äôs heart isn‚Äôt in making money out of any of this. She genuinely just wants to create a space where EVERYONE has a chance to learn about the animals, learn how to take care of them and to have a space where they feel safe and valued. This organization exists solely because there was a need within the community that hadn‚Äôt been filled and it‚Äôs grown to what it is because her heart was big enough to fill it. If you haven‚Äôt visited them yet, this is your sign to do so now.

Me and my family had a beautiful experience today. My daughters love riding horses. They like farm animals. We fed the chickens, the goats, and some horses. I was so happy to see how my girls connected with the animals and the nature üåøüå≤. After that we went to the playground üõù and spent time as a family ü•∞. Sally and her family who live in the place is friendly, nice and kind üòä.

We absolutely love Cheyne Ranch!  My kids (7 and 10) have been taking weekly horse riding lessons here for the past six months. They are obsessed not just with the horses but also with the chickens, bunnies, cats and dogs.  Their teacher Christopher is very patient, kind, and knowledgeable. Sally Ann, the founder and owner, has safety and learning as her main priorities.  She has a created a detailed curriculum to ensure students make progress not only in riding skill but also in caring for the horses.  We highly recommend Cheyne Ranch to anyone looking for riding lessons or for a place that their kids can be around animals.

Our son has been attending Cheyne Ranch programming now for a year and it is such a welcoming environment. He‚Äôs thriving with the independence and skills he‚Äôs building both through barn care and riding. It feels like a Home away from home!

I cannot express enough gratitude for the positive impact Child & Family Consultants have had on my life. From the moment I first reached out to them, I felt a sense of hope and support that I hadn't experienced before. The staff at Child & Family Consultants are incredibly professional, compassionate, and understanding. They took the time to listen to my concerns and tailored their approach to fit my specific needs. What stands out the most about Child & Family Consultants is their genuine care for their clients. They made me feel heard and valued, which boosted my confidence and helped me make positive changes in my life. The difference they have made in my life is profound, and I am truly grateful for their support.

Many families, including ours, have seen real, positive changes after working with Child & Family Consultants. Improvements in behavior, communication, and overall family well-being are common feedback. The staff‚Äôs supportive and collaborative approach makes you feel like you‚Äôre part of a team, all working towards a brighter future.
I've been coming here for a few months, and it really helps me a lot. I feel more confident and happier. It's been a great experience!

Child & Family Consultants and staff are truly an exceptional gift to those in the disability community. Our son has been a long time client of this Agency and its services have greatly improved his life.  Dr. Werner, Joe, has extensive knowledge about autism and it's effect on individuals living with this challenge. He provides compassionate support along with concrete suggestions for thriving with autism. His skill and insight have helped our family manage some of the difficulties we've encountered. Many thanks to the fabulous staff at Child & Family Consultants.

I had contacted this company about getting some social help for my ADHD son. They have social skills classes. The office manager emailed me right back about what they offer (great). I called to add my sons name to list. They told me where we should go to meet the group. When I got to that location we could not locate anyone. We called the office to find out the class had moved to another location a half hour away and no one had called "US" to let us know. Now I imagine they called everyone else on the list since there was no one else there wondering what to do. I really don't know how they missed contacting us because she said our name was on the list, but I find it very unprofessional and unacceptable. Nothing like making a child excited to meet other kids and go bowling to then being told no sorry, people don't know how to do there job properly and you have to suffer the consequences.

I began seeing Laurie Philison during a particularly difficult time in my life, hoping to find support, guidance, and professionalism. Unfortunately, over the course of nearly a year of weekly sessions, I often felt a lack of clear boundaries and support.There were several behaviors I found concerning - such as frequently taking personal phone calls during our sessions and sitting barefoot throughout appointments. While these actions may not be alarming to everyone, they created a dynamic that didn?t feel professional or grounding for me.The most troubling part of my experience came when I inquired about my therapy records. I was told they had been lost and that there was no recollection of our work together. After so much time spent in session, this left me feeling dismissed and unsupported.Mental health care requires trust, presence, and accountability. I?m sharing this so that others feel empowered to seek providers who offer the professionalism and support they need and deserve

I want to express my gratitude to Sunil Thomas  for being a crucial support during a challenging time in my life. As a first-time therapy participant, I needed someone to help me navigate Post traumatic stress syndrome and provide objective insights. Sunil created a welcoming and safe place, making each session an opportunity to gain practical tools for making sound decisions in complex situations. His expertise and tailored approach have been invaluable. I highly recommend Sunil Thomas to anyone seeking a dedicated and skilled therapist. Thank you for your support when I needed it the most.

My family and I had our world turned upside down one day last year I struggled to find any phycologist who would take on the task of finding our new normal, Dr.Spero was willing to take the time and energy to make that happen, We feel so incredibly thankful to Dr Spero and his entire staff there is light at the end of the tunnel there is hope and achievable goals. Dr Spero has a unique way of bringing out the best in all of us.

I had Laurie Philipson recently for a couple counseling and it went horrible. She kept bringing up different locations of where I was from and they were incorrect each time. It made it seem that she wasn‚Äôt paying attention, or perhaps getting me confused with someone that my partner probably mentioned. She allowed my partner to continuously cut me off when it was my turn to speak. She then stated that I need to stop bringing up past experiences. I thought this was a therapy session! I‚Äôm in here with my partner due to trust issues from the past and it‚Äôs hard for me to get over them, which is why I was in the session. At the end, I felt my now EX partner and I came out worst in the session.

Dr. Spero is an exceptional psychologist who I can recommend without the slightest reservation. He helped me when I was a teenager many years ago, so when my young daughter experienced some trauma witnessing a shooting at a shopping mall he was the first person I thought of. To my surprise, he was still here in South Florida and looked more or less exactly the same as he had all those years ago. He was brilliant with my daughter and helped her to process the incident, move past her nightmares and manage the stress and anxiety that resulted from the incident. She is doing great in school and is a very happy kid. He excels at making kids feel safe and comfortable expressing themselves, and he gets great results. More than anything though, he truly cares about his patients and takes the time to make sure they all get the help they need.
They do great work in the community! I like to bring donations here, they take clothes and so much more, and they are always so kind and helpful when I do so.

I love them and there concerns

review_text: We had a wonderful experience with Cherice for our child's gifted assessment! review_text: Child and Adolescent Psychology of Tampa Bay is a wonderful practice! Cherice is an excellent resource for child evaluations and therapy. She is highly knowledgeable and knows how to work with children all ages!

review_text:

I can't say enough about the supportive, collaborative environment that Juli and her team have created for our family. It is such a comfort to know they are there for us whenever we need them.

review_text: My daughter works with Steve and has progressed exponentially with his therapies. review_text:

review_text: The Children's Center and our instructor Nicole are truly great! They are extremenly nice and very professional. Our daughter loves going there and we've seen clear improvements in her behavior and sensory processing. I'd recommend The Children's Center to any parent that needs a little help with their little one (who doesn't!).

As an autism mom I give this office 5 stars. My son has been a patient since he was 4 going on 5 years of age. He is now going on 11 and has made tremendous gains! We have done both OT and speech in this office.  My daughter has also had OT in this office. The staff has become family and I always feel safe knowing he is in good hands when in sessions. I remember being really worried about not being in the session the whole time when he was younger but you can tell how happy he is here with the staff. I appreciate this clinic so much for their dedication to provide quality service. I am happy to say that Eddie has developed functional speech ( Non Verbal at age 4 and 5 started developing much more at age 6 and 7). He can now express wants, needs and feelings. He is speaking in clearer sentences and speech has become much more functional. There is so much more I could tell you. This is an awesome clinic. Thanks to all of you! Carolyn, Rhonda, Rachael and the rest of the gang. Thank you all so much!

My son has been going to Children‚Äôs Choice For Therapy since  he has been 2.5. He has made amazing progress with his overall develop as well as with his academic skills!! Children‚Äôs Choice offers very comprehensive therapy services for a wide variety of diagnoses. The owner is extremely easy to work with and is dedicated to determining the best types of therapies to ensure the success of your child. I would highly recommend!

Children's Communication Center is a gem in Tallahassee! Our son has thrived under the expertise and care he received from his 1:1 sessions with "Miss Lori." Her years of experience, passion for her work, and kindness helped our son make great strides in his communicative abilities.  A move out of state has now left us with big shoes to fill as we seek to find someone with even half the skill and dedication that Lori at Children's Communication Center has demonstrated.

Children's Communication Center is invaluable for my son and our family. My son experienced years of speech/language therapy from CCC when he was growing up. Now that he is older, CCC recently provided a series of SLP services to correct and enhance his adult speech and language. This will help him as he navigates the transition period and becomes an adult with understandable speech and appropriate language skills. CCC is a huge part of his success in life!

Children's Communications Center is a wonderful resource in our community. Our son, Nicholas, made tremendous progress working with Lori.  We highly recommend CCC to families in the Tallahassee area in need of speech pathology services.

We highly recommend Lori for any child who is having speech issues or difficulties.  Our son had seen two other speech pathologists for his speech before we found Lori.  We wish we had found her first!   She is the first professional who focused not just on how our son said things but upon why he said them the way he did.  We started tongue strengthening exercises and could see a difference in our son's speech very quickly.  Lori became not just our son's speech "teacher," but also his friend.  We joked that she was like his therapist because of how he enjoyed talking to her about all types of things.  He thoroughly enjoyed seeing her each week.    So, whether you're looking for your first speech pathologist for you or your child or have tried others and are looking for a change, you should without question call Lori.

review_text: Dr. McDonald is great! She is personable, professional, and caring. Don‚Äôt second guess, go see her to feel better today.

review_text: Felt all they were focusing on was selling me a care packages for spine correction VS helping me elevate the pain. provider_name: City of Pembroke Pines Early Development Center Central Campus
review_text:
As a parent, choosing the right preschool can feel overwhelming, but enrolling our child at the Pembroke Pines Early Developmental Center Central Campus has been one of the best decisions we've made. It's clear the environment is nurturing, inclusive, and developmentally appropriate. We also really appreciate the regular communication from the teachers and office staff. Whether it's updates, pictures, or small wins from the day, we always feel connected and informed. It‚Äôs comforting to know our child is safe, happy, and truly thriving.
We highly recommend the Pembroke Pines Early Developmental Center Central Campus to any family looking for a caring, high-quality preschool that prioritizes the whole child. We are so grateful to be part of this community!

Sadly, we made the decision to let him go. Dr. Haley and Nick were so wonderful with Rocky. They and the staff were so gentle and caring and truly helped me get through a heart-breaking procedure. Dr. Claunch and his staff have taken care of our dogs for over 20 years. They treat our pets with love and compassion. We love them like family.  Helen and Wayne Van Dusen

From reception, to assistants, to vet techs, to the doctor, everyone is absolutely superb at what they do. Five stars. ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Our family cannot put into words the gratitude we have for Danielle . She has been working with our 3¬Ω-year-old daughter, and from day one, she has gone above and beyond, not just as a speech language pathologist, but as someone who has truly become like family to us. Her warmth, patience, and genuine care for our daughter‚Äôs growth have been nothing short of remarkable.

She celebrates every milestone, no matter how small, and knows exactly how to keep our daughter engaged, encouraged, and excited to learn.
