Because of Danielle our daughter‚Äôs confidence has grown alongside her speech, and the joy in her eyes when she runs into a session says it all. She is a rare gem in her field, and we feel so fortunate to have her in our lives. We cannot recommend her enough. She‚Äôs not just helping our daughter find her voice, she‚Äôs helping her shine.

10 stars if I could! Danielle is such a wonderful woman to work with, my daughter trusted her right away, and is always excited to go to speech. After a few short months she is finally saying words, talking and taking steps in the right direction! Her office is clean, organized and Danielle is sweet, calm, caring, and gentle! So happy we found her!

We‚Äôve had a fantastic experience here with our son. He enjoys the appointments and we‚Äôve seen a lot of improvements across both speech and language. Danielle is compassionate while also pushing him to improve. And now they are going into his school. Can‚Äôt say enough good things!

I could not recommend Danielle with Clawson Speech Therapy enough! My son has been with her a little less than a year now and has blossomed with his speech. Danielle is very knowledgeable, patient & kind. My son has difficulties regulating most days but because of her experience with working with children on the spectrum and her overall calm demeanor, he feels safe with her and regulates within minutes. I am so proud of my son for how far he has come and it is with many thanks to Danielle.

When you notice a difference in your kid after switching SLP.. it‚Äôs a sign! My son beams when I tell him it‚Äôs his speech day; after his sessions, he‚Äôs excited to show me what he did. Ms. Danielle is great with him and we have seen so much progress after he has worked with her. I also appreciate the feedback she gives us- how well he did in that session, or where he struggled. She has educated me so that I could try different techniques at home to help my son excel. From his first session, Ms. Danielle really calmed my momma nerves. Seeing his progress is amazing and I‚Äôm so glad we are with Clawson Speech!

100% recommend! They are absolutely amazing!!!  The staff really goes above and beyond to make sure you receive excellent care. The one on one visits are great. Eric and Fi are very knowledgeable,  kind, and caring.  I was so nervous about starting physical therapy after I was involved in a car accident.  They have truly made a huge impact on my recovery.  I can't say enough good things.  I really appreciate all that they do!

Erik creates miracles. My first knee replacement was a breeze but I had complications with my second knee replacement. He diagnosed the issue when neither my surgeon nor a neurologist could. He was extremely patient but pushed me to do the things I needed to do and wanted to be able to do again. I faithfully did the exercises he gave me as homework. It took a few months but I was soon able to walk and return to the gym. I attribute my recovery to Erik‚Äôs expertise and balance between patience and pushing.

It‚Äôs not easy to find a good and safe place when it comes to medical care, especially physical therapy.  However, I found Clear Choice therapy is the one that I have been looking for, and I highly recommend it to anyone who needs help.  The owner, Erik, is the most warm, caring and knowledgeable physical therapist I have ever met.  He took his time to go over the anatomy of my health issues so that I have a better understanding of how to avoid aggravating them.  Also, he went above and beyond to listen to my medical history and came up with a treatment plan for me, and chose an excellent physical therapist, Fi, who has expertise in my problem area.   I am very pleased with Fi, and am looking forward to getting better under her care.
From the friendly ladies at the front desk to Erik and Fiorella, you can't go wrong choosing Clear Choice for your physical therapy needs.

I interviewed several other PT facilities so glad
I found Erik Bleeker at Clear Choice Physical Therapy!
Recovering from Hip replacement Erik has given me one on one PT for an hour each visit! I had no idea what to expect cannot believe how much better I‚Äôm doing in just four visits! Erik truly knows his expertise and explains what‚Äôs going on with my recovery.
I‚Äôm  so looking forward to achieving full flexibility and full use of my new hip  with Erik‚Äôs help!
Another very important thing the facility is extremely friendly, clean and very organized! A huge plus for anyone trying to recover from surgery!

We can‚Äôt wait to see the progress that is to come and are forever grateful for Mrs. Dorothy gifts, kindness, and patience.

Dorothy is very warm and welcoming and goes above and beyond what is expected as a speech therapist to make her clients feel comfortable! Our daughter is not only progressing much quicker than expected, she is now also reteaching the skills she has learned to her little brother!  We are very grateful to have found Dorothy and HIGHLY reccomend her to anyone who might need a little extra help with their children's speech development.

I absolutely love Mrs. Dorothy! She is so kind and patient with my child. She's understanding and is very responsive via text and email. This was one of the best decisions I've ever made for my child and I'm so thankful to Mrs. Dorothy for making the therapy fun and enjoyable for my child.

In my opinion they also have the world‚Äôs best massage therapist! I had been to several chiropractors and massage places in the past but now I can‚Äôt imagine going anywhere else! Go see Dr. D., Robyn, Jen and the rest of the team today and see how much better you can feel.

review_text: Dr Clow, Megan & staff are truly healers. Their way to treat the whole person is radically, forward thinking in medicine. Count on going here & getting well beyond what you thought possible!

Reina lets ME figure out on my own my strengths and weaknesses. Thanks to Reina I see a new future.

Edsel is excellent! He always knows right away what's going on with your body. He pin points the underlying cause of your symptoms. He explains everything so well, so you know that by following his instructions and protocol you will heal.

I highly recommend Edsel Bittencourt. Over the past 3 years I have had a septic swollen knee from Lyme arthritis and would always have to have my knee aspirated many times a year. After one visit, I could finally see my knee cap. With his technique and only a few treatments, my knee is now finally getting back to normal, which is amazing!!!

I highly recommend Edsel Bittencourt as a physical therapist. Before I saw Edsel, I was still having major issues 7 months post total knee replacement. My knee was very swollen and hot to the touch. My range of motion was poor despite 6+ months of post operative PT and several months of chiropractic care. I walked with a very noticeable limp and was in constant pain. My orthopedic surgeon had even suggested a follow up surgery to try and figure out what was wrong.

Thankfully, within 1-2 appointments with Edsel, I was finally moving in the right direction. Swelling quickly dissipated and my knee was cool to the touch. I no longer walk with a limp, pain has significantly decreased, and I am continuing to make gains on my range of motion. He also corrected my hip misalignment during the initial session.

Edsel is extremely knowledgeable, kind, and compassionate. He spends a full hour per appointment performing manual therapy, Winback TECAR Therapy, and dry needling. Edsel truly understands how different body parts interconnect.
Edsel is also very knowledgeable about EDS.

The CHI team members are extremely friendly and professional. If you experiencing chronic pain or headaches, I would not hesitate to recommend Edsel and CHI.

Got shots in my neck.
They are great people there.
They explained everything that is going on.
Thank you for being so caring on your patients.   It makes it better on your caring and explaining everything as you go.
Very nice! Understandable. Personable group of professionals.. I would recommend them

I‚Äôm writing this for a family member who‚Äôs too scared to say anything, and her lawyer is pushing her to stay there. The doctors do not want to do adjustments, always pushes massages. Denise is rude and has no customer relation skills, and has put hands on her to push her past the pain threshold and stated ‚ÄúNo pain, no gain‚Äù. Go somewhere else
I spend less time in their waiting room than any waiting room I have ever been in. Not only is their service quick, these are the most pleasant staff members I have ever encountered.
Great place, they really do care about the people. I am glad to have them on my side

reviewer_name: Hair Fairy Godmother Head Lice Rescue
review_text: Jennifer McGinness was our therapist for our son with autism and was absolutely amazing with him. He felt so comfortable during their evaluation. She was so informative with us on her findings and we feel really happy with the outcome.  Thank you again Jennifer. You are amazing

I have had a wonderful experience with Coastal Neuropsychology. They were easy to communicate with when i set up appointments. the space felt private and secure when I was in sessions. The therpist (dr Thibodeaux) has been amazing. I really feel like the sessions helped and i even took a break for a while when i was feeling more in control. I am going back in and am looking forward to it!
Dr. Stefanie Coppes is an incredibly knowledgeable and compassionate pediatric neuropsychologist. I have known her for 10 years in a professional capacity and would trust my children with her.

Dr. Panchal is amazing!
I‚Äôve suffered from undiagnosed anxiety and ADHD for many years and finally found a doctor that heard me out and validated what triggered me and gave me a diagnosis that brought so much relief! She is very soft spoken and down to earth and I‚Äôm honestly disappointed that I can‚Äôt have her as a regular provider! Highly highly recommend!

I wouldn't call Samantha O. any kind of doctor!! She may have passed some tests but I wouldn't call her "qualified" in any sense of the word!  Her report is so far from the truth you'd think she mixed up a different patients report & her false claims are completely baseless.  She made several terrible accusations that couldn't be further from the truth & borders on defamation of character!!  Each accusation can be proven untrue!!  She does not have proper knowledge or the personality to do this type of work much less evaluate anyone's life, she's as green as they come!!  Another patient, Marina C.'s review below is spot on, almost exact same issues & same person, Samantha O.  They don't have anyone to greet you as you walk in or ask a question to?  STAY AWAY, FIND ANOTHER PLACE!!

I have been going for physical therapy for a little over a month. They are very patient, understanding and knowledgeable. I see the results after having surgery a month ago. What I especially like is any questions I have are answered. I completely recommend.

Allie made a special impact in our hearts. Our son has a rare genetic mutation that resulted in seizures. As a result he needs a lot of therapy. Allie was our OT therapist, there were a lot of harder days with Jaxson where he quite simply did not want to participate or would give a lot of push back. Allie was relentless and determined to find any solution she could. She leaned on her resources, offered to come watch him in his classroom and leaned into all of the things Jaxson enjoys. There was no other option but to be all in on team Jaxson. She got him to engage, even in some of our hardest sessions. We are focusing on getting our son sensory regulation therapy. He has a hard time with being able to regulate when his dad and I are not present. Once we see strides there we will be running right back into Allie‚Äôs care.

In life there are people that you cross paths with or meet that make an impact on you and your life. Allie is one of those people.

Thank you!

Coastal Pediatric Therapy Center is outstanding!  Everyone working here goes out of their way to ensure children receive the best care possible!  I would like to express our gratitude for a very special speech therapist named Adrianna!  Adrianna has already done so much to improve our son's life in the short time she has been working with him!  Adrianna listens to our worries and concerns and constantly goes far above and beyond to do whatever will best serve our child!  She is truly a Blessing!  We are truly Blessed to have all of the therapists that work with our boys to help them progress toward a better life!  We highly recommend this company because they are truly the very best!

We cannot be any happier with our therapists at Coastal Pediatric Therapy Center! Hope has 4 therapists and all are amazing with her! They not only help her with physical, occupational and speech therapy but they love on her as well! When you've been in therapy since you were a baby, having a loving, respected and fun therapist is important for success! Thank you Kaylee, Emily, Danielle and Meagan! You are truly the best!

If you are looking for someone to take a personal interest  your child look no further! Coastal Pediatric Therapy not only does that but goes above and beyond! I want to specifically share our amazing experience with Katelyn (Speech), Kim (PT), and Mylee (OT)! My son has had great improvements with these 3 ladies and they have each made such a positive impact in such a short period of time!

Coastal Pediatric Therapy Center is amazing.  My son has been in OT previously at another center and although it had been successful, his progress was slow.  At Coastal, I have seen progress after every session.  His Occupational Therapist, Danielle is the absolute best.  While working with my son, she has given me a wealth of information on how to assist him on a daily basis. She has also advised me of other resources that may be beneficial to him to use in conjunction with OT.

We came in after my father in law had passed. My wife was going through an extremely difficult panic and anxiety attack. The staff was so kind, caring, and patient with her at her worst time. They took gentle care of her and helped to calm her down. When I visit this office you will see they genuinely care for the people they treat. Even after a few days, I called back and spoke with Dr. Jessica K. She asked me how my wife was doing and what had happened to her after we left. She genuinely thought about her and wanted to make sure she was doing well. Not many places make you feel so safe and comfortable. I can‚Äôt express how thankful I am for all of the kindness you showed her and I during that time. Thank you to everyone who assisted us. We will forever recommend and utilize this establishment. You were her guardian angels at her moment of need and I‚Äôm forever grateful for you all!

The office staff are always nice, polite,and professional. Christina is a amazing person to talk to, I like her because she listens and she's honest, she gives me great advice I appreciate her. She has really help me with some very difficult situations. The medication staff are understand and quick to make sure you get your refills on time. I would recommend this office to anyone who needs help

Victoria was super nice and got me in for a sameday counseling appointment. She also helped me with all my paperwork which made things so much easier. The manager Leslie was very sweet and made me feel completely at ease she even called me two days later just to check in and make sure everything went well. If you‚Äôre dealing with personal relationship issues, ask for Kathleen! She is an amazing therapist and always has a solution. My husband and I now go twice a week honestly the two-week wait to see her was 100% worth it! Thank you Coastal

The office staff are very helpful and have been very nice. I have been seeing Kathleen and she has been incredibly helpful. I started using them as an emergency appointment, but found that I really connected with her and that has made a huge difference. I would definitely recommend them.

The staff is awesome! They have always been friendly, respectful and very professional every time whether on the phone or in person. I‚Äôve been a patient since before they moved from up the street. I like taking my bike around the curves right off Hibiscus.

I recently experienced one of the hardest parts of being a pet parent‚Äîlosing my beloved companion. My heart is broken. But this message isn‚Äôt about grief; it‚Äôs about gratitude.

I want to recognize the incredible team at Coastal Veterinary Care in Dunedin. The kindness, compassion, and care they showed to both me and my pet during this difficult time were beyond anything I could have imagined. They treated us like family, offering genuine support and comfort when we needed it most.

Even though my pet wasn‚Äôt feeling his best, I could tell he was truly comfortable there. That means everything to me. I‚Äôll never forget the way they cared for him‚Äîand for me. I‚Äôm deeply thankful.

LOVE everything about this vet!  The entire office is friendly and caring, and the office is very comfortable.  THANK YOU for helping care for my elderly pup Mak at his end of life, and also for treating the heart worms in my rescue pup Roxy.

Dr. Morris and her team are the absolute BEST! We‚Äôve trusted them with all of our pet‚Äôs care for years and every single interaction has been wonderful. They truly have you and your pet‚Äôs best interest at heart. Every team member is so patient and compassionate. I would give more than 5 stars if I could! Highly highly recommend!!!
Dr Tracy and her team are the best! They treat all of our animals like family. Cannot thank them enough for their service!

I have no words to describe Dr.Tracy. She is TRULY BEYOND COMPASSIONATE. She has helped me on a continuous 'Journey', already...MORE than(I think...) she even recognizes. She frequents my place of employment in her free time...she's BEYOND AMAZING. And is absolutely 1 of thee GREATEST humans i have ever met. I had a great experience here. I had a pinched nerve, and in a lot of pain. Had a couple therapy sessions and it healed faster than I thought. Everyone at this office is so friendly and helpful. Dr. Schneider was great and also very funny. I felt comfortable in every  single appointment I had. Thank you so much for taking care of this!

Dr. Schneider, Michael, Joni, and Stephanie at Coastal Wellness are phenomenal!! They are very generous, warm, helpful and easygoing people. I appreciate the high quality services I received from them. You can talk to them about anything and feel a sense of familiarity like a family. They always make you feel comfortable and the establishment is always clean. I loved coming here every time to get my upper back and shoulders adjusted. When I first started coming here back in January, I was in severe pain from getting rear ended in a car accident. Now, I feel like the visits and treatment was worthwhile. I highly recommend this business to anyone who needs an awesome chiropractor to get adjusted!

Absolutely tremendous care.
Was referred there to treat an old injury in my lower back that started acting up in February this year.  The treatments, adjustments, massage therapy got me into a better place then I was before.
Recently, pinched a nerve in my neck and quickly they assessed and came up with a plan.  I am feeling 1000% better.
Dr. Schneider is top shelf, his jokes not so much. Ha!
The team is professional, caring and knowledgeable.
Seriously folks, this place can really make a difference for you, I can't emphasize enough how miserable I was feeling and the 180 that I have achieved.
This is a non paid advertisement, although I may submit an invoice.

I recently had an Aquafirme facial with Joni, and it was an absolutely amazing experience! From the moment I walked in, the staff made me feel welcomed and comfortable. Joni took the time to listen to my concerns and needs.

The Aquafirme facial itself was incredibly relaxing and rejuvenating. Days following my facial my skin felt smoother, firmer, and more hydrated than ever before. It left my skin glowing for days afterwards, I don‚Äôt have to worry about putting on makeup.

But what really made this experience stand out was Joni's expertise and professionalism. Her attention to detail and commitment to providing a top-notch experience really shone through.

I would highly recommend Joni and the Aquafirme facial to anyone looking for a luxurious and effective skincare treatment. Thank you, Joni, for an unforgettable experience! ‚ú®

Pictures are two days after my facial no makeup or filter! I‚Äôm obsessed! üíõ

If you need treatment, this is the place to go. They are the nicest treatment team you‚Äôll ever meet. The office is prestine, all the equipment and tools they utilize are to die for and they help the problematic areas efficiently. To get treated by these people, I consider myself grateful üí™üíï thank you Dr. Grant, Joanie, and Paul ü•∞ - I recommend this place 110% üèÜüèÜüèÜüèÜüèÜ heh

provider_name: Cobalt Therapy (Expert Voice and Swallow Care)
review_text: Excellent! Our family has been using Cobalt Therapy for 3+ years now for a family member who had a stroke. We are extremely pleased with the therapists, office staff and owner. It is a  pleasure to work with them. The progress our family member has made is clearly noticeable. The compassion they show towards the patient and the family is a big part of the equation. Diligent, caring, honest, trustworthy, consistent, compassionate. I highly recommend Ann Marie and her staff.

provider_name: Cobalt Therapy (Expert Voice and Swallow Care)
review_text: I am so happy I found Cobalt Therapy.  They really helped me.  I was diagnosed with Senile Vocal Chord Bowing and was losing my voice entirely.  With their help I have learned through using my breath and engaging my diaphram I got my voice back and know how to keep it going.  A big win!  I can't say enough about Ann Marie and Jennifer.  Caring, kind, consistent and helpful all the way.  My singing voice has even improved so I'm sounding less like Lucille Ball :-).  Thank you Cobalt.

provider_name: Cobalt Therapy (Expert Voice and Swallow Care)
review_text:
After attending one of the Cobalt Therapy voice clinics, I contacted Ann-Marie for treatment sessions. As a prior singer I was having problems getting my singing voice back in working order. I had a major issue with Muscle Tension from years of over singing that was keeping me from my passion, ‚ÄúMusic‚Äù.
Ann-Marie has been terrific at identifying the mechanics of my problem and guiding me thru the proper techniques to restore my voice.
She has been very patient with me as I regain my confidence and am grateful for her as a therapist for providing both knowledge and compassion.
I will recommend Ann-Marie to all my fellow vocal musicians.

provider_name: Cobalt Therapy (Expert Voice and Swallow Care)
review_text:
Working with Natalie was a very enjoyable experience! With her highly professional guidance I am on the path to getting back to the life I once had.  She was a pleasure to work with and Mary and I will always be thankful for her help.  Natalie you are the BEST!

Tom & Mary

provider_name: Cobalt Therapy (Expert Voice and Swallow Care)
review_text:
I luckily came across a cobalt brochure at my allergist's  office
I haven't been able to sing for 10 yrs and slowly but surely with Natalie's keen apptitude  and considerate manner , I feel like I'm coming back
The initial testing at the office was professional as well
Their team developed a program for me and I am close to weening
off meetings/training with  Natalie Paul
The home visits have been
a plus .... convenient and  comfortable ..:
Very punctual and organized
as well. Thank you for your patience and care... I'm a big fan
of the process
Easy  recommendation

Dr Pawich is wonderful.  I would recommend her to anyone with concerns about their child . She is extremely knowledgeable and takes care to ensure families are properly included and educated. She does her best to accommodate the needs of the child and family. Dr Pawich is patient and gentle with her patients and is very effective in her diagnostic testing, even with toddlers :)
Dr Pawich was amazing, I highly recommend.

The moment we walked in we felt so welcomed and comfortable. Lindsey is very friendly and personable, she helped us feel less anxious about our son‚Äôs ADOS testing. Dr.Pawich is so kind and took the time to explain everything to my husband and I. Our son warmed up to her so quickly, and thanks to her he will be able to receive the care and therapies he needs to help him succeed. I will definitely recommend Cocoa Beach Child Psychology to other parents and to our neurologist.

I would recommend Dr. Pawich! She was so knowledgeable patient understanding and really took her time! my son kind of shut down after about an hour of testing and she waited for him to get back on track! Thank you soooo much Dr pawich! The Montalto's appreciate you!! You are AMAZING ‚ù£Ô∏è
Super sweet and dedicated staff. Small practice, so booked out for a bit, but worth the wait. Thank you!!

After my shoulder surgery I needed physiotherapy. I was very happy to use the services of  Coconut Creek Therapy. Very nice and professional  staff and friendly atmosphere. I was treated with care and was improving after each therapy. I would definitely refer family and friends. Thank you Todd and your staff, I appreciate!
D. Trifunovski

I was diagnosed with carpal tunnel in both wrists. My doctor recommended Physical Therapy, as a alternative to surgery.  I'm on my second week and had so much improvement, it prompted me to write this review.  Great therapist, and nice receptionist. I would be happy to recommend them to anyone in pain.

I'm tremendously appreciative for the outstanding care I received, following an automobile accident, from Coconut Creek Physical Therapy. I was terribly bruised and believed it would be a very long time until I would be free of pain and able to use my arm.  Todd and Sean worked miracles, and were able to accomplish in 3 weeks, what I thought would take months. Between exercises, massage, electrodes, laser and heat pads, I'm a new person.
Thank you so much for your attentiveness and professionalism.  I also want to thank Erica for welcoming me and give me the much needed confidence that all would be well.

My experience here was truly amazing! The employees are not only kind and professional, but they provided such a personalized experience and made us feel so comfortable from the moment we walked in until we left. Their staff and therapists are extremely knowledgeable and provided us with a thorough and thoughtful evaluation, therapy and explanation throughout the whole session. I highly recommend Coconut Creek Therapy to people of all ages in need of physical therapy, including infants! They started working on my son at about 6 months old and they were so patient and gentle with him, even through his moments of crankiness. I can't thank them enough!

I have been going to Coconut Creek Physical for a few months. I had tried therapy in the past at other locations and did not feel that it helped. Now that I have been going here I have found great improvement. Todd did my initial appointment and now Valdez has been doing my therapy. I have knee issues and have found I am able to move around with more mobility.  I love the friendly atmosphere of the place. The added bonus is Sophie and Tucker the therapy dogs.

Finally ‚Äî a vet in Miami that actually puts your pet first instead of your wallet. I brought in my Great Dane for treatment and was honestly blown away by how affordable and compassionate the care was. The entire visit, including consultation, medication, and prescriptions, was only $115 ‚Äî I‚Äôve never paid less than $300 anywhere else. Most places see a giant dog and try to run up the bill, but not here. The staff was amazing, the vet was honest and caring, and they‚Äôve 100% earned my trust. From now on, this is the only place I‚Äôll bring my pets. Thank you for everything ‚Äî you‚Äôve got a customer for life. üôå

They saved my kitty Gunner. I found him in a field, in the rain crying at night. I have no idea how I saw him . He was very sick.
This place has a special place in my heart. The staff is awesome and I love that it‚Äôs old school

I was traveling with my dog while visiting family and I was worried because he had been sneezing and lethargic. I brought him to Coconut Grove Animal Clinic and wow, what a great experience! Everything was so easy, and everyone was so kind. I didn‚Äôt even need an appointment, there were no extra charges or premiums. It was honestly very reasonable and inexpensive. They thoroughly examined and tested my boy, prescribed him antibiotics and he‚Äôs already feeling better. After 6 years of having my pup and going to vets in NYC, I think I‚Äôll just continue coming here each time I travel!

‚ô•Ô∏è The Best Veterinary Clinic in Miami! Super nice, loving and friendly staff. You can rest assure they will take best care of your pet! I have been in many Veterinary clinics and Dr. Marmesh and their staff is top notch pet care!  Thank you for taking care of my baby Chloe !!! ‚ô•Ô∏è
They provide amazing and attentive care. They‚Äôre knowledgeable about a lot of conditions. We are so lucky to have a locally owned vet business in our area! Their walk in service is great!

Oh my god they are the best place. The staff is wonderful. Dr. Collins is awesome with the dogs. I can‚Äôt say enough about him. I‚Äôve told all my neighbors and I know a majority of them started taking their dogs or cats to her.
Dr Collins was WONDERFUL with my goat. She knew exactly how to fix the issue and she fixed it quickly while being totally affordable. I highly recommend!

Sally Collins and her staff are second to none. I‚Äôve never been to any vet as thorough and experienced. Sally will make you feel like you and your pets have known her for years. She‚Äôs seen pretty much everything, and she stays up to date on modern technology and medicine. I HIGHLY recommend using her services even if you‚Äôve got to drive a bit farther!

Dr. Collins is the best vet ever!! I have had them in Virginia and Florida. She truly addresses every concern and tries to make your pet have a better life.And of course Marley is one of her noisiest patients and its not because he didn't get a good night's rest!!
My one dog is very stranger shy and she went right to Dr. Ercoli. That won me. Love both Dr. Ercoli and Dr. Collins. They make sure my pets don't have any problems.

I have seen Kayleigh and Thomas at Coleman and Baughman for 3 different issues. I am an LPGA
Professional and I needed replacement surgery on a knee,  hip and shoulder. 2 years ago I worked with them for a torn rotator cuff. I first saw the Orthopedic surgeon at Mayo Clicic. He said if you are willing to do physical therapy for 4 months you may be able to avoid it. He mentioned he‚Äôs been sending his patients to Coleman and Baughman and has had good success with the results. I worked hard with them all winter and it worked!  Next I  was seeing if they could strengthen my knee to avoid knee replacement   That worked too!  Last up was a hip replacement that was done 2 years ago. I went through a Physical Therapy group in Minneapolis but that did not give me the rotation I needed for a full swing. So I spent this winter doing more PT on that hip. They are more than a cut above every other PT firm  I‚Äôve ever worked with. It‚Äôs a boutique group that truly tailors a program for your specific issue. I‚Äôve been to 3 other practices in the Jacksonville area and they are all cookie cutter. Everybody gets the same program for a specific body part. That does not work. But when you work for a chain that‚Äôs just the way it is. So if you‚Äôre looking for a Physical Therapy group they are really the best in northern Florida

When I first arrived at Coltman & Baughman for my first PT appointment, I was a little apprehensive since my doctor did not have his profile displayed in the lobby. But Dr. Jack Fletcher soon assuaged my concern with his friendly and enthusiastic demeanor. I had injured my back in an accident and Dr. Jack listened to my issues, asked what my goals were, and made a plan to achieve those goals. Through his thoughtful and motivating care, I was able to achieve my goals and created habits that will help keep me strong and able in the future. The clinic on Phillips is clean and well maintained, there were even several improvements made to the facilities during my care. There is a great energy in the clinic because of the rapport between employees who care about providing the best care for their patients. I cannot recommend Jack, Thomas, and the Coltman & Baughman team enough.

This place has a great reputation among several physicians, and my visit confirms that. I saw Shayne Fisher and liked his deep knowledge and thorough approach. Also, nice to have someone with a sense of humor.

Overall, the place is clean, straightforward, and pretty efficient, I'll update later after a month of regular visits

I‚Äôve been coming to CBPT for three weeks now and have seen dramatic improvements already in my fractured arm. Jack is great and he keeps mixing up the exercises and keeping them fresh, which helps. Look forward to golfing again soon.

Kayla was awesome. She really knows her stuff and is incredibly knowledgeable. She‚Äôs also very kind. Jack was great too and filled in when I couldn‚Äôt work with Kayla. Would recommend them both!! Very nice facility and staff. You cant go wrong here.

Morgan was great! In addition to his knowledge and expertise handling the behavioral issues with our dog, he also takes the time to explain why we are doing a specific exercise, how it pertains to correcting the behavior, and what next steps to follow to ensure continued improvement. We‚Äôve been shocked at the improvement and changes in our dog‚Äôs behavior despite it only being a couple months since we began incorporating the training. Morgan‚Äôs methods are also easy to follow and incorporate after the sessions are over.

Morgan is the best! I found Come Sit Stay on Google based on the great reviews so I wanted to add one more for anyone on the fence. I rescued my dog Annie 4 years ago as a 10 month old and it had been on my list to find a trainer when I could afford the investment. Morgan‚Äôs programs work and are worth the investment! Annie went from barking at strangers and pulling hard on her leash to being excited to ‚Äúcome sit stay‚Äù which has made both her and me feel more relaxed during outings and when meeting new people and dogs. During my last training session, she serenely watched the birds on the beach which is a huge change from barking and pulling the leash wanting to chase them. We did the 5 lesson training with the e collar and it was a great experience. Highly recommend if you are looking for confidence in training and leading your rescue pup out in the world! Thank you Morgan !!

Before training, my 70-pound dog was so stubborn that I often had to pick him up half way through the walk because he‚Äôd decided he was going a different way. Walks were stressful, and I honestly thought he might never change.

After working with Morgan, the difference is unbelievable. He taught me simple, effective techniques that finally got through to him. Now he listens, walks calmly, and actually enjoys going out.

The best part? I can now hold my two-year-old while walking my dog with ease ‚Äî something I never thought would be possible. I‚Äôm so happy with the results of this training!

Working with Morgan was an amazing experience. He was concise, knowledgeable, and very friendly. He helped me and Lunas bond grow to the next level, being able to understand her body language and what she reacts to allows me to put her in situation that I know she will succeed in and grow from. Being confident with her on walks makes getting her exercise outside a breeze and the mental stimulation from the behaviors we practice at home has helped her become an overall more relaxed, happy dog! Couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better experience!
Morgan was so awesome to work with and learn from! He taught us so many good things and really helped train our Rottweiler puppy! Highly recommend.

My daughters have been working with Ms. Erika for nearly three years. She has truly changed the lives of our girls, teaching them skills & strategies to be able to express themselves through communication and listening and spoken language. Having experienced a progressive hearing loss at a young age, my two daughters wear bilateral cochlear implants. The care and compassion she has for her patients is so special and unique. My girls have expanded their vocabulary, improved their articulation and pronunciation, and continue to strengthen their language through each session with Ms. Erika. We are eternally grateful for her continuous love, support, patience, and compassion. Thank you!

Erika is an amazing speech therapist and gave me a lot of confidence from the first contact and during her assessment. She was a pleasure to work with and I learned a lot from her. Very affectionate, her sessions were always very fruitful. It was great luck to have found her, as she speaks Portuguese, English and Spanish. Thank you Erika, for the wonderful work you have done with my family! You will always have a special place in our hearts.
Erika is an amazing therapist and helped us a lot with feeding challenges with our son especially related to color, texture and smell. I would highly recommend her.
Erika is an incredible bi-lingual speech therapist, and she was the best help we could have for our son‚Äôs development! She‚Äôs an amazing professional and person!

Erica was a game changer for my son (who is diagnosed ASD) as well as me. I hired Erica referred by a friend for my son when he was around  4yrs old. He had already gone through several speech therapists since he was 3 but none used floortime (play time) and sensory input as she did at that time. I have heard and seen now more therapists integrating, but back then only a few or very difficult to find.

Initially she would film a couple of sessions with my son and me playing and then would review and share input  with me as well as demonstrate how to open, engage and close circles of conversations. She also was fantastic incorporating sensory elements that would enhance and provide stimulus for my son's engagement during sessions.

She helped me understand better how to follow leads from my son's communication and me building upon that and conversations, rather than me initiating. I also was able to  introduce new vocabulary naturally happening during play time.

At that time, I could not use words I can today and certainly I can say now she was coaching  me as well as Parent Training. At that time in life and still to date many therapists still fail with that part...Parent training and integration in sessions with their  children. THIS HELPS EMPOWER US  with tools and techniques to have a continuity with our children of what therapists do. Afterwards, I started integrating and asking all in everything I could with any service I hired.for my son. I believe to date that has been the biggest game changer in our journey.

As I look back at times with people who have made an impact/difference with us, Erica comes to mind.
In gratitude, OBRIGADA, GRACIAS, God bless you.

We are incredibly fortunate to have found Hanna for our son's speech therapy. She is an exceptional speech-language pathologist, demonstrating a high level of expertise in her field. Hanna provides invaluable advice and guidance on all aspects of our son's development, going above and beyond to support both him and our family.

Her warm and accommodating nature makes every session a positive experience. She is meticulous about scheduling and ensures that any missed sessions are promptly made up, showing her dedication to our son's progress. Hanna is also remarkably easy to communicate with, readily answering our questions and ensuring we fully understand her recommendations.

We feel incredibly lucky to have found Hanna and her facility, Communication Corner Therapy LLC. The welcoming and supportive environment she and her team have created has been instrumental in our son's progress. We wholeheartedly recommend Hanna and her team to any family seeking a compassionate, skilled, and dedicated speech therapist. We are deeply thankful for everything she has done for our son.

Hanna is an incredible speech therapist! My son worked with her for about two years, and his progress was exponential‚Äîgoing from non-verbal to verbal. She quickly recognized that he processed language differently and gave me invaluable tips to support his communication at home. Most importantly, my son absolutely loved his sessions with her! When I even mentioned her name at home, he would light up with a huge smile. We are so grateful for her dedication and warmth she brought to every session. I highly recommend Hanna to any family looking for a caring and skilled SLP!

WE LOVE MISS HANNA!! She has been such a blessing to us and our family and I could not recommend her enough! Miss Hanna was so warm and welcoming from the moment we met her and my daughter who is quite shy, was excited to keep going back. I cried time and time again as I watched my daughter‚Äôs speech skills flourish over time with Miss Hanna. My daughter was so shy and didn‚Äôt say much- mostly because she didn‚Äôt know how to communicate- and she had difficulty articulating words. Miss Hanna is so knowledgeable and my daughter was making progress with each session. She gave us the tools we needed in the home to help support my daughter‚Äôs progress as well. My daughter is now so confident in speaking and she speaks so clearly! I am so thankful for Miss Hanna and the impact she has made on my daughter‚Äôs communication and social skills! She is a gem and I‚Äôm so glad we found her!

Hanna has been a blessing to me and my daughter! When I first took my daughter, Maddy to see her, Maddy wasn't even able to speak two words or even say 'mama'. Hanna made progress with Maddy within that first week, it was like night and day. The results speak for themselves.

It's been a little over two years since then and my daughter is talking so much it shocks me everyday and makes me so proud. Hanna is one of the kindest people I've ever met and my daughter always looks forward to seeing her. Hanna understands Maddy and is so patient and encouraging. She is dedicated to making sure my child can communicate and advocate herself.

If you need a caring speech therapist, I will recommend her ten thousand times over! Trust me, you will not regret it because Hanna is the best!

Hanna helped my 3 year old really get her speech down! She had trouble with her ‚Äús‚Äù and ‚Äúl‚Äù sounds specifically and now she fluently is correct in her conversation! Hanna gave tips like ‚Äúremember your snake sound‚Äù for when you hear if she forgets it and she quickly picks it back up. I highly recommend Hanna for speech therapy! My daughter was always pumped to see her every week :-)

Trisha is an exceptionally talented, patient and knowledgeable speech therapist. The facility where she practices is also very well appointed and welcoming. We feel very fortunate that she‚Äôs been able to work with our son. Her talent for engaging with him has resulted in significant progress in his speech and communication skills. Based on professionalism, dedication and results, I highly recommend the Communication Therapy Clinic as a standout choice for anyone seeking effective speech therapy services.

After a year of treatment,  my granddaughter's communication skills have improved immensely,  in addition to her vocabulary!  She is more social able and her emotions are much more regulated.  With those skills, she and her teachers work well together so she can get the education that she deserves.

Our sweet blind kitty Vader suddenly couldn‚Äôt use his back leg. The staff was quick to diagnose his condition and performed FHO surgery. At discharge, we got everything we needed to help him recover- pain meds, wound care instructions, rehab to do at home each week. We did a 2 week phone call check up so we didn‚Äôt have to bring him over an hour back. Everyone was just so amazing!

My Belgian mal broke her tibia and the whole staff was absolutely phenomenal. They were attentive and caring. Dr Vitucci did beyond amazing caring for Mila performing a MIPO (minimal invasive plate osteosynthesis) she was home the same day and I‚Äôm happy to report she is doing very well. They answered all of my questions and concerns and checked up on her frequently. They also offer Shockwave therapy which we opted for to help the healing process for Mila. I would definitely recommend their services and caring, professional skills. If you care for your pet and want the best this is the place to go! Thank you Dr Vitucci and Staff at CC Vet Specialist for caring for my Mila

Edit: Follow up has been phenomenal. They reassured me every step and have been here for us night and day. Thursday marks 14 days post op and Tank is doing great. The team continues to follow up. I stand by my review.

When my Tank started limping it concerned me so we saw our usual clinic, though not his normal vet. They advised Tank had torn essentially his ACL and referred him to ortho as soon as possible to avoid it worsening. I promptly took the vet tech's advice on places and researched. This team is top tier. Tank is home happily recovering from his TPLO (essentially doggy knee replacement with a plate and screws). Dr. Vitucci was patient and calm but thorough. He repeatedly left spots for questions and offered visual help as well as clarification. The team caring for my baby were all so kind and gentle with him, taking time to understand his needs and also allow me to ask questions. Lauran held my hand so to speak by bringing me frequent updates from his care progress to helping me with his little embarassment. Aaron and Zander were so sweet and calm too. They lifted him, set his meds and everything with the same gentle care I would have myself had I half their skill. The front desk team just cheers you right up with their kindness and when it was time to go Gabbi (Gabby?) made sure I had team members to help ease Tank's car trip. You want a place where you don't worry your baby is abandoned, mistreated, or left unattended and scared? This is them. Five stars is not nearly enough. The incision site is so tidily closed up scars should be minimal and low issue.

I cannot speak highly enough of the staff at CCVS. I called in, sitting on the ground outside not knowing what to do with my dog Peach as she was unable to move after injuring her knee. Samantha answered the phone and took the time to talk me through how to best support my dog in the moment, and was able to get me an appointment to be seen within 24 hours. Dr. Stanley also took all the time I needed to answer my million and one questions, walk through what different treatment options would look like and help me develop the best plan of care that would work for our lifestyle and budget. The level of compassion, support and care I felt from everyone from start to finish was next level. Thank you all for your dedication to your practice! Would recommend this team to anyone in need of quality care for their fur child.

We were referred to CCVS by our local vet in Ocala. CCVS setup up our initial visit in a timely manner. Dr Vitucci assessed our dogs situation, and formulated a plan with care and concern. We were pleased with the great care our dog received from the entire team at CCVS including Dr Vitucci, Erin, Aaron, and the entire staff. They took time to explain every step of the procedure and what needed to be done at home during recovery. Dr Vitucci called several times after the procedure to check on our pet.
The atmosphere at CCVS is welcoming and puts you at easy during a very stressful time for pet parents.
Thanks to the whole team at CCVS for the great service!

I can't not believe the unprofessional staff that they have.

Thanks to the whole process here, I will be changing my phone number as soon as the children are reunified so that they can't contact me for any future issues.

They are Liars I have never seen such dirtyness  going on in my life after doing a lot of Research I see How the are and it is not about Reunification or helping Families it is all about REHOMING Children they LIE SO MUCH they are STEALING children for Federal FUNDING FRAUD and ASFA BONUS CHECKS Did you know how much your child is worth to them to remove from you STARTING PRICE $4,000 up to $10,000 per child THEY COMMIT PERJURY and that is a crime Family Forward Project for the Families

I would like to Thank All the staff for the above and beyond service we received here. They are the most compassionate veterinarian Hospital I have been to. The love and care for my dog and our concerns was overwhelming for us.
Thank you so very much for your Help in getting our dog Well.

A few years ago my little guy Peabo was my pet squirrel. He was more than just a squirrel. He was my furry little child. I took him on a regular basis to Dr. Mattson and she always cared for him. With love and special attention along with the rest of her staff. When the day came that Peabo could no longer be with us, Dr. Mattson did everything she could to save him. Ultimately he didn't make it. Peabo lived for nearly 9 years which is much longer than most squirrels do. She had taken x-rays and put him on Oxygen and performed the normal exams. She also waived all of the fees incurred during his visit and care. She also offered to handle his cremation so that I did not have to endure that. I thanked her and told her that I would just take him home instead. I was completely distraught and bawling like a baby and she embraced me and even tied my shoes for me. I could not have asked for a better veterinarian and person to take care of him an our needs like she did. A week later I received a condolence card in the mail from her and her staff. Thank you Dr. Mattson for all of your compassion and Care.

This was my second visit to Companion Animal Hospital with JoJo, our 10.5yo French bulldog. The first visit was a routine annual with physical testing and vaccinations. It was fine, I felt that JoJo had a very thorough exam.

On our second visit last week, JoJo saw Dr.Bennett for an eye problem that was diagnosed as a corneal ulcer. A very painful condition for my little friend. I LOVED Dr. Bennett's attitude and bedside manner. She was very caring and nonjudgmental. I really appreciated her taking the time to test JoJo and then whip up an eye serum for treatment from JoJo's blood. It's working great!

I can‚Äôt say enough great things about Companion Animal Hospital in Lakeland! The staff is incredibly kind, knowledgeable, and truly goes above and beyond for both pets and their owners. From the moment you walk in, you‚Äôre treated so kindly.

The doctors and the entire team take the time to explain everything clearly, making sure your pet receives the best care possible. The facility is well-maintained, and smells clean‚Äîwhich instantly gives you peace of mind that your pet is being cared for in a safe and sanitary environment.

Whether it‚Äôs a routine checkup, an urgent care visit, or long-term care, I always feel confident that my pet is in the best hands. Highly recommend this clinic to anyone looking for compassionate and professional veterinary care.
My bichon frise 9 years old only and best Veterinarian. He‚Äôs been a patient since 2014 and we are blessed to count with Dr. Matson care.

provider_name: Companion Animal Hospital of North Florida
review_text: I am so glad I went to Companion Animal Hospital!  I had been going to another vet but was unable to afford his services and I was not very happy going there.  My best buddy needed help as he was not at all like he used to be and was lethargic, sad, and hurting.  Dr. Andreoni and the rest of the staff were top notch!  Dr. Andrioni was very thorough with her examination (and her assistants) and explained what was going on with him and what she was going to do that day and what I was going to do at home. After two weeks, he is now back to his, energetic, playful, and happy self!!  Also, I didn't have to pay an overwhelming fee (half as much as the other vet), I felt it was more than well worth it to have my best buddy back!!!   Thank you Companion. :)

provider_name: Companion Animal Hospital of North Florida
review_text: I recently came in with my cat Bubba, who had a urinary blockage. I had taken him to the ER, where they quoted me $7,000 to fix him. I didn‚Äôt have the money, so I took him to his regular vet, Companion. Unfortunately, they weren‚Äôt able to unblock him either. Thankfully, they recommended another vet who could, and the procedure cost less than $1,200. Bubba wouldn‚Äôt be here without Companion, and I‚Äôm forever grateful!!!

provider_name: Companion Animal Hospital of North Florida
review_text: This office has the best staff and doctors in town! I absolutely love all of them! I tell everyone and anyone to bring their pets here to get the best care. They are so amazing with my babies! Thank you guys for kicking ass!!!

provider_name: Companion Animal Hospital of North Florida
review_text: I have only ever taken Charlie my dog to Companion Animal Hospital and I will not take him anywhere else. They are so awesome with him. Everyone is very personable and professional. If you are looking for an amazing Veterinarian for your pet then look no further!!

provider_name: Companion Animal Hospital of North Florida
review_text:
These people fantastic. We needed service to help our poor girl go to ‚Äúsleep‚Äù. Other places wouldn‚Äôt accept us without being a primary care patient. But these Vets accept us, charged us fairly, and were really kind and caring.

As we‚Äôre going through the mourning process right bow, we will not forget the kindness you showed us through it. Thank you.

This facility both changed and saved my life! 60 days ago, I did not have the slightest bit of a will to live. Here, I had the opportunity to learn how to live and not just go through life merely existing. Being someone who struggles with both mental health and substance abuse issues, it was great to be able to tackle both while going through treatment. One great thing is that the person, Anna who is in charge of the whole thing really seems to care and was of great help to me. From the therapist, to the facilitators and the techs, I really have no complaints. If you're given the opportunity, I strongly suggest working with Greg, as he was of the greatest help to me here.
I would highly recommend this place to anyone struggling with mental health, substance abuse or both, it is truly a great place!

I want to express my heartfelt gratitude to Compassion Behavioral Health for their incredible support during my recovery journey. Cameron played a pivotal role in my mental health and substance recovery, providing guidance and encouragement when I needed it most. I also want to thank Paula and Monya for their unwavering commitment as my therapists‚Äîthey truly made a significant impact on my life. The entire staff has been compassionate and attentive, always there when I needed them. Thanks to this amazing team, I feel stronger and more hopeful about my future. Highly recommend!

I recently spent time at this rehab facility, and my experience was a mix of both serious concerns and meaningful growth.
To start with the difficult part  during my stay, I was overmedicated while staff tried to determine what was wrong with me. The trial-and-error approach with medications left me feeling more confused and detached than helped at times. While I understand that diagnosis and treatment can be complex, I believe the process could have been handled with more caution, communication, and care. This was a significant challenge and something I hope the facility works to improve for future patients.
That said, despite this issue, I did gain a great deal from the program. The educational material, therapy sessions, and group discussions taught me valuable tools and insights that I‚Äôll carry with me for the rest of my life. I learned about myself, my patterns, and practical ways to support my recovery going forward. Many of the staff members were compassionate and knowledgeable, and I‚Äôm genuinely grateful for those who took the time to support me.
Overall, my experience was far from perfect, but it wasn‚Äôt without value. I left with a stronger sense of direction and the skills to continue working on my recovery and for that, I‚Äôm thankful.

Compassion is a really good facility. It helped me get my mental right also they help to teach me better and more fishing and coping skills for myself. happy HP is where I learned that I am worthy and I do love myself that I am capable of being loved and giving love. All the techs are good but my personal favorites are Dustin, Brock, jojo, and Jennifer. These techs are top tier. But besides some of the BS between clients from time to time it‚Äôs a good facility.

A life-changing experience!
I can‚Äôt say enough good things about Compassion Behavioral Health. From the moment I arrived I felt supported, respected, and understood. The staff truly care not just about getting you through a program, but helping you build a real foundation for long-term recovery.
The therapists were knowledgeable and compassionate, and the group sessions were incredibly powerful. I especially appreciated the variety of therapy options CBT, EMDR,  and even art therapy. It wasn‚Äôt a one-size-fits-all approach they tailored the program to my needs.
The facility itself is clean, safe, and peaceful. The outdoor areas and activities gave me a sense of normalcy and helped with healing. Also, having access to both mental health and substance use treatment in one place was a huge plus.
If you‚Äôre struggling and looking for a place where you‚Äôll be treated with dignity while receiving top-notch care, I highly recommend Compassion Behavioral Health. They helped me turn my life around. Big shoutout to Cam my case manager she‚Äôs amazing

provider_name: Compassion Behavioral Health -Mental Health Treatment Hollywood, FL
review_text: I came to Compassion Behavioral Health for mental health issues. I have had extremely good results and highly recommend to anyone and everyone with mental health. This is a 5star residential treatment center that I highly recommend to one. Elena was amazing with case management and I‚Äôm just so grateful.

review_text:

provider_name: Compassion Behavioral Health -Mental Health Treatment Hollywood, FL
review_text: The facility was great and the staff were exceptional! Elena made sure everything I needed to take care of outside of this facility was handled and helped me set myself up for success before I even left. The program here is focused on mental health and addiction, between the facilitators and the community of my peers there‚Äôs no place I would rather be for my growth. I will forever be grateful for my time here and everything I have gained from this journey. If you are looking for help and guidance this is a safe place where you can work on you while still feeling connected!

review_text: When I came to Compassion I needed help to get out of the environment I was in to stop using drug. provider_name: Compassion Behavioral Health -Mental Health Treatment Hollywood, FL
review_text: CBH helped me better understand myself and my mental health. Shout out to all the group facilitators; they are experts in their field. Shout out to the techs, especially the daytime techs for going above and beyond in making me feel comfortable in this place.

After too many spine surgeries over the years, I wasn‚Äôt sure how to resume a more serious exercise routine without risking reinjury, so I returned to Competitive Edge Physical Therapy. My goal was to rebuild strength and mobility, & I knew my core needed big attention. Thankfully, I had the good fortune to work with Ms. Kate ‚Äî a remarkable therapist who tailors every session to my needs, pushes me in all the right ways & encourages me with genuine care. Though therapy always varies & the exercises may look simple, my muscles remind me otherwise for days afterward. As Kate likes to prove, *if you‚Äôre not moving it, you‚Äôre losing it* ‚Äî and she inspires me to keep moving during every visit! Thanks to her guidance and direction, I‚Äôm already stronger, more mobile, and a lot more motivated to continue. Kate is an exceptional therapist, and from what I‚Äôve observed, she‚Äôs in great company at Competitive Edge.

This might be a lame thing to say, but I look forward to my PT sessions here lol. My PT Kate is awesome and so knowledgeable. She is super easy to work with and has even helped me structure my workouts outside of PT to make sure I am not exasperating my current Injury. I think pricing is super fair for the level of care and service that you receive.

I would easily recommend anyone in the Tampa bay area to come here for any PT needs!

I‚Äôm having the pleasure of working with Kate and Greg. Both are both incredible to work with and know just how much to push and do in my treatments. I just finished my 3rd week of treating my piriformis leg muscles and the improvement to awesome. Would recommend CEP to everyone
I went for therapy for to my surgery for my shoulder. And I am so glad that I did. My recovery after surgery was good, my muscles around my shoulder were in shape going into surgery.

Although they also treat athletes, I am 84 years old with history of falls. I  receive  focused, personalized attention from a well educated, experienced expert who identifies and systematically addresses specific behavioral, muscular and neurological issues, with a plan for safe, gradual improvement without stress.

Absolutely the best radiology facility I‚Äôve been to!!! I wish all radiology places were like them. It‚Äôs very clean, staff are super welcoming and friendly. MRI tech, he‚Äôs awesome, you can see he loves what he does and is very kind, patient and explains each step to put you at ease!!! Definitely recommend!!!

The wonderful person I talked to today  was awesome.  She really listened to me and she helped me so much. I would highly recommend this place because they are caring and compassionate and they want to help you.
I just want to say the staff is so kind and welcoming and they actually care! Dr. Lopez is wonderful! He adjusted my back and I feel great üëç God bless him!
Everyone that works there is so sweet and helpful. They show true concern for your health. I started therapy in June and was just released with no pain. I am so thankful for their help.

Not a single negative thing to say about the therapy staff, all friendly and nice. But this place will bleed you dry and leave you thousands in debt and still in chronic pain. They knew I had nerve damage and still just kept recommending physical therapy, i was so blinded by pain i kept listening to theyre advice for more therapy, pain levels never changed and it got to the point I just stopped going from depression, of course that was the point, 15k dollars later that they recommended spinal injections. Throu and throu this place showed they have no actual care for me. Told me they don't recommend inversion tables,  tho they have one and its amazing and works..... The last appointment I had they recommend i continued physical therapy, told them it wasn't helping my pains from the nerve damage, she asks hoe I know I have nerve damage, I had the fuxking tests done there. She looks down at the computer for a minute then looks at me and is like ohh yea it does show nerve damage in the eng, so they literally will look you in the face without even looking at your injuries on the computer thats documented and will still recommend physical therapy smh. Put your self and your interests first, this place will not put you first.

Everyone are super nice from ms Rhonda , Bridget , Alexis , Silas  ,Dr Keira ,dr Abraham and dr Frazier .I have been evaluated accurately. And I am looking forward for the rest of the treatment and can‚Äôt wait for the best results .

Update: I feel so much better . I completed the rehabilitation treatment . The team is beyond fantastic . I will surely recommend complete care .Y‚Äôall in the right place with the right people .üòä

My husband and I have been treated by the wonderful staff at Complete Care on Malabar. Everyone at the facility is so pleasant and caring! They are insuring that we are receiving the best possible treatment for recovery after an accident.
It starts with Rhonda at the reception, to the techs Silas, Alexis, and Bridget, to Dr. Frazier They are all exceptional!
We want to thank each of you from the bottom of our hearts!
The Browns

From the start of my journey with Complete Care I have been treated very well. The initial evaluation was above my expectations and the fact that before leaving they scheduled me for an MRI and setup treatment to help rehab me back to normal. The staff is top notch and are very good at listening to you and providing information about your injuries.  I would highly recommend their services to anyone that asks.

They have given me extraordinary attention and I feel very happy because I have improved incredibly. The staff treats very well and always with a smile. The doctors are very attentive and friendly but Dr. Abraham is very kind and familiar with her patients. Nice experience.‚ù§Ô∏è

Ohhhh my gosssssh, lemme just say, after being in a car accident and having to go for PT & exams, etc‚Ä¶.Dr Abraham was the MOST AMAZING Dr I have ever dealt with. She explained everything not me, took her time with me and never made me feel like a burden. I cannot say enough amazing things about her! Rhonda, the office manager is super amazing as well as all of the staff. They engage in pt activities with you, have genuine conversations & everyone keeps you informed every step of the way. Rhonda is outstanding in her dedication to getting the patients what they need and battling with insurance companies. I really hope Dr Abraham stays at this location and they offer her permanent residency. Hands down, the best staff I‚Äôve ever experienced. Thank you too all you amazing ladies.

It was very easy to make the appointment from my PCP referral. My first treatment was very shortly thereafter. I was very impressed with the Occupational Therapy team. After listening to what ailed me, "no problem, we'll take good care of you". Initial tests involved establishing my range of motion and taking many measurements, i.e established the baseline. The exercises and treatments were varied. At all times I felt that they cared and were committed to getting me better. In a short while my pain level has markedly decreased , I have gained strength in my hands/fingers, finger pain no longer keeps me awake. I am a avid fan, and I unreservedly recommend Complete Therapy.

Complete Therapy is a well-managed, professional operation from top to bottom.   The therapists are all focused, helpful and most of all effective!  I had severe rotator cuff tendonitis that I thought was torn and the therapy has improved my mobility dramatically.  The entire staff is focused on helping you, accommodating appointment changes, and managing complex insurance issues.  5 stars, I highly recommend this provider.

I‚Äôve been taking my mom to Complete Therapy USA and love this place! The staff is so kind, attentive, and genuinely helpful. I can already see the positive impact it‚Äôs having on my mom, and it gives me so much peace knowing she‚Äôs in great hands. I highly recommend Complete Therapy USA to anyone looking for thoughtful and compassionate care!

Unbelievable center. Have been dealing with chronic back pain for years but had a very severe flare up. The attention they gave to detail, the way they listened and understood everything is not comparable to any other PT center. Could not recommend more!!! Such a pleasure to deal with also

I went to Complete Therapy with an acute attack of sciatica and from the first the staff were truly amazing. Chris was my trainer, and he was incredibly insightful. He made me feel confident and supported as I got back on track with my fitness journey.

My son started physical therapy here 6 months ago. His knee was injured during a soccer game. The team here at Complex is outstanding. They take such great care of him. As a member at Complex, I couldn‚Äôt be happier with my experience. The gym is always clean and well maintained. The personal trainers are exceptional. They take a genuine interest in your fitness goals and tailor workouts to help you achieve them. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or a seasoned athlete, you‚Äôll feel right at home. Highly recommend Reese, Haley, and Rafa at Complex! It‚Äôs more than just a gym; it‚Äôs a community that supports and motivates you every step of the way.

I've been going to Complex Health & Wellness for six months now, and it's been an amazing experience! All of the trainers are phenomenal, and there's a great culture here that keeps you motivated. I train with Sebastian, and I can always count on getting an excellent session in. He tailors the workouts to my goals and pushes me to be my best. Highly recommend this gym if you're looking for a supportive, high-energy environment!

Every single one of the staff has been extraordinary. The whole gym itself has such great energy. Jess has been the best coach I‚Äôve had to this day! She‚Äôs passionate, knowledgeable, & extremely motivating. I look forward to each & every session. If you‚Äôre looking for quality training services, this is THE gym! Thank me later!!

Kate was absolutely wonderful to work with. She was incredibly patient, knowledgeable, and always had insightful suggestions that made a real difference. Her approach focused on positive reinforcement and small, manageable changes that had a huge impact.

My dog is 91 pounds and used to bark, jump, and practically drag me down the street just to say hi to every person and dog we passed. Thanks to Kate‚Äôs guidance, he‚Äôs become so much calmer and more responsive on our walks. provider_name: Coral Gables Speech Therapy - Adults & Neurological
review_text: My daughter has been doing speech therapy with Ms. Haber as part of her recovery from a brain injury. Her recovery has been unprecedented, and I believe it has been in part because of the personalized and professional therapy she has been receiving from Ms. Haber. I will forever be grateful for the incredible work and support that Ms. Haber continues to provide my daughter, while being an example of excellence in our community.

provider_name: Coral Gables Speech Therapy - Adults & Neurological
review_text: Rita has been patient and very thorough helping my father recover speech after his stroke. I highly recommend.

provider_name: Coral Reef Riding Academy (New Spirit Farm)
review_text: My daughter has been taking lessons for a few months now and she loves it.  Erica is great with the girls!  She does an amazing job teaching them responsibility around the barn while also teaching riding skills.

provider_name: Coral Reef Riding Academy (New Spirit Farm)
review_text: I had lessons with erica when i was about 12 years old and its been many years since. Looking back all these years i still recommend staying away! She once put me on a horse that spooked from cars splashing in the rain‚Ä¶ while it was raining‚Ä¶ and it spooked and bucked. She also accused me of stealing money threatening to call the cops and making me cry and cry‚Ä¶ it was found under her sons bed and i never got a apology. Horrible woman. I couldnt recommend more to stay away unless you want your children to be scared also.

provider_name: Coral Reef Riding Academy (New Spirit Farm)
review_text: This place is definitely a hidden gem! The owner is kind, experienced, and very professional. My daughter is learning to ride in a very safe environment and is so happy‚ù§Ô∏è

provider_name: Coral Reef Riding Academy (New Spirit Farm)
review_text: My daughter has been riding here for over a year. She has learned so much. Very nice staff - especially Taylor.

provider_name: Coral Reef Riding Academy (New Spirit Farm)
review_text: My daughter had a great experience this evening here for her riding lesson. She can't wait to go back!

I walked in and spoke with Christina, and she was so friendly and nice! She took the time to ask questions and was very helpful while I was getting information for my grandpa. Really appreciated how welcoming and professional she was!
Look forward to my appointments because I know not only am I going to feel better after I leave- but everyone is also very friendly and professional.

I went here in terrible back pain. I was having trouble working because my pain was so bad I couldn‚Äôt concentrate. I was having trouble taking care of my 2 year old son. Found out I had two herniated discs and spinal stenosis in my lumbar area. Then I did spinal decompression and now I feel like a new woman and feel better than I have in over a decade. I feel like I‚Äôm better able to work on my overall wellness and my back is no longer keeping me from doing the things I want to in life.

The staff, Teresa, Diva and Christian at Disc Centers of America (Coral Springs) are very friendly and attentive. This therapy has helped my sciatica symptoms greatly. Don't put a Band Aid on your condition; treat it so you can live pain free and doing the things you like! I recommend this business.

*EDIT* Fellow patients need to silence their cellphones and stop conducting personal or business calls in therapy area and on speaker phone! Conduct your business before and after treatment. Respect your fellow patients. Unless you have a family member in the Emergency Room, SILENCE YOUR PHONE! This is common sense.

After the receptionist place me on hold for 10 min, I hang up and called again.
It looks like she was not in the mood the work try to find all reasons to make me call some where else ‚Ä¶,

We went in for my 14 year old chihuahua unable to relieve himself. He didn‚Äôt even growl at the puppy in the waiting room, and if you know chihuahua‚Äôs, you know this is a sign of a major problem. Thankfully Dr Oscar was able to run some tests, then stay late and perform emergency surgery that same day. Now our little grandpa is doing much better, all healed up, and back to his grumpy self growling and barking at other dogs. I‚Äôve had this dog since I was 19. He is family and it meant the world to me and my husband that the doctor took the time to help us ensure he‚Äôs still with us and hopefully will be for many more years to come. We will be taking all of our pets here in the future due to the care and kindness we were shown our first day walking through those doors. I can confidently recommend this business to anyone else who has pets in need of care.

This animal clinic is top-notch! The facility is spotless, and the service is incredibly fast. They even take great care of turtles Samy, which is rare. Oscar is amazing‚Äîhe was attentive, knowledgeable, and truly cared about my turtle‚Äôs well-being. Highly recommend! Here the before and after of Sammy.

Dr. Paez and staff are absolutely amazing. Coming to the office is like going to a family's home. Dr. Paez (Oscar) is straight and to the point. Your pet will receive what they need and with genuino care and affection.

I can confidently say that this vet office is the best in Miami! Dr. Paez Castro is outstanding, he seamlessly combines eastern and western medicine, which shows his approach to pet care. Every member of his staff is absolutely wonderful and incredibly knowledgeable, making every visit a positive experience. I've never had to worry about leaving my pets in their care. In fact, I collaborate with his clinic for many of my foster pets, and I trust them completely.

This is an excellent family-run business where your pets will be loved and embraced. You can rest assured that any health issues will be handled with the utmost care by Dr. Castro and his dedicated team. Highly recommend!

I had such a great experience at this pet clinic! It‚Äôs a warm and welcoming place‚Äîsuper clean and beautifully maintained. The staff is absolutely wonderful and incredibly kind with all the pets. Their love and attention towards the animals really stand out. I‚Äôll definitely be recommending this place to all pet parent

Kristie is amazing. She has been an angel in my son's life, helping him with his tongue tie, releasing fascia and helping him latch better, sit up unassisted, amongst other things. She is a joy to be around and a breath of fresh air. My son loves her and I am so grateful for her that I travel 3 hours to come to her practice. She is one of a kind and any child and parent would be lucky to work with her!

Kristie has changed my son's life in ways that are hard to put into words. When he first started seeing her, he was so stressed out and anxious from school (Kindergarten) that he had developed a guppy type breathing pattern where he would sometimes gulp for air as a maladaptive coping mechanism. He was unable to even lay down on his back and close his eyes, unless it was his choice to do so and he was in control. He would automatically go into "fight or flight" mode when put into any situation out of his control. It was heartbreaking to watch as a parent and not know how to help him.

Meeting Kristie and doing therapy with her has been a complete game changer for my son and our family. He is still his sweet self, but is now able to succeed and live to his complete potential, and be comfortable in his surroundings. He is thriving at school. His standardized test scores went through the roof after starting with Kristie. We couldn't be happier and more proud. Kristie has changed the course of our sweet boy's life, and we are eternally grateful.

Kristie at Core Pediatric Therapy has completely transformed our son‚Äôs life. When he was two, a doctor told us there was nothing we could do‚Äîthat neurological damage was done. But Kristie proved them wrong. She addressed every goal we had for our child and went above and beyond.

We were told he probably wouldn‚Äôt be able to ride a bike. She encouraged us to bring a bike to therapy, and now we enjoy family bike rides with a confident and capable child who doesn‚Äôt even need training wheels! A child who once struggled to hold a pencil now creates art daily. He went from being behind on standardized testing to scoring in the 95th percentile for his age this year. The progress we‚Äôve seen with Kristie‚Äôs help is nothing short of miraculous.

Kristie‚Äôs knowledge, patience, and dedication are unparalleled. She takes the time to truly understand each child and creates personalized plans to help them thrive. Her detailed evaluations not only provided us with clarity but also connected us to additional services that further supported our son‚Äôs development. Kristie even collaborated with those therapies to ensure he would excel in every area of his life.

Both of our children now say they want to be like Kristie when they grow up‚Äîto help kids the way she helped our son.
