If you know something isn‚Äôt right with your child but don‚Äôt know where to start, Kristie is the answer. She truly cares, is highly educated and certified, and delivers life-changing results. We can‚Äôt recommend her enough.

My 2 month old daughter had a tongue tie, a head turn preference, and extreme tightness all throughout her body. Kristie was recommended to me by our lactation consultant, and I am so thankful for her knowledge and hard work with my daughter. Kristie helped resolve all these issues, and now my daughter is happy, not fussy, is still successfully breastfeeding at 7 months, and all of this was done without a tongue tie release. Trust the process, and lean into everything she is saying. Kristie is so wonderful and I talk to everyone I know about proper oral function and how it correlates with overall health and what it can do for children and adults. I have learned so much and will continue to use Kristie in the future with all my children!

Our experience with Kristie was beyond helpful, informative and wonderful! Kristie is extremely knowledgeable in what she does and was always willing and able to answer any of my questions during our sessions together. I would say she even went above and beyond answering them and would take the time to show me with demonstrations, text, photos etc. My 7 month old had a head turn preference, lower jaw tone and just overall tightness in his body. He no longer has any of these things and is the happiest baby. I am so thankful for finding Core Pediatric Therapy and the opportunity to give my baby the best possible start to his life.

provider_name: Core Values Orlando Physical Therapy and Wellness
review_text: I've been to several physical therapists and can confidently say Core Values PT has been my best and most impactful place so far! Dr. Megan and Dr. Austin have helped me regain confidence in my legs and I already feel like a stronger runner after just a couple of months working with them. I recommend them to all of my running friends, or just people who need help bouncing back and recovering from injuries!

provider_name: Core Values Orlando Physical Therapy and Wellness
review_text: Core Values Physical Therapy has top notch physical therapists who work with athletes and runners. If you‚Äôre looking for sports rehabilitation or trying to hit your next personal best, this is the best physical therapy place in Orlando.

provider_name: Core Values Orlando Physical Therapy and Wellness
review_text: I can‚Äôt recommend Core Values (and Austin) enough! Over the past few months, they helped me tremendously with my running, by improving my form, building endurance, and keeping me injury-free throughout the process. I was not the regular PT patient, as I reached out due to an upcoming physical fitness test I needed help with. However, they created a personalized running program tailored to my goals, which kept me motivated and pushed me to levels I didn‚Äôt think I could reach. Thanks to Austin‚Äôs guidance and encouragement, I was able to train confidently and successfully pass my recent PT test. The team is knowledgeable, supportive, super fun, and genuinely invested in their patients‚Äô success. I had a great experience with Core Values and would recommend them to anyone!

provider_name: Core Values Orlando Physical Therapy and Wellness
review_text: I‚Äôve been recently diagnosed with mild Achilles tendinitis and have been working with Dr Austin at the Core Values office in Orlando.  The dry needling combined with some running mechanics work has been fantastic and I was able to notice results right away during a local 5K. I‚Äôve also had the pleasure of working with both Dr Megan and Dr Rebecca as fill ins, and the consistency in care was beyond excellent. I‚Äôm on my way to returning to pain free running and it would be possible without Core Values!

provider_name: Core Values Orlando Physical Therapy and Wellness
review_text: I love the team here! They‚Äôre all so friendly. Dr. Meg helped me come back from a running injury. Her assignments and planning helped me hit my most recent 5k race goals! I am now going to ask her to help me with my spring half marathon training, which I know she will definitely say yes to. üòä Seriously though, they‚Äôre all great. If you have pain or just want to improve in your sport of choice or maybe want to sneeze without peeing post childbirth or whatever, go here. 10/10 recommend.

Visiting this clinic has been a life-changing experience for me! I‚Äôve struggled with nerve issues in my back and neck for years, and constant headaches were part of my daily life. But ever since I started treatment here, everything has improved dramatically.
The professionals are not just skilled‚Äîthey‚Äôre miracle workers! I finally feel relief and can enjoy life again. Thank you for giving me my health back!

I take my 8-month-old daughter to this physical therapy clinic, and honestly ‚Äî I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this place.

First of all, Dr. Valentina is a true professional ‚Äî kind, attentive, and incredibly gentle with babies. My daughter absolutely loves her, which means a lot at this age. When your baby feels safe and comfortable, that says everything.

But it‚Äôs not just her. The entire staff is amazing. From the receptionists to the specialists who do massage, acupuncture, and electrotherapy ‚Äî every single person is not only highly skilled but also genuinely warm and caring. It really feels like everyone was carefully chosen ‚Äî not just for their expertise, but for their heart.

What really stands out is that they treat your problem like their own. They take time to listen, to understand, and they truly do everything they can to help. The clinic is well-equipped with specialized machines, pain relief treatments, and a thoughtful, personalized approach.

This place is more than just a clinic ‚Äî it‚Äôs a true gem. Finding professionals like this, who combine deep knowledge with soul and empathy, is rare. We are truly grateful to be in their care.

This place is absolutely amazing and the people who work there are wonderful and fantastic at what they do. If you're hurting and you need physical therapy this is the place to go to. They helped me when I had an accident and my back neck and spine was messed up. Thank you so much for everything.

They sent me to this clinic, called, agreed on a meeting. They promised to send information and did not send it, when I called back and asked a question, the girl was rude and said, why didn't you call back, did not clarify, in the end she hung up and does not answer when I call back. I do not recommend contacting this organization.

I used to get treatment  by Stanley Gabriel in New York after my shoulder surgery. He was able to make me 100% to recover.
Now I moved to Florida, and accidentally got into the office where he works now in Hollywood  Florida.  I am happy with the treatment,  which he and his team provided. People are very professional, nice, work hard to make patients  happy. Me and my husband, who also under the treatment here, highly recommend this place.

Our kids have been coming to this clinic for just a couple of months and I cannot begin to explain how much they have improved on their speech. I am especially grateful to Lexi who has helped our 2 year old communicate with us. I definitely recommend them! The office is always attentive and clean and they are so understanding. Thank you so much!

Dear Cornerstone Therapy Team,

I am writing to express my deep disappointment and frustration with the way my friend has been treated by your facility. As a fellow parent, I am deeply concerned about the impact that your decisions have had on his child's well-being and progress.

He has been involved in a court-ordered 50/50 custody arrangement with his child's mother, which includes timesharing and  being allowed inclusion in therapy sessions.

Despite this, your facility has  cancelled his child's therapy sessions during his visitation times without informing him. This  shows a blatant disregard for the well-being of his child.

When he arrived at your facility today, I was shocked and disappointed to hear that he  was  told that his  child's session was cancelled and that he  was not welcome; he was beyond devastated. He  provided the court order, which clearly outlines their shared custody arrangement and the importance of both parents being involved in their child's therapy. However, your staff refused to acknowledge the order or make any exceptions.

I understand that your facility may have concerns about "business" or "scheduling," but these concerns are trumped by the fact that you are ignoring a court order and prioritizing alleged hearsay from his child's mother over the best interests of their child. It is unacceptable that you would use unproven alleged allegations to justify penalizing his  child by cancelling sessions during his visitation times.

As a parent, he is committed to being involved in his child's life and supporting their progress. He has worked hard to establish a positive relationship with his child, and he is devastated by the way your facility has chosen to treat him. He is especially  concerned about the long-term impact that this will have on their child's well-being and mental health.

I urge you to reconsider your policies and practices regarding co-parenting and to prioritize the well-being of children over business interests. I request that you take immediate action to rectify this situation and ensure that his  child's therapy sessions are scheduled in accordance with the court order which is convenient to both parents and optimal for their child.
.
I hope that you all can work together to find a solution that prioritizes the best interests of their child. However, if not, he will be forced  to request through the courts the ability to seek alternative therapy options that respect the court order and prioritize their child's well-being. He will also be lodging complaints with the appropriate organizations.

Absolutely fantastic! My autistic son had speech and occupational therapy done here and has shown major improvements. Our therapists Amanda and Katherine are kind, caring and knowledgeable. The staff are truly amazing and I would highly recommend their services.

My son has been getting therapy at cornerstone for about 6 months now. We recently switched from another therapy center where he had been recieving services for over 7 years. I only wish we had made the switch sooner. The staff and all the therapists are awesome and the center is amazing. I cant say enough about how happy we are to be working with everyone there. The love shines through these therapists and pores out into the children.

I was told in 2009 that my boy/girl twins were autistic. My daughter was non verbal yet my son could read at age three. I had no idea that autism had such drastic extremes. After calling a few offices, I decided to bring them here. I have been nothing but happy with the care and help my kids have received. They both receive speech and occupational therapy and they LOVE their therapist (Cindy and Faith).  I whole heartedly trust them and consider them an extension of our family. MaryAnn and Lori go above and beyond to help with any insurance and billing issues.  Friendly, courteous, professional and caring describe this wonderful group.

The staff is all very sweet and willing to make your experience the best. The vet techs and vet have always been amazing and given me a lot of information that I would have never known of. I will always return!
All the staff including the veterinarians are very pleasant and really care about the animals. We‚Äôve been using this veterinary clinic for a decade and with multiple pets. They are great!

Such great supportive staff. I came in for an unfortunate pet emergency after my dog got into some gum in my purse. I came in as a new client with no appointment and they were so kind and helpful and professional. They got my dog back on track and let us know everything that was happening and the cost breakdown as we went along. This place came highly recommended from a friend of mine who has had her fair share of experience with vets around town. I‚Äôm happy I chose to go to this vet in my time of need as they were so knowledgeable, helpful, and really gave my baby the attention she needed and really and helped prevent anything worse from happening.

Dr. Hancock is a fantastic vet for all three of my dogs. When the first two had to be put down, the entire staff was caring and professional. Lately however, the staff has left a great deal to be desired. Terribly long waits (30-45 minutes) to even see the doctor on a regular basis. If you have no issues with the wait times, I cannot recommend them strongly enough. The issue is that when things go wrong, they go horribly wrong, and the staff gets nasty and unprofessional. This issue has only been in the last 6 months or so. Once they have their issues ironed out, this will be the place to go to again. I mourn the fact that it has come to this. I will never forget the great care my dogs got there.

Absolutely delighted with the exceptional care and service provided by Corrine Drive Animal Hospital! When my dog fell ill during our first visit, their dedicated team worked tirelessly to nurse her back to health. What sets them apart is their remarkable transparency regarding treatment costs and options, ensuring I felt confident in every decision.
Recently, I brought my new puppy in for vaccinations alongside her older sister. To my pleasant surprise, they went the extra mile by trimming the puppy's nails during the shot session without any request from me. The staff consistently exceeds expectations, thoroughly explaining each procedure and remaining transparent about both pricing and treatment plans.
Corrine Drive Animal Hospital has earned my trust, and I wholeheartedly intend to continue entrusting the care of my two dogs to their knowledgeable and compassionate team. Highly recommend their top-notch services!

Called to setup an appointment as a new patient. Will only go to voicemail because nobody picks up. Oh wait, and here‚Äôs the kicker: the voicemail box isn‚Äôt even set up? Of course, it isn‚Äôt. Because why answer the phone or call people back who are trying to get help for themselves? That would be ridiculous, wouldn‚Äôt it?

Wish Pamela was a little more alert and aware that her "patients" need her. Please don't be a therapist if you aren't willing to answer your patients when they're contacting you and begging for an appointment, especially being suicidal.

provider_name: Counseling and Wellness Center of South Florida
review_text: Chelsea Fullilove is a great counselor/therapist. She‚Äôs very kind and understanding. You can tell she actually cares. Best counseling experience I‚Äôve had. Strongly recommend

provider_name: Counseling and Wellness Center of South Florida
review_text: If you are looking for a safe environment to start your healing journey then try Staci! She can be the confidential sounding board that‚Äôs difficult to find otherwise.

provider_name: Counseling and Wellness Center of South Florida
review_text: I'm happy to have worked directly with Staci at CWCSF. She and her team are top notch: professional, personable, and knowledgeable.

provider_name: Counseling and Wellness Center of South Florida
review_text: Staci is the absolute best! Everyone who I‚Äôve met has always been extremely kind and welcoming. Amazing credentials!

provider_name: Counseling and Wellness Center of South Florida
review_text: This is a practice with very knowledgeable and caring therapists.  Very professional.  I highly recommend their services.

I have been coming to Country Oaks Animal Hospital  for years and have ALWAYS felt so loved here~not only for myself but for my precious great dane Penny. When I moved to Brandon briefly, I would make the trip here because there is no greater care than Country Oaks Animal Hospital. I‚Äôm truly blessed to have such excellent care for my girl.

If you are looking for the BEST place to take your fur family member, look no further. Make an appointment today; you won‚Äôt be disappointed!!

The entire staff at Country Oaks is exceptional. They didn‚Äôt stop until they could figure out what was wrong with our sweet dog, turned out to be a very rare condition. They were very honest and realistic with a treatment plan, would call after hours to answer questions and provide us the assistance needed. She lived 10 months passed the time she was expected to (due to their treatment plan) and when it was time to make the hardest decision, were the most supportive and caring people we could have asked for. They made a special keepsake for our son as this was his therapy dog and made us feel so loved. The respect they showed for our dog was worth 10 stars alone and the care they took with our son goes beyond what any rating could ever give.

My first time there and all the staff was wonderful. I had a very sick baby girl kitten and they totally took care of her. I would suggest this vet clinic to anyone!!! I definitely will be using them again!  Super nice staff ü§óü•∞

I brought my kitty Binx
in for a urinary blockage, Dr.Ortiz took amazing care of him and was able to relieve him from his pain and clear the blockage. While Binx was there, he was able to diagnose him with a congenital heart condition called cardiomyopathy. I had no idea he had a heart condition considering he‚Äôs only a year and a half old. Unfortunately, this condition shortens the life of a cat, I took all the measures that Dr. Ortiz recommended to make his life comfortable. A few months later Binx peacefully passed away in his sleep, without the diagnosis from Dr. Ortiz, this would‚Äôve been very unexpected, but I was prepared for it because of this. When I took Binxs in to have him cremated, the staff was so compassionate towards me especially Dr. Ortiz,  the empathy and kindness that I received from the staff that day made me feel so comforted, knowing that these people truly care about your pet. Shout out to Elizabeth, Sandra, Yvette and Missy, All my interactions with them were always positive, Friendly, helpful and caring. Country Oaks Animal Hospital is highly recommend and I will always bring my pets here.

We have been coming here for many years and the care we have received from Dr. Richmond, and more recently Dr. Ortiz, has been amazing. Our basset has had a plethora of health issues along the way, and we know we are in excellent hands here. Fantastic techs and wonderful front office staff too- this practice is the whole package.  A special shout out to Yvette. Thank you all!

provider_name: Country Oaks Animal Hospital & Boarding Kennel
review_text: We love Country Oaks...in fact we are fairly certain that our pup Ollie faked his broken toe last week just to see his favorites at Country Oaks because he was walking just fine 24-hours later. LOL!.  The staff is always so helpful from the front desks to the vet techs and vets. Highly recommend!

provider_name: Country Oaks Animal Hospital & Boarding Kennel
review_text: Timely appointment both booking arriving, vet listened, thorough exam, and did not recommend things to pet did not need. Office was bright, friendly, very clean and a great location.

provider_name: Country Oaks Animal Hospital & Boarding Kennel
review_text: By fair one of the worst vet and kennel I have ever seen. I came here for a tour and I‚Äôm so glad my husband was the one who said absolutely not. The kennel staff seems uneducated and the kennels are disgusting. The office manager does nothing but talk negatively about her staff and former staff very unprofessional. Definitely need a staff overhaul.

provider_name: Country Oaks Animal Hospital & Boarding Kennel
review_text: We have been coming to Country Oaks Animal Hospital & Boarding Kennel for almost 20 years and would not change a thing!  Dr. Baird is the most compassionate and knowledgeable veterinarian I have ever met.  She and her amazing staff have always taken the best care of our furry family.  I always recommend Dr. Baird when asked if I know of a good vet.  Thanks to all of you!

provider_name: Country Oaks Animal Hospital & Boarding Kennel
review_text: The staff is caring and professional. Whether it‚Äôs annual exam and vaccinations, dental care, or illness, I always know that my pets are in good hands at Country Oaks. I also love the ease of communicating, scheduling, reminders and their rewards program through the PetDesk app!
Best boarding place we have ever used. If you are needing to board your dog in SW Florida please do yourself a favor and try the Country Pet Ranch. Our dog Ozzy loves it there.

I don't know what we would do without Country Pet Ranch for boarding! Seriously, they are incredible with our German Shepherd. Extremely knowledgeable and confident in their handling. At this time, he is intact, so he has separate playtime, sometimes with other large males. They keep up on shot records, learn the pet's favorite activities and truly care for them like their own! I can pick up the phone and get an update anytime. The staff doesn't even skip a beat, they know exactly which dog you are asking about and give you the info you need so you can continue on with your plans. On top of all of this, their prices are very reasonable! Make sure you reserve your days early as they do fill up, but it's worth every bit of planning ahead.

Our dogs are always excited to go to Country Pet Ranch! They love the staff and playing with other dogs. I love that everyone there knows exactly who my dogs are and are always genuinely happy to see them. We live closer to other boarding places, but we're willing to travel a little further for the Ranch!

I love this place.  I bring my two German Shepards and they love it.  They jump out of the car, run into the office and run into the back to the kennels!  Who ever heard of such of thing?   It is such a relief that I can travel and not worry about them.  They are kind and attentive to the dogs.  One time my older GS got sick and they had her at the vet  - in great shape before I got back to town. The vet (they went to my vet) told me she would have been dangerously ill if they hadn't acted so quickly.  I just can't crow enough about the people who work here.  They are just great.
Always have had a wonderful experience here, Staff members are awesome and make us feel welcomed. Most importantly Maze loves it there! 10/10

After spending a ton of money with this vets office because my dog has a really bad growth inside his ear causing him excruciating pain(to the point we almost had him euthanized) I was told I‚Äôd get a call that afternoon after his appt or the next day about cost to have surgery. I Never received a call. I called a couple of days later to see what was going on and they said ‚Äúoh that doctor is off the rest of the month‚Äù..like are you kidding me?  Almost a week later they call me and still can‚Äôt let me know how much the procedure will be. Thankfully I did my own foot work and found a place that agreed to do this life saving procedure because Countryside Animal hospital obviously couldn‚Äôt care less about my dog they just wanted me to swipe my card. They should be absolutely ashamed of themselves.

Best veterinary clinic ever!! I can't say enough good things about Countryside and Dr. Pringle. He is incredibly knowledgeable and always takes the time to explain every aspect of my dog Stitch‚Äôs care. Since Stitch is reactive, the entire staff goes above and beyond to make him feel as comfortable as possible while still providing top-notch care. Dr. Pringle is also great at coming up with alternative treatment plans that accommodate Stitch‚Äôs behavioral needs, ensuring he gets the best care without added stress. I highly recommend this clinic for their compassion and expertise.

The whole staff here is amazing! They are always able to get me an appointment very quickly, they treat my pets with kindness and care, and the doctors are all very intelligent and thorough with their exams and explaining everything to me! I have some really traumatized rescues and the extent they have gone to try to make them comfortable is so amazing! Thank you for helping me and my fur babies and treating them so well ü©∑

I met Dr. Strickland for the first time, she was the vet who actually saved a four week old kitten from a storm drain and brought it to the vet clinic, I was blessed to adopt this baby kitten, Lenny. A year later, we come full circle, Dr. Strickland got to see my beautiful cat Lenny for the first time and I was able to thank her & her son for saving  my baby kitty Lenny‚ù§Ô∏è
Dr. Strickland makes a difference by saving the lives of the feral cats and dogs she finds, along with being an amazing vet, she‚Äôs also very caring and compassionate along with the whole country side vet staff. Hands down, I would highly recommend her and CountrySide vet clinic-

Dr. Pringle is a great Veterinarian. He really talks to you about what is going on with your furry friend and would could be wrong if they are not feeling like themselves. He won‚Äôt do unnecessary test and he always asks before he will run anything along with giving an estimate. I‚Äôve had nothing but excellent service and great experiences over the last couple years. I would highly recommend Countryside Animal Hospital!!

provider_name: Countryside at the Park Animal Clinic
review_text: We can‚Äôt say enough great things about Countryside and their staff. We have 4 dogs and they make it so easy to get them in and out. The staff is amazing and so kind. Dr. Manning is an angel and we are so happy to have found this place. Our dogs are our children and their health means everything to us. The prices are affordable and the hours are very convenient. They are so easy to work with and really care about you and your pets.

provider_name: Countryside at the Park Animal Clinic
review_text: If you want a place that takes time with your pets to ensure their safety, this is not the place. My dog came in for an emergency situation, and i‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs pure laziness or the vet not being experienced enough, but she somehow missed a large tumor on my dogs x-rays. In addition to that, she saw fluid on the x-ray & didn‚Äôt check into that further after saying my dog was anemic (blood loss). Not even 48 hours later my dog died from a heart attack caused by internal bleeding. The vet at the emergency place we took her to, took a sample of the fluid and found blood immediately, if she would have done her job properly i could have had more time with girl. As the owner was amazing & apologetic, it doesn‚Äôt change the fact that this vet was completely negligent and it cost my dog her life, in addition to her being in pain until she passed. This is the most devastating situation my family and I have ever been through.

provider_name: Countryside at the Park Animal Clinic
review_text: I am so pleased with the service at this clinic.  The staff is awesome and always go above board to assist in any and every way.  Thank you for your great service.  I will drive the extra miles to visit this clinic. üòä

provider_name: Countryside at the Park Animal Clinic
review_text: Accredited vets and handled both my cats with love and care. They made sure that it was budget friendly and offered me a complimentary service.

provider_name: Countryside at the Park Animal Clinic
review_text: Having 3 cats Otter, Bisbee and Biff that we take to Coountryside for their yearly check ups we have found in the last 3 years that we are very impressed with the staff and the veterinary. It‚Äôs important that we have a vet close and this location is 5 minutes away. This past visit we had the pleasure of meeting Dr. Teri Harty and what a wonderful person to deal with. Thank you all at Countryside! Laney

First & foremost I want to express how all the staff members including the doctor at the county line / 441 office is AMAZING!!!! All the staff members that‚Äôs there are VERY FRIENDLY, Loving, Caring, Happy & most importantly
VERY RESPECTFUL!!!! They answer all my questions. I‚Äôve rarely seen an office that gives their patients grace when it comes down to your schedule appointment date & time. If by any chance you‚Äôre late they will still see you, if by any chance you are a no show they will reach out to see if you‚Äôre ok & help reschedule your appointment. Now, the office OMG, that‚Äôs a different topic. This office by far VERY CLEAN & SMELLS GREAT! I Love That! I‚Äôd Recommend This Specific Office A MILLION TIMES If Needed.

Unfortunately, my husband and I had gotten into a vehicle accident,  thank god we are alive and grateful to have found County Line Chiropractic.  They are super friendly and knowledgeable of what they are doing. We recommend them for your therapy needs.

Enjoy being treated here,  awesome staff.

I recommend any to come visit . Have your first consultation, you won‚Äôt regret.

My doctor is the best, he is so professional.
Also other employees know everything about customer service, love them and appreciate their attention!
Sheril was perfect too, she is so professional, cute and sensitive! I really love her ‚ù§Ô∏è

Love this place they are so helpful without. them I wouldn‚Äôt be getting better grateful for them. Renensha is the best my favorite she always positive and helpful and doctor c is the best he explains everything and a great doctor and all the nurses are great Lucky to have them in my corner.

We are so incredibly grateful for Angelica! She is hands down the best trainer and dog therapist we‚Äôve ever met. As seasoned dog owners, we‚Äôve always been successful with our training methods‚Äîuntil now. Our current dog has different needs and Angelica helps us to understand them and build a deeper connection.

Angelica has been unbelievably patient, not only with our dog but with us as well. She takes the time to teach us how to be successful just as much as she works directly with our fur-baby. She is also very  encouraging and supportive of us. Thanks to her guidance, we continue to improve and learn every time we meet.

We feel so grateful to have her in our corner in this journey.

We can‚Äôt recommend Angelica enough‚Äîshe‚Äôs truly one of a kind!

We found courteous canine inc through our travels in Tampa in Wesley, chapel northern Hillsboro and decided this was the place we wanted to take our ear. Puppy to have some socialization time and he jumped in the pool first time had a blast, played all day, didn't stop came home and was pooped all day. All night literally. He ran all day, had a blast, jumped. Digged, ran, played with dogs jumped in a pool swam. Very good trainers, very nice staff. Wonderful people, they sent us videos and pictures throughout the day for a checkup. As it was his first time, I believe they do this with all the dogs and it is kind of comforting when you have your Fur baby with someone else and they call you and give you Pictures and videos to let you know. Everything is okay. A great establishment would take my dog back there in a heartbeat.Thanks again guys see you soon.

Courteous Canine Inc. literally offers "dog training the fun way," and it's wonderful to see so many happy dogs and dog owners there. The founder, Angelica Steinker, is a well-known expert in modern, positive dog training - which is reflected, among other things, in the highest references of the industry.  Courteous Canine also offers behavior consulting at the top level - well-founded and with a scientific background.

So if you are looking for the best training for your dog or force-free support for behavioral problems, you have come to the right place.

There are numerous opportunities on campus for group or individual training, bonding or just having fun with your dog, such as agility, dock diving or lure coursing.

I highly recommend this dog school to all true dog lovers!

I had my corgi puppy Archie set up to get some behavioral lessons to help with his leash aggression and anxiety with cars/bikes. My initial lesson with the trainer, Erin, was simple and she took notes on all of Archie's quirks and issues.

Over the next few months we worked together at the complex and in our home and Erin was just so great. Archie was always very happy to see her and she provided so much helpful guidance for navigating our very stubborn, but dangerously smart, puppy. Her lessons have stuck with us through the proper reinforcement in our every day and I'm very thankful for Erin's knowledge.

Couldn't recommend them enough!

I cannot say enough good things about their doggy daycare. We discovered it while doing some training for our puppy. It is priced higher than some others ($40-45/day) but there is a reason‚Ä¶you get what you pay for!!! My dog is loving her best life and I‚Äôm jealous. She plays all day with her friends, gets a frozen King at lunch, takes naps and goes swimming! Her butt wags so hard when she sees Miss Cara, she is in love! I only wish I had more money to send her all week while I work. But hands down, you will not find a more loving, fun ‚Äúdog person‚Äù than Cara and you will not find a place more fun or as clean as this one!!!

Marci is so welcoming, the entire staff is! This place is wonderful. A great trail ride! You don't have to have experience with riding horses, they will teach you everything you need to know. You even get to feed your horse carrots at the end to reward them. Beautiful location, nice people, and sweet horses. I really enjoyed trail riding through the Apalachicola National Forest, absolutely beautiful!Can't wait to go back!

My first visit to Crazy 8 Ranch was more than 10 years ago.  The horseback riding is NOT nose to tail, though the horses are dependable.  But they do have a brain and a mind of their own, so it makes the rides fun and interesting.  After passing through a neighborhood, the rides enter the Apalachicola National Forest.  The rider can sign up for horses based on your skill and a ride based on how long you want to be in the saddle.  Many of the horses are rescues whose lives have been improved by joining the crew at Crazy 8.  You can also lease a horse from Crazy 8 and ride on your own or bring your own horse and rent space.  There are campsites available if you want to stay awhile.  The place has summer and Christmas camps for kids along with riding lessons for both adults and young people.

I still go to Crazy 8 and am impressed with what Marci DeCamp has created out of the space and the number of horses she has managed to rescue.  This place is worth your time, your money and your sore butt after a ride in the woods!

The last time I was on a horse was 50 years ago when I was showing horses. My wonderful wife took me to Crazy 8 for my 70th birthday recently so I could sit on a horse one more time. It was a great experience! They are kind and caring people who worked with me to work out how to mount and unmount given my limitations these days and dedicated a handler just for us. Best Birthday Ever!

What an amazing experience! We got there early and were given a bag of carrots to feed the rescues. The ride through the Apalachicola National Forest was lovely and fun. And it all goes to support kind people doing good work!
We all had a great time on our trail ride. Shantel was an amazing guide and all of our horses were super sweet. Thanks for a great birthday Crazy 8 Ranch!

Jess is an exceptional therapist for children and individuals of all ages. She is kind, compassionate, and soft-spoken, making it easy for children to connect with her. Jess is deeply committed to providing the best service possible, consistently staying updated on new treatment techniques. Her dedication and expertise make her a wonderful asset to any therapeutic journey.

I called and was inquiring of a service they do not offer but Jess old me that she had someone to recommend in a callback message. I really appreciated that service done. That shows that there is above a baseline level of care for her patients and I think that should be rewarded. I have not seemed treatment of have been seen by any of the providers here.

Finding a caring, compassionate, trustworthy counselor to guide and direct our children is no easy task.    Jess is just that!   I have recommended many clients to her with great results, and will continue to send clients her way.     Highly recommend her

Jess is the best! She‚Äôs experienced and compassionate. I love her!. I‚Äôve learned so much and grown as a person since knowing her. If you‚Äôre looking for guidance and a fresh start, reach out to Jess and her staff today!

Jess is a talented, knowledgeable, and compassionate counselor.  She has a great reputation of working with children, but has great experience in working with clients of many ages and issues.  I would highly recommend Jess as a counselor.

As a 20+ years special needs teacher, AND parent of special needs kids, I confidently give this place and it's owners the highest of reviews. Their hard work changed my son's life and set him up for success. Highly recommend without reservation. The owners and staff clearly care deeply about their clients,.

Being in this field for nearly five years, four of those as an active RBT, and almost two with CBS. I‚Äôve seen a lot in the world of ABA. Some experiences have been positive, others more concerning. But in all my time, I‚Äôve never encountered an ABA company as truly dedicated to the well-being of children as CBS. Management and staff consistently demonstrates professionalism, ethics, and, most importantly, compassion in every interaction I‚Äôve witnessed. Their commitment sets a high standard in the field and should be trusted.

My son has been going to CBS for almost a year, and they have made a world of difference. He is way more verbal, and his behavior has improved greatly. They were also instrumental in helping his potty training journey. The staff had always been extremely communicative, and I can see how much they truly care. I'm genuinely confused about how someone is posting that a therapist abused a child at either Largo or St. Pete locations. The therapists are in a big open room, and everyone would see if something happened. The therapist they have said has been with my son numerous times before, and he loves him. I also asked my son about the therapist today, and he said he's nice.

I don't want to discount the feelings of a mother, but I definitely would need to see some evidence as a parent of someone who also sends their child to this clinic every day. I also don't see any arrests for him in Pinellas Who's in Jail. After working Crimes Against Children for so long, I know that if you have a room full of witnesses and/or video, an arrest happens immediately. I will wait to see what the actual findings are because I've seen way too many times before that people rush to judgement before they have any facts. I have seen nothing but caring, selfless staff working here, so I'll reserve judgement. Not to mention, we have very few great ABA clinics in this area, and to trash a business for something they handled is so bizarre to me. This is why we can't have nice places for our kids. Nobody wants the liability.

My daughter has been attending therapy at this clinic for a year and a half. She loves it there, and they love her.
I left my career when she was one because I couldn‚Äôt find a trustworthy caregiver at the time. Two years and an autism diagnosis later, I was even more hesitant to leave her in anyone else‚Äôs care as a vulnerable, pre verbal child. Our initial phone call and meeting with Brit put us at ease.
I have had the honor of watching my beautiful child grow in confidence, make friends, communicate with Proloquo2go while also becoming more verbal by the day. I am very involved in her therapy and in setting realistic goals that stay true to her AUTHENTIC self. The entire staff at CBS has been kind, helpful and supportive in helping us to find what works for our family.
I have never seen a bruise I can‚Äôt explain, or had an incident that wasn‚Äôt communicated to me at an appropriate time. The only concern I raised about an RBT (which was just a mismatch in style) was handled promptly without any pushback.
The staff at CBS respect my decisions as a parent, provide a safe and supportive environment for the kids and are always available when I need a sounding board.
Fantastic group of people.  Always transparent and helpful.  They have helped my child develop further than we had ever thought possible, always with kindness.

Jennifer is kind, compassionate and driven to serve her clients and their parents. I highly recommend her as a therapist for young children. I have been a colleague of Jennifer's for about a year and every experience with her has been enriching.

Jennifer has a heart and desire for working with toddler age children and their families. She provides a warm and nurturing atmosphere for healing and developmental growth to take place. If your looking for someone to help your little one with social skills, boundaries and behavioral issues I highly recommend her!

Jennifer has a big heart and is very caring. She is professional, kind, educated, experienced,  compassionate, and attentive. She is my top recommendation if you are looking for someone with a passion to help children and their parents.

Jennifer is a talented mental health professional who is gifted in her ability to work with children to help them overcome behavioral and emotional concerns. She offers guidance to parents and is thorough in her approach to counseling.
I have known Jennifer professionally for more than 5-years. She is dedicated to her profession and most of all, to her clients.

I have known Jennifer, professionally, for over 5 years. Jennifer's warm, empathetic and compassionate personality shines through and she truly has an energetic passion for working with children and families that is awe inspiring. I confidently refer client's to her without hesitation, as I know that they will receive quality care and services, in their healing journeys.

provider_name: Creative Kids Therapy Inc - ABA THERAPY
review_text: Writing this review is easy because we are so thankful for finding Creative Kids Therapy and meeting our Therapist, Alondra. She has taken the time and dedication to build a trust and bond with our son that, in turn, resulted in him opening up and making such big strides in his delayed milestones. We could almost immediately start seeing changes/improvements in his speech and interaction with us and in the classroom, and even with his eating! The staff at the office is very professional and attentive to anything we need when we have called, and they make sure to call and follow up - even if just to tell us they're working on something that may be a bit delayed. This place is truly a blessing; we can't thank you guys enough!

provider_name: Creative Kids Therapy Inc - ABA THERAPY
review_text:
I don't like to leave bad reviews, but I've never dealt with such a terrible healthcare facility. I also called twice for the manager to call me before writing this review, with no call back. This has been one of the most frustrating and disappointing healthcare experiences I've ever had. I took my child in for an evaluation months ago. They had no problem billing my insurance ‚Äî but since then, nothing. No results, no follow-up, no explanation.

I‚Äôve called over 10 times, trying to get answers. Each time, I‚Äôm given the same empty promise that someone ‚Äî usually a manager ‚Äî will call me back. Not once have they followed through. It‚Äôs clear this office does not prioritize communication, follow-up, or basic professionalism.

This isn‚Äôt just a customer service issue ‚Äî it‚Äôs a complete failure in patient care and accountability. How can you take the time to take your child in, they charge for services but never get back to you with results? There is something sketchy going on with this company, where they charge for visits and don't get back to you. I strongly warn others to look elsewhere.

provider_name: Creative Kids Therapy Inc - ABA THERAPY
review_text: I don‚Äôt like to leave bad reviews . But I am honestly fed up. It‚Äôs been almost 3 months of me calling every week advising the person who answers the phone to escalate my request and I‚Äôm always informed that they will send an email but can‚Äôt guarantee to schedule an evaluation. Nobody EVER calls me back. I‚Äôm trying to schedule both my sons for speech therapy and they are behind. The only reason I‚Äôm choosing this facility is due to it being close proximity to me. Otherwise, I am considering searching elsewhere . It should not take 3 months to schedule an appointment especially when I‚Äôve spoken to the same front desk person over and over ‚Ä¶

provider_name: Creative Kids Therapy Inc - ABA THERAPY
review_text: I have been trying to make an appointment for a new patient for the last 3 days. The first person to who I spoke to, got my son information, and she said someone was going to call me back. They never call. Today, I called for a second time because my infant needs physical therapies as soon as possible. They placed me on hold, and then none one picked the phone up. I work in the medical field. I don‚Äôt understand why they would need over 24 hours to book an appointment. I hope they have enough patients and their business is thriving. I‚Äôm not taking my son for medical care to a place which lack of professionalism

provider_name: Creative Kids Therapy Inc - ABA THERAPY
review_text: My husband and I didn't know where to turn for speech therapy for our sons, but choosing Creative Kids Therapy was the best decision we could have made. We have had the most incredible experience with Creative Kids Therapy, especially with Morgan, the speech therapist. Morgan has been amazing with our sons. She is incredibly patient, kind, and truly passionate about her work. We've seen such remarkable progress in our sons' communication skills since they started working with her. Morgan makes each session engaging and fun, and our boys always look forward to their time with her. We are beyond grateful for the positive impact she has had on our family and would highly recommend her and Creative Kids Therapy to anyone seeking exceptional speech therapy services.

Irina is one of the best professionals I've met and she is truly passionate about helping children reach their full potential. Since my son started working with Irina, I‚Äôve noticed significant progress in his motor skills, balance, and reaction time. Her therapy sessions are always fun and engaging, keeping my 7-year old motivated and attentive (which could be a challenge). I‚Äôm so grateful for the positive impact she‚Äôs had on my son‚Äôs development! Can't recommend her highly enough.

Irina is a wonderful specialist. My children really like to study with her. The classes are held in a playful way, simple and interesting for children! Irina takes into account the individual characteristics of each child, and the classes are held so that the child learns something new and develops his or her skills. My children usually study for one hour and do not want to leave, they like it so much!!! I highly recommend Irina for your children.

I am writing to express my gratitude for Irina's exceptional occupational therapy evaluation for my son at
Creative Occupational Therapy Services. Irina's expertise and thoughtful approach have been instrumental in understanding and addressing my son's needs.

From the start, Irina created a warm and welcoming environment that made my son feel comfortable. Her thorough evaluation not only provided valuable insights into his challenges but also set the foundation for a personalized intervention plan.

Irina's dedication to tailoring interventions to my son's unique requirements has made a noticeable difference. Her blend of professionalism and compassion has created a positive and supportive atmosphere that my son responds well to.

I highly recommend Irina and the occupational therapy services at Creative Occupational Therapy Services. Thank you, Irina, for your commitment to my son's well-being and growth.

Irina is a great occupational therapist . She is very meticulous and thorough in her process . I like how the activities she crafts for my toddler covers several goals from food sensitivity to fine motor skills and following directions. My daughter made significant progress last fall working with Irina. She is also very professional and 1 hour with her can be equivalent to 2 hours at certain OT gyms. I like how she also explains the science behind her methods and provides handouts for the parents to continue the work.
Irina is a wonderful therapist - very detailed, attentive & educational. She has helped my son advance greatly and highly recommend her to help your family.

I‚Äôve been working with Crossover PT for my shoulder, and I can‚Äôt recommend them enough! From the start, Dr. Bryant has been professional, knowledgeable, and very supportive. He really takes the time to explain what‚Äôs going on, create a plan that works for me, and encourage me along the way. I‚Äôve already noticed great improvement in my mobility and strength. He is friendly, the environment is welcoming, and I feel like he truly cares about my recovery.
If you‚Äôre looking for a place that combines expertise with genuine care, Crossover PT is the place to go!

I came to Bryant with patella tendinitis, and thanks to his expertise, my knee is now completely healed. He is knowledgeable, attentive, and takes the time to tailor each session to my needs. Bryant also provides daily exercises to continue strengthening at home, which has been invaluable to my recovery. On top of being an excellent physical therapist, he‚Äôs a genuinely great person. He has my highest recommendation.

Dr. Bryant provides top-notch guidance and expertise. He bridges a critical gap between routine physical therapy experience and sports performance, creating a dynamic environment for growth and improvement in everything from sport-specific training to day-to-day function. He provided stellar insight into my own movement patterns and deficits,  and helped me regain function that I lost from surgery with awesome results. I hadn‚Äôt hoped to achieve as much as I did with him and he has my highest recommendation. Your health is worth every penny, and this is an investment that will help maintain and enhance your abilities for years to come.

I came to Bryant Villota after having had hip surgery on my left hip and re injuring it after coming back for my senior year of baseball. After talking on the phone I knew that I found the right guy to help me recover and regain the strength in my hip to come back stronger then before. With the assessments and workouts he gave me at his facility and with the true coach I have been able to start lifting again pain free and started my ramp up back to throwing in baseball. With his knowledge about the body and his knowledge about how the body should move in baseball he is the perfect PT guy to help you recover faster and not have to worry about re injuring yourself once you are cleared back to activity.

Dr. Bryant is amazing! He is compassionate, professional, and a great  listener. Dr. Bryant helped me improve my overall health and truly cares for his patients. I especially appreciate the follow up text messages and ‚Äúhomework‚Äù Dr. Bryant sends me. What I love most about Crossover, I am the only patient at my appointment. Dr. Bryant is focusing on my health and not running from patient to patient.

Wow. All I can say about this organization is WOW.

From effective communication to welcoming smiles. Everyone on staff was so accommodating on our volunteer time at the property.

When we research our service projects to have our employees volunteer at; we are very particular. Crossroads checked every box with their values, mission and work rate. Couldn't have asked for a better place to volunteer at this past Friday! What they do for their clients is life changing!

Has been the MOST healing equine therapy center for me, and the therapists are so sweet, caring, and knowledgeable. I have learned so much more about horses and how loving and intelligent they are! Wonderful place.

I have had so much loss of loved ones within 1 year. Equine Ministries was so much needed even when I thought I was ok. The staff there are so loving and welcoming. I would recommend them to anyone who have ever been through a trauma of any kind. I‚Äôm so happy that I went.
Such an amazing therapeutic and team building experience! Lindsey and team were amazing. I can‚Äôt wait to come back!

It was a pleasure working with Crossroad Corral to host a teambuilding activity for my workplace. We definitely got our money's worth since the session was 2 hours long, had 2 facilitators and of course had the uniqueness of working with 2 horses. The activity was completely safe and didn't require having prior experience with horses or needing to ride them.  I would absolutely work with Lindsay and her staff again. Thank you Crossroad Corral!

This is such a welcoming facility! I love the group classes, instructors, and the people who come to work out here. I am a 65 year old woman and it is my priority place to come 3+ times a week. The bonus is the hydromassage machines and the red light therapy machine. All that plus more (childcare, tanning) is included in your membership. The front desk staff is so friendly and helpful. The gym and locker room is very clean.

Justin has made my fitness experience one to remember. I have been going to this gym since May and I have not been to a better one than this because he provides peak service. He always has a smile and strives to make your fitness journey a fun one. Him and the rest of the employees have been so friendly. I recommend coming to this gym if you‚Äôre thinking about one.
This has been my gym for almost 3 years now, and I highly recommend it. It's always clean, rarely overwhelmingly busy, and plenty of variety in equipment. Staff is super friendly, too.

I recently visited Crunch Fitness, and I have to say, it has been an outstanding experience! From the moment I walked in, I was impressed by the cleanliness and spaciousness of the facility. It's refreshing to see a gym that is not overly crowded, allowing me to have a wonderful workout without feeling cramped or rushed.

One of the best aspects of Crunch Gym is the opportunity to meet and work out with friends. It has become a social hub where we can motivate each other and enjoy our fitness journey together. The variety of classes offered is incredible, catering to all fitness levels and interests. Whether you're into high-intensity interval training, yoga, or spinning, there's something for everyone.

The staff at Crunch Gym is another highlight. They are incredibly helpful, friendly, and always ready to assist with any questions or needs. Their professionalism and dedication to members' well-being are evident in everything they do. When I signed up, I received a complimentary body scan, which provided valuable insights into my fitness progress and goals.

Overall, Crunch Gym has exceeded my expectations in every way. The clean and inviting environment, the wide range of classes, and the supportive staff make it a top-notch choice for anyone looking to enhance their fitness routine. I highly recommend Crunch Gym to anyone seeking a positive and rewarding workout experience. I'll definitely be continuing my fitness journey here!
This is a good place I recommend it, the people who work here are kind and professional, I like the classes and the trainers especially Jen and Lisa I love them

provider_name: Cultivate Behavioral Health & Education - ABA Therapy for Autism
review_text:
We love it here. My kiddo adores all the staff and is learning so much. Thank you to everyone involved for making it happen to where we no longer have communication barriers for our little man. Yes, he may still be nonverbal, but he is discovering who he his and how to express himself like never before. We communicate in our own ways. He does say words but only when he wants, lol. ((Catches yah off guard ü•∞))
His personality has blossomed within such a short time. His happiness sky rocketed once we broke down that wall. Not only is our little guy learning from the staff here, but us parents as well. Again, much appreciation to everyone at Cultivate for their time, patience, AND the desire to help teach our kids. üòÄ

provider_name: Cultivate Behavioral Health & Education - ABA Therapy for Autism
review_text:
If your child is moderate to severe on the autism spectrum than do not take your kids here. My oldest just started here not even a month and had a pretty bad episode. We just found out that they are not equipped to handle his behavior which was pretty shocking. We move around a lot do to being military and every center we have gone to never had any issues with my son. We explained to them in the beginning that my son has an agression history and we believed they could handle it and apparently so did they. He hasn't had an intense episode in over two years and I believe the move and the lack of therapy due to waiting on availability and referrals really affected him. After his episode they told us they didn't have the resources to handle this and we just got an email today that he was no longer allowed at the center. When we called back for clarification it became a he said she said conversation. According to them we were not specific enough about my son's particular aggression but told them beforehand, this was never an issue for us at any of the other centers my kids went to or have visited.

I'm sorry if you cannot handle every child on the spectrum then you should not be in business.

provider_name: Cultivate Behavioral Health & Education - ABA Therapy for Autism
review_text: I would recommend this place.

I've taken my cats here twice, both experiences were pleasant. Dr. Bowman cares a lot about your fur babies! Her presence, communication and careful attention to detail is impeccable. She took us in with only a moments notice on a Saturday morning and we are so grateful for that. She made sure she covered all the bases and that made me comfortable and confident with my cats condition, diagnosis, and treatment. Our old girl will be coming back here for future visits.

I want to thank the Staff at the Cumberland Animal Clinic for the help they gave us over the weekend. Our lab was very sick and we brought her in a Friday, as a walk-in and they took us right in due to the illness she had. Dr. Simmons, Kelly, Haley, and staff were amazing. The helped us through this tough time and helped her get better. What an amazing staff.

I can‚Äôt prove anything, but my dog was never the same after boarding there for 5 days. The staff seemed nice from the limited interactions I had with them. I don‚Äôt think the doctors or front staff did anything to him. But I wonder about the kennel staff. All I know is after picking my boy up, he never barked again and cannot breathe out of his nose. This has been going on for months. I‚Äôm sure they would say bring him back and let them check on him, but I would never subject him to going there again. Since the horrible experience of boarding him, we have been to our regular vet over and over and over trying to help him. Also, when I picked him up he was shaking and absolutely terrified.

I took my dog in for a heart guard test and to get more medication. I had them look at a sore on her leg that will not heal. So I left her with them so the vet could take a look at it since I didn‚Äôt let them know before her appointment. Which was fine. I understood. The lady called me and told me that everything will be $297 and that I could pick her up. But when I got there, the price was $500. The lady even admitted to telling me the $297 and that she didn‚Äôt understand why there was a $200 difference.

The manager comes in and tells me there was a glitch in the system. I told her I had been coming to them for four years now and asked if they could make it right for me and do everything for the $297 that I agreed upon. Then she proceeds to blame it on the receptionist was new and in training. Oh so there wasn‚Äôt really a glitch in the system? She just told me wrong. Now she was changing her reason for the misquote.

She went and got Andrew Simmons. The veterinarian. He had a short temper. He said the $500 was what you agreed upon. I said that is not true and even the lady up front told them that she had quoted me the $297 over the phone. Then I was on the phone with my husband saying that I‚Äôm going to be late to pick up my kid from preschool and he might need to go and get him. The appointment was for 10 am and by this time it was 2:20 since I had to come back. So Andrew had a slick tongue and yelled at me. He said well this was supposed to be a lot shorter. I‚Äôm like well yeah, because of you guys it‚Äôs not.

I gave them back their medication and only paid for the tests she was given. I‚Äôm going somewhere else to get her medication. I left frustrated and disappointed. It didn‚Äôt have to turn ugly. It didn‚Äôt have to be that way. Andrew has a quick temper and wouldn‚Äôt even hear me out or talk about why I was frustrated. All he did was want to yell at me. I had my two year old and my baby with me. He just stormed out of the office after.

There are other reviews that I‚Äôm seeing about this guys temper! Horrible. Save yourself the time and don‚Äôt go here. All I wanted them to do was take responsibility for their mistake since I‚Äôve been a loyal customer with them. Don‚Äôt go here. Find somewhere that will treat their customers with respect.

Thanks! Emily Bradshaw with Penny

This place and team is amazing! Got me in quickly when I found a stray in need. Our exam was free because it was our first one! They treated us with kindness and care. The clinic is clean and organized. Highly recommend!

provider_name: Cutting Edge Physical Therapy and Wellness
review_text:
Dr. De Freitas turned what was meant to be just a long family vacation into a true success! Not only did she provide excellent treatment for my grandmother, who had suffered a stroke years earlier, but she also cared for all of us‚Äîon the very same day.

Before beginning any treatment, she carefully evaluated each of us. Afterwards, she went above and beyond by offering personalized aftercare‚Äîcomplete with recommendations and detailed exercises that she later mailed to us individually. Her approach is both effective and efficient, and I would highly recommend her, especially to anyone who takes their health seriously.

A personal detail that touched me deeply was when she had her son play with my daughter so she wouldn‚Äôt be bored while the adults were receiving treatment. That kind of thoughtfulness goes beyond medical care‚Äîit shows genuine compassion. Thank you, Dr. De Freitas!

provider_name: Cutting Edge Physical Therapy and Wellness
review_text: Dr. Pauline at Cutting edge physical therapy is extremely knowledgeable about therapy and healing the body. She healed me from a concussion complications of the head in the neck. Her knowledge about anatomy and the wellness of the body is extensive. I highly recommend her for any physical therapy you may need

provider_name: Cutting Edge Physical Therapy and Wellness
review_text: THE BEST! I‚Äôve been to multiple physical therapists and Dr. Pauline is no doubt the best I‚Äôve worked with. She‚Äôs helped me make significant progress with shoulder and calf injuries, as well as my posture. Dr. Pauline shows you the importance of your overall body structure and posture, and how they can be underlying contributing factors to injuries or healing, and how to address them. Not every physical therapist does that! She also did some Myofascial release and Dry Needling on my calf which really expedited my healing. Thanks Dr. Pauline!!

provider_name: Cutting Edge Physical Therapy and Wellness
review_text:
Until you feel as though you have lost the ability to walk you'll never understand the importance of a good physical therapist! One who is in your corner and who will be both patient, supportive, kind and your own personal cheerleader!

I had a slip and fall accident in 2023 and felt hopeless, depressed and stiff as I laid in bed thinking this would be it for me. It was not until I met Dr. Pauline is when I had a chance at living a pain free life. She coached me through the pain by providing me daily digital exercises, along with heat therapy, massages and tailored stretches geared towards my injury.

Fast forward to February 2025, I was fortunate enough (or not so fortunate) to fall and exacerbate the same problem areas. Who did I turn to? Cutting Edge Physical Therapy!
I went from walking like a mummy to walking with confidence in just 2 sessions. It was not just the physical coaching it begins with the mind, which Dr. Pauline is sure to help you to acknowledge, accept and believe.

This is essential to the healing process as we tend to go back to old/bad habits. Her sound words fosters hope, resilience, and a positive mindset, which can significantly impact recovery and well-being.

I can go on and on about Cutting Edge Physical Therapy and how they have changed my life for the better in the last few years. I look forward to my next visit here and one-on-one sessions with Dr. Pauline as I learn something new every time I visit. ‚ù§Ô∏è

provider_name: Cutting Edge Physical Therapy and Wellness
review_text: The best physical therapist ever. I was in so much pain after a car accident and in just one visit the pain began to subside. Go to Dr.Pauline you won't regret it.

I am lost from words how am amazed . The customer service here. They are so awesome with my dog. They treated him like they‚Äôre. Own a dog. Anytime my dog have any issues they always get us in there as soon as possible and feeling better. I would recommend them for your all your pets needs.

My husband and I are overwhelmed with gratitude for the care and concern of our boy Etzel. Over the weekend we needed to get him emergency care. On Monday our Veterinarians office called to see how our boy was doing. A huge thank you to Kacey and Dr. Ezell for taking the time to follow up.

Kathie, Tom and Etzel Melton

New to state, plus I had surgery, so I did not get a vet right when we got here. My dog had a clogged anal gland abscess, which we were very clear about. My husband had take her since I had to work. They had some tech express her gland but did not take care of the abscess. Naturally I was very confused, especially since they took the fee and charged us a deposit for a future appointment. Then of course by the next day it ruptured. My husband said they told him to call if any problems arose. I did and the woman I spoke to was rude, condescending, and told me they did not have time to see my dog but I better get her to another vet or my dog would die. So I took her to another vet, they were fantastic and nice, so now they are my dogs new vet. Unfortunately  Cypress Animal Hospital would not return my deposit even though they told me to go to another vet. Not nice people. Total rip off.

Cypress Animal Hospital is truly one of a kind. From the moment you walk in, you're greeted with warmth and genuine kindness. The staff is consistently friendly, compassionate, and clearly devoted to the well-being of every animal that comes through their doors.

Dr. Ezell is simply amazing. They treat my pets as if they were their own‚Äîtaking time during every visit to explain things clearly, answer all of my questions, and most importantly, make my pets feel safe and loved. That kind of personalized care is rare, and it means the world to me as a pet owner.

They go above and beyond in every way, and it shows in everything they do‚Äîfrom routine visits to unexpected emergencies. I honestly can't say enough good things about this place. If you're looking for a veterinary team that truly cares, look no further than Cypress Animal Hospital. They have my complete trust and deepest gratitude.

I had my first appointment with this facility. After years of going to the same vet I decided to find something closer to home. He had been to the vet just two months prior to this appointment at Cypress Animal Hospital. For starters, my concerns were not properly addressed. Questions left unanswered. After the appointment I called back and was promised a phone call that I never received which was to answer the questions that should‚Äôve been answered at the appointment. Dr.Ezell gave my dog a diagnosis that just 2 months ago he didnt have. A dog who has always been perfectly healthy and taken care of. She claims he has an ‚Äúextremely bad‚Äù heart murmur (a 6 on a scale from 1-6) how did he go from perfectly healthy to a 6? He didn‚Äôt. Just a way to squeeze money out of us. The prices are outrageous and overall did not seem like a trustworthy place. After her insane diagnosis, I decided to get a second opinion from her previous vet and a different one as well. He does NOT have a heart murmur. Dr.Ezell wanted to ‚Äúplace him on medication for life‚Äù. This situation just shows she is not genuine. She‚Äôs a vet for the money she can get out of it, not to help the pets. Very inhumane if you ask me. My dog also has cataracts, he‚Äôs had it for years. She did not notice it. Even though it has always been a big issue with him.

Such a beautiful place with absolutely wonderful horses, volunteers and owners! I loved being there and cannot wait to go back. They offer many services from trail rides to birthday party activities with the horses! I had the pleasure to photograph the horses and volunteers!
Have never seen someone with such love for horses as the owner. Recommend stopping in for a trail ride.
I had a great ride and the people that run it are great. The horses look happy and healthy. Definitely recommend after my trail ride!!
My daughter and I loved our ride! This family is so sweet and really cares for the horses

Had the opportunity to spend the day with these amazing people & their horses.  They have a special place in North Florida with lots of kindness & LOVE for these animals.
Thank you for making memories that will last a lifetime!

With Gratitude

Carlos

We are are almost finished with DOG of Jax‚Äôs day training program and our puppy is an entirely different dog! Anne and her team are amazing! They teach Camber the skills, and then give us the tools to reinforce at home. She is so much better with listening, obeying, jumping less, and not barking at everything she sees ü§£. I will recommend Anne to literally anyone who owns a dog! (Also this picture is proof they work her hard)

Best dog trainer anywhere! Ann Baxter, with Dog Obedience Group of Jax, D.O.G.! She is top notch! I have a 1 year old European Doberman, who was so out of control.  He would jump on you, bite your hands, wouldn't leave my 12 year old blue point siamese cat alone, jumped on furniture, basically a wild man!  Had consultation with Ann, and loved what we heard.  Brought Cooper, my Doberman, in for a meet and greet with Ann.  Wow!, what a disaster!  Totally out of control! 30 days later, Ann drives up to our house with Cooper, as we wondered if we had wasted a buncha money, or what. We could tell looking out the window,  Ann had performed a miracle on our Cooper! He was a changed boy! He obeyed all her commands, walked perfectly on the leash, and then we came out. What a different dog! Never seen anything like it, he missed us, but he did show us how well behaved he was going to be! We still work with him, commands, treadmill, walking, take him to restaurants, and even Happy Hours!  Do not hesitate, if you have an  out of control dog, to call Ann. She is by far, the best at what she does. Give her a chance with your dog! And don't forget to get the freeze dried liver treats she makes, they help too!                          Life is good, with a well-mannered Doberman! Thanks again, Ann!                          Tommy & Rubye,                Proud Parents
Anne did great work on our dog Marty! We‚Äôve seen such a difference in his behavior and confidence all thanks to her.

Hats off to Ann and her facility. The high degree of professionalism, and quality of training techniques was outstanding. Words can't express how satisfied I am with the results of the class that I was enrolled in. I would highly recommend Dog Obedience Group of Jax, to anyone who wants a good quality training experience.

Many pups from the year 2020 have missed out on much needed social skills and group settings to help them become good with the basics and being around other dogs.  Our adopted Doberman was one of those COVID pups who ended up in rescue at 10 months, and DOG provided just what we needed for him on his way to being a great all around boy.  He's super smart, and now we've the basics to build on to keep his mind and body properly engaged so we can survive his high-energy youthful years!  Highly recommend Anne and her team.

DACARE is the best ABA center I could ever find for my son. I have and I will continue to recommend this center. The facility is so beautiful, spacious, comfortable, since day 1 my son LOVES going to DACARE, the owner, and the whole staff is incredibly friendly, professional, supportive and experienced. My son is attending the aftercare program, this program is just what I had in mind, it‚Äôs exactly we needed and wanted for my son. Now during the summer is his attending his 1st summer camp, he is having so much fun while he is learning and making progress every day. As a parent I have piece of mind and happy knowing that he is the PERFECT place. THANK YOU DACARE ‚ù§Ô∏è

We are grateful for the entire team at DACARE. Since Alex started his therapies, we‚Äôve seen tremendous progress‚Äînot only in his development, but in his confidence and happiness.

Thank you to Amber, Mariana and the whole staff for always welcoming us with professionalism, kindness, and TRUE CARE. A very special thank you to Rossie and Gisela whose dedication, patience, and deep understanding have shown us that she has a true gift for working with children like Alex. I couldn‚Äôt be more thankful.

And the best part? Alex is always happy to go. What greater peace of mind and joy could I ask for?

DACARE has not only supported Alex in his therapies but also provided guidance at school, helping us create the right environment for his growth. We‚Äôre especially thankful for the creative and thoughtful programs they offer‚Äîlike their adapted summer camp, where kids can enjoy fun activities while continuing to learn and develop in a setting that truly understands their needs.

It‚Äôs more than a therapy center‚Äîit‚Äôs a place of care, support, and hope. We feel truly blessed to be part of the DACARE family.

Dacare is a new great ABA center with an amazing staff. They are all very professional, knowledgeable, respectful and most important very sweet with all the kiddos. My little brother goes there and he is very happy every day he goes there. I know Mrs. P (Gisela) that's they way Juan calls her, since few years ago. I am impressed the impact she has made on him and my family. She is advocate, knowledgeable, and always with a positive attitude, always helping parents and sharing information and advice for the wellbeing for the kiddos.

I‚Äôm very disappointed with the services at this ABA center. It‚Äôs clear that the owner is not truly invested in helping the children progress. My goddaughter has been attending for some time, and sadly, there has been little to no growth in her development. The staff are not focused on individualized learning or goals, and it feels more like a daycare than a true ABA therapy center.

There‚Äôs no structure, no accountability, and very little evidence of actual teaching or therapeutic intervention. It's extremely frustrating to see a child with so much potential not being challenged or supported appropriately. I expected a professional environment where data is tracked, progress is celebrated, and children are actively taught ‚Äî not just supervised.

If you're looking for real ABA services that focus on progress and development, I would strongly recommend looking elsewhere.

DACARE has truly been a blessing for our family. From the moment we walked in, the environment felt safe, loving, and completely focused on each child‚Äôs unique needs ‚Äî an absolute 10/10. The progress my daughter has made is incredible, and I credit that to the outstanding team who have surrounded her with patience, professionalism, and so much heart.

I want to give a very special mention to Mariana, my daughter‚Äôs RBT. She is everything a parent could hope for ‚Äî professional, deeply loving, firm when needed, and so in tune with my daughter‚Äôs needs. Mariana has helped transform my daughter in ways I couldn‚Äôt have imagined. Her growth, confidence, and joy are living proof of Helena‚Äôs dedication and talent.

I‚Äôm also deeply grateful for Gisela, Amber, Joana, and Gaby ‚Äî each of them has offered us unconditional support, genuine care, and the kind of love that goes beyond a job description. Their presence in our lives is a true gift. They have supported us through every step with compassion, warmth, and an unwavering commitment to helping my daughter thrive.

I thank God every day for putting these incredible human beings in our path. DACARE isn‚Äôt just therapy ‚Äî it‚Äôs family, hope, and transformation.

Quick appointments. Great price. Professional friendly receptionist and Doctor.
Very clean, comfortable facility.
I have been using this facility for several years and will continue to use them.

I highly recommend this office - their service is exceptional and reliable. They prioritize their patients' time and send friendly reminders to ensure you stay up to date. When you arrive, you can expect minimal waiting time in the comfortable waiting room. Overall, their commitment to providing an outstanding experience sets them apart.

This certainly is a wonderful place to visit. It's always refreshing to encounter friendly and efficient staff.  Knowing they are willing to explain things thoroughly adds to the positive experience. Their dedication to customer service is commendable.  You've inspired me to learn more about this place.

I was a walk in for a dot physical and everyone i spoke with was kind and very helpful. The process didn't take long and the doctor was very nice and helpful.  I recommend 10/10. Oh and it's only 65$ for the physical and other places they charge 120 and up.

Jenna was very professional, she was very informal and very attentive. The Dot Medical exam was quick and the doctor was also professional and informal. I‚Äôd recommend 10 out of 10 times. You just don‚Äôt get service like this anywhere. Thank You Ladies for all that you do.

I‚Äôm so grateful for Bambino and the guidance he‚Äôs given me and my 6 month old Mal. His patience and calm energy have already made such a difference, even though we‚Äôre still early in the process‚ò∫Ô∏è. We have a long way to go, but I‚Äôve learned so much already and can‚Äôt wait to see Duchess reach her full potential with his help! Huge thank you to his wife, Kim, as well for being so welcoming and supportive throughout this journeyü´∂üèºüí™üèºüí™üèº
