I first learned about the Schroth method through the internet, then fortunately there's one practitioner in town, Dr Sarah. I went to see her for my back problem with scoliosis and was taught how to do Schroth method exercises. They work!! When I had problems (back pain, shoulder pain etc), I went to see her and her therapy is totally different than a typical therapist's I have received all my life. She totally took into consideration of your 'scoliosis' condition and integrated that into the treatment. That's why it works.  One time I had a back pain for over a week and after seeing her, my pain was totally gone! This goes to show she knows exactly what she's doing.

I cannot recommend enough of seeing her at least for initial evaluation especially for those getting older and all these underlying problems will eventually catch up to you. Being proactive with your body will lead the way.

Dr. Rivard has been an integral part of the scoliosis care team for my daughter! She has guided us on this journey through Schroth and into bracing working seamlessly with other experts in the field. She is exceptional at applying her training and expertise in an individualized way for her patients. She keeps up-to-date with the latest research in the scoliosis field and isn't afraid to discuss the hard questions or think outside the box. Most importantly, she takes into account the whole person, both physically and mentally. This is a difficult journey for both the patient and the parents, but she has given my daughter confidence and the ability to own this process. She has also supported me in walking along side my daughter as she faces these challenges at such a young age. God truly placed her in our path during a time when we were not sure where to turn next and I am so thankful!

Dr. Sarah has been an amazing physical therapist, and I could not recommend her enough. Her skills and knowledge have helped me build confidence and improve my quality of life. Overall, my back pain has decreased, and my posture has improved significantly. Thank you for supporting me throughout this journey.

Working with Sarah has helped our daughter with her scoliosis more than any other treatment. The exercises she has taught her have significantly reduced her discomfort and helped her improve her ability to hold herself straighter. The techniques are tailored to our daughter‚Äôs curve and she now knows how to hold proper posture to best support her spine. We are so grateful for Dr. Rivard and her incredible wealth of knowledge and expertise!

Other PT settings tend to focus on only one specific issue, whereas Dr. Sarah conceptualizes and treats the whole musculoskeletal system to improve functioning. She is diagnostically savvy and takes her patients' experiences seriously. Can't recommend her enough!

It‚Äôs been such a pleasure collaborating with the occupational therapists at Empower. They genuinely care about each child‚Äôs progress and always meet them right where they are. Their focus on regulation and connection is so incredible- it makes all the difference in helping a child feel seen and supported so they can truly show up as their best self.

Dr. CC is an amazing occupational therapist and goes above and beyond in her company. Her commitment to the growth and wellbeing of her patients and families is truly admirable! Such a wonderful, safe and special company with such heart and passion I would highly recommend!!

I have had the privilege of working with Dr. Carolina Castillo, and her dedication to her patients is truly remarkable. She takes the time to deeply understand each individual‚Äôs needs and goals, offering personalized care that reflects her empathy and expertise. Her passion for helping others grow and thrive is evident in every interaction, and she brings a level of compassion and professionalism that is unmatched. Dr. Castillo fosters a supportive environment where her patients feel empowered to reach their full potential. I recommend her to anyone seeking a skilled and caring occupational therapist!

Dr. CC and Empower Development are truly outstanding! The OT Dr. CC is amazing‚Äîknowledgeable, patient, and deeply caring. The beautiful location makes every visit even more enjoyable, but the best part is having a bilingual occupational therapist for the children. I highly recommend this clinic to any family looking for top-quality occupational therapy and social skills camps!

I have had the pleasure of working with Dr. Carolina Castillo for about 6 months and have been nothing short of blown away by the degree of empathy, compassion, and professionalism that she brings to her clients and colleagues. She has a broad yet deep level of experience in working with diverse treatment concerns and goals, and always communicates her work in a respectful and supportive manner. The name of her practice is an excellent and accurate description of her overall approach and strength. The dedication in which she empowers her clients is genuine, passionate, and individualized. In my time working with her I have learned about more than just her profession - I have also felt empowered as a person. She is also an excellent communicator with parents when working with children and carries a tremendous amount of empathy and patience. Where occupational therapy and mental health meet, you will find Dr. Castillo. I would highly recommend her for occupational therapy to any potential client or fellow professional in a related field.

provider_name: Empower Her Physical Therapy & Wellness - Pelvic Floor Therapist
review_text:
I‚Äôm so grateful to have found Emily! After having my babies in 2019 and 2021, I experienced complications from a 4th degree tear with my first delivery that made pelvic floor therapy an absolute necessity as time went on. I was having incontinence issues and working with Emily, truly has been a blessing.

She is knowledgeable, compassionate, and makes you feel completely comfortable during what can be a very vulnerable process. Emily took the time to really understand my history and tailor therapy to my needs. Not only did she help me heal physically, but she also gave me tools and confidence to manage my pelvic floor health long-term.

I‚Äôm so grateful I found her and would recommend her to any mom navigating recovery after childbirth. She truly made such a difference in my healing journey.

provider_name: Empower Her Physical Therapy & Wellness - Pelvic Floor Therapist
review_text: I can‚Äôt say enough good things about working with Emily during my pregnancy! This was my first baby and I had lots of questions as things came up. She helped me address incontinence, manage lower back pain, and answered every question I had about maintaining my fitness during pregnancy. She provided a great environment and easy-to-follow plans based on where I was in pregnancy. Then, she provided labor education regarding breathing and pelvic floor health. I am going into this birth so comfortable and confident. I will see her after for recovery as well. I would recommend her to anyone who could use support during pregnancy and postpartum!

provider_name: Empower Her Physical Therapy & Wellness - Pelvic Floor Therapist
review_text: Emily is the best!!‚ù§Ô∏è In the beginning of my pregnancy, I dealt with a lot of vomiting which caused some leakage issues for me. These issues were the reasons I reached out to Emily and after meeting her, I quickly realized I wanted to keep seeing her throughout my pregnancy! She is knowledgeable, caring and relatable. Towards the end of pregnancy, I experienced a lot of pain with one legged movements and inner thigh pain. Having Emily help me through every phase was so helpful and I feel like my pregnancy was much easier and enjoyable with her intervention. Emily taught me so much about how my own body works and gave me tools to cope and even thrive! I feel like her guidance has set me up well for labor and pushing as a FTM! I‚Äôm so grateful for Emily and would recommend that any mommas  see her! Invest in yourself and your baby!

provider_name: Empower Her Physical Therapy & Wellness - Pelvic Floor Therapist
review_text: Dr. Emily is so wonderful. I came to her to help with pelvic pain throughout my pregnancy. She was attentive and cared about my situation. Each appointment she was focused on relieving my pain and setting me up for giving birth. The work we did helped my pain. She also gave a playlist of things to do in-between our appointments. The other thing I learned is that there is so much included in pelvic floor therapy than I realized.  I would definitely recommend her for anyone interested in doing pelvic floor therapy.

provider_name: Empower Her Physical Therapy & Wellness - Pelvic Floor Therapist
review_text: I found Dr. Emily after I had a flare up of symptoms almost two years postpartum, which was causing me so much anxiety. Not only is she a wonderful listener, but she validated my concerns and made me a plan based on my goals. She quickly helped reduce my symptoms and helped me achieve my goals!  Also, her clinic environment is also very calming with everything you may need to help in your therapy journey! I would recommend her to anyone pregnant, postpartum or dealing with any pelvic floor dysfunctions. Thank you, Dr. Emily!

I have been seeing Alyssa and Nijah for Pilates/PT for over a year. They are knowledgeable and professional. They put a lot of thought into how to safely progress, helping build strength and flexibility while avoiding injury.  Their instructions are clear and helpful. They are attentive about tracking my progress and history and I have felt that my workouts are very personal and tailored. They ask questions, listen, and adjust to meet any specific needs that arise. I will continue to come regularly!

If you are in need of real physical wellness, real physical healing and therapy... Empower PT is the only place to go! The strides I've been making with Kendall in just 5 weeks have been phenomenal, Kendall is the best! I've attempted physical therapy at numerous other physical therapy places and ended up hurt and more miserable due to my crazy joint mobility. I stopped those places very early on, each time, resulting in years of suffering That is until my new massage therapist referred me to Empower PT. I was lucky to get an appointment with Kendall and now life is getting remarkably better at an astounding rate. Do yourself a favor and make an appointment, now!

Kendall, Niajah, and the rest of the team have provided me with a wonderful experience thus far. I'm so grateful to have found a place that prioritizes individual care and proper training methods. I've struggled in the past to find good physical therapists, and I'm so relieved to no longer have to search! Highly recommend.

Empower PT truly empowers a person to become the best version of themselves physically.  The staff really cares and their thoroughness and dedication to their patients is top-notch.  I 100% trust them to help me feel better, and to gain strength and courage with exercises when my low-back pain flares up. The one-on-one attention they give to patients is amazing.  I started going to Empower PT about 5 years ago when I lived in South Tampa. I now live in Chicago and will schedule appointments with them when I come down to visit because I have not found any other place like them.  They truly are the BEST!  Thank you for being wonderful, Empower PT!

I switched from another physiotherapist to Kendall's practice. Previously, I had a new student every six weeks with the same schedule. Now, Kendall offers a completely personalized approach. Her strength lies in combining physiotherapy and home exercises with her myofascial knowledge and detailed bodywork in her practice, where she perfectly senses where tension needs to be released in every session

provider_name: Empower Wellness and Physical Therapy- Jacksonville, FL
review_text:
Outstanding physical therapy experience!

I worked with Hannah for shoulder rehabilitation and couldn‚Äôt be more impressed. After just a couple of in-person sessions, we continued through her app - which was incredibly effective. The app provided curated exercises tailored to my injury and made it easy to track my progress, ask questions, and get real-time feedback. Hannah was attentive, supportive, and clear every step of the way. Thanks to her expertise and the thoughtful structure of the program, I‚Äôm feeling significantly better and more confident in my recovery. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a modern, results-driven physical therapy experience!

provider_name: Empower Wellness and Physical Therapy- Jacksonville, FL
review_text: I had an amazing experience working with Dr. Hannah Rawlings! When we first started, I was unable to put weight on my back or jog/run sprints without severe pain in my back. As a disabled veteran and former athlete, I have a ton of chronic pain and injuries that I‚Äôve had to work through over the last 20+ years. Dr. Hannah gave me an individualized program and helped me get back to doing things I didn‚Äôt expect to be able to do again, such as placing a barbell on my back for squatting and deadlifting. She also gave me enough to continue the journey. A coach is someone who empowers others to be better. Dr. Hannah isn‚Äôt just a physical therapist. She‚Äôs a coach. She empowered me to keep working hard and gave me tools to continue. I appreciate her and know she‚Äôs going to help so many more people along the way!

provider_name: Empower Wellness and Physical Therapy- Jacksonville, FL
review_text: Hannah is hands down the best pain management/physical therapy doctor I have seen since herniating multiple discs in my lower back. I came to her in a very weak moment in my recovery story. I was in constant pain, struggling to make progress and just mentally defeated. She took me in as an individual case and worked very hard to find my specific areas of weakness, strength and places that I needed to work on. She did the due diligence of learning who I am, the goals I would like to meet and the activities I enjoy doing (or would like to get back into doing). Thanks to those things and her stellar communication throughout the process I have been able to feel this connection with myself again that pain pushed so far away for so long. My journey is far from over but without Hannah I wouldn‚Äôt be back on the road to recovery. My progress since I started to see Hannah is undeniable, she has given me all the tools to healing and shielding my spin for the rest of my life. All Hannah asks of me is to try my best and stay as consistent as possible. If you‚Äôre willing to put in the work/time, the sky is the limit. Coming from a guy that has seen tons of specialist, none of them have been able to help me produce the results Hannah has. 10/10 highly recommend her services!!

provider_name: Empower Wellness and Physical Therapy- Jacksonville, FL
review_text: We love Dr. Hannah! Absolutely the best physical therapist in the area! My daughter is a gymnast and she has been having foot pain for most of the year. We tried many different methods to ease/remove the pain but it kept coming back. After seeing Dr. Hannah her foot pain was eliminated immediately and there are no signs of it coming back. Dr. Hannah developed a comprehensive rehab plan designed specifically for her and checks up regularly to make sure the plan is working and adjust the therapy as her foot gets stronger. Our visits with Dr. Hannah are a delight as she is such a professional and is so friendly to us, especially my daughter. If you are looking for a phenomenal therapist in NE Florida give Dr. Hannah a call. I promise you won‚Äôt regret it!

provider_name: Empower Wellness and Physical Therapy- Jacksonville, FL
review_text: I came to Hannah with a low back issue I felt I couldn‚Äôt solve on my own. I was never able to deadlift anything past 315lbs without sciatic pain running through my left leg. I was concerned because as a powerlifter, I had a meet coming up and was unable to progress one of my main lifts. I met with Hannah and she evaluated my situation, and came up with a program that not only let me deadlift pain free, but I was able to set a personal record in my deadlift. She gave me the tools I needed to further work on my weaknesses in my posterior chain, which I am focusing on even after my time with Hannah. I highly recommend her.

I can't say enough good things about Empower Women and especially Payton! She is truly amazing. I recently had a hysterectomy, and Payton was with me every step of the way. From helping me prepare for the surgery to guiding me through recovery and pelvic support for the future. Payton's support made all the difference. Her knowledge, care, and genuine concern for my well-being gave me so much comfort during a challenging time. I honestly don‚Äôt think I would be doing as well as I am now without her help. Payton made a tough journey feel manageable, and I‚Äôm so grateful for her! I highly recommend Empower Women.

The only regret I have about my sessions with Payton is that I didn‚Äôt find out about her earlier. My experience with her at Empower has been great. She is very enthusiastic, kind and patient and is so knowledgeable and thorough. Also, the two ladies who work at the front desk are very nice and helpful.

Payton is a trusted provider in our community. She is knowledgeable, compassionate, and kind. I am so glad I am working with her after having my second baby to regain strength! Payton is great at assessing problems and finding solutions, exercises, and stretches that are attainable for postpartum mothers to incorporate in their busy days! I am already starting to see improvements in my daily activities and less pain all around. She is also a dream with babies and held my baby for most of my initial eval and follow up appointments!

I had a great experience at Empower Women PT. Susan Sims made me feel completely comfortable and never uneasy. Everything was explained clearly and thoroughly, which helped me understand my treatment and feel confident throughout the process. Highly recommend!

Payton is amazing! She is SO knowledgeable, personable and kind. Great bedside manner! She was one of the rare few who made me feel like I was not alone in navigating the tough journey of first time pregnancy. I dealt with a lot of urinary and pelvic symptoms including significant SPD pain for which I was simply told by OB ‚Äúit will go away after you give birth‚Äù and felt overwhelmed by the lack of direction and help. Pelvic PT made me feel heard and validated. Payton was so supportive and helpful for teaching me how to manage my anxiety and pain as well as teaching me strengthening exercises for a smooth delivery and strong return to running post partum. Payton made me feel confident and empowered for my first birth (which turned out to be a very positive vaginal delivery, pushed my 9 pound baby out in 45 minutes)! Go see her, you will not be disappointed!

provider_name: Encompass Health Rehabilitation Hospital of Jacksonville
review_text: Best rehab experience I‚Äôve ever had. So good in fact I was discharged a week earlier than expected. Very knowledgeable PT Staff. Excellent health care nurses and attendees. And the food was pretty decent I ate everything I ordered. I was blessed to be able to have stayed there.

provider_name: Encompass Health Rehabilitation Hospital of Jacksonville
review_text: My husband recently stayed here and I must say we were truly impressed with the environment, staff and services provided!!! He enjoyed his PT, OT and speech.. Stacey (RN with Burgundy shortcut hair) was the first person we met .. she wasn‚Äôt even his nurse and she helped us and made us feel welcomed on his first day he was there. All of the staff are truly amazing and had no problems providing us with answers to all off our question. I truly recommend encompass !!!!

provider_name: Encompass Health Rehabilitation Hospital of Jacksonville
review_text: I had a wonderful experience with Encompass. All of the staff from MDs to dietary took excellent care of me. I made amazing progress while I was there and started feeling better and stronger almost immediately. They listened to me and I felt a part of the plan. Nursing care was amazing and the techs were quick to answer. Everyone made me feel well taken care of. PT pushed me just enough so that I could go home safely and with confidence. It was just the perfect place and I‚Äôm so glad I went. The clinical team all worked together and I just can‚Äôt say enough good things  about them!

provider_name: Encompass Health Rehabilitation Hospital of Jacksonville
review_text: Encompass was a great experience for my mom.  The nurses & techs were kind & patient - amazing actually!  The rehab staff were amazing - always a smile on their faces & words of encouragement.  The rest of the staff from dietary, office, caseworkers & doctors made the time spent at Encompass a great experience.  The facility is clean & well thought out.   Highly recommend.

provider_name: Encompass Health Rehabilitation Hospital of Jacksonville
review_text: Everyone was so polite and kind to me! Even if I didn‚Äôt want to do what they insisted! Ha! I loved it here! Plus I am most grateful for that wonderful woman, Bonnie parks ! Who rescued me from a horrible place of a poor condition !  Thank you all so very much! You are a God sent!

provider_name: Encompass Health Rehabilitation Hospital, an affiliate of Martin Health
review_text:
From the techs to the docs, angels in scrubs.

If you're laying in a hospital bed after having a serious condition that needs rehab, take an active role and deciding your next steps. Make sure you have active conversations with your case manager and if you're within a reasonable distance choose Encompass for your rehab.
From the check-in through the discharge my experience was all about rehab. The techs and nurses are extremely helpful almost to the point where they get in the way of rehab. I had to insist a few times that I can tie my own shoes. I checked in on a Saturday and honestly things are a little slower there on Saturdays and Sundays. But they do have therapists available if you want to do therapy on weekends which I did. Then first thing Monday morning my schedule was filled with a minimum of 3 hours per day.
I would like to mention and express my gratitude to all the therapists, nurses techs, docs, administrators and kitchen and housekeeping staff: Sue, Olivia, Jessica, Amanda, Dr Mendelson, Dr 'D', Dawn, Dana, Lisa, Morgan, Chris, Edith, Crystal, Judy, the techs and nurses whose names escape me, and the managers (sorry if I forgot anyone). It's obvious the place is well manged from the way things function. The scheduling was impressive as was the flexibility to adapt it. I would not want to forget the kitchen, the menus every couple of days and the good food albeit a heart healthy diet was very tasty and varied.
There are many angels among the staff of Encompass and I am very happy it was recommended to me, so I recommend it to anyone needing compassionate and more importantly effective care.
Keep up the healing,
Pablo (307)
The origami guy

provider_name: Encompass Health Rehabilitation Hospital, an affiliate of Martin Health
review_text:
Encompass Rehabilitation Hospital in Stuart is truly amazing. They saved my dad‚Äôs life, and I will be forever grateful. From the moment we called Kodi and Melissa every single person we worked with was kind, supportive, and genuinely cared about his recovery. The entire team went above and beyond, not just with his medical care, but also with encouragement and compassion for our whole family.

It‚Äôs rare to find a place where every staff member treats patients like family, but Encompass does exactly that. We couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better experience, and we will always remember the incredible impact they made.

provider_name: Encompass Health Rehabilitation Hospital, an affiliate of Martin Health
review_text: On my last visit to the Stuart Encompass in August ‚Äò25, I was transferred from Cleveland Clinic Tradition Hospital, to help with my physical recovery  When I left CCTH, I was clear of all infections. During my stay at Encompass, I received x-rays on my L rib cage to find out why I had pain.  Turns out I had two acute fractured ribs as indicated by their X-ray Dept.  Then the big day came, discharge from Encompass.  Four days after discharge from Encompass, i visited with my GP at the Cleveland Clinic Saint Lucie West medical clinic. After more testing, turns out I had a bad UTI , that was not cleared up.  IMO, Encompass has a good physcial rehab department but it appears it has plenty of issues with its medical care.

provider_name: Encompass Health Rehabilitation Hospital, an affiliate of Martin Health
review_text:
I wish to compliment  the O/T &  P/T & NURSING  STAFF for their excellent  care and their encouragement.  I was dismissed  on Friday  it was a little  odd being home I reside  in independent  living but I have been managing  well.  I wish to thank Encompass
For their care and encouragement.  I would recommend  Encompass  to all.

provider_name: Encompass Health Rehabilitation Hospital, an affiliate of Martin Health
review_text:
After having back surgery I entered Encompass Health Rehab in Stuart, Florida from the very first day there the care and service was superb. The entire staff were tentative and went above and beyond their duties to make me feel comfortable . They did everything that a person could want to have them feel like home, from the food to their friendly smiles of the staff.
I really enjoyed the Rehab center and their great staff that worked with me to get ready to go home and back to a normal life again.  There were 2 staff members that made me feel great, always smiling and listening to my silly stories while working with me.
Krista and Shasha, these ladies are GREAT !!! I will miss their smiles and care.
Harold Lee Burns

I can‚Äôt say enough good about Dr. Lindsey! She is knowledgeable and takes time to actually listen to what you‚Äôre saying and feeling. She is incredibly talented and was able to help my lower back pain immensely with dry needling, physical therapy, exercises to work on throughout the week, and stretches that no one else has given me. My sessions with her always leave me feeling great and my chronic pain has improved. I always feel comfortable with Lindsey, her people skills are unmatched. Her office is super clean and conveniently located off of 13th street in a cool gym (Symmetry Fitness) with free parking. Other PTs I‚Äôve seen you have to fight for a parking spot or pay to park. It sounds like a minor detail, but when you‚Äôre in pain and struggling to walk, being able to park right in front of the business and easily walk in is very appreciated. Overall, I love End Range Performance + Dr. Lindsey and will be a forever client!

Lindsey is absolutely amazing at what she does. She takes the time to fully understand your issues, what your goals are for your body and helps you get there. I have consistent shoulder issues and Lindsey has been the only one I've seen able to help my shoulder using a number of techniques including massage therapy, needling, and rehab exercises. I high recommend Lindsey for any of your rehab and recovery needs!

Lindsey is one of the best Physical Therapist I‚Äôve worked with. She helped me get back into lifting after I had a total hip replacement. The process was very smooth and encouraging. She paid attention to the smallest details. Forever grateful for her work.

I‚Äôve had a great experience with Dr. Lindsey. She is a truly skilled and compassionate physical therapist. After struggling with forearm pain and limited mobility, I booked a consultation with Lindsey. After a thorough assessment she recommended I try dry needling, and I‚Äôm so glad I did.

Lindsey explained the process thoroughly, made me feel completely at ease, and did a great job relieving my anxiety. Almost immediately my pain decreased significantly and within a few days my range of motion improved, and I was able to return to doing pull ups.

I highly recommend her to anyone seeking effective and personalized care.

I can‚Äôt recommend Dr. Lindsey Meeks highly enough!  She‚Äôs such an important part of my overall wellness routine.  Her expertise, attentiveness, and genuine caring approach make her an amazing physical therapist. She takes the time to listen, explain the underlying cause, as well as ‚Äúthe why‚Äù behind the treatment and exercises.  I have had great results, more mobility, and improved workouts since working with Dr. Lindsey.  She‚Äôs one of the best decisions I‚Äôve made for my health.

I have never had a group of doctors who would ever listen to me and my feelings and respect me for what I am saying and I am so grateful kin knowing that I have a set of doctors who are willing to listen and support me in any way they can and have bent over backwards to help me through everything I am going through I am so blessed and grateful for envision mind care and I would be willing that you would not be sorry for choosing this provider for yourself I am very thankful and you would be too
Excellent professionals, with great service and a very attentive team. They‚Äôre located in a prime spot in Miami, with private parking for extra convenience.

Choosing Envision Mindcare has been a transformative decision in my journey towards overcoming depression. From the moment I reached out to them, I felt a sense of compassion and understanding from their team. Their approach is not just about treating symptoms but truly understanding the individual behind them.

Overall, my experience with Envision Mindcare has been nothing short of life-changing. I am immensely grateful for their dedication to mental health advocacy and their commitment to supporting individuals on their path to healing and happiness. I wholeheartedly recommend them to anyone seeking compassionate, effective, and empowering support for depression and mental wellness.

Dr Warner has been a godsend!!!! Very relatable and professional. Because I am a high performance individual with a lot on my plate It takes someone who is highly intellectual and capable of dealing with high-end professionals and the demands that come with that in a succinct manner. I would recommend anyone to see him more over if you are demanding professional who needs a fully board certified doctor to handle your needs this is the one.

THANK YOU!!! I would not hesitate to recommend you. My sessions were incredibly beneficial. Dr. Warner made me feel at ease discussing my issues and was able to help identify and dissect the background to my problems. This company was truly a blessing in my life!

Today was my first visit to Envision Physical Therapy, and I‚Äôm already impressed. I came in with lower back and hip pain, and they took the time to listen, explain everything clearly, and start me on a plan that makes sense. I left feeling hopeful and already more comfortable. Friendly, professional, and highly recommended!

I have been to several physical therapy locations, but never to Envision! My doctor recommended it and I am so glad he did. Everyone there is amazing they talk to you. Explain things to you so that you know what‚Äôs going on. I‚Äôve never had that before. I would recommend envision to anyone that wants a five star facility.

Amanda at the front desk goes above and beyond! I ended up not able to go there because of my insurance so I can‚Äôt speak to the actual facility, but Amanda communicated so well and went back and forth with me trying to help and finding solutions. She was fantastic and took a lot of extra time! It is so rare to find exceptional customer service these days, and so I wanted to be sure to let everyone know that you can expect an awesome experience with scheduling here.

They took me from not mobile at all to unreal mobility.  Three staff has more caring and give each patient individual treatment on their own needs. Came from Cora after 6 months with no results. Stephanie is my therapist. Omg she got me straight

I can‚Äôt express enough how thankful I am for Stephanie and the entire team at Envision Physical Therapy in Lake Mary! After dealing with vertigo for over six weeks, I was referred to an ENT specialist, who simply confirmed that I had BPPV (benign paroxysmal positional vertigo) on my right side‚Äîsomething I already knew. I was then sent to a physical therapist to have a maneuver performed, though I‚Äôm still unsure why it couldn‚Äôt have been done in the doctor‚Äôs office. I was charged $150 just for the consultation, which lasted only 10 minutes, where I was told what I already knew.

Then, I went to Envision Physical Therapy, and that‚Äôs when everything changed. Stephanie was incredible‚Äîshe immediately performed a maneuver, and within just one visit, the spinning stopped! I returned a few more times for additional maneuvers to help reset my body‚Äôs signals to the nervous system, as the issue had persisted for so long. I honestly wish my doctor or anyone else had informed me that all I needed was a physical therapist who specialized in these maneuvers, which only took about 30 minutes to provide lasting relief.

If you or anyone you know is suffering from vertigo, I cannot recommend Stephanie and the team at Envision Physical Therapy enough. Don't wait‚Äîgo see them right away for the relief you‚Äôve been searching for!
Great center for children, I Recommend Alina. She is absolutely amazing with kids and did a fantastic job with my child which is not easy. If you go here ask for her she is the best!
Do not go here, do not work here, do not bring your kids here. Please. Everything is wrong with this place and the ones that suffer are the kids.
Such work goes Into each horse. The visit was fun
Awful, they never pick up their phone calls and offer false information on their website about volunteering. I just wanna help the horseys!

I'm so proud to be a volunteer for this great organization! The horses are very well cared for and in excellent shape. They receive timely vet and farrier care and tons of love from all who pass through the barn doors. Equestrian Inc. is a great resource for helping these beautiful horses have a second chance and I consider myself very lucky to volunteer alongside the amazing people who run it.

I love this place. After orientation I felt free to come and work and hang out with the horses as I pleased. Unlike other stables where I sometimes felt sorry for my big friends, I never did at Equestrian. Their only job is to play and the human job is to spoil them

Those horses have become my babies. Lucky has to hug me every time hexsees me. Tally just wants to cuddle. Astoria he just wants to be close to you. Southern knignt he's a baby just wants to be loved. Maserati Man is the racehorse of the group undergoing recovery then going through retaining to help get him back 0n the track. Victoria shee a sweetheart but not much of a people horse. Then there's Bling Maserati's nest friend. And rowdy he's the old man of the group that just wants to to love on you. Rolo he's a goober but a sweetheart. Now lucky and southern knight are legit partners in crime, and skin will not leave lucky alone during Lucky's bathtime. Ugh these horses are the reason why I exist. I would best with out them.ladtly jj  is a hyper and yet loveable man , and lassie shes on stall rest and yet just doesn't like it. And there's archie the resident donkey. And felix the resident cat.

Incredibly knowledgeable staff and strong culture of a safe and welcoming environment from the moment you arrive. The equine therapists are skilled and advanced in knowledge including the neuroscience of attachment and polyvagal theory that have helped clients achieve clinical goals in ways traditional therapy hadn‚Äôt achieved. This is such a special facility that truly transformed so many lives

We love Equine Assisted Healing and the Herd Foundation! Our clients get so much out of their time at the farm. The team there has truly helped to create a holistic treatment experience for all of our clients.

We had the pleasure of doing another Tent Rental for ERAF equine rescue this past weekend. The staff there are always great to work with. They do a lot of good to help these animals and we are grateful to be able to work with this foundation!

I‚Äôm going to start out by saying most of the volunteer and staff team are quite nice, but a couple of them have given me issues to the point where I didn‚Äôt feel comfortable going back after almost a year of volunteer work there. I‚Äôve got 12 years of horse experience, owning and all, and wanted to volunteer at a local rescue as it gave me something extra to do on weekends. I was open about my experience and was quickly allowed to handle horses and was invited onto the medical team. Little did I know the volunteers on the medical team don‚Äôt actually get to help with common issues like rain rot, thrush, etc. I was quite disappointed as I wanted to do more for the horses as I had the experience and ability to deal with easy issues such as. As I went throughout my day volunteering, I was met with hostility when I wasn‚Äôt cleaning up after the horses and in turn doing tasks that we were asked to do on the whiteboard in the break room. On multiple occasions I was met with passive aggressive comments from volunteers and staff due to me not going to classes for horse related activities as I already knew what they were teaching. I was treated like a know it all and a child even though I am of legal age and had the same amount of knowledge as a lot of the staff or adults there. In my opinion, some of the staff don‚Äôt have a very welcoming personality and aren‚Äôt very helpful. I‚Äôve even seen a specific staff member hit horses after provoking them herself and notified people of it, but she is still allowed to ride and work with these horses. For the sake of the horses, I hope a staff member reads this and decides they want to investigate to do better for eraf. I doubt I will be coming back to volunteer unless my equine skills are actually taken seriously and I‚Äôm treated fairly.
The heart of all the people here is amazing. A wonderful rescue who really cares for the horses in their care

First off, this rescue is absolutely wonderful! If you are considering volunteering, please note that you are not signing up to ride lesson ponies and give a horse a bath. We clean stalls, scrub buckets, sweep‚Ä¶it‚Äôs hard work. But once you take the free and simple horsemanship class you can handle horses and groom them! The people there are great, and the volunteers all work together efficiently. The horses are wonderful as well! There‚Äôs a great variety, from off-the-track thoroughbreds to formerly wild mustangs to ponies and seniors. I have volunteered here for 10 months and I have no plans to stop anytime soon; I love it here! So if you‚Äôre willing to do some dirty work and help these gorgeous animals, this is the place for you!

Unprofessional staff members, making money is more important than actually adopting out the horses to good homes. If you plan on volunteering, just know that you will not ride the horses. You'll clean and groom horses basically. Don't plan on doing anything else. They don't have riding days for you like I was told when I was here. Gossip is an issue as well with some of the staff. The horses are amazing and yes. They do the best they can with what they have, but some of the staff need to be more professional and not so biased. I loved most of the staff members there but the ones who were biased didn't exactly hide their judgements very well or opinions. If you love cleaning and grooming, yes. Volunteer here. But don't expect much in return for your hard work. You will basically be expected to work like an employee without the pay and treated like one (and not in a good sense) while getting little to no appreciation in return. If you want to ride, expect to pay for lessons because other wise you won't.  The pros though are that you are helping rescued horses and gaining basic stable and horse care knowledge. I will give them that.

A very warm and welcoming place and the work being done here is so inspiring.  The staff, volunteers, participants and the horses are all so amazing.  Seeing the riders engage with their horses, becoming more confident and overcoming challenges is truly a joy.  I‚Äôm so grateful to be even a small part of it.  A wonderful place to volunteer!

Equine-Assisted Therapy here has been life-changing for us. My child has made so many gains since starting here and looks forward to coming to the barn every week. The staff here are all so kind and caring, the volunteers are the heart of the program, and the horses are truly the best therapists.

They do great work over there. Our Rotary club was involved with a service project to update the bathrooms and tack room in the stable and it took about a month's worth of weekends but we got it done. Our club got to witness firsthand how their program makes such a huge difference in the lives of their clients. It really is wonderful what these animals can do and how the therapists and trainers bring out the best in both the people and the creatures.

So if you‚Äôre serious about learning to ride  or need a stable for your horse. If you also  want a place where you and your horse will be treated like family, Equistarre is the place to be. Y‚Äôall come on down and see for yourself‚Äîyou won‚Äôt be disappointed

Evolutions has changed my life. My experience here has been one of the hardest things I‚Äôve ever done, but the best thing I have ever done. Evolutions treatment center has changed my life. From the moment I stepped into the doors, I felt so welcomed. All of the staff welcomed me with open hearts, and arms. I highly recommend this program to anyone who is in need, weather it be mental health or addition purposes. This program has changed my life.

Can't thank Dr. John enough for the help he has given me the past few weeks. As he helps me in rebuilding strength in both areas, he also teaches me about what is going on, how we are going to fix it and most of all, how to prevent these issues from happening in the future. He gives you at home workouts and constantly checks in on you to see how you are progressing and recovering. The recovery treatment post PT is even better. Don't even hesitate working with Dr. John!

I‚Äôve been seeing Dr. John for a while now, and I can confidently say he‚Äôs been a game-changer for my movement, flexibility, and overall recovery. He takes a very personalized approach and genuinely cares about your progress‚Äînot just treating symptoms but helping you move and feel better long-term.

His cupping sessions are next level‚Äîevery time I leave, I feel looser, more mobile, and significantly less tension in my body. If you‚Äôre looking to improve your flexibility, recover faster, or just move better in everyday life, Dr. John is the guy to see. Highly recommend!

After enduring over 18 months of mobility issues and relying on a walker due to GBS syndrome, I'm incredibly blessed to have crossed paths with Dr. John. Dealing with insurance and mediocre physical therapy was a constant struggle, and I was seeing multiple specialists just to get the care I needed.

Discovering Dr. John was a game-changer because he offers comprehensive care all in one place. There's no need to drive all over town to a personal trainer, then to physical therapy, then to your massage therapist, and then try to find someone who offers dry needling and scraping. We've only been working together for about 12 weeks, but I'm already experiencing an incredible difference. My time with other providers in town simply doesn't compare.

Dr. John is patient, knowledgeable, and genuinely wants the best for his clients. He's like having four specialists in one! If you're not working with this genius, you're truly missing out.

He provides:
* Strength training
* Physical therapy
* Dry needling
* Cupping
* Scraping
* Adjustments
* Stretching

He does it all and is a total game-changer! Book with him ASAP ‚Äì you won't regret it!

I had a great experience with John. The one-on-one care was very personalized, and he really listened and cared about my recovery. He tried different approaches that helped me get back on track to pain-free running. Highly recommend

I came too Dr John Degalbo after I dislocated my knee while training Brazilian Jiu-jitsu and he helped me immensely. The training started slow but within a few weeks I was able too do a full squat and now my knee is back and stronger than it has been before

I want to express my deepest gratitude and admiration for the incredible work done by the team at this center. In particular, I want to highlight the professionalism, dedication, and commitment of Marvia and the therapists under her supervision. From day one, we have felt unconditional support and personalized care that have helped us see significant progress in our child.

Marvia is an exceptional professional who leads with empathy and expertise, ensuring that every strategy is tailored to the specific needs of the children. The therapists working with her are equally dedicated, patient, and passionate, creating an environment full of learning and love.

This center is undoubtedly a place where families find not only quality services but also a team that truly cares about the well-being and development of our children. I am deeply grateful and highly recommend this place to any family seeking professional and compassionate support.

Evolving Minds is the third ABA company that we try for services for our son. After dealing with many issues from big companies that don‚Äôt really care for quality of service and only care about charging us, as of now Evolving Minds has been the total opposite. The staff is extremely professional and caring. It is a BIG difference in the quality of service when the owner is involved and works in the field. Patricia (the owner) is always available and ready to provide support to both of us parents and therapists. The supervisor for my son, Nikkie, is amazing, very knowledgeable, helpful and very caring. My wife and I are extremely thankful that we found a provider that genuinely cares for my son. I highly recommend Evolving Minds to any parent looking for services.

My son attended Evolving Minds from 2nd grade - 6th grade and we had nothing but an absolute wonderful experience. Through the years J worked with many of the wonderful ladies here. Renee, Gaby, Marvia, & Kathy to name a few. I will forever be grateful and thankful to all the EV minds staff for all they did for J and our family. From the center sessions, in home sessions and helping me advocate at IEP meetings over the years. THANK YOU!! 5 years of ABA and our sons growth is amazing. He has zero unmanageable behaviors at school now, is actively advocating for himself, helps around the house with age appropriate tasks and has so much self confidence! We have since moved, but if I could have taken these ladies with me I would have. The love, care and attention they gave my son and our family over the years has been invaluable and I will forever be grateful to them!!!

I had a wonderful experience with this company. Renee was amazing through the entire journey. They poured their heart and soul into my daughter and she's excelled because of their diligent care. Highly recommend!

It is not easy to reach out heir bill department (only one person Rossana) if you have any billing issue. We have the bill issues couple times but it‚Äôs very hard to find Rossana to communicate I've sent all documents and told them to call me but she always avoid my calls. I waste so much time tried to connect her. It's not the first time to have the bill with problem. Even you go to the office they will tell you Rossana is not there and no one can help. It's hilarious to work so hard to make my payment.

But the services there are all good. The front desk Joanna is very friendly and she always tried very hard to help. She even help Rossana to do extra work to communicate with the clients. Renee is very nice and she was our BCBA. You can feel the efforts she put on my son. She tried very hard to understand my son and arrange very experienced therapists for son since I requested so.
Overall, I highly recommend this place except the bill department. Please ensure to check all transactions of every invoice.

Update1: She called me after this post and agree to create a new invoice without the transactions with issue to let me make a payment. For those two with issue, she promised will contact the insurance company and get back to me. I was very surprised that she didn‚Äôt even read my email.  (Yes she replied my email without even read my email and she admitted it) Hopefully things can be resolved this time.

Update2: The owner is very understanding and supportive as always. She took over the bill department and communicate with me directly. She even wave the extra payment that I'm supposed to pay. Over all, I recommend this facility.

The physicians and staff at Excel is top notch. They‚Äôre very knowledgeable, courteous, and professional. There‚Äôs no over booking so the wait time is minimal. Since I was assigned to CCN from my VA hospital I have been very impressed with their service.  Very professional, courteous and knowledgeable of my situation.  They are efficient in their work.  I am very impressed with their skills and concern for my well being.  I would give EXCEL Spine and 10 stars if i was allowed.

I don‚Äôt recommend them because they always change what they charge. I went in for a procedure today and I‚Äôve only paid $48 for it the last 3 times, and now they want $150. My insurance hasn‚Äôt changed. It‚Äôs not a new year to change the about insurance requires. They didn‚Äôt bother to call me and tell me it was going to be triple the normal amount. So when I showed up for my appointment I had to scrambled to pay $150!!! They have records of the other charges and all they could say is they think the person that checked me in didn‚Äôt know what they were doing is their best guess.
I‚Äôve been a long term patient here for many years and I‚Äôm going to Dr Websters office now that charges CONSIDERABLY LESS for the regular appointments AND the procedures. His office staff is significantly more competent, and I get informed what the fees are before my appointment, and he does a fantastic job.
Also, Dr. Jassal really HURT ME during the procedure he did. He made it clear I was the last patient of the day and he rushed it. Dr. Shah didn‚Äôt hurt me when he did the procedure.

Thanks for your experience commitment & dedication to keeping my pain at a minimum thru procedures and medication your professionalism shows from the front desk to the back Dr. Jassel is great at what he does keeping patients calm and informed on what he's doing during procedures
Thank You Excel Pain&Spine
This Doctor has saved my life! I mean it! He has also given my husband‚Äôs wife back and my children's momma back to them. Thank you so much! TY for fixing the issue instead of throwing RX at it.

If you are looking for a good team of therapist don‚Äôt hesitate. Nivia and her team of therapists are highly recommend. Weather it‚Äôs OT, PT or Speech they are all reflexible, resourceful, and very knowledgeable. Dr. Carroll is phenomenal!  She works with you and your doctors to develop a plan that will encourage you to meet your health and wellness goals. My grandsons loved their experience! Twins are little individuals and they were treated like the special people they are. They have thrived under t h e care of Excel Wellness & Rehab. Highly recommend!

I highly recommend Excel Wellness & Rehab. My son received speech, OT & physical therapy at this office and they do a fantastic job. They will work with your schedule to ensure your child gets the assistance they need.

EST has been the absolute best choice I‚Äôve made for my daughter‚Äôs therapy needs! Sarah and Hannah, I cant say enough how amazing these two are! My daughter looks forward to her sessions and loves spending time with them. They both have truly helped my daughter in so many ways. EST will truly make a difference in your child‚Äôs developmental journey! This is the best place!

I'm incredibly grateful to for the exceptional care and support they've provided to my son in this Place. This place is amazing and highly recommend this place for your babies.

With Exceptional Speech Therapy I‚Äôve had the best experience! I have twins and they have progressed so much since they‚Äôve been attending. provider_name: Exceptional Therapies - Jacksonville - Applied Behavior Analysis
review_text: The team at Exceptional Therapies is very dedicated to not only their kids but also to learning new information and collaborating with other professional for the best possible outcomes. I highly recommend them to anyone that has an autistic child and needs help. Cady-Jo, Hadley, and Jenny  are exceptionally knowledgeable and caring.

provider_name: Exceptional Therapies - Jacksonville - Applied Behavior Analysis
review_text: My son has been attending here for almost a year and his improvement is excelent. The staff is great and his overall skills have been getting better and better everyday.

provider_name: Exceptional Therapies - Jacksonville - Applied Behavior Analysis
review_text:
My son was diagnosed with Autism at 2.5 years old, and we started coming to Exceptional Therapies right before he turned 3. I would say this is probably the best decision we have made for our son, and we see so much progress made in the past one year. When we just started, he was sensitive, nearly non-verbal, has many behavioral issues, now, he has become such a happy boy. We were very overwhelmed and concerned when he just got diagnosed, and we were so worried that he won't be able to go to school like other kids, but now, all the therapist are telling us he could go to school next year, and I am confident he will do well in his future.

Special thanks to Ms Kathy and all RBTs on her team (Madison, Nyjah, Keri, Katie, Emily). Everyone truly cares about what they do, and did a lot to help him grow. We also have frequently parent meeting with Kathy and/or exchange msg, so we are kept up to date on all the progress, skills that being worked on. Now, my son doesn't have much behavioral problems anymore, he is talking non stop, and more independent. Looking back, i can't believe we will be able to achieve all these positive changes without help of this amazing team.

provider_name: Exceptional Therapies - Jacksonville - Applied Behavior Analysis
review_text: Wow, where do I start? If you're looking for ABA for your child, I highly suggest you look no further! I absolutely love what they have done for my son. He's been attending for almost a year now and Kathy is absolutely amazing along with the other RBTs Madison, Katie, Bri, etc. My son has never been out of my sight in anyone's care because of course the world is crazy so I was super nervous about leaving him here but Kathy made all my nerves go away with the group chat they have with all the RBTs. They send pictures and updates throughout the day with the chat and he's always super happy! The days he didn't have ABA he would be bothered and I knew then that he was attached to them which made me superrrrr happy! He wasn't saying much but a couple of words when he started if any and he was 3 years old but now he's 4 and he's saying sooooo much! He utilizes his things he learns at ABA at home. Kathy gives us educational literature to teach us things about autism and anything new to do with our son which makes me aware of how much she analyzes the kids so they reach their full potential! I am so thankful that I trusted the process because I'm super excited for our son to see where he will be in the future. When he was first diagnosed with autism I was terrified of him being capable to be like other kids without autism but Exceptional Therapies gives not only our son confidence but us as parents. Huge thanks to Exceptional Therapies! They aren't only RBTs, they are family! ‚ô•

provider_name: Exceptional Therapies - Jacksonville - Applied Behavior Analysis
review_text:
Best staff and support EVER!  Not only Kathy and her staff are kind, knowledgeable & Caring.  They will go the Extra Mile, above and beyond to care for our rising star.

I feel very supported in my son's ABA therapy. I really like how his therapist always takes the time to speak with me to tell me what goals she is working on with him, what things he is doing well with, and what things he is having a hard time with.

This is the place to go for ABA therapy, PERIOD. üòÄ‚úåÔ∏è

My partner and I took our veiled Chameleon here today for a routine check up and had a wonderful experience! Dr McLeod was very helpful and kind. We received lots of helpful information about chameleon care and felt true compassion from Dr. McLeod. She handled our baby with such care.The staff was also exceptional. We will definitely be returning and hope to try their boarding services in the future. I would recommend this location to other exotic animal owners.

Dr. McLeod did an amazing job with my guinea pig‚Äôs soft tissue surgery to remove a cyst. She was caring, thorough, and made me feel completely at ease. The surgery went smoothly, and recovery has been great. I highly recommend her!üíó

I brought my pet and I should say the receptionist, nurses, Dr, were really kind and compassionate towards my rooster. However they should gave me two bottles of one medication instead  I left only with one. When I called today about the issue, their reaction was like I was lying, some times facial expressions said more than a thousands words. I went to get the medicine , and  what they gave me I‚Äôm pretty sure doesn‚Äôt have 20 ml as I should be.  Never got an apology for the incident, for my time and travel to that place. So check your medications before you left, See the pictures, bigger bottle the one I got when I brought my pet.

Unfortunately I had to put my hamster of 2 1/2 years down today. Dr. McLeod was absolutely wonderful and so kind and gentle with him. This was my first experience with this vet and albeit a sad one, the quality of care and level of respect and compassion from the staff is amazing. I will most definitely be bringing my next pet here for their checkups. Thank you so much for being there to help my baby rest peacefully‚ù§Ô∏è

The staff and Dr. McLeod saved our Oscar from a horrible eye injury with following severe infection. She had stopped eating for weeks and was lying on the bottom of her tank. We contacted several other exotic vets and were told to contact someone else, or that there was nothing to be done for her. We found Exotic Animal Hospital of Orlando by a google search and had an appointment the next day. Dr. McLeod was very knowledgeable and always answered all of our questions and gave us all the options for treatment and everything needed to give her the medications. Dr. McLeod also provided us with different syringes when we were having problems with the ones we originally received and even replaced a dose that was lost during administration no charge. We were able help our 8 year old Oscar fight the infection. She ended up needing surgery to remove her eye. She was taken care of so well during and after her surgery and she has recovered and is eating again and swimming normally. She would 100% have passed away if not for Dr. McLeod and the team at Exotic Animal Hospital of Orlando.

The facility itself is in a great location, well decorated and sparkling clean. I immediately felt comfortable. While waiting, a large screen provides health tips, quotes and facts about spinal care and beyond.
Every single person on their team was warm, caring and knowledgeable. They all clearly and confidently explained everything step-by-step. Their questions were geared to fully understanding my circumstances and goals. The examination was thorough and the doctor made it fun. I felt seen and heard as a whole person. Looking forward to all future appointments. Highly recommend!!

I walked into Experience Health & Wellness in May 2025. Actually, I limped in, barely able to walk or stand. I had been suffering for approximately 3 months and visited the ER a week prior to coming to Experience. The ER visit and follow-up resulted in getting on a heavy dose of pain meds. I'm normally a very active person, and at 54 years of age, I do have some chronic pain from sports related injuries. This particular period of time was unbearable. I was skeptical that anything could be done. However, I started Soft Wave, Adjustments, and Traction two days a week. Within two weeks I was walking normal and finally able to get good sleep. Within a month, I was back to my daily routine of biking, strength training, running, and walking. I was beyond ecstatic over my progress. This week (Sept 2025) I had follow up x-rays and it doesn't even look like the same person/spine from my images in May. I am more active and feel better than I have in 30 years, no exaggeration. My only regret is not getting this treatment earlier! The entire staff is over the top amazing. I am very grateful to everyone at Experience Health & Wellness for giving me my life back!
I‚Äôm so impressed with the staff and the state of art facility. I immediately knew my concerns were being addressed. The staff exhibited precise focus to reach my goal of Health and wellness.

Just finished my first visit with Dr. Clark to explore the benefits of Softwave Therapy. The clinic is very new, beautiful, spacious and comfortable. The staff are very personable, approachable, knowledgeable, and skilled. They take a genuine interest in each patient's health and welfare, taking the time to get to know you personally and make meaningful recommendations. Overall, I'm very impressed with their facility, the staff, and my care. It's a bit soon to tell whether Softwave Therapy will benefit me, but I will try to update my review with therapy results at some point in the future.

This is the best place I‚Äôve ever been to. I am getting chiropractic care and softwave treatments here. You will not find a better place to get care. I‚Äôve been to several chiropractors over the years and this place is unlike any other. They are thorough, genuinely care about their patients, and have top notch customer service. I went in originally for Endometriosis (severe pain during my cycles) and 1.5 months into my care I am having almost pain-free cycles. I now have better digestion, emotional regulation, and my normal pain areas on my upper back/neck are gone. I‚Äôve truly experienced a miracle with my health because of this wonderful place! Every person working there is dedicated to ensuring every patient has the best possible care and experience.

Alicia has been working with my son on his speech and I can‚Äôt put into words how incredibly talented she is. The journey my son has been on so far has been so rewarding but also frustrating at times. I am driven to consistently find what strategy fits best towards my son‚Äôs education. My son has so much great energy and once directed promptly and enthusiastically he is able to intake and pick up on things quickly. I did a lot of research to find the right fit. I wanted something that was going to be truly potent for my son‚Äôs speech. I am so thankful and grateful to say that they have over exceeded my expectations. Thank you Hillary for this one of a kind place for children. You have taken my son to levels I knew he could achieve with the right professionals behind him. So very grateful and with us for life. Thank you

We‚Äôve had such a great experience with Expression 4 Kids! My child‚Äôs speech has improved drastically over the past few months‚Äîhe‚Äôs now able to form sentences and express himself so much more clearly. The progress has been amazing to watch, and I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the support and care we‚Äôve received. I would 10/10 recommend their services to any parent looking for real results!

Only after a few sessions of speech and OT, our little one has improved dramatically! Not only are Shelby and Alicia experts in this field, they are compassionate and gentle. Hilary, the owner goes above and beyond and is not only an exceptional therapist but is so accommodating and kind. I would highly highly recommend expressions 4 kids, hands down!

Hi. Just really wanted to thank the staff for everything they have done for my daughter.  Miss Hilary, Miss Stephanie and especially Miss Alicia,(my baby's guardian angel). It is really hard in soo many ways when your child isn't able to communicate the way most other children are able to. Even harder when you don't know what to do...you look things up...speak to everyone who has kids...Dr's etc. its scary and hard. To have support and expertise. Someone who is  willing to listen to you, educate you,  connect with your child and try different things to help break that barrier is a godsend.  To see it help and work. To see the happiness in your child's eyes... no words... none!
Thank you

We love Expressions 4 kids ! I have learned such helpful tools here for my son and he has enjoyed coming. Hilary and Shelby are so knowledgeable and I knew we were in the right place right from the first visit. Highly recommend !!
I absolutely love this place! The staff is incredibly professional, and it‚Äôs always spotless. I highly recommend it

My son recently started attending this school and so far it‚Äôs been the best thing to happen to us. He‚Äôs happy, he eats from them (he can be stubborn), he comes home smelling great, communication is top notch with the owner and staff, and the facility is super clean! I literally can go on and on but I just have to say thank you to this school because I‚Äôm at peace with my son being away from me which will allows me to work with a peace of mind. Thank you Extended Kids Care!

"I wholeheartedly recommend Extended Kids Care PPEC! As a parent, it's comforting to know that your child is in capable and compassionate hands. What sets this place apart is the owner's unique blend of medical expertise and personal experience.

As a Nurse Practitioner and a mother to a child with a chronic condition, she understands the intricacies of complex care and the emotional nuances of parenting a child with special needs. Her love, dedication, and expertise shine through in every aspect of the care provided.

The staff is warm, attentive, and well-trained. The facilities are clean, safe, and welcoming. But what truly impresses me is the owner's unwavering commitment to providing top-notch care with empathy and kindness.

If you're looking for a trustworthy and nurturing environment for your child, look no further than Extended Kids Care PPEC. You'll be in good hands!"
If you are looking for a safe and wonderful place for you little treasure, it is the place!!

I absolutely love this place and the amazing staff! Since my son started here, he has truly excelled in his development. He was born at 30 weeks and spent time in the NICU, so I was very nervous about returning to work and finding the right care for him. From the very beginning, everyone at The Extended PPEC was so welcoming and understanding, which immediately put me at ease.

All the staff feel like family to both me and my son. They go above and beyond to make sure he‚Äôs happy, healthy, and growing. I love that they send pictures throughout the day so I can see how he‚Äôs doing. They have played such a big role in helping him reach important developmental milestones. I‚Äôm beyond grateful for the care, love, and support they provide every day.

Dr. Tommy Vickers is a miracle worker! I‚Äôve had a billion massages, which did nothing to resolve my issue, and one visit with Dr. Tommy and I‚Äôm a new person! He is beyond thorough, explains everything that he‚Äôs doing, and why he‚Äôs doing it, is very professional, patient and kind. He even gives tips on things you can do on your own to heal. I cant say enough great things about him! I will work with him every chance I get!

5 Stars ‚Äì Tommy is the Best!
Extra Mile Rehab and Performance exceeded my expectations, all thanks to Tommy. He was incredibly knowledgeable, professional, and truly cared about my progress. He took the time to understand my goals, created a personalized plan, and pushed me just the right amount to get results. His positive energy and attention to detail made every session something I looked forward to. If you‚Äôre looking for someone who‚Äôs not only great at what they do but also genuinely invested in your success, Tommy‚Äôs your guy. Highly recommend!

Dr. Tommy is amazing! I went to see him for my upper back/ neck area to work on relieving tension. We had a great session and I felt immediate relief. He is so knowledgeable and educational! Highly recommend

Highly recommend Dr. Tommy! He takes time to listen and discuss issues, provides effective treatment and offers additional support to continue rehab on your own. My first treatment helped me to understand my ongoing issues as well as to alleviate some of my discomfort. I will be returning to have Dr. Tommy help me get my neck and shoulders back into top shape!

I am finally closer to being pain free after years of suffering with pain and immobility. Dr. Tommy spent the time to identify the root cause of my issues, working on strength, mobility and soft tissue. I felt validated in that the treatment plan was centered around maintaining/bettering an active lifestyle. Tommy provided the skills and resources necessary to continuously feel better long after our visits. I‚Äôd highly recommend his services, especially for athletes at any level.

I respect that they were able to get me in the same day to see the vet about my dog‚Äôs eyes. At a high cost.
My primary vet had already prescribed drops, checked the pressure, and confirmed that my dog was blind in one eye even spoke to the doc in the phone.  We were rushed here to get the proper mix of medications to try to save her other eye.

Unfortunately, things went downhill quickly. I was crying, overwhelmed, and struggling to understand what the doctor was saying when they started explaining surgery to remove her eye. They did go over other options, but all still required medications. They said removal was the best option. While I was breaking down, I felt like they had zero sympathy. They eventually gave me a few minutes to think, but the tech who came in was extremely rude when I told her I needed to wait to hear back from my vet tech before making the final decision. She snapped back that I had to wait for my vet tech. I explained that yes, I always run everything through her, but the way it was said felt dismissive and uncaring. She also got upset and made me feel a bit stupid when I requested detailed info on which eye drop goes first.  She said it will all be written down. I understand that but I wanted to make sure I rolled all instructions.

Then they told me surgery could be scheduled for next week, but later offered a sooner date. I chose sooner, but then they added in bloodwork. Also was prescribed medication for her skin something my vet tech later confirmed wasn‚Äôt even necessary.

To make things worse, I later found out this clinic is owned by a certain company and honestly, it feels like all they care about is money and could care less about the most important things compassion, patience, and understanding in a very emotional time.

The even got rude with my primary doctor and the lady got rude with me over the phone when I called to cancel because my vet was able to do the procedure half the cost and other things my dog needed.

This place needs to think about how they treat the owners and speak to them because not one of them has a sense of compassion.

We brought our 8-year-old Great Dane, Duke, to Eye Care for Animals in Tampa after an emergency visit revealed a possible eye condition. Dr. Fife and the team quickly and accurately diagnosed him with a severe case of anterior uveitis.

My husband is a veterinary dentist, so we understand firsthand the importance of involving specialists in complex cases. Dr. Fife‚Äôs expertise, along with the clinic‚Äôs advanced diagnostic tools, ensured Duke received the precise care he needed.

We‚Äôre incredibly grateful for the professionalism, compassion, and knowledge shown by Dr. Fife and the entire staff. Their swift action and thorough approach made a stressful situation so much easier to navigate. Highly recommend Eye Care for Animals for anyone in need of expert veterinary ophthalmology care.

I've had the best experience at Eye Care for Animals in Tampa. My Persian cat had an eye sequestrum and the treatment was five stars every step of the way. They truly care for the animals there and their well being. I would highly recommend them to anyone!
